original: BhP_03.01.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.01.001/1 evam etat purā pṛṣṭo maitreyo bhagavān kila
analyzed: evam etat purā pṛṣṭaḥ maitreyaḥ bhagavān kila

original: BhP_03.01.001/2 kṣattrā vanaṃ praviṣṭena tyaktvā sva-gṛham ṛddhimat
analyzed: kṣattrā vanam praviṣṭena tyaktvā sva gṛham ṛddhimat

original: BhP_03.01.002/1 yad vā ayaṃ mantra-kṛd vo bhagavān akhileśvaraḥ
analyzed: yat vai ayam mantrakṛt vaḥ bhagavān akhila īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.01.002/2 pauravendra-gṛhaṃ hitvā praviveśātmasāt kṛtam
analyzed: paurava indra gṛham hitvā praviveśa ātmasāt kṛtam

original: BhP_03.01.003/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_03.01.003/1 kutra kṣattur bhagavatā maitreyeṇāsa saṅgamaḥ
analyzed: kutra kṣattuḥ bhagavatā maitreyeṇa āsa saṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.003/2 kadā vā saha-saṃvāda etad varṇaya naḥ prabho
analyzed: kadā vā sahasaṃvādaḥ etat varṇaya naḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.01.004/1 na hy alpārthodayas tasya vidurasyāmalātmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi alpa artha udayaḥ tasya vidurasya amala ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.004/2 tasmin varīyasi praśnaḥ sādhu-vādopabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: tasmin varīyasi praśnaḥ sādhuvāda upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.005/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.01.005/1 sa evam ṛṣi-varyo 'yaṃ pṛṣṭo rājñā parīkṣitā
analyzed: saḥ evam ṛṣi varyaḥ yam pṛṣṭaḥ rājñā parīkṣitā

original: BhP_03.01.005/2 praty āha taṃ subahu-vit prītātmā śrūyatām iti
analyzed: prati āha tam su bahu vid prīta ātmā śrūyatām iti

original: BhP_03.01.006/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.01.006/1 yadā tu rājā sva-sutān asādhūn puṣṇan na dharmeṇa vinaṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: yadā tu rājā sva sutān asādhūn puṣṇan na dharmeṇa vinaṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ

original: BhP_03.01.006/2 bhrātur yaviṣṭhasya sutān vibandhūn praveśya lākṣā-bhavane dadāha
analyzed: bhrātuḥ yaviṣṭhasya sutān vibandhūn praveśya lākṣā bhavane dadāha

original: BhP_03.01.007/1 yadā sabhāyāṃ kuru-deva-devyāḥ keśābhimarśaṃ suta-karma garhyam
analyzed: yadā sabhāyām kuru deva devyāḥ keśa abhimarśam suta karma garhyam

original: BhP_03.01.007/2 na vārayām āsa nṛpaḥ snuṣāyāḥ svāsrair harantyāḥ kuca-kuṅkumāni
analyzed: na vārayām āsa nṛpaḥ snuṣāyāḥ sva asraiḥ harantyāḥ kuca kuṅkumāni

original: BhP_03.01.008/1 dyūte tv adharmeṇa jitasya sādhoḥ satyāvalambasya vanaṃ gatasya
analyzed: dyūte tu adharmeṇa jitasya sādhoḥ satya avalambasya vanam gatasya

original: BhP_03.01.008/2 na yācato 'dāt samayena dāyaṃ tamo-juṣāṇo yad ajāta-śatroḥ
analyzed: na yācataḥ dāt samayena dāyam yat ajātaśatroḥ

original: BhP_03.01.009/1 yadā ca pārtha-prahitaḥ sabhāyāṃ jagad-gurur yāni jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: yadā ca pārtha prahitaḥ sabhāyām jagadguruḥ yāni jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.009/2 na tāni puṃsām amṛtāyanāni rājoru mene kṣata-puṇya-leśaḥ
analyzed: na tāni puṃsām amṛtāyanāni rājā uru mene kṣata puṇya leśaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.010/1 yadopahūto bhavanaṃ praviṣṭo mantrāya pṛṣṭaḥ kila pūrvajena
analyzed: yadā upahūtaḥ bhavanam praviṣṭaḥ mantrāya pṛṣṭaḥ kila pūrvajena

original: BhP_03.01.010/2 athāha tan mantra-dṛśāṃ varīyān yan mantriṇo vaidurikaṃ vadanti
analyzed: atha āha tat mantra dṛśām varīyān yat mantriṇaḥ vaidurikam vadanti

original: BhP_03.01.011/1 ajāta-śatroḥ pratiyaccha dāyaṃ titikṣato durviṣahaṃ tavāgaḥ
analyzed: ajātaśatroḥ pratiyaccha dāyam titikṣataḥ durviṣaham tava āgaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.011/2 sahānujo yatra vṛkodarāhiḥ śvasan ruṣā yat tvam alaṃ bibheṣi
analyzed: sahānujaḥ yatra vṛkodara ahiḥ śvasan ruṣā yat tvam alam bibheṣi

original: BhP_03.01.012/1 pārthāṃs tu devo bhagavān mukundo gṛhītavān sakṣiti-deva-devaḥ
analyzed: pārthān tu devaḥ bhagavān mukundaḥ gṛhītavān sa kṣitidevadevaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.012/2 āste sva-puryāṃ yadu-deva-devo vinirjitāśeṣa-nṛdeva-devaḥ
analyzed: āste sva puryām yadu devadevaḥ vinirjita aśeṣa nṛdeva devaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.013/1 sa eṣa doṣaḥ puruṣa-dviḍ āste gṛhān praviṣṭo yam apatya-matyā
analyzed: saḥ eṣa doṣaḥ puruṣa dviṣ āste gṛhān praviṣṭaḥ yam apatya matyā

original: BhP_03.01.013/2 puṣṇāsi kṛṣṇād vimukho gata-śrīs tyajāśv aśaivaṃ kula-kauśalāya
analyzed: puṣṇāsi kṛṣṇāt vimukhaḥ gata śrīḥ tyaja āśu a śaivam kula kauśalāya

original: BhP_03.01.014/1 ity ūcivāṃs tatra suyodhanena pravṛddha-kopa-sphuritādhareṇa
analyzed: iti ūcivān tatra suyodhanena pravṛddha kopa sphurita adhareṇa

original: BhP_03.01.014/2 asat-kṛtaḥ sat-spṛhaṇīya-śīlaḥ kṣattā sakarṇānuja-saubalena
analyzed: asatkṛtaḥ sat spṛhaṇīya śīlaḥ kṣattā sa karṇānuja saubalena

original: BhP_03.01.015/1 ka enam atropajuhāva jihmaṃ dāsyāḥ sutaṃ yad-balinaiva puṣṭaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ enam atrā upajuhāva jihmam dāsyāḥ sutam yad balinā eva puṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.015/2 tasmin pratīpaḥ parakṛtya āste nirvāsyatām āśu purāc chvasānaḥ
analyzed: tasmin pratīpaḥ parakṛtyaḥ āste nirvāsyatām āśu purāt śvasānaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.016/1 svayaṃ dhanur dvāri nidhāya māyāṃ bhrātuḥ puro marmasu tāḍito 'pi
analyzed: svayam dhanuḥ dvāri nidhāya māyām bhrātuḥ puras marmasu tāḍitaḥ u pi

original: BhP_03.01.016/2 sa ittham atyulbaṇa-karṇa-bāṇair gata-vyatho 'yād uru mānayānaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham atyulbaṇa karṇa bāṇaiḥ gata vyathaḥ yāt uru mānayānaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.017/1 sa nirgataḥ kaurava-puṇya-labdho gajāhvayāt tīrtha-padaḥ padāni
analyzed: sa nirgataḥ kaurava puṇya labdhaḥ gaja āhvayāt tīrtha padaḥ padāni

original: BhP_03.01.017/2 anvākramat puṇya-cikīrṣayorvyām adhiṣṭhito yāni sahasra-mūrtiḥ
analyzed: anvākramat puṇya cikīrṣayā urvyām adhiṣṭhitaḥ yāni sahasramūrtiḥ

original: BhP_03.01.018/1 pureṣu puṇyopavanādri-kuñjeṣv apaṅka-toyeṣu sarit-saraḥsu
analyzed: pureṣu puṇya upavana adri kuñjeṣu apaṅka toyeṣu sarit saraḥsu

original: BhP_03.01.018/2 ananta-liṅgaiḥ samalaṅkṛteṣu cacāra tīrthāyataneṣv ananyaḥ
analyzed: ananta liṅgaiḥ samalaṅkṛteṣu cacāra tīrtha āyataneṣu ananyaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.019/1 gāṃ paryaṭan medhya-vivikta-vṛttiḥ sadāpluto 'dhaḥ śayano 'vadhūtaḥ
analyzed: gām paryaṭat medhya vivikta vṛttiḥ sadā āplutaḥ śayanaḥ vadhūtaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.019/2 alakṣitaḥ svair avadhūta-veṣo vratāni cere hari-toṣaṇāni
analyzed: alakṣitaḥ svaiḥ avadhūta veṣaḥ vratāni cere hari toṣaṇāni

original: BhP_03.01.020/1 itthaṃ vrajan bhāratam eva varṣaṃ kālena yāvad gatavān prabhāsam
analyzed: ittham vrajan bhāratam eva varṣam kālena yāvat gatavān prabhāsam

original: BhP_03.01.020/2 tāvac chaśāsa kṣitim eka cakrāml ekātapatrām ajitena pārthaḥ
analyzed: tāvat śaśāsa kṣitim eka eka ātapatrām ajitena pārthaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.021/1 tatrātha śuśrāva suhṛd-vinaṣṭiṃ vanaṃ yathā veṇuja-vahni-saṃśrayam
analyzed: tatra atha śuśrāva suhṛd vinaṣṭim vanam yathā veṇu ja vahni saṃśrayam

original: BhP_03.01.021/2 saṃspardhayā dagdham athānuśocan sarasvatīṃ pratyag iyāya tūṣṇīm
analyzed: saṃspardhayā dagdham atha anuśocan sarasvatīm pratyak iyāya tūṣṇīm

original: BhP_03.01.022/1 tasyāṃ tritasyośanaso manoś ca pṛthor athāgner asitasya vāyoḥ
analyzed: tasyām tritasya uśanasaḥ manoḥ ca pṛthoḥ atha agneḥ asitasya vāyoḥ

original: BhP_03.01.022/2 tīrthaṃ sudāsasya gavāṃ guhasya yac chrāddhadevasya sa āsiṣeve
analyzed: tīrtham sudāsasya gavām guhasya yat śrāddhadevasya saḥ āsiṣeve

original: BhP_03.01.023/1 anyāni ceha dvija-deva-devaiḥ kṛtāni nānāyatanāni viṣṇoḥ
analyzed: anyāni ca iha dvijadeva devaiḥ kṛtāni nānā āyatanāni viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_03.01.023/2 pratyaṅga-mukhyāṅkita-mandirāṇi yad-darśanāt kṛṣṇam anusmaranti
analyzed: pratyaṅga mukhya aṅkita mandirāṇi yad darśanāt kṛṣṇam anusmaranti

original: BhP_03.01.024/1 tatas tv ativrajya surāṣṭram ṛddhaṃ sauvīra-matsyān kurujāṅgalāṃś ca
analyzed: tatas tu ativrajya surāṣṭram ṛddham sauvīra matsyān kurujāṅgalān ca

original: BhP_03.01.024/2 kālena tāvad yamunām upetya tatroddhavaṃ bhāgavataṃ dadarśa
analyzed: kālena tāvat yamunām upetya tatra uddhavam bhāgavatam dadarśa

original: BhP_03.01.025/1 sa vāsudevānucaraṃ praśāntaṃ bṛhaspateḥ prāk tanayaṃ pratītam
analyzed: sa vāsudeva anucaram praśāntam bṛhaspateḥ prāk tanayam pratītam

original: BhP_03.01.025/2 āliṅgya gāḍhaṃ praṇayena bhadraṃ svānām apṛcchad bhagavat-prajānām
analyzed: āliṅgya gāḍham praṇayena bhadram svānām apṛcchat bhagavat prajānām

original: BhP_03.01.026/1 kaccit purāṇau puruṣau svanābhya- pādmānuvṛttyeha kilāvatīrṇau
analyzed: kaccit purāṇau puruṣau svanābhya pādma anuvṛttyā iha kila avatīrṇau

original: BhP_03.01.026/2 āsāta urvyāḥ kuśalaṃ vidhāya kṛta-kṣaṇau kuśalaṃ śūra-gehe
analyzed: āsātaḥ urvyāḥ kuśalam vidhāya kṛtakṣaṇau kuśalam śūra gehe

original: BhP_03.01.027/1 kaccit kurūṇāṃ paramaḥ suhṛn no bhāmaḥ sa āste sukham aṅga śauriḥ
analyzed: kaccit kurūṇām paramaḥ suhṛd naḥ bhāmaḥ saḥ āste sukham aṅga śauriḥ

original: BhP_03.01.027/2 yo vai svas-ṇāṃ pitṛvad dadāti varān vadānyo vara-tarpaṇena
analyzed: yaḥ vai pitṛ vat dadāti varān vadānyaḥ vara tarpaṇena

original: BhP_03.01.028/1 kaccid varūthādhipatir yadūnāṃ pradyumna āste sukham aṅga vīraḥ
analyzed: kaccit varūtha adhipatiḥ yadūnām pradyumnaḥ āste sukham aṅga vīraḥ

original: BhP_03.01.028/2 yaṃ rukmiṇī bhagavato 'bhilebhe ārādhya viprān smaram ādi-sarge
analyzed: yam rukmiṇī bhagavataḥ bhilebhe ārādhya viprān smaram ādisarge

original: BhP_03.01.029/1 kaccit sukhaṃ sātvata-vṛṣṇi-bhoja- dāśārhakāṇām adhipaḥ sa āste
analyzed: kaccit sukham sātvata vṛṣṇi bhoja dāśārhakāṇām adhipaḥ saḥ āste

original: BhP_03.01.029/2 yam abhyaṣiñcac chata-patra-netro nṛpāsanāśāṃ parihṛtya dūrāt
analyzed: yam abhyaṣiñcat śatapatra netraḥ nṛpāsana āśām parihṛtya dūrāt

original: BhP_03.01.030/1 kaccid dhareḥ saumya sutaḥ sadṛkṣa āste 'graṇī rathināṃ sādhu sāmbaḥ
analyzed: kaccit hareḥ saumya sutaḥ sadṛkṣaḥ āste rathinām sādhu sāmbaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.030/2 asūta yaṃ jāmbavatī vratāḍhyā devaṃ guhaṃ yo 'mbikayā dhṛto 'gre
analyzed: asūta yam jāmbavatī vrata āḍhyā devam guham yaḥ mbikayā dhṛtaḥ gre

original: BhP_03.01.031/1 kṣemaṃ sa kaccid yuyudhāna āste yaḥ phālgunāl labdha-dhanū-rahasyaḥ
analyzed: kṣemam sa kaccit yuyudhānaḥ āste yaḥ phālgunāt labdha dhanu rahasyaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.031/2 lebhe 'ñjasādhokṣaja-sevayaiva gatiṃ tadīyāṃ yatibhir durāpām
analyzed: lebhe ñjasā adhokṣaja sevayā eva gatim tadīyām yatibhiḥ durāpām

original: BhP_03.01.032/1 kaccid budhaḥ svasty anamīva āste śvaphalka-putro bhagavat-prapannaḥ
analyzed: kaccit budhaḥ svasti anamīvaḥ āste śvaphalka putraḥ bhagavat prapannaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.032/2 yaḥ kṛṣṇa-pādāṅkita-mārga-pāṃsuṣv aceṣṭata prema-vibhinna-dhairyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṣṇa pāda aṅkita mārga pāṃsuṣu aceṣṭata prema vibhinna dhairyaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.033/1 kaccic chivaṃ devaka-bhoja-putryā viṣṇu-prajāyā iva deva-mātuḥ
analyzed: kaccit śivam devakabhojaputryāḥ viṣṇu prajāyāḥ iva devamātuḥ

original: BhP_03.01.033/2 yā vai sva-garbheṇa dadhāra devaṃ trayī yathā yajña-vitānam artham
analyzed: yā vai sva garbheṇa dadhāra devam trayī yathā yajña vitānam artham

original: BhP_03.01.034/1 apisvid āste bhagavān sukhaṃ vo yaḥ sātvatāṃ kāma-dugho 'niruddhaḥ
analyzed: api svid āste bhagavān sukham vaḥ yaḥ sātvatām kāmadughaḥ niruddhaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.034/2 yam āmananti sma hi śabda-yoniṃ mano-mayaṃ sattva-turīya-tattvam
analyzed: yam āmananti sma hi śabdayonim manaḥ mayam sattva turīya tattvam

original: BhP_03.01.035/1 apisvid anye ca nijātma-daivam ananya-vṛttyā samanuvratā ye
analyzed: api svid anye ca nija ātma daivam ananyavṛttyā samanuvratāḥ ye

original: BhP_03.01.035/2 hṛdīka-satyātmaja-cārudeṣṇa- gadādayaḥ svasti caranti saumya
analyzed: gada ādayaḥ svasti caranti saumya

original: BhP_03.01.036/1 api sva-dorbhyāṃ vijayācyutābhyāṃ dharmeṇa dharmaḥ paripāti setum
analyzed: api sva dorbhyām vijaya acyutābhyām dharmeṇa dharmaḥ paripāti setum

original: BhP_03.01.036/2 duryodhano 'tapyata yat-sabhāyāṃ sāmrājya-lakṣmyā vijayānuvṛttyā
analyzed: duryodhano tapyata yat sabhāyām sāmrājya lakṣmyā vijaya anuvṛttyā

original: BhP_03.01.037/1 kiṃ vā kṛtāgheṣv agham atyamarṣī bhīmo 'hivad dīrghatamaṃ vyamuñcat
analyzed: kim vā kṛta agheṣu agham ati amarṣī bhīmaḥ hi vat dīrghatamam vyamuñcat

original: BhP_03.01.037/2 yasyāṅghri-pātaṃ raṇa-bhūr na sehe mārgaṃ gadāyāś carato vicitram
analyzed: yasya aṅghri pātam raṇabhūḥ na sehe mārgam gadāyāḥ carataḥ vicitram

original: BhP_03.01.038/1 kaccid yaśodhā ratha-yūthapānāṃ gāṇḍīva-dhanvoparatārir āste
analyzed: kaccit ratha yūthapānām gāṇḍīvadhanvā uparatāriḥ āste

original: BhP_03.01.038/2 alakṣito yac-chara-kūṭa-gūḍho māyā-kirāto giriśas tutoṣa
analyzed: alakṣitaḥ yat śara kūṭa gūḍhaḥ māyā kirātaḥ giriśaḥ tutoṣa

original: BhP_03.01.039/1 yamāv utasvit tanayau pṛthāyāḥ pārthair vṛtau pakṣmabhir akṣiṇīva
analyzed: yamau uta svid tanayau pṛthāyāḥ pārthaiḥ vṛtau pakṣmabhiḥ akṣiṇī iva

original: BhP_03.01.039/2 remāta uddāya mṛdhe sva-rikthaṃ parāt suparṇāv iva vajri-vaktrāt
analyzed: uddāya mṛdhe sva riktham parāt suparṇau iva vajri vaktrāt

original: BhP_03.01.040/1 aho pṛthāpi dhriyate 'rbhakārthe rājarṣi-varyeṇa vināpi tena
analyzed: aho pṛthā api dhriyate rbhaka arthe rājarṣi varyeṇa vinā api tena

original: BhP_03.01.040/2 yas tv eka-vīro 'dhiratho vijigye dhanur dvitīyaḥ kakubhaś catasraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu ekavīraḥ dhirathaḥ vijigye dhanuḥ dvitīyaḥ kakubhaḥ catasraḥ

original: BhP_03.01.041/1 saumyānuśoce tam adhaḥ-patantaṃ bhrātre paretāya vidudruhe yaḥ
analyzed: saumya anuśoce tam adhas patantam bhrātre paretāya vidudruhe yaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.041/2 niryāpito yena suhṛt sva-puryā ahaṃ sva-putrān samanuvratena
analyzed: niryāpitaḥ yena suhṛd sva puryāḥ aham sva putrān samanuvratena

original: BhP_03.01.042/1 so 'haṃ harer martya-viḍambanena dṛśo nṛṇāṃ cālayato vidhātuḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham hareḥ martya viḍambanena dṛśaḥ nṛṇām cālayataḥ vidhātuḥ

original: BhP_03.01.042/2 nānyopalakṣyaḥ padavīṃ prasādāc carāmi paśyan gata-vismayo 'tra
analyzed: na anya upalakṣyaḥ padavīm prasādāt carāmi paśyan gata vismayaḥ

original: BhP_03.01.043/1 nūnaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ tri-madotpathānāṃ mahīṃ muhuś cālayatāṃ camūbhiḥ
analyzed: nūnam nṛpāṇām trimada utpathānām mahīm muhur cālayatām camūbhiḥ

original: BhP_03.01.043/2 vadhāt prapannārti-jihīrṣayeśo 'py upaikṣatāghaṃ bhagavān kurūṇām
analyzed: vadhāt prapanna ārti jihīrṣayā īśaḥ upi upaikṣata agham bhagavān kurūṇām

original: BhP_03.01.044/1 ajasya janmotpatha-nāśanāya karmāṇy akartur grahaṇāya puṃsām
analyzed: ajasya janma utpatha nāśanāya karmāṇi akartuḥ grahaṇāya puṃsām

original: BhP_03.01.044/2 nanv anyathā ko 'rhati deha-yogaṃ paro guṇānām uta karma-tantram
analyzed: nanu anyathā kaḥ rhati deha yogam paras guṇānām uta karma tantram

original: BhP_03.01.045/1 tasya prapannākhila-lokapānām avasthitānām anuśāsane sve
analyzed: tasya prapanna akhila lokapānām avasthitānām anuśāsane sve

original: BhP_03.01.045/2 arthāya jātasya yaduṣv ajasya vārtāṃ sakhe kīrtaya tīrtha-kīrteḥ
analyzed: arthāya jātasya yaduṣu ajasya vārtām sakhe kīrtaya tīrtha kīrteḥ

original: BhP_03.02.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.02.001/1 iti bhāgavataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā vārtāṃ priyāśrayām
analyzed: iti bhāgavataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā vārtām priya āśrayām

original: BhP_03.02.001/2 prativaktuṃ na cotseha autkaṇṭhyāt smāriteśvaraḥ
analyzed: prativaktum na ca utseha autkaṇṭhyāt smārita īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.02.002/1 yaḥ pañca-hāyano mātrā prātar-āśāya yācitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pañca hāyanaḥ mātrā prātarāśāya yācitaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.002/2 tan naicchad racayan yasya saparyāṃ bāla-līlayā
analyzed: tat na aicchat racayan yasya saparyām bāla līlayā

original: BhP_03.02.003/1 sa kathaṃ sevayā tasya kālena jarasaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: sa katham sevayā tasya kālena jarasam gataḥ

original: BhP_03.02.003/2 pṛṣṭo vārtāṃ pratibrūyād bhartuḥ pādāv anusmaran
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ vārtām pratibrūyāt bhartuḥ pādau anusmaran

original: BhP_03.02.004/1 sa muhūrtam abhūt tūṣṇīṃ kṛṣṇāṅghri-sudhayā bhṛśam
analyzed: sa muhūrtam abhūt tūṣṇīm kṛṣṇa aṅghri sudhayā bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.02.004/2 tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena nimagnaḥ sādhu nirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: tīvreṇa bhakti yogena nimagnaḥ sādhu nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.005/1 pulakodbhinna-sarvāṅgo muñcan mīlad-dṛśā śucaḥ
BhP_03.02.005/2 pūrṇārtho lakṣitas tena sneha-prasara-samplutaḥ
BhP_03.02.006/1 śanakair bhagaval-lokān nṛlokaṃ punar āgataḥ
analyzed: śanakais bhagavat lokāt nṛ lokam punar āgataḥ

original: BhP_03.02.006/2 vimṛjya netre viduraṃ prītyāhoddhava utsmayan
analyzed: vimṛjya netre viduram prītyā āha uddhavaḥ utsmayan

original: BhP_03.02.007/0 uddhava uvāca
analyzed: uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.02.007/1 kṛṣṇa-dyumaṇi nimloce gīrṇeṣv ajagareṇa ha
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dyu maṇi nimloce gīrṇeṣu ajagareṇa ha

original: BhP_03.02.007/2 kiṃ nu naḥ kuśalaṃ brūyāṃ gata-śrīṣu gṛheṣv aham
analyzed: kim nu naḥ kuśalam brūyām gata śrīṣu gṛheṣu aham

original: BhP_03.02.008/1 durbhago bata loko 'yaṃ yadavo nitarām api
analyzed: durbhagaḥ bata lokaḥ yam yadavaḥ nitarām api

original: BhP_03.02.008/2 ye saṃvasanto na vidur hariṃ mīnā ivoḍupam
analyzed: ye saṃvasantaḥ na viduḥ harim mīnāḥ iva uḍupam

original: BhP_03.02.009/1 iṅgita-jñāḥ puru-prauḍhā ekārāmāś ca sātvatāḥ
analyzed: iṅgita jñāḥ puru prauḍhāḥ eka ārāmāḥ ca sātvatāḥ

original: BhP_03.02.009/2 sātvatām ṛṣabhaṃ sarve bhūtāvāsam amaṃsata
analyzed: sātvatām ṛṣabham sarve bhūtāvāsam amaṃsata

original: BhP_03.02.010/1 devasya māyayā spṛṣṭā ye cānyad asad-āśritāḥ
analyzed: devasya māyayā spṛṣṭāḥ ye ca anyat asat āśritāḥ

original: BhP_03.02.010/2 bhrāmyate dhīr na tad-vākyair ātmany uptātmano harau
analyzed: bhrāmyate dhīḥ na tad vākyaiḥ ātmani upta ātmanaḥ harau

original: BhP_03.02.011/1 pradarśyātapta-tapasām avitṛpta-dṛśāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: pradarśya atapta tapasām a vitṛpta dṛśām nṛṇām

original: BhP_03.02.011/2 ādāyāntar adhād yas tu sva-bimbaṃ loka-locanam
analyzed: ādāya antar adhāt yaḥ tu sva bimbam lokalocanam

original: BhP_03.02.012/1 yan martya-līlaupayikaṃ sva-yoga- māyā-balaṃ darśayatā gṛhītam
analyzed: yat martya līlā aupayikam sva yoga māyā balam darśayatā gṛhītam

original: BhP_03.02.012/2 vismāpanaṃ svasya ca saubhagarddheḥ paraṃ padaṃ bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇāṅgam
analyzed: vismāpanam svasya ca saubhaga ṛddheḥ param padam bhūṣaṇa bhūṣaṇa aṅgam

original: BhP_03.02.013/1 yad dharma-sūnor bata rājasūye nirīkṣya dṛk-svastyayanaṃ tri-lokaḥ
analyzed: yat dharma sūnoḥ bata rājasūye nirīkṣya dṛś svastyayanam trilokaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.013/2 kārtsnyena cādyeha gataṃ vidhātur arvāk-sṛtau kauśalam ity amanyata
analyzed: kārtsnyena ca adyā iha gatam vidhātuḥ arvāk sṛtau kauśalam iti amanyata

original: BhP_03.02.014/1 yasyānurāga-pluta-hāsa-rāsa- līlāvaloka-pratilabdha-mānāḥ
analyzed: yasya anurāga pluta hāsa rāsa līlā avaloka pratilabdha mānāḥ

original: BhP_03.02.014/2 vraja-striyo dṛgbhir anupravṛtta- dhiyo 'vatasthuḥ kila kṛtya-śeṣāḥ
analyzed: vrajastriyaḥ anupravṛtta dhiyaḥ vatasthuḥ kila kṛtyaśeṣāḥ

original: BhP_03.02.015/1 sva-śānta-rūpeṣv itaraiḥ sva-rūpair abhyardyamāneṣv anukampitātmā
analyzed: sva śānta rūpeṣu itaraiḥ sva rūpaiḥ abhyardyamāneṣu anukampita ātmā

original: BhP_03.02.015/2 parāvareśo mahad-aṃśa-yukto hy ajo 'pi jāto bhagavān yathāgniḥ
analyzed: parāvara īśaḥ mahat aṃśa yuktaḥ hi ajaḥ jātaḥ bhagavān yathā agniḥ

original: BhP_03.02.016/1 māṃ khedayaty etad ajasya janma- viḍambanaṃ yad vasudeva-gehe
analyzed: mām khedayati etat ajasya janma viḍambanam yat vasudeva gehe

original: BhP_03.02.016/2 vraje ca vāso 'ri-bhayād iva svayaṃ purād vyavātsīd yad-ananta-vīryaḥ
analyzed: vraje ca vāsaḥ ribhayāt iva svayam purāt vyavātsīt yat ananta vīryaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.017/1 dunoti cetaḥ smarato mamaitad yad āha pādāv abhivandya pitroḥ
analyzed: dunoti cetaḥ smarataḥ mama etat yat āha pādau abhivandya pitroḥ

original: BhP_03.02.017/2 tātāmba kaṃsād uru-śaṅkitānāṃ prasīdataṃ no 'kṛta-niṣkṛtīnām
analyzed: tāta amba kaṃsāt uru śaṅkitānām prasīdatam no kṛta niṣkṛtīnām

original: BhP_03.02.018/1 ko vā amuṣyāṅghri-saroja-reṇuṃ vismartum īśīta pumān vijighran
analyzed: kaḥ vai amuṣya aṅghri saroja reṇum vismartum īśīta pumān vijighran

original: BhP_03.02.018/2 yo visphurad-bhrū-viṭapena bhūmer bhāraṃ kṛtāntena tiraścakāra
analyzed: yaḥ visphurat bhrū viṭapena bhūmeḥ bhāram kṛtāntena tiras cakāra

original: BhP_03.02.019/1 dṛṣṭā bhavadbhir nanu rājasūye caidyasya kṛṣṇaṃ dviṣato 'pi siddhiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭā bhavadbhiḥ nanu rājasūye caidyasya kṛṣṇam dviṣataḥ u siddhiḥ

original: BhP_03.02.019/2 yāṃ yoginaḥ saṃspṛhayanti samyag yogena kas tad-virahaṃ saheta
analyzed: yām yoginaḥ saṃspṛhayanti samyak yogena kaḥ tad viraham saheta

original: BhP_03.02.020/1 tathaiva cānye nara-loka-vīrā ya āhave kṛṣṇa-mukhāravindam
analyzed: tathā eva ca anye nara loka vīrāḥ ye āhave kṛṣṇa mukha aravindam

original: BhP_03.02.020/2 netraiḥ pibanto nayanābhirāmaṃ pārthāstra-pūtaḥ padam āpur asya
analyzed: netraiḥ pibantaḥ nayana abhirāmam pārtha astra pūtaḥ padam āpuḥ asya

original: BhP_03.02.021/1 svayaṃ tv asāmyātiśayas tryadhīśaḥ svārājya-lakṣmy-āpta-samasta-kāmaḥ
BhP_03.02.021/2 baliṃ haradbhiś cira-loka-pālaiḥ kirīṭa-koṭy-eḍita-pāda-pīṭhaḥ
analyzed: balim haradbhiḥ cira lokapālaiḥ kirīṭa koṭyā īḍita pāda pīṭhaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.022/1 tat tasya kaiṅkaryam alaṃ bhṛtān no viglāpayaty aṅga yad ugrasenam
analyzed: tat tasya kaiṅkaryam alam bhṛtān naḥ viglāpayati aṅga yat ugrasenam

original: BhP_03.02.022/2 tiṣṭhan niṣaṇṇaṃ parameṣṭhi-dhiṣṇye nyabodhayad deva nidhārayeti
analyzed: tiṣṭhat niṣaṇṇam parameṣṭhi dhiṣṇye nyabodhayat deva nidhāraya iti

original: BhP_03.02.023/1 aho bakī yaṃ stana-kāla-kūṭaṃ jighāṃsayāpāyayad apy asādhvī
analyzed: aho bakī yam stana kālakūṭam jighāṃsayā apāyayat api asādhvī

original: BhP_03.02.023/2 lebhe gatiṃ dhātry-ucitāṃ tato 'nyaṃ kaṃ vā dayāluṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajema
analyzed: lebhe gatim dhātrī ucitām tatas kam vā dayālum śaraṇam vrajema

original: BhP_03.02.024/1 manye 'surān bhāgavatāṃs tryadhīśe saṃrambha-mārgābhiniviṣṭa-cittān
analyzed: manye surān bhāgavatān tryadhīśe saṃrambha mārga abhiniviṣṭa cittān

original: BhP_03.02.024/2 ye saṃyuge 'cakṣata tārkṣya-putram aṃse sunābhāyudham āpatantam
analyzed: ye saṃyuge cakṣata tārkṣyaputram aṃse sunābha āyudham āpatantam

original: BhP_03.02.025/1 vasudevasya devakyāṃ jāto bhojendra-bandhane
analyzed: vasudevasya devakyām jātaḥ bhojendra bandhane

original: BhP_03.02.025/2 cikīrṣur bhagavān asyāḥ śam ajenābhiyācitaḥ
analyzed: cikīrṣuḥ bhagavān asyāḥ śam ajena abhiyācitaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.026/1 tato nanda-vrajam itaḥ pitrā kaṃsād vibibhyatā
analyzed: tatas nanda vrajam itaḥ pitrā kaṃsāt vibibhyatā

original: BhP_03.02.026/2 ekādaśa samās tatra gūḍhārciḥ sa-balo 'vasat
analyzed: ekādaśa samāḥ tatra gūḍha arciḥ sa balaḥ vasat

original: BhP_03.02.027/1 parīto vatsapair vatsāṃś cārayan vyaharad vibhuḥ
analyzed: parītaḥ vatsapaiḥ vatsān cārayan vyaharat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.02.027/2 yamunopavane kūjad- dvija-saṅkulitāṅghripe
analyzed: yamunā upavane kūjat dvija saṅkulita aṅghripe

original: BhP_03.02.028/1 kaumārīṃ darśayaṃś ceṣṭāṃ prekṣaṇīyāṃ vrajaukasām
analyzed: kaumārīm darśayan ceṣṭām prekṣaṇīyām vrajaukasām

original: BhP_03.02.028/2 rudann iva hasan mugdha- bāla-siṃhāvalokanaḥ
analyzed: rudan iva hasan mugdha bāla siṃha avalokanaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.029/1 sa eva go-dhanaṃ lakṣmyā niketaṃ sita-go-vṛṣam
analyzed: saḥ eva go dhanam lakṣmyāḥ niketam sita go vṛṣam

original: BhP_03.02.029/2 cārayann anugān gopān raṇad-veṇur arīramat
analyzed: cārayan anugān gopān arīramat

original: BhP_03.02.030/1 prayuktān bhoja-rājena māyinaḥ kāma-rūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: prayuktān bhojarājena māyinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.030/2 līlayā vyanudat tāṃs tān bālaḥ krīḍanakān iva
analyzed: līlayā vyanudat tān tān bālaḥ krīḍanakān iva

original: BhP_03.02.031/1 vipannān viṣa-pānena nigṛhya bhujagādhipam
analyzed: vipannān viṣa pānena nigṛhya bhujaga adhipam

original: BhP_03.02.031/2 utthāpyāpāyayad gāvas tat toyaṃ prakṛti-sthitam
analyzed: utthāpya apāyayat gāvaḥ tat toyam prakṛti sthitam

original: BhP_03.02.032/1 ayājayad go-savena gopa-rājaṃ dvijottamaiḥ
analyzed: ayājayat gosavena gopa rājam dvijottamaiḥ

original: BhP_03.02.032/2 vittasya coru-bhārasya cikīrṣan sad-vyayaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: vittasya ca uru bhārasya cikīrṣan sat vyayam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.02.033/1 varṣatīndre vrajaḥ kopād bhagnamāne 'tivihvalaḥ
analyzed: varṣati indre vrajaḥ kopāt bhagna māne ti vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_03.02.033/2 gotra-līlātapatreṇa trāto bhadrānugṛhṇatā
analyzed: gotra līlā ātapatreṇa trātaḥ bhadra anugṛhṇatā

original: BhP_03.02.034/1 śarac-chaśi-karair mṛṣṭaṃ mānayan rajanī-mukham
analyzed: śarad śaśi karaiḥ mṛṣṭam mānayan rajanīmukham

original: BhP_03.02.034/2 gāyan kala-padaṃ reme strīṇāṃ maṇḍala-maṇḍanaḥ
analyzed: gāyan kala padam reme strīṇām maṇḍala maṇḍanaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.001/0 uddhava uvāca
analyzed: uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.03.001/1 tataḥ sa āgatya puraṃ sva-pitroś cikīrṣayā śaṃ baladeva-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: tatas saḥ āgatya puram sva pitroḥ cikīrṣayā śam baladeva saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.001/2 nipātya tuṅgād ripu-yūtha-nāthaṃ hataṃ vyakarṣad vyasum ojasorvyām
analyzed: nipātya tuṅgāt ripu yūtha nātham hatam vyakarṣat vyasum ojasā urvyām

original: BhP_03.03.002/1 sāndīpaneḥ sakṛt proktaṃ brahmādhītya sa-vistaram
analyzed: sāndīpaneḥ sakṛt proktam brahma adhītya sa vistaram

original: BhP_03.03.002/2 tasmai prādād varaṃ putraṃ mṛtaṃ pañca-janodarāt
analyzed: tasmai prādāt varam putram mṛtam pañcajana udarāt

original: BhP_03.03.003/1 samāhutā bhīṣmaka-kanyayā ye śriyaḥ savarṇena bubhūṣayaiṣām
analyzed: bhīṣmaka kanyayā ye śriyaḥ savarṇena

original: BhP_03.03.003/2 gāndharva-vṛttyā miṣatāṃ sva-bhāgaṃ jahre padaṃ mūrdhni dadhat suparṇaḥ
analyzed: gāndharva vṛttyāḥ miṣatām sva bhāgam jahre padam mūrdhni dadhat suparṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.004/1 kakudmino 'viddha-naso damitvā svayaṃvare nāgnajitīm uvāha
analyzed: kakudminaḥ viddha nasaḥ damitvā svayaṃvare nāgnajitīm uvāha

original: BhP_03.03.004/2 tad-bhagnamānān api gṛdhyato 'jñāñ jaghne 'kṣataḥ śastra-bhṛtaḥ sva-śastraiḥ
analyzed: tad bhagna mānān api gṛdhyataḥ jñām jaghne kṣataḥ śastrabhṛtaḥ sva śastraiḥ

original: BhP_03.03.005/1 priyaṃ prabhur grāmya iva priyāyā vidhitsur ārcchad dyutaruṃ yad-arthe
analyzed: priyam prabhuḥ grāmye iva priyāyāḥ vidhitsuḥ ārcchat dyutarum yad arthe

original: BhP_03.03.005/2 vajry ādravat taṃ sa-gaṇo ruṣāndhaḥ krīḍā-mṛgo nūnam ayaṃ vadhūnām
analyzed: vajrī ādravat tam sa gaṇaḥ ruṣā andhaḥ krīḍāmṛgaḥ nūnam ayam vadhūnām

original: BhP_03.03.006/1 sutaṃ mṛdhe khaṃ vapuṣā grasantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sunābhonmathitaṃ dharitryā
analyzed: sutam mṛdhe kham vapuṣā grasantam dṛṣṭvā sunābha unmathitam dharitryā

original: BhP_03.03.006/2 āmantritas tat-tanayāya śeṣaṃ dattvā tad-antaḥ-puram āviveśa
analyzed: āmantritaḥ tad tanayāya śeṣam dattvā tad antaḥpuram āviveśa

original: BhP_03.03.007/1 tatrāhṛtās tā nara-deva-kanyāḥ kujena dṛṣṭvā harim ārta-bandhum
analyzed: tatra āhṛtāḥ tāḥ naradeva kanyāḥ kujena dṛṣṭvā harim ārta bandhum

original: BhP_03.03.007/2 utthāya sadyo jagṛhuḥ praharṣa- vrīḍānurāga-prahitāvalokaiḥ
analyzed: utthāya sadyas jagṛhuḥ praharṣa vrīḍā anurāga prahita avalokaiḥ

original: BhP_03.03.008/1 āsāṃ muhūrta ekasmin nānāgāreṣu yoṣitām
analyzed: āsām muhūrte ekasmin nānā āgāreṣu yoṣitām

original: BhP_03.03.008/2 sa-vidhaṃ jagṛhe pāṇīn anurūpaḥ sva-māyayā
analyzed: savidham jagṛhe pāṇīn anurūpaḥ sva māyayā

original: BhP_03.03.009/1 tāsv apatyāny ajanayad ātma-tulyāni sarvataḥ
analyzed: tāsu apatyāni ajanayat ātma tulyāni sarvatas

original: BhP_03.03.009/2 ekaikasyāṃ daśa daśa prakṛter vibubhūṣayā
analyzed: ekaikasyām daśa daśa prakṛteḥ vibubhūṣayā

original: BhP_03.03.010/1 kāla-māgadha-śālvādīn anīkai rundhataḥ puram
analyzed: kāla māgadha śālva ādīn anīkaiḥ rundhataḥ puram

original: BhP_03.03.010/2 ajīghanat svayaṃ divyaṃ sva-puṃsāṃ teja ādiśat
analyzed: ajīghanat svayam divyam sva puṃsām tejaḥ ādiśat

original: BhP_03.03.011/1 śambaraṃ dvividaṃ bāṇaṃ muraṃ balvalam eva ca
analyzed: śambaram dvividam bāṇam muram balvalam eva ca

original: BhP_03.03.011/2 anyāṃś ca dantavakrādīn avadhīt kāṃś ca ghātayat
analyzed: anyān ca dantavakra ādīn avadhīt kān ca ghātayat

original: BhP_03.03.012/1 atha te bhrātṛ-putrāṇāṃ pakṣayoḥ patitān nṛpān
analyzed: atha te bhrātṛ putrāṇām pakṣayoḥ patitān nṛpān

original: BhP_03.03.012/2 cacāla bhūḥ kurukṣetraṃ yeṣām āpatatāṃ balaiḥ
analyzed: cacāla bhūḥ kurukṣetram yeṣām āpatatām balaiḥ

original: BhP_03.03.013/1 sa karṇa-duḥśāsana-saubalānāṃ kumantra-pākena hata-śriyāyuṣam
analyzed: sa karṇa duḥśāsana saubalānām kumantra pākena hata śriyā āyuṣam

original: BhP_03.03.013/2 suyodhanaṃ sānucaraṃ śayānaṃ bhagnorum ūrvyāṃ na nananda paśyan
analyzed: suyodhanam sa anucaram śayānam bhagna ūrum ūrvyām na nananda paśyan

original: BhP_03.03.014/1 kiyān bhuvo 'yaṃ kṣapitoru-bhāro yad droṇa-bhīṣmārjuna-bhīma-mūlaiḥ
analyzed: kiyān bhuvaḥ yam kṣapita ūru bhāraḥ yat droṇa bhīṣma arjuna bhīma mūlaiḥ

original: BhP_03.03.014/2 aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇiko mad-aṃśair āste balaṃ durviṣahaṃ yadūnām
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa akṣauhiṇikaḥ mad aṃśaiḥ āste balam durviṣaham yadūnām

original: BhP_03.03.015/1 mitho yadaiṣāṃ bhavitā vivādo madhv-āmadātāmra-vilocanānām
analyzed: mithas yadā eṣām bhavitā vivādaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.015/2 naiṣāṃ vadhopāya iyān ato 'nyo mayy udyate 'ntardadhate svayaṃ sma
analyzed: na eṣām vadha upāyaḥ iyān atas nyaḥ mayi udyate ntardadhate svayam sma

original: BhP_03.03.016/1 evaṃ sañcintya bhagavān sva-rājye sthāpya dharmajam
analyzed: evam sañcintya bhagavān sva rājye sthāpya dharmajam

original: BhP_03.03.016/2 nandayām āsa suhṛdaḥ sādhūnāṃ vartma darśayan
analyzed: nandayām āsa suhṛdaḥ sādhūnām vartma darśayan

original: BhP_03.03.017/1 uttarāyāṃ dhṛtaḥ pūror vaṃśaḥ sādhv-abhimanyunā
analyzed: uttarāyām dhṛtaḥ pūroḥ vaṃśaḥ sādhu abhimanyunā

original: BhP_03.03.017/2 sa vai drauṇy-astra-sampluṣṭaḥ punar bhagavatā dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa vai drauṇi astra sampluṣṭaḥ punar bhagavatā dhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.018/1 ayājayad dharma-sutam aśvamedhais tribhir vibhuḥ
analyzed: ayājayat dharmasutam aśvamedhaiḥ tribhiḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.03.018/2 so 'pi kṣmām anujai rakṣan reme kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi kṣmām anujaiḥ rakṣan reme kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_03.03.019/1 bhagavān api viśvātmā loka-veda-pathānugaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api viśvātmā loka veda patha anugaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.019/2 kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.020/1 snigdha-smitāvalokena vācā pīyūṣa-kalpayā
analyzed: snigdha smita avalokena vācā pīyūṣa kalpayā

original: BhP_03.03.020/2 caritreṇānavadyena śrī-niketena cātmanā
analyzed: caritreṇa anavadyena śrīniketena ca ātmanā

original: BhP_03.03.021/1 imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva ramayan sutarāṃ yadūn
analyzed: imam lokam amum ca eva ramayan sutarām yadūn

original: BhP_03.03.021/2 reme kṣaṇadayā datta- kṣaṇa-strī-kṣaṇa-sauhṛdaḥ
analyzed: reme kṣaṇadayā datta kṣaṇa strī kṣaṇa sauhṛdaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.022/1 tasyaivaṃ ramamāṇasya saṃvatsara-gaṇān bahūn
analyzed: tasya evam ramamāṇasya saṃvatsara gaṇān bahūn

original: BhP_03.03.022/2 gṛhamedheṣu yogeṣu virāgaḥ samajāyata
analyzed: gṛhamedheṣu yogeṣu virāgaḥ samajāyata

original: BhP_03.03.023/1 daivādhīneṣu kāmeṣu daivādhīnaḥ svayaṃ pumān
analyzed: daiva adhīneṣu kāmeṣu daiva adhīnaḥ svayam pumān

original: BhP_03.03.023/2 ko viśrambheta yogena yogeśvaram anuvrataḥ
analyzed: kaḥ viśrambheta yogena yogeśvaram anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_03.03.024/1 puryāṃ kadācit krīḍadbhir yadu-bhoja-kumārakaiḥ
analyzed: puryām kadācid krīḍadbhiḥ yadu bhoja kumārakaiḥ

original: BhP_03.03.024/2 kopitā munayaḥ śepur bhagavan-mata-kovidāḥ
analyzed: kopitāḥ munayaḥ śepuḥ bhagavat mata kovidāḥ

original: BhP_03.03.025/1 tataḥ katipayair māsair vṛṣṇi-bhojāndhakādayaḥ
analyzed: tatas katipayaiḥ māsaiḥ vṛṣṇi bhoja andhaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.03.025/2 yayuḥ prabhāsaṃ saṃhṛṣṭā rathair deva-vimohitāḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ prabhāsam saṃhṛṣṭāḥ rathaiḥ deva vimohitāḥ

original: BhP_03.03.026/1 tatra snātvā pit-n devān ṛṣīṃś caiva tad-ambhasā
analyzed: tatra snātvā devān ṛṣīn ca eva tad ambhasā

original: BhP_03.03.026/2 tarpayitvātha viprebhyo gāvo bahu-guṇā daduḥ
analyzed: tarpayitvā atha viprebhyaḥ gāvaḥ bahu guṇāḥ daduḥ

original: BhP_03.03.027/1 hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ śayyāṃ vāsāṃsy ajina-kambalān
analyzed: hiraṇyam rajatam śayyām vāsāṃsi ajina kambalān

original: BhP_03.03.027/2 yānaṃ rathān ibhān kanyā dharāṃ vṛtti-karīm api
analyzed: yānam rathān ibhān kanyāḥ dharām vṛttikarīm api

original: BhP_03.03.028/1 annaṃ coru-rasaṃ tebhyo dattvā bhagavad-arpaṇam
analyzed: annam ca uru rasam tebhyaḥ dattvā bhagavat arpaṇam

original: BhP_03.03.028/2 go-viprārthāsavaḥ śūrāḥ praṇemur bhuvi mūrdhabhiḥ
analyzed: go vipra artha asavaḥ śūrāḥ praṇemuḥ bhuvi mūrdhabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.04.001/0 uddhava uvāca
analyzed: uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.001/1 atha te tad-anujñātā bhuktvā pītvā ca vāruṇīm
analyzed: atha te tad anujñātāḥ bhuktvā pītvā ca vāruṇīm

original: BhP_03.04.001/2 tayā vibhraṃśita-jñānā duruktair marma paspṛśuḥ
analyzed: tayā vibhraṃśita jñānā duruktaiḥ marma paspṛśuḥ

original: BhP_03.04.002/1 teṣāṃ maireya-doṣeṇa viṣamīkṛta-cetasām
analyzed: teṣām maireya doṣeṇa viṣamīkṛta cetasām

original: BhP_03.04.002/2 nimlocati ravāv āsīd veṇūnām iva mardanam
analyzed: nimlocati ravau āsīt veṇūnām iva mardanam

original: BhP_03.04.003/1 bhagavān svātma-māyāyā gatiṃ tām avalokya saḥ
analyzed: bhagavān sva ātma māyāyāḥ gatim tām avalokya saḥ

original: BhP_03.04.003/1 sarasvatīm upaspṛśya vṛkṣa-mūlam upāviśat
analyzed: sarasvatīm upaspṛśya vṛkṣa mūlam upāviśat

original: BhP_03.04.004/1 ahaṃ cokto bhagavatā prapannārti-hareṇa ha
analyzed: aham ca uktaḥ bhagavatā prapanna ārti hareṇa ha

original: BhP_03.04.004/2 badarīṃ tvaṃ prayāhīti sva-kulaṃ sañjihīrṣuṇā
analyzed: badarīm tvam prayāhi iti sva kulam sañjihīrṣuṇā

original: BhP_03.04.005/1 tathāpi tad-abhipretaṃ jānann aham arindama
analyzed: tathā api tad abhipretam jānan aham arindama

original: BhP_03.04.005/2 pṛṣṭhato 'nvagamaṃ bhartuḥ pāda-viśleṣaṇākṣamaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas nu agamam bhartuḥ pāda viśleṣaṇa akṣamaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.006/1 adrākṣam ekam āsīnaṃ vicinvan dayitaṃ patim
analyzed: adrākṣam ekam āsīnam vicinvan dayitam patim

original: BhP_03.04.006/2 śrī-niketaṃ sarasvatyāṃ kṛta-ketam aketanam
analyzed: śrīniketam sarasvatyām kṛta ketam aketanam

original: BhP_03.04.007/1 śyāmāvadātaṃ virajaṃ praśāntāruṇa-locanam
analyzed: śyāma avadātam virajam praśānta aruṇa locanam

original: BhP_03.04.007/2 dorbhiś caturbhir viditaṃ pīta-kauśāmbareṇa ca
analyzed: dorbhiḥ caturbhiḥ viditam pīta kauśa ambareṇa ca

original: BhP_03.04.008/1 vāma ūrāv adhiśritya dakṣiṇāṅghri-saroruham
analyzed: vāme ūrau adhiśritya dakṣiṇa aṅghri saroruham

original: BhP_03.04.008/2 apāśritārbhakāśvattham akṛśaṃ tyakta-pippalam
analyzed: apāśrita arbhaka aśvattham a kṛśam tyakta pippalam

original: BhP_03.04.009/1 tasmin mahā-bhāgavato dvaipāyana-suhṛt-sakhā
analyzed: tasmin mahābhāgavataḥ dvaipāyana suhṛd sakhā

original: BhP_03.04.009/2 lokān anucaran siddha āsasāda yadṛcchayā
analyzed: lokān anucaran siddhaḥ āsasāda yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_03.04.010/1 tasyānuraktasya muner mukundaḥ pramoda-bhāvānata-kandharasya
analyzed: tasya anuraktasya muneḥ mukundaḥ pramoda bhāva ānata kandharasya

original: BhP_03.04.010/2 āśṛṇvato mām anurāga-hāsa- samīkṣayā viśramayann uvāca
analyzed: āśṛṇvataḥ mām anurāga hāsa samīkṣayā viśramayan uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.011/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.011/1 vedāham antar manasīpsitaṃ te dadāmi yat tad duravāpam anyaiḥ
analyzed: veda aham antar manasi īpsitam te dadāmi yat tat duravāpam anyaiḥ

original: BhP_03.04.011/2 satre purā viśva-sṛjāṃ vasūnāṃ mat-siddhi-kāmena vaso tvayeṣṭaḥ
analyzed: satre purā viśvasṛjām vasūnām mad siddhi kāmena vaso tvayā iṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.012/1 sa eṣa sādho caramo bhavānām āsāditas te mad-anugraho yat
analyzed: saḥ eṣa sādho caramaḥ bhavānām āsāditaḥ te mad anugrahaḥ yat

original: BhP_03.04.012/2 yan māṃ nṛlokān raha utsṛjantaṃ diṣṭyā dadṛśvān viśadānuvṛttyā
analyzed: yat mām nṛ lokān rahaḥ utsṛjantam diṣṭyā dadṛśvān viśada anuvṛttyā

original: BhP_03.04.013/1 purā mayā proktam ajāya nābhye padme niṣaṇṇāya mamādi-sarge
analyzed: purā mayā proktam ajāya nābhye padme niṣaṇṇāya mama ādisarge

original: BhP_03.04.013/2 jñānaṃ paraṃ man-mahimāvabhāsaṃ yat sūrayo bhāgavataṃ vadanti
analyzed: jñānam param mad mahima avabhāsam yat sūrayaḥ bhāgavatam vadanti

original: BhP_03.04.014/1 ity ādṛtoktaḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ pratikṣaṇānugraha-bhājano 'ham
analyzed: iti ādṛta uktaḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ prati kṣaṇa anugraha bhājanaḥ ham

original: BhP_03.04.014/2 snehottha-romā skhalitākṣaras taṃ muñcañ chucaḥ prāñjalir ābabhāṣe
analyzed: sneha uttha romā skhalita akṣaraḥ tam muñcam śucaḥ prāñjaliḥ ābabhāṣe

original: BhP_03.04.015/1 ko nv īśa te pāda-saroja-bhājāṃ sudurlabho 'rtheṣu caturṣv apīha
analyzed: kaḥ nu īśa te pāda saroja bhājām su durlabhaḥ rtheṣu caturṣu api iha

original: BhP_03.04.015/2 tathāpi nāhaṃ pravṛṇomi bhūman bhavat-padāmbhoja-niṣevaṇotsukaḥ
analyzed: tathā api na aham pravṛṇomi bhūman bhavat pada ambhoja niṣevaṇa utsukaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.016/1 karmāṇy anīhasya bhavo 'bhavasya te durgāśrayo 'thāri-bhayāt palāyanam
analyzed: karmāṇi anīhasya bhavaḥ bhavasya te palāyanam

original: BhP_03.04.016/2 kālātmano yat pramadā-yutāśramaḥ svātman-rateḥ khidyati dhīr vidām iha
analyzed: kāla ātmanaḥ yat pramadā ayuta āśramaḥ svātman rateḥ khidyati dhīḥ vidām iha

original: BhP_03.04.017/1 mantreṣu māṃ vā upahūya yat tvam akuṇṭhitākhaṇḍa-sadātma-bodhaḥ
analyzed: mantreṣu mām vā upahūya yat tvam akuṇṭhita akhaṇḍa sat ātmabodhaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.017/2 pṛccheḥ prabho mugdha ivāpramattas tan no mano mohayatīva deva
analyzed: pṛccheḥ prabho mugdhaḥ iva apramattaḥ tat naḥ manaḥ mohayati iva deva

original: BhP_03.04.018/1 jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ provāca kasmai bhagavān samagram
analyzed: jñānam param sva ātma rahaḥ prakāśam provāca kasmai bhagavān samagram

original: BhP_03.04.018/2 api kṣamaṃ no grahaṇāya bhartar vadāñjasā yad vṛjinaṃ tarema
analyzed: api kṣamam naḥ grahaṇāya bhartar vada añjasā yat vṛjinam tarema

original: BhP_03.04.019/1 ity āvedita-hārdāya mahyaṃ sa bhagavān paraḥ
analyzed: iti āvedita hārdāya mahyam sa bhagavān paraḥ

original: BhP_03.04.019/2 ādideśāravindākṣa ātmanaḥ paramāṃ sthitim
analyzed: ādideśa aravinda akṣaḥ ātmanaḥ paramām sthitim

original: BhP_03.04.020/1 sa evam ārādhita-pāda-tīrthād adhīta-tattvātma-vibodha-mārgaḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam ārādhita pāda tīrthāt adhīta tattva ātma vibodha mārgaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.020/2 praṇamya pādau parivṛtya devam ihāgato 'haṃ virahāturātmā
analyzed: praṇamya pādau parivṛtya devam iha āgataḥ ham viraha ātura ātmā

original: BhP_03.04.021/1 so 'haṃ tad-darśanāhlāda- viyogārti-yutaḥ prabho
analyzed: saḥ ham tad darśana āhlāda viyoga ārti yutaḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.04.021/2 gamiṣye dayitaṃ tasya badaryāśrama-maṇḍalam
analyzed: gamiṣye dayitam tasya badarī āśrama maṇḍalam

original: BhP_03.04.022/1 yatra nārāyaṇo devo naraś ca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ naraḥ ca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_03.04.022/2 mṛdu tīvraṃ tapo dīrghaṃ tepāte loka-bhāvanau
analyzed: mṛdu tīvram tapaḥ dīrgham tepāte loka bhāvanau

original: BhP_03.04.023/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.023/1 ity uddhavād upākarṇya suhṛdāṃ duḥsahaṃ vadham
analyzed: iti uddhavāt upākarṇya suhṛdām duḥsaham vadham

original: BhP_03.04.023/2 jñānenāśamayat kṣattā śokam utpatitaṃ budhaḥ
analyzed: jñānena aśamayat kṣattā śokam utpatitam budhaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.024/1 sa taṃ mahā-bhāgavataṃ vrajantaṃ kauravarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa tam mahā bhāgavatam vrajantam kaurava ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.024/2 viśrambhād abhyadhattedaṃ mukhyaṃ kṛṣṇa-parigrahe
analyzed: viśrambhāt abhyadhatta idam mukhyam kṛṣṇa parigrahe

original: BhP_03.04.025/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.025/1 jñānaṃ paraṃ svātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ yad āha yogeśvara īśvaras te
analyzed: jñānam param sva ātma rahaḥ prakāśam yat āha yogeśvaraḥ īśvaraḥ te

original: BhP_03.04.025/2 vaktuṃ bhavān no 'rhati yad dhi viṣṇor bhṛtyāḥ sva-bhṛtyārtha-kṛtaś caranti
analyzed: vaktum bhavān naḥ rhati yat hi viṣṇoḥ bhṛtyāḥ sva bhṛtya artha kṛtaḥ caranti

original: BhP_03.04.026/0 uddhava uvāca
analyzed: uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.026/1 nanu te tattva-saṃrādhya ṛṣiḥ kauṣāravo 'ntike
analyzed: nanu te tattva saṃrādhyaḥ ṛṣiḥ kauṣāravaḥ ntike

original: BhP_03.04.026/2 sākṣād bhagavatādiṣṭo martya-lokaṃ jihāsatā
analyzed: sākṣāt bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ martya lokam jihāsatā

original: BhP_03.04.027/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.027/1 iti saha vidureṇa viśva-mūrter guṇa-kathayā sudhayā plāvitorutāpaḥ
analyzed: iti saha vidureṇa viśvamūrteḥ guṇa kathayā sudhayā plāvita uru tāpaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.027/2 kṣaṇam iva puline yamasvasus tāṃ samuṣita aupagavir niśāṃ tato 'gāt
analyzed: kṣaṇam iva puline yamasvasuḥ tām samuṣitaḥ aupagaviḥ niśām tatas gāt

original: BhP_03.04.028/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.028/1 nidhanam upagateṣu vṛṣṇi-bhojeṣv adhiratha-yūthapa-yūthapeṣu mukhyaḥ
analyzed: nidhanam upagateṣu vṛṣṇi bhojeṣu adhiratha yūthapa yūthapeṣu mukhyaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.028/2 sa tu katham avaśiṣṭa uddhavo yad dharir api tatyaja ākṛtiṃ tryadhīśaḥ
analyzed: sa tu katham avaśiṣṭaḥ uddhavaḥ yat hariḥ api tatyajaḥ ākṛtim tryadhīśaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.029/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.04.029/1 brahma-śāpāpadeśena kālenāmogha-vāñchitaḥ
analyzed: brahma śāpa apadeśena kālena amoghavāñchitaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.029/2 saṃhṛtya sva-kulaṃ sphītaṃ tyakṣyan deham acintayat
analyzed: saṃhṛtya sva kulam sphītam tyakṣyan deham acintayat

original: BhP_03.04.030/1 asmāl lokād uparate mayi jñānaṃ mad-āśrayam
analyzed: asmāt lokāt uparate mayi jñānam mad āśrayam

original: BhP_03.04.030/2 arhaty uddhava evāddhā sampraty ātmavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: arhati uddhavaḥ eva addhā samprati ātmavatām varaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.031/1 noddhavo 'ṇv api man-nyūno yad guṇair nārditaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: na uddhavaḥ ṇu api yat guṇaiḥ na arditaḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.04.031/2 ato mad-vayunaṃ lokaṃ grāhayann iha tiṣṭhatu
analyzed: atas mad vayunam lokam grāhayan iha tiṣṭhatu

original: BhP_03.04.032/1 evaṃ tri-loka-guruṇā sandiṣṭaḥ śabda-yoninā
analyzed: evam triloka guruṇā sandiṣṭaḥ śabdayoninā

original: BhP_03.04.032/2 badaryāśramam āsādya harim īje samādhinā
analyzed: badaryāśramam āsādya harim samādhinā

original: BhP_03.04.033/1 viduro 'py uddhavāc chrutvā kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: viduraḥ pi uddhavāt śrutvā kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.033/2 krīḍayopātta-dehasya karmāṇi ślāghitāni ca
analyzed: krīḍayā upātta dehasya karmāṇi ślāghitāni ca

original: BhP_03.04.034/1 deha-nyāsaṃ ca tasyaivaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ dhairya-vardhanam
analyzed: deha nyāsam ca tasya evam dhīrāṇām dhairya vardhanam

original: BhP_03.04.034/2 anyeṣāṃ duṣkarataraṃ paśūnāṃ viklavātmanām
analyzed: anyeṣām duṣkarataram paśūnām viklava ātmanām

original: BhP_03.04.035/1 ātmānaṃ ca kuru-śreṣṭha kṛṣṇena manasekṣitam
analyzed: ātmānam ca kuruśreṣṭha kṛṣṇena manasā īkṣitam

original: BhP_03.04.035/2 dhyāyan gate bhāgavate ruroda prema-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: dhyāyan gate bhāgavate ruroda prema vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_03.04.036/1 kālindyāḥ katibhiḥ siddha ahobhir bharatarṣabha
analyzed: kālindyāḥ katibhiḥ siddha ahobhiḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_03.04.036/2 prāpadyata svaḥ-saritaṃ yatra mitrā-suto muniḥ
analyzed: prāpadyata svaḥsaritam yatra mitrā sutaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_03.05.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.05.001/1 dvāri dyu-nadyā ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇāṃ maitreyam āsīnam agādha-bodham
analyzed: dvāri dyunadyāḥ ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām maitreyam āsīnam agādha bodham

original: BhP_03.05.001/2 kṣattopasṛtyācyuta-bhāva-siddhaḥ papraccha sauśīlya-guṇābhitṛptaḥ
analyzed: kṣattā upasṛtya acyuta bhāva siddhaḥ papraccha sauśīlya guṇa abhitṛptaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.002/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.05.002/1 sukhāya karmāṇi karoti loko na taiḥ sukhaṃ vānyad-upāramaṃ vā
analyzed: sukhāya karmāṇi karoti lokaḥ na taiḥ sukham vā anyat upāramam vā

original: BhP_03.05.002/2 vindeta bhūyas tata eva duḥkhaṃ yad atra yuktaṃ bhagavān vaden naḥ
analyzed: vindeta bhūyas tatas eva duḥkham yat atra yuktam bhagavān vadet naḥ

original: BhP_03.05.003/1 janasya kṛṣṇād vimukhasya daivād adharma-śīlasya suduḥkhitasya
analyzed: janasya kṛṣṇāt vimukhasya daivāt adharma śīlasya su duḥkhitasya

original: BhP_03.05.003/2 anugrahāyeha caranti nūnaṃ bhūtāni bhavyāni janārdanasya
analyzed: anugrahāya iha caranti nūnam bhūtāni bhavyāni janārdanasya

original: BhP_03.05.004/1 tat sādhu-varyādiśa vartma śaṃ naḥ saṃrādhito bhagavān yena puṃsām
analyzed: tat sādhu varya ādiśa vartma śam naḥ saṃrādhitaḥ bhagavān yena puṃsām

original: BhP_03.05.004/2 hṛdi sthito yacchati bhakti-pūte jñānaṃ sa-tattvādhigamaṃ purāṇam
analyzed: hṛdi sthitaḥ yacchati bhakti pūte jñānam satattva adhigamam purāṇam

original: BhP_03.05.005/1 karoti karmāṇi kṛtāvatāro yāny ātma-tantro bhagavāṃs tryadhīśaḥ
analyzed: karoti karmāṇi kṛta avatāraḥ yāni ātmatantraḥ bhagavān tryadhīśaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.005/2 yathā sasarjāgra idaṃ nirīhaḥ saṃsthāpya vṛttiṃ jagato vidhatte
analyzed: yathā sasarja agre idam nirīhaḥ saṃsthāpya vṛttim jagataḥ vidhatte

original: BhP_03.05.006/1 yathā punaḥ sve kha idaṃ niveśya śete guhāyāṃ sa nivṛtta-vṛttiḥ
analyzed: yathā punar sve khe idam niveśya śete guhāyām sa nivṛtta vṛttiḥ

original: BhP_03.05.006/2 yogeśvarādhīśvara eka etad anupraviṣṭo bahudhā yathāsīt
analyzed: yogeśvara adhīśvaraḥ ekaḥ etat anupraviṣṭaḥ bahudhā yathā āsīt

original: BhP_03.05.007/1 krīḍan vidhatte dvija-go-surāṇāṃ kṣemāya karmāṇy avatāra-bhedaiḥ
analyzed: krīḍan vidhatte kṣemāya karmāṇi avatāra bhedaiḥ

original: BhP_03.05.007/2 mano na tṛpyaty api śṛṇvatāṃ naḥ suśloka-mauleś caritāmṛtāni
analyzed: manaḥ na tṛpyati api śṛṇvatām naḥ suśloka mauleḥ carita amṛtāni

original: BhP_03.05.008/1 yais tattva-bhedair adhiloka-nātho lokān alokān saha lokapālān
analyzed: yaiḥ tattva bhedaiḥ adhilokanāthaḥ lokān alokān saha lokapālān

original: BhP_03.05.008/2 acīkḷpad yatra hi sarva-sattva- nikāya-bhedo 'dhikṛtaḥ pratītaḥ
analyzed: acīkḷpat yatra hi sarva sattva nikāya bhedaḥ dhi kṛtaḥ pratītaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.009/1 yena prajānām uta ātma-karma- rūpābhidhānāṃ ca bhidāṃ vyadhatta
analyzed: yena prajānām uta ātma karma rūpa abhidhānām ca bhidām vyadhatta

original: BhP_03.05.009/2 nārāyaṇo viśvasṛg ātma-yonir etac ca no varṇaya vipra-varya
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ viśvasṛj ātmayoniḥ etat ca naḥ varṇaya vipra varya

original: BhP_03.05.010/1 parāvareṣāṃ bhagavan vratāni śrutāni me vyāsa-mukhād abhīkṣṇam
analyzed: para avareṣām bhagavan vratāni śrutāni me vyāsa mukhāt abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_03.05.010/2 atṛpnuma kṣulla-sukhāvahānāṃ teṣām ṛte kṛṣṇa-kathāmṛtaughāt
analyzed: atṛpnuma kṣulla sukha āvahānām teṣām ṛte kṛṣṇa kathā amṛta oghāt

original: BhP_03.05.011/1 kas tṛpnuyāt tīrtha-pado 'bhidhānāt satreṣu vaḥ sūribhir īḍyamānāt
analyzed: kaḥ tṛpnuyāt tīrtha padaḥ u bhidhānāt satreṣu vaḥ sūribhiḥ īḍyamānāt

original: BhP_03.05.011/2 yaḥ karṇa-nāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhava-pradāṃ geha-ratiṃ chinatti
analyzed: yaḥ karṇa nāḍīm puruṣasya yā atas bhava pradām geha ratim chinatti

original: BhP_03.05.012/1 munir vivakṣur bhagavad-guṇānāṃ sakhāpi te bhāratam āha kṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: muniḥ bhagavat guṇānām sakhā api te bhāratam āha kṛṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.012/2 yasmin nṛṇāṃ grāmya-sukhānuvādair matir gṛhītā nu hareḥ kathāyām
analyzed: yasmin nṛṇām grāmya sukha anuvādaiḥ matiḥ gṛhītā nu hareḥ kathāyām

original: BhP_03.05.013/1 sā śraddadhānasya vivardhamānā viraktim anyatra karoti puṃsaḥ
analyzed: sā śraddadhānasya vivardhamānā viraktim anyatra karoti puṃsaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.013/2 hareḥ padānusmṛti-nirvṛtasya samasta-duḥkhāpyayam āśu dhatte
analyzed: hareḥ pada anusmṛti nirvṛtasya samasta duḥkha apyayam āśu dhatte

original: BhP_03.05.014/1 tāñ chocya-śocyān avido 'nuśoce hareḥ kathāyāṃ vimukhān aghena
analyzed: tām śocya śocyān avidaḥ nuśoce hareḥ kathāyām vimukhān aghena

original: BhP_03.05.014/2 kṣiṇoti devo 'nimiṣas tu yeṣām āyur vṛthā-vāda-gati-smṛtīnām
analyzed: kṣiṇoti devaḥ nimiṣaḥ tu yeṣām āyuḥ vṛthāvāda gati smṛtīnām

original: BhP_03.05.015/1 tad asya kauṣārava śarma-dātur hareḥ kathām eva kathāsu sāram
analyzed: tat asya kauṣārava śarma dātuḥ hareḥ kathām eva kathāsu sāram

original: BhP_03.05.015/2 uddhṛtya puṣpebhya ivārta-bandho śivāya naḥ kīrtaya tīrtha-kīrteḥ
analyzed: uddhṛtya puṣpebhyaḥ iva ārta bandho śivāya naḥ kīrtaya tīrtha kīrteḥ

original: BhP_03.05.016/1 sa viśva-janma-sthiti-saṃyamārthe kṛtāvatāraḥ pragṛhīta-śaktiḥ
analyzed: sa viśva janma sthiti saṃyama arthe kṛta avatāraḥ pragṛhīta śaktiḥ

original: BhP_03.05.016/2 cakāra karmāṇy atipūruṣāṇi yānīśvaraḥ kīrtaya tāni mahyam
analyzed: cakāra karmāṇi atipūruṣāṇi yāni īśvaraḥ kīrtaya tāni mahyam

original: BhP_03.05.017/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.05.017/1 sa evaṃ bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā kauṣāravo muniḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā kauṣāravaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_03.05.017/2 puṃsāṃ niḥśreyasārthena tam āha bahu-mānayan
analyzed: puṃsām niḥśreyasa arthena tam āha bahu mānayan

original: BhP_03.05.018/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.05.018/1 sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho lokān sādhv anugṛhṇatā
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā sādho lokān sādhu anugṛhṇatā

original: BhP_03.05.018/2 kīrtiṃ vitanvatā loke ātmano 'dhokṣajātmanaḥ
analyzed: kīrtim vitanvatā loke ātmanaḥ dhokṣaja ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.019/1 naitac citraṃ tvayi kṣattar bādarāyaṇa-vīryaje
analyzed: na etat citram tvayi kṣattar bādarāyaṇa vīrya je

original: BhP_03.05.019/2 gṛhīto 'nanya-bhāvena yat tvayā harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ na anya bhāvena yat tvayā hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.05.020/1 māṇḍavya-śāpād bhagavān prajā-saṃyamano yamaḥ
analyzed: māṇḍavya śāpāt bhagavān prajā saṃyamanaḥ yamaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.020/2 bhrātuḥ kṣetre bhujiṣyāyāṃ jātaḥ satyavatī-sutāt
analyzed: bhrātuḥ kṣetre bhujiṣyāyām jātaḥ satyavatī sutāt

original: BhP_03.05.021/1 bhavān bhagavato nityaṃ sammataḥ sānugasya ha
analyzed: bhavān bhagavataḥ nityam sammataḥ sa anugasya ha

original: BhP_03.05.021/2 yasya jñānopadeśāya mādiśad bhagavān vrajan
analyzed: yasya jñāna upadeśāya mā ādiśat bhagavān vrajan

original: BhP_03.05.022/1 atha te bhagaval-līlā yoga-māyorubṛṃhitāḥ
analyzed: atha te bhagavat līlāḥ yogamāyā uru bṛṃhitāḥ

original: BhP_03.05.022/2 viśva-sthity-udbhavāntārthā varṇayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
BhP_03.05.023/1 bhagavān eka āsedam agra ātmātmanāṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhagavān ekaḥ āsa idam agre ātmā ātmanām vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.05.023/2 ātmecchānugatāv ātmā nānā-maty-upalakṣaṇaḥ
BhP_03.05.024/1 sa vā eṣa tadā draṣṭā nāpaśyad dṛśyam ekarāṭ
analyzed: sa vai eṣa tadā draṣṭā na apaśyat dṛśyam ekarāj

original: BhP_03.05.024/2 mene 'santam ivātmānaṃ supta-śaktir asupta-dṛk
analyzed: mene santam iva ātmānam supta śaktiḥ a supta dṛś

original: BhP_03.05.025/1 sā vā etasya saṃdraṣṭuḥ śaktiḥ sad-asad-ātmikā
analyzed: sā vai etasya saṃdraṣṭuḥ śaktiḥ sat asat ātmikā

original: BhP_03.05.025/2 māyā nāma mahā-bhāga yayedaṃ nirmame vibhuḥ
analyzed: māyā nāma mahābhāga yayā idam nirmame vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.05.026/1 kāla-vṛttyā tu māyāyāṃ guṇa-mayyām adhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: kāla vṛttyā tu māyāyām guṇa mayyām adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.026/2 puruṣeṇātma-bhūtena vīryam ādhatta vīryavān
analyzed: puruṣeṇa ātma bhūtena vīryam ādhatta vīryavān

original: BhP_03.05.027/1 tato 'bhavan mahat-tattvam avyaktāt kāla-coditāt
analyzed: tatas bhavat mahat tattvam avyaktāt kāla coditāt

original: BhP_03.05.027/2 vijñānātmātma-deha-sthaṃ viśvaṃ vyañjaṃs tamo-nudaḥ
BhP_03.05.028/1 so 'py aṃśa-guṇa-kālātmā bhagavad-dṛṣṭi-gocaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi aṃśa guṇa kāla ātmā bhagavat dṛṣṭi gocaraḥ

original: BhP_03.05.028/2 ātmānaṃ vyakarod ātmā viśvasyāsya sisṛkṣayā
analyzed: ātmānam vyakarot ātmā viśvasya asya sisṛkṣayā

original: BhP_03.05.029/1 mahat-tattvād vikurvāṇād ahaṃ-tattvaṃ vyajāyata
analyzed: mahat tattvāt vikurvāṇāt aham tattvam vyajāyata

original: BhP_03.05.029/2 kārya-kāraṇa-kartrātmā bhūtendriya-mano-mayaḥ
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ ātmā bhūta indriya manaḥ mayaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.030/1 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tridhā
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā

original: BhP_03.05.030/2 ahaṃ-tattvād vikurvāṇān mano vaikārikād abhūt
analyzed: aham tattvāt vikurvāṇāt manaḥ vaikārikāt abhūt

original: BhP_03.05.030/3 vaikārikāś ca ye devā arthābhivyañjanaṃ yataḥ
analyzed: vaikārikāḥ ca ye devāḥ artha abhivyañjanam yatas

original: BhP_03.05.031/1 taijasānīndriyāṇy eva jñāna-karma-mayāni ca
analyzed: taijasāni indriyāṇi eva jñāna karma mayāni ca

original: BhP_03.05.031/2 tāmaso bhūta-sūkṣmādir yataḥ khaṃ liṅgam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tāmasaḥ bhūta sūkṣma ādiḥ yatas kham liṅgam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.032/1 kāla-māyāṃśa-yogena bhagavad-vīkṣitaṃ nabhaḥ
analyzed: kāla māyā aṃśa yogena bhagavat vīkṣitam nabhaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.032/2 nabhaso 'nusṛtaṃ sparśaṃ vikurvan nirmame 'nilam
analyzed: nabhasaḥ nusṛtam sparśam vikurvan nirmame nilam

original: BhP_03.05.033/1 anilo 'pi vikurvāṇo nabhasoru-balānvitaḥ
analyzed: anilaḥ pi vikurvāṇaḥ nabhasā uru bala anvitaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.033/2 sasarja rūpa-tanmātraṃ jyotir lokasya locanam
analyzed: sasarja rūpa tanmātram jyotiḥ lokasya locanam

original: BhP_03.05.034/1 anilenānvitaṃ jyotir vikurvat paravīkṣitam
analyzed: anilena anvitam jyotiḥ vikurvat para vīkṣitam

original: BhP_03.05.034/2 ādhattāmbho rasa-mayaṃ kāla-māyāṃśa-yogataḥ
analyzed: ādhatta ambhaḥ rasa mayam kāla māyā aṃśa yogataḥ

original: BhP_03.05.035/1 jyotiṣāmbho 'nusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vikurvad brahma-vīkṣitam
analyzed: jyotiṣā ambhaḥ nu saṃsṛṣṭam vikurvat brahma vīkṣitam

original: BhP_03.05.035/2 mahīṃ gandha-guṇām ādhāt kāla-māyāṃśa-yogataḥ
analyzed: mahīm gandha guṇām ādhāt kāla māyā aṃśa yogataḥ

original: BhP_03.05.036/1 bhūtānāṃ nabha-ādīnāṃ yad yad bhavyāvarāvaram
analyzed: bhūtānām nabhaḥ ādīnām yat yat bhavya avarāvaram

original: BhP_03.05.036/2 teṣāṃ parānusaṃsargād yathā saṅkhyaṃ guṇān viduḥ
analyzed: teṣām para anusaṃsargāt yathā saṅkhyam guṇān viduḥ

original: BhP_03.05.037/1 ete devāḥ kalā viṣṇoḥ kāla-māyāṃśa-liṅginaḥ
analyzed: ete devāḥ kalāḥ viṣṇoḥ kāla māyā aṃśa liṅginaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.037/2 nānātvāt sva-kriyānīśāḥ procuḥ prāñjalayo vibhum
analyzed: nānātvāt sva kriyā anīśāḥ procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ vibhum

original: BhP_03.05.038/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.05.038/1 namāma te deva padāravindaṃ prapanna-tāpopaśamātapatram
analyzed: namāma te deva pada aravindam prapanna tāpa upaśama ātapatram

original: BhP_03.05.038/2 yan-mūla-ketā yatayo 'ñjasoru- saṃsāra-duḥkhaṃ bahir utkṣipanti
analyzed: yat mūla ketāḥ yatayaḥ ñjasā uru saṃsāra duḥkham bahis utkṣipanti

original: BhP_03.05.039/1 dhātar yad asmin bhava īśa jīvās tāpa-trayeṇābhihatā na śarma
analyzed: yat asmin bhave īśa jīvāḥ tāpa trayeṇa abhihatāḥ na śarma

original: BhP_03.05.039/2 ātman labhante bhagavaṃs tavāṅghri- cchāyāṃ sa-vidyām ata āśrayema
analyzed: ātman labhante bhagavan tava aṅghri chāyām savidyām atas āśrayema

original: BhP_03.05.040/1 mārganti yat te mukha-padma-nīḍaiś chandaḥ-suparṇair ṛṣayo vivikte
analyzed: mārganti yat te mukha padma nīḍaiḥ chandaḥ suparṇaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ vivikte

original: BhP_03.05.040/2 yasyāgha-marṣoda-sarid-varāyāḥ padaṃ padaṃ tīrtha-padaḥ prapannāḥ
analyzed: yasya agha marṣa uda saridvarāyāḥ padam padam tīrtha padaḥ prapannāḥ

original: BhP_03.05.041/1 yac chraddhayā śrutavatyā ca bhaktyā sammṛjyamāne hṛdaye 'vadhāya
analyzed: yat śraddhayā śrutavatyā ca bhaktyā sammṛjyamāne hṛdaye vadhāya

original: BhP_03.05.041/2 jñānena vairāgya-balena dhīrā vrajema tat te 'ṅghri-saroja-pīṭham
analyzed: jñānena vairāgya balena dhīrāḥ vrajema tat te ṅghri saroja pīṭham

original: BhP_03.05.042/1 viśvasya janma-sthiti-saṃyamārthe kṛtāvatārasya padāmbujaṃ te
analyzed: viśvasya janma sthiti saṃyama arthe kṛta avatārasya pada ambujam te

original: BhP_03.05.042/2 vrajema sarve śaraṇaṃ yad īśa smṛtaṃ prayacchaty abhayaṃ sva-puṃsām
analyzed: vrajema sarve śaraṇam yat īśa smṛtam prayacchati abhayam sva puṃsām

original: BhP_03.05.043/1 yat sānubandhe 'sati deha-gehe mamāham ity ūḍha-durāgrahāṇām
analyzed: yat sānubandhe sati deha gehe mama aham iti ūḍha durāgrahāṇām

original: BhP_03.05.043/2 puṃsāṃ sudūraṃ vasato 'pi puryāṃ bhajema tat te bhagavan padābjam
analyzed: puṃsām su dūram puryām bhajema tat te bhagavan pada abjam

original: BhP_03.05.044/1 tān vai hy asad-vṛttibhir akṣibhir ye parāhṛtāntar-manasaḥ pareśa
analyzed: tān vai hi asat vṛttibhiḥ akṣibhiḥ ye parāhṛta antarmanasaḥ pareśa

original: BhP_03.05.044/2 atho na paśyanty urugāya nūnaṃ ye te padanyāsa-vilāsa-lakṣyāḥ
analyzed: atho na paśyanti urugāya nūnam ye te padanyāsa vilāsa lakṣyāḥ

original: BhP_03.05.045/1 pānena te deva kathā-sudhāyāḥ pravṛddha-bhaktyā viśadāśayā ye
analyzed: pānena te deva kathā sudhāyāḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā viśada āśayāḥ ye

original: BhP_03.05.045/2 vairāgya-sāraṃ pratilabhya bodhaṃ yathāñjasānvīyur akuṇṭha-dhiṣṇyam
analyzed: vairāgya sāram pratilabhya bodham yathā añjasā anvīyuḥ akuṇṭha dhiṣṇyam

original: BhP_03.05.046/1 tathāpare cātma-samādhi-yoga- balena jitvā prakṛtiṃ baliṣṭhām
analyzed: tathā apare ca ātma samādhi yoga balena jitvā prakṛtim baliṣṭhām

original: BhP_03.05.046/2 tvām eva dhīrāḥ puruṣaṃ viśanti teṣāṃ śramaḥ syān na tu sevayā te
analyzed: tvām eva dhīrāḥ puruṣam viśanti teṣām śramaḥ syāt na tu sevayā te

original: BhP_03.05.047/1 tat te vayaṃ loka-sisṛkṣayādya tvayānusṛṣṭās tribhir ātmabhiḥ sma
analyzed: tat te vayam loka sisṛkṣayā ādya tvayā anusṛṣṭāḥ tribhiḥ ātmabhiḥ sma

original: BhP_03.05.047/2 sarve viyuktāḥ sva-vihāra-tantraṃ na śaknumas tat pratihartave te
analyzed: sarve viyuktāḥ sva vihāra tantram na śaknumaḥ tat pratihartave te

original: BhP_03.05.048/1 yāvad baliṃ te 'ja harāma kāle yathā vayaṃ cānnam adāma yatra
analyzed: yāvat balim te harāma kāle yathā vayam ca annam adāma yatra

original: BhP_03.05.048/2 yathobhayeṣāṃ ta ime hi lokā baliṃ haranto 'nnam adanty anūhāḥ
analyzed: yathā ubhayeṣām te ime hi lokāḥ balim harantaḥ nnam adanti anūhāḥ

original: BhP_03.05.049/1 tvaṃ naḥ surāṇām asi sānvayānāṃ kūṭa-stha ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ surāṇām asi sa anvayānām kūṭasthaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.049/2 tvaṃ deva śaktyāṃ guṇa-karma-yonau retas tv ajāyāṃ kavim ādadhe 'jaḥ
analyzed: tvam deva śaktyām guṇa karma yonau retaḥ tu ajāyām kavim ādadhe jaḥ

original: BhP_03.05.050/1 tato vayaṃ mat-pramukhā yad-arthe babhūvimātman karavāma kiṃ te
analyzed: tatas vayam mad pramukhāḥ yad arthe babhūvima ātman karavāma kim te

original: BhP_03.05.050/2 tvaṃ naḥ sva-cakṣuḥ paridehi śaktyā deva kriyārthe yad-anugrahāṇām
analyzed: tvam naḥ sva cakṣuḥ paridehi śaktyā deva kriyā arthe yad anugrahāṇām

original: BhP_03.06.001/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.06.001/1 iti tāsāṃ sva-śaktīnāṃ satīnām asametya saḥ
analyzed: iti tāsām sva śaktīnām satīnām a sametya saḥ

original: BhP_03.06.001/2 prasupta-loka-tantrāṇāṃ niśāmya gatim īśvaraḥ
analyzed: prasupta loka tantrāṇām niśāmya gatim īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.06.002/1 kāla-sañjñāṃ tadā devīṃ bibhrac-chaktim urukramaḥ
analyzed: kāla sañjñām tadā devīm bibhrat śaktim urukramaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.002/2 trayoviṃśati tattvānāṃ gaṇaṃ yugapad āviśat
analyzed: trayoviṃśati tattvānām gaṇam yugapad āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.003/1 so 'nupraviṣṭo bhagavāṃś ceṣṭārūpeṇa taṃ gaṇam
analyzed: saḥ nupraviṣṭaḥ bhagavān ceṣṭā rūpeṇa tam gaṇam

original: BhP_03.06.003/2 bhinnaṃ saṃyojayām āsa suptaṃ karma prabodhayan
analyzed: bhinnam saṃyojayām āsa suptam karma prabodhayan

original: BhP_03.06.004/1 prabuddha-karma daivena trayoviṃśatiko gaṇaḥ
analyzed: prabuddha karma daivena trayoviṃśatikaḥ gaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.004/2 prerito 'janayat svābhir mātrābhir adhipūruṣam
analyzed: preritaḥ janayat svābhiḥ mātrābhiḥ adhipūruṣam

original: BhP_03.06.005/1 pareṇa viśatā svasmin mātrayā viśva-sṛg-gaṇaḥ
analyzed: pareṇa viśatā svasmin mātrayā viśvasṛj gaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.005/2 cukṣobhānyonyam āsādya yasmin lokāś carācarāḥ
analyzed: cukṣobha anyonyam āsādya yasmin lokāḥ cara acarāḥ

original: BhP_03.06.006/1 hiraṇmayaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sahasra-parivatsarān
analyzed: hiraṇmayaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sahasra parivatsarān

original: BhP_03.06.006/2 āṇḍa-kośa uvāsāpsu sarva-sattvopabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: āṇḍakośaḥ uvāsa apsu sarva sattva upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.007/1 sa vai viśva-sṛjāṃ garbho deva-karmātma-śaktimān
analyzed: sa vai viśvasṛjām garbhaḥ deva karma ātma śaktimān

original: BhP_03.06.007/2 vibabhājātmanātmānam ekadhā daśadhā tridhā
analyzed: vibabhāja ātmanā ātmānam ekadhā daśadhā tridhā

original: BhP_03.06.008/1 eṣa hy aśeṣa-sattvānām ātmāṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa hi aśeṣa sattvānām ātmā aṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.008/2 ādyo 'vatāro yatrāsau bhūta-grāmo vibhāvyate
analyzed: ādyaḥ vatāraḥ yatra asau bhūta grāmaḥ vibhāvyate

original: BhP_03.06.009/1 sādhyātmaḥ sādhidaivaś ca sādhibhūta iti tridhā
analyzed: sa adhyātmaḥ sa adhidaivaḥ ca sa adhibhūtaḥ iti tridhā

original: BhP_03.06.009/2 virāṭ prāṇo daśa-vidha ekadhā hṛdayena ca
analyzed: virāj prāṇaḥ daśavidhaḥ ekadhā hṛdayena ca

original: BhP_03.06.010/1 smaran viśva-sṛjām īśo vijñāpitam adhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: smaran viśvasṛjām īśaḥ vijñāpitam adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.010/2 virājam atapat svena tejasaiṣāṃ vivṛttaye
analyzed: virājam atapat svena tejasā eṣām vivṛttaye

original: BhP_03.06.011/1 atha tasyābhitaptasya katidhāyatanāni ha
analyzed: atha tasya abhitaptasya katidhā āyatanāni ha

original: BhP_03.06.011/2 nirabhidyanta devānāṃ tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: nirabhidyanta devānām tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu

original: BhP_03.06.012/1 tasyāgnir āsyaṃ nirbhinnaṃ loka-pālo 'viśat padam
analyzed: tasya agniḥ āsyam nirbhinnam lokapālaḥ viśat padam

original: BhP_03.06.012/2 vācā svāṃśena vaktavyaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate
analyzed: vācā sva aṃśena vaktavyam yayā asau pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.013/1 nirbhinnaṃ tālu varuṇo loka-pālo 'viśad dhareḥ
analyzed: nirbhinnam tālu varuṇaḥ lokapālaḥ viśat hareḥ

original: BhP_03.06.013/2 jihvayāṃśena ca rasaṃ yayāsau pratipadyate
analyzed: jihvayā aṃśena ca rasam yayā asau pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.014/1 nirbhinne aśvinau nāse viṣṇor āviśatāṃ padam
analyzed: nirbhinne aśvinau nāse viṣṇoḥ āviśatām padam

original: BhP_03.06.014/2 ghrāṇenāṃśena gandhasya pratipattir yato bhavet
analyzed: ghrāṇena aṃśena gandhasya pratipattiḥ yatas bhavet

original: BhP_03.06.015/1 nirbhinne akṣiṇī tvaṣṭā loka-pālo 'viśad vibhoḥ
analyzed: nirbhinne akṣiṇī tvaṣṭā lokapālaḥ viśat vibhoḥ

original: BhP_03.06.015/2 cakṣuṣāṃśena rūpāṇāṃ pratipattir yato bhavet
analyzed: cakṣuṣā aṃśena rūpāṇām pratipattiḥ yatas bhavet

original: BhP_03.06.016/1 nirbhinnāny asya carmāṇi loka-pālo 'nilo 'viśat
analyzed: nirbhinnāni asya carmāṇi lokapālaḥ nilaḥ viśat

original: BhP_03.06.016/2 prāṇenāṃśena saṃsparśaṃ yenāsau pratipadyate
analyzed: prāṇena aṃśena saṃsparśam yena asau pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.017/1 karṇāv asya vinirbhinnau dhiṣṇyaṃ svaṃ viviśur diśaḥ
analyzed: karṇau asya vinirbhinnau dhiṣṇyam svam viviśuḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.017/2 śrotreṇāṃśena śabdasya siddhiṃ yena prapadyate
analyzed: śrotreṇa aṃśena śabdasya siddhim yena prapadyate

original: BhP_03.06.018/1 tvacam asya vinirbhinnāṃ viviśur dhiṣṇyam oṣadhīḥ
analyzed: tvacam asya vinirbhinnām viviśuḥ dhiṣṇyam oṣadhīḥ

original: BhP_03.06.018/2 aṃśena romabhiḥ kaṇḍūṃ yair asau pratipadyate
analyzed: aṃśena romabhiḥ kaṇḍūm yaiḥ asau pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.019/1 meḍhraṃ tasya vinirbhinnaṃ sva-dhiṣṇyaṃ ka upāviśat
analyzed: meḍhram tasya vinirbhinnam sva dhiṣṇyam kaḥ upāviśat

original: BhP_03.06.019/2 retasāṃśena yenāsāv ānandaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: retasā aṃśena yena asau ānandam pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.020/1 gudaṃ puṃso vinirbhinnaṃ mitro lokeśa āviśat
analyzed: gudam puṃsaḥ vinirbhinnam mitraḥ loka īśaḥ āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.020/2 pāyunāṃśena yenāsau visargaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: pāyunā aṃśena yena asau visargam pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.021/1 hastāv asya vinirbhinnāv indraḥ svar-patir āviśat
analyzed: hastau asya vinirbhinnau indraḥ svarpatiḥ āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.021/2 vārtayāṃśena puruṣo yayā vṛttiṃ prapadyate
analyzed: vārtayā aṃśena puruṣaḥ yayā vṛttim prapadyate

original: BhP_03.06.022/1 pādāv asya vinirbhinnau lokeśo viṣṇur āviśat
analyzed: pādau asya vinirbhinnau loka īśaḥ viṣṇuḥ āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.022/2 gatyā svāṃśena puruṣo yayā prāpyaṃ prapadyate
analyzed: gatyā sva aṃśena puruṣaḥ yayā prāpyam prapadyate

original: BhP_03.06.023/1 buddhiṃ cāsya vinirbhinnāṃ vāg-īśo dhiṣṇyam āviśat
analyzed: buddhim ca asya vinirbhinnām vāgīśaḥ dhiṣṇyam āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.023/2 bodhenāṃśena boddhavyam pratipattir yato bhavet
analyzed: bodhena aṃśena boddhavyam pratipattiḥ yatas bhavet

original: BhP_03.06.024/1 hṛdayaṃ cāsya nirbhinnaṃ candramā dhiṣṇyam āviśat
analyzed: hṛdayam ca asya nirbhinnam candramāḥ dhiṣṇyam āviśat

original: BhP_03.06.024/2 manasāṃśena yenāsau vikriyāṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: manasā aṃśena yena asau vikriyām pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.025/1 ātmānaṃ cāsya nirbhinnam abhimāno 'viśat padam
analyzed: ātmānam ca asya nirbhinnam abhimānaḥ viśat padam

original: BhP_03.06.025/2 karmaṇāṃśena yenāsau kartavyaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: karmaṇā aṃśena yena asau kartavyam pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.026/1 sattvaṃ cāsya vinirbhinnaṃ mahān dhiṣṇyam upāviśat
analyzed: sattvam ca asya vinirbhinnam mahān dhiṣṇyam upāviśat

original: BhP_03.06.026/2 cittenāṃśena yenāsau vijñānaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: cittena aṃśena yena asau vijñānam pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.06.027/1 śīrṣṇo 'sya dyaur dharā padbhyāṃ khaṃ nābher udapadyata
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ sya dyauḥ dharā padbhyām kham nābheḥ udapadyata

original: BhP_03.06.027/2 guṇānāṃ vṛttayo yeṣu pratīyante surādayaḥ
analyzed: guṇānām vṛttayaḥ yeṣu pratīyante sura ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.028/1 ātyantikena sattvena divaṃ devāḥ prapedire
analyzed: ātyantikena sattvena divam devāḥ prapedire

original: BhP_03.06.028/2 dharāṃ rajaḥ-svabhāvena paṇayo ye ca tān anu
analyzed: dharām rajaḥ svabhāvena paṇayaḥ ye ca tān anu

original: BhP_03.06.029/1 tārtīyena svabhāvena bhagavan-nābhim āśritāḥ
analyzed: tārtīyena svabhāvena bhagavat nābhim āśritāḥ

original: BhP_03.06.029/2 ubhayor antaraṃ vyoma ye rudra-pārṣadāṃ gaṇāḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ antaram vyoma ye rudra pārṣadām gaṇāḥ

original: BhP_03.06.030/1 mukhato 'vartata brahma puruṣasya kurūdvaha
analyzed: mukhataḥ vartata brahma puruṣasya kuru udvaha

original: BhP_03.06.030/2 yas tūnmukhatvād varṇānāṃ mukhyo 'bhūd brāhmaṇo guruḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu unmukha tvāt varṇānām mukhyaḥ bhūt brāhmaṇaḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_03.06.031/1 bāhubhyo 'vartata kṣatraṃ kṣatriyas tad anuvrataḥ
analyzed: bāhubhyaḥ vartata kṣatram kṣatriyaḥ tat anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_03.06.031/2 yo jātas trāyate varṇān pauruṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-kṣatāt
analyzed: yaḥ jātaḥ trāyate varṇān pauruṣaḥ kaṇṭaka kṣatāt

original: BhP_03.06.032/1 viśo 'vartanta tasyorvor loka-vṛttikarīr vibhoḥ
analyzed: viśaḥ vartanta tasya ūrvoḥ loka vṛtti karīḥ vibhoḥ

original: BhP_03.06.032/2 vaiśyas tad-udbhavo vārtāṃ nṛṇāṃ yaḥ samavartayat
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ tad udbhavaḥ vārtām nṛṇām yaḥ samavartayat

original: BhP_03.06.033/1 padbhyāṃ bhagavato jajñe śuśrūṣā dharma-siddhaye
analyzed: padbhyām bhagavataḥ jajñe śuśrūṣā dharma siddhaye

original: BhP_03.06.033/2 tasyāṃ jātaḥ purā śūdro yad-vṛttyā tuṣyate hariḥ
analyzed: tasyām jātaḥ purā śūdraḥ yad vṛttyā tuṣyate hariḥ

original: BhP_03.06.034/1 ete varṇāḥ sva-dharmeṇa yajanti sva-guruṃ harim
analyzed: ete varṇāḥ svadharmeṇa yajanti sva gurum harim

original: BhP_03.06.034/2 śraddhayātma-viśuddhy-arthaṃ yaj-jātāḥ saha vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: śraddhayā ātma viśuddhi artham yat jātāḥ saha vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.06.035/1 etat kṣattar bhagavato daiva-karmātma-rūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: etat kṣattar bhagavataḥ daiva karma ātma rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.06.035/2 kaḥ śraddadhyād upākartuṃ yogamāyā-balodayam
analyzed: kaḥ śraddadhyāt upākartum yoga māyā bala udayam

original: BhP_03.06.036/1 tathāpi kīrtayāmy aṅga yathā-mati yathā-śrutam
analyzed: tathā api kīrtayāmi aṅga yathāmati yathāśrutam

original: BhP_03.06.036/2 kīrtiṃ hareḥ svāṃ sat-kartuṃ giram anyābhidhāsatīm
analyzed: kīrtim hareḥ svām satkartum giram anya abhidhā satīm

original: BhP_03.06.037/1 ekānta-lābhaṃ vacaso nu puṃsāṃ suśloka-mauler guṇa-vādam āhuḥ
analyzed: ekānta lābham vacasaḥ nu puṃsām suśloka mauleḥ guṇa vādam āhuḥ

original: BhP_03.06.037/2 śruteś ca vidvadbhir upākṛtāyāṃ kathā-sudhāyām upasamprayogam
analyzed: śruteḥ ca vidvadbhiḥ upākṛtāyām kathā sudhāyām upasamprayogam

original: BhP_03.06.038/1 ātmano 'vasito vatsa mahimā kavinādinā
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vasitaḥ vatsa mahimā kavi nādinā

original: BhP_03.06.038/2 saṃvatsara-sahasrānte dhiyā yoga-vipakkayā
analyzed: saṃvatsara sahasra ante dhiyā yoga vipakkayā

original: BhP_03.06.039/1 ato bhagavato māyā māyinām api mohinī
analyzed: atas bhagavataḥ māyā māyinām api mohinī

original: BhP_03.06.039/2 yat svayaṃ cātma-vartmātmā na veda kim utāpare
analyzed: yat svayam ca ātma vartmā ātmā na veda kim uta apare

original: BhP_03.06.040/1 yato 'prāpya nyavartanta vācaś ca manasā saha
analyzed: yatas prāpya nyavartanta vācaḥ ca manasā saha

original: BhP_03.06.040/2 ahaṃ cānya ime devās tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
analyzed: aham ca anye ime devāḥ tasmai bhagavate namaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.001/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ maitreyaṃ dvaipāyana-suto budhaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam maitreyam dvaipāyana sutaḥ budhaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.001/2 prīṇayann iva bhāratyā viduraḥ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: prīṇayan iva bhāratyāḥ viduraḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: BhP_03.07.002/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.002/1 brahman kathaṃ bhagavataś cin-mātrasyāvikāriṇaḥ
analyzed: brahman katham bhagavataḥ cit mātrasya avikāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.002/2 līlayā cāpi yujyeran nirguṇasya guṇāḥ kriyāḥ
analyzed: līlayā ca api yujyeran nirguṇasya guṇāḥ kriyāḥ

original: BhP_03.07.003/1 krīḍāyām udyamo 'rbhasya kāmaś cikrīḍiṣānyataḥ
analyzed: krīḍāyām udyamaḥ rbhasya kāmaḥ cikrīḍiṣā anyatas

original: BhP_03.07.003/2 svatas-tṛptasya ca kathaṃ nivṛttasya sadānyataḥ
analyzed: svatas tṛptasya ca katham nivṛttasya sadā anyatas

original: BhP_03.07.004/1 asrākṣīd bhagavān viśvaṃ guṇa-mayyātma-māyayā
analyzed: asrākṣīt bhagavān viśvam guṇa mayyā ātma māyayā

original: BhP_03.07.004/2 tayā saṃsthāpayaty etad bhūyaḥ pratyapidhāsyati
analyzed: tayā saṃsthāpayati etat bhūyas pratyapidhāsyati

original: BhP_03.07.005/1 deśataḥ kālato yo 'sāv avasthātaḥ svato 'nyataḥ
analyzed: deśataḥ kālataḥ sau avasthātaḥ svatas nyatas

original: BhP_03.07.005/2 aviluptāvabodhātmā sa yujyetājayā katham
analyzed: a vilupta avabodha ātmā sa yujyeta ājayā katham

original: BhP_03.07.006/1 bhagavān eka evaiṣa sarva-kṣetreṣv avasthitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān ekaḥ eva eṣa sarva kṣetreṣu avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.006/2 amuṣya durbhagatvaṃ vā kleśo vā karmabhiḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: amuṣya durbhaga tvam vā kleśaḥ vā karmabhiḥ kutas

original: BhP_03.07.007/1 etasmin me mano vidvan khidyate 'jñāna-saṅkaṭe
analyzed: etasmin me manaḥ vidvan khidyate jñāna saṅkaṭe

original: BhP_03.07.007/2 tan naḥ parāṇuda vibho kaśmalaṃ mānasaṃ mahat
analyzed: tat naḥ parāṇuda vibho kaśmalam mānasam mahat

original: BhP_03.07.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.008/1 sa itthaṃ coditaḥ kṣattrā tattva-jijñāsunā muniḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham coditaḥ kṣattrā tattva jijñāsunā muniḥ

original: BhP_03.07.008/2 pratyāha bhagavac-cittaḥ smayann iva gata-smayaḥ
analyzed: pratyāha bhagavat cittaḥ smayan iva gata smayaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.009/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.009/1 seyaṃ bhagavato māyā yan nayena virudhyate
analyzed: sā iyam bhagavataḥ māyā yat nayena virudhyate

original: BhP_03.07.009/2 īśvarasya vimuktasya kārpaṇyam uta bandhanam
analyzed: īśvarasya vimuktasya kārpaṇyam uta bandhanam

original: BhP_03.07.010/1 yad arthena vināmuṣya puṃsa ātma-viparyayaḥ
analyzed: yat arthena vinā amuṣya puṃsaḥ ātma viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.010/2 pratīyata upadraṣṭuḥ sva-śiraś chedanādikaḥ
analyzed: pratīyate upadraṣṭuḥ sva śiraḥ chedana ādikaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.011/1 yathā jale candramasaḥ kampādis tat-kṛto guṇaḥ
analyzed: yathā jale candramasaḥ kampa ādiḥ tad kṛtaḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.011/2 dṛśyate 'sann api draṣṭur ātmano 'nātmano guṇaḥ
analyzed: dṛśyate san api draṣṭuḥ ātmanaḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.012/1 sa vai nivṛtti-dharmeṇa vāsudevānukampayā
analyzed: sa vai nivṛtti dharmeṇa vāsudeva anukampayā

original: BhP_03.07.012/2 bhagavad-bhakti-yogena tirodhatte śanair iha
BhP_03.07.013/1 yadendriyoparāmo 'tha draṣṭrātmani pare harau
analyzed: yadā indriya uparāmaḥ draṣṭṛ ātmani pare harau

original: BhP_03.07.013/2 vilīyante tadā kleśāḥ saṃsuptasyeva kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: vilīyante tadā kleśāḥ saṃsuptasya iva kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_03.07.014/1 aśeṣa-saṅkleśa-śamaṃ vidhatte guṇānuvāda-śravaṇaṃ murāreḥ
BhP_03.07.014/2 kiṃ vā punas tac-caraṇāravinda- parāga-sevā-ratir ātma-labdhā
analyzed: kim vā punar tad caraṇa aravinda parāga sevā ratiḥ ātma labdhā

original: BhP_03.07.015/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.015/1 sañchinnaḥ saṃśayo mahyaṃ tava sūktāsinā vibho
analyzed: sañchinnaḥ saṃśayaḥ mahyam tava sūkta asinā vibho

original: BhP_03.07.015/2 ubhayatrāpi bhagavan mano me sampradhāvati
analyzed: ubhayatra api bhagavat manaḥ me sampradhāvati

original: BhP_03.07.016/1 sādhv etad vyāhṛtaṃ vidvan nātma-māyāyanaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: sādhu etat vyāhṛtam vidvan na ātma māyā ayanam hareḥ

original: BhP_03.07.016/2 ābhāty apārthaṃ nirmūlaṃ viśva-mūlaṃ na yad bahiḥ
analyzed: ābhāti apārtham nirmūlam viśva mūlam na yat bahis

original: BhP_03.07.017/1 yaś ca mūḍhatamo loke yaś ca buddheḥ paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca mūḍhatamaḥ loke yaḥ ca buddheḥ param gataḥ

original: BhP_03.07.017/2 tāv ubhau sukham edhete kliśyaty antarito janaḥ
analyzed: tau ubhau sukham edhete kliśyati antaritaḥ janaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.018/1 arthābhāvaṃ viniścitya pratītasyāpi nātmanaḥ
analyzed: artha abhāvam viniścitya pratītasya api na ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.018/2 tāṃ cāpi yuṣmac-caraṇa- sevayāhaṃ parāṇude
analyzed: tām ca api yuṣmad caraṇa sevayā aham parāṇude

original: BhP_03.07.019/1 yat-sevayā bhagavataḥ kūṭa-sthasya madhu-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yad sevayā bhagavataḥ kūṭasthasya madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.019/2 rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ
analyzed: rati rāsaḥ bhavet tīvraḥ pādayoḥ vyasana ardanaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.020/1 durāpā hy alpa-tapasaḥ sevā vaikuṇṭha-vartmasu
analyzed: durāpāḥ hi alpa tapasaḥ sevāḥ vaikuṇṭha vartmasu

original: BhP_03.07.020/2 yatropagīyate nityaṃ deva-devo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yatra upagīyate nityam devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.021/1 sṛṣṭvāgre mahad-ādīni sa-vikārāṇy anukramāt
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā agre mahat ādīni sa vikārāṇi anukramāt

original: BhP_03.07.021/2 tebhyo virājam uddhṛtya tam anu prāviśad vibhuḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ virājam uddhṛtya tam anu prāviśat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.07.022/1 yam āhur ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ sahasrāṅghry-ūru-bāhukam
analyzed: yam āhuḥ ādyam puruṣam sahasra aṅghri ūru bāhukam

original: BhP_03.07.022/2 yatra viśva ime lokāḥ sa-vikāśaṃ ta āsate
analyzed: yatra viśve ime lokāḥ sa vikāśam te āsate

original: BhP_03.07.023/1 yasmin daśa-vidhaḥ prāṇaḥ sendriyārthendriyas tri-vṛt
analyzed: yasmin daśavidhaḥ prāṇaḥ sa indriya artha indriyaḥ trivṛt

original: BhP_03.07.023/2 tvayerito yato varṇās tad-vibhūtīr vadasva naḥ
analyzed: tvayā īritaḥ yatas varṇāḥ tad vibhūtīḥ vadasva naḥ

original: BhP_03.07.024/1 yatra putraiś ca pautraiś ca naptṛbhiḥ saha gotrajaiḥ
analyzed: yatra putraiḥ ca pautraiḥ ca naptṛbhiḥ saha gotra jaiḥ

original: BhP_03.07.024/2 prajā vicitrākṛtaya āsan yābhir idaṃ tatam
analyzed: prajāḥ vicitra ākṛtayaḥ āsan yābhiḥ idam tatam

original: BhP_03.07.025/1 prajāpatīnāṃ sa patiś cakḷpe kān prajāpatīn
analyzed: prajāpatīnām sa patiḥ cakṷpe kān prajāpatīn

original: BhP_03.07.025/2 sargāṃś caivānusargāṃś ca manūn manvantarādhipān
analyzed: sargān ca eva anusargān ca manūn manvantara adhipān

original: BhP_03.07.026/1 eteṣām api vedāṃś ca vaṃśānucaritāni ca
analyzed: eteṣām api vedān ca vaṃśānucaritāni ca

original: BhP_03.07.026/2 upary adhaś ca ye lokā bhūmer mitrātmajāsate
analyzed: upari adhas ca ye lokāḥ bhūmeḥ mitra ātmaja āsate

original: BhP_03.07.027/1 teṣāṃ saṃsthāṃ pramāṇaṃ ca bhūr-lokasya ca varṇaya
analyzed: teṣām saṃsthām pramāṇam ca bhūrlokasya ca varṇaya

original: BhP_03.07.027/2 tiryaṅ-mānuṣa-devānāṃ sarīsṛpa-patattriṇām
analyzed: tiryak mānuṣa devānām sarīsṛpa patattriṇām

original: BhP_03.07.027/3 vada naḥ sarga-saṃvyūhaṃ gārbha-sveda-dvijodbhidām
analyzed: vada naḥ sarga saṃvyūham gārbha sveda dvija udbhidām

original: BhP_03.07.028/1 guṇāvatārair viśvasya sarga-sthity-apyayāśrayam
BhP_03.07.028/2 sṛjataḥ śrīnivāsasya vyācakṣvodāra-vikramam
analyzed: sṛjataḥ śrīnivāsasya vyācakṣva udāra vikramam

original: BhP_03.07.029/1 varṇāśrama-vibhāgāṃś ca rūpa-śīla-svabhāvataḥ
analyzed: varṇa āśrama vibhāgān ca rūpa śīla svabhāvataḥ

original: BhP_03.07.029/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ janma-karmāṇi vedasya ca vikarṣaṇam
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām janma karmāṇi vedasya ca vikarṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.07.030/1 yajñasya ca vitānāni yogasya ca pathaḥ prabho
analyzed: yajñasya ca vitānāni yogasya ca pathaḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.07.030/2 naiṣkarmyasya ca sāṅkhyasya tantraṃ vā bhagavat-smṛtam
analyzed: naiṣkarmyasya ca sāṅkhyasya tantram vā bhagavat smṛtam

original: BhP_03.07.031/1 pāṣaṇḍa-patha-vaiṣamyaṃ pratiloma-niveśanam
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa patha vaiṣamyam pratiloma niveśanam

original: BhP_03.07.031/2 jīvasya gatayo yāś ca yāvatīr guṇa-karmajāḥ
analyzed: jīvasya gatayaḥ yāḥ ca yāvatīḥ guṇa karma jāḥ

original: BhP_03.07.032/1 dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṇāṃ nimittāny avirodhataḥ
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām nimittāni avirodhataḥ

original: BhP_03.07.032/2 vārtāyā daṇḍa-nīteś ca śrutasya ca vidhiṃ pṛthak
analyzed: vārtāyāḥ daṇḍanīteḥ ca śrutasya ca vidhim pṛthak

original: BhP_03.07.033/1 śrāddhasya ca vidhiṃ brahman pit-ṇāṃ sargam eva ca
analyzed: śrāddhasya ca vidhim brahman pitṇām sargam eva ca

original: BhP_03.07.033/2 graha-nakṣatra-tārāṇāṃ kālāvayava-saṃsthitim
analyzed: graha nakṣatra tārāṇām kāla avayava saṃsthitim

original: BhP_03.07.034/1 dānasya tapaso vāpi yac ceṣṭā-pūrtayoḥ phalam
analyzed: dānasya tapasaḥ vā api yat ca iṣṭāpūrtayoḥ phalam

original: BhP_03.07.034/2 pravāsa-sthasya yo dharmo yaś ca puṃsa utāpadi
analyzed: pravāsa sthasya yaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ ca puṃsaḥ uta āpadi

original: BhP_03.07.035/1 yena vā bhagavāṃs tuṣyed dharma-yonir janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yena vā bhagavān tuṣyet dharma yoniḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.035/2 samprasīdati vā yeṣām etad ākhyāhi me 'nagha
analyzed: samprasīdati vā yeṣām etat ākhyāhi me nagha

original: BhP_03.07.036/1 anuvratānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ ca dvijottama
analyzed: anuvratānām śiṣyāṇām putrāṇām ca dvijottama

original: BhP_03.07.036/2 anāpṛṣṭam api brūyur guravo dīna-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: an āpṛṣṭam api brūyuḥ guravaḥ dīna vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_03.07.037/1 tattvānāṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ katidhā pratisaṅkramaḥ
analyzed: tattvānām bhagavan teṣām katidhā pratisaṅkramaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.037/2 tatremaṃ ka upāsīran ka u svid anuśerate
analyzed: tatra imam ke upāsīran ke u svid anuśerate

original: BhP_03.07.038/1 puruṣasya ca saṃsthānaṃ svarūpaṃ vā parasya ca
analyzed: puruṣasya ca saṃsthānam svarūpam vā parasya ca

original: BhP_03.07.038/2 jñānaṃ ca naigamaṃ yat tad guru-śiṣya-prayojanam
analyzed: jñānam ca naigamam yat tat guru śiṣya prayojanam

original: BhP_03.07.039/1 nimittāni ca tasyeha proktāny anagha-sūribhiḥ
analyzed: nimittāni ca tasya iha proktāni anagha sūribhiḥ

original: BhP_03.07.039/2 svato jñānaṃ kutaḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktir vairāgyam eva vā
analyzed: svatas jñānam kutas puṃsām bhaktiḥ vairāgyam eva vā

original: BhP_03.07.040/1 etān me pṛcchataḥ praśnān hareḥ karma-vivitsayā
analyzed: etān me pṛcchataḥ praśnān hareḥ karma vivitsayā
