original: BhP_03.07.040/2 brūhi me 'jñasya mitratvād ajayā naṣṭa-cakṣuṣaḥ
analyzed: brūhi me jñasya mitra tvāt ajayā naṣṭa cakṣuṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.041/1 sarve vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapo dānāni cānagha
analyzed: sarve vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca tapaḥ dānāni ca anagha

original: BhP_03.07.041/2 jīvābhaya-pradānasya na kurvīran kalām api
analyzed: jīva abhaya pradānasya na kurvīran kalām api

original: BhP_03.07.042/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.07.042/1 sa ittham āpṛṣṭa-purāṇa-kalpaḥ kuru-pradhānena muni-pradhānaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham āpṛṣṭa purāṇa kalpaḥ kuru pradhānena muni pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_03.07.042/2 pravṛddha-harṣo bhagavat-kathāyāṃ sañcoditas taṃ prahasann ivāha
analyzed: pravṛddha harṣaḥ bhagavat kathāyām sañcoditaḥ tam prahasan iva āha

original: BhP_03.08.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.08.001/1 sat-sevanīyo bata pūru-vaṃśo yal loka-pālo bhagavat-pradhānaḥ
analyzed: sat sevanīyaḥ bata pūru vaṃśaḥ yat lokapālaḥ bhagavat pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.001/2 babhūvithehājita-kīrti-mālāṃ pade pade nūtanayasy abhīkṣṇam
analyzed: babhūvitha iha ajita kīrti mālām pade pade abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_03.08.002/1 so 'haṃ nṛṇāṃ kṣulla-sukhāya duḥkhaṃ mahad gatānāṃ viramāya tasya
analyzed: saḥ ham nṛṇām kṣulla sukhāya duḥkham mahat gatānām viramāya tasya

original: BhP_03.08.002/2 pravartaye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yad āha sākṣād bhagavān ṛṣibhyaḥ
analyzed: pravartaye bhāgavatam purāṇam yat āha sākṣāt bhagavān ṛṣibhyaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.003/1 āsīnam urvyāṃ bhagavantam ādyaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ devam akuṇṭha-sattvam
analyzed: āsīnam urvyām bhagavantam ādyam saṅkarṣaṇam devam akuṇṭha sattvam

original: BhP_03.08.003/2 vivitsavas tattvam ataḥ parasya kumāra-mukhyā munayo 'nvapṛcchan
analyzed: vivitsavaḥ tattvam atas parasya kumāra mukhyāḥ munayaḥ nvapṛcchan

original: BhP_03.08.004/1 svam eva dhiṣṇyaṃ bahu mānayantaṃ yad vāsudevābhidham āmananti
analyzed: svam eva dhiṣṇyam bahu mānayantam yat vāsudeva abhidham āmananti

original: BhP_03.08.004/2 pratyag-dhṛtākṣāmbuja-kośam īṣad unmīlayantaṃ vibudhodayāya
analyzed: pratyak dhṛta akṣa ambuja kośam īṣat unmīlayantam vibudha udayāya

original: BhP_03.08.005/1 svardhuny-udārdraiḥ sva-jaṭā-kalāpair upaspṛśantaś caraṇopadhānam
analyzed: svardhunī uda ārdraiḥ sva jaṭā kalāpaiḥ upaspṛśantaḥ caraṇa upadhānam

original: BhP_03.08.005/2 padmaṃ yad arcanty ahi-rāja-kanyāḥ sa-prema nānā-balibhir varārthāḥ
analyzed: padmam yat arcanti ahi rāja kanyāḥ saprema nānā balibhiḥ vara arthāḥ

original: BhP_03.08.006/1 muhur gṛṇanto vacasānurāga- skhalat-padenāsya kṛtāni taj-jñāḥ
analyzed: muhur gṛṇantaḥ vacasā anurāga skhalat padena asya kṛtāni tajjñāḥ

original: BhP_03.08.006/2 kirīṭa-sāhasra-maṇi-praveka- pradyotitoddāma-phaṇā-sahasram
analyzed: kirīṭa sāhasra maṇi praveka pradyotita uddāma phaṇā sahasram

original: BhP_03.08.007/1 proktaṃ kilaitad bhagavattamena nivṛtti-dharmābhiratāya tena
analyzed: proktam kila etat bhagavattamena nivṛtti dharma abhiratāya tena

original: BhP_03.08.007/2 sanat-kumārāya sa cāha pṛṣṭaḥ sāṅkhyāyanāyāṅga dhṛta-vratāya
analyzed: sanatkumārāya sa ca āha pṛṣṭaḥ sāṅkhyāyanāya aṅga dhṛta vratāya

original: BhP_03.08.008/1 sāṅkhyāyanaḥ pāramahaṃsya-mukhyo vivakṣamāṇo bhagavad-vibhūtīḥ
BhP_03.08.008/2 jagāda so 'smad-gurave 'nvitāya parāśarāyātha bṛhaspateś ca
analyzed: jagāda saḥ smat gurave nvitāya parāśarāya atha bṛhaspateḥ ca

original: BhP_03.08.009/1 provāca mahyaṃ sa dayālur ukto muniḥ pulastyena purāṇam ādyam
analyzed: provāca mahyam sa dayāluḥ uktaḥ muniḥ pulastyena purāṇam ādyam

original: BhP_03.08.009/2 so 'haṃ tavaitat kathayāmi vatsa śraddhālave nityam anuvratāya
analyzed: saḥ u ham tava etat kathayāmi vatsa śraddhālave nityam anuvratāya

original: BhP_03.08.010/1 udāplutaṃ viśvam idaṃ tadāsīd yan nidrayāmīlita-dṛṅ nyamīlayat
analyzed: udāplutam viśvam idam tadā āsīt yat nidrayā āmīlita dṛś nyamīlayat

original: BhP_03.08.010/2 ahīndra-talpe 'dhiśayāna ekaḥ kṛta-kṣaṇaḥ svātma-ratau nirīhaḥ
analyzed: ahi indra talpe dhiśayānaḥ ekaḥ kṛtakṣaṇaḥ svātma ratau nirīhaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.011/1 so 'ntaḥ śarīre 'rpita-bhūta-sūkṣmaḥ kālātmikāṃ śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ntar śarīre rpita bhūta sūkṣmaḥ kāla ātmikām śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.011/2 uvāsa tasmin salile pade sve yathānalo dāruṇi ruddha-vīryaḥ
analyzed: uvāsa tasmin salile pade sve yathā analaḥ dāruṇi ruddha vīryaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.012/1 catur-yugānāṃ ca sahasram apsu svapan svayodīritayā sva-śaktyā
analyzed: caturyugānām ca sahasram apsu svapan svayā udīritayā sva śaktyā

original: BhP_03.08.012/2 kālākhyayāsādita-karma-tantro lokān apītān dadṛśe sva-dehe
analyzed: kāla ākhyayā āsādita karma tantraḥ lokān apītān dadṛśe sva dehe

original: BhP_03.08.013/1 tasyārtha-sūkṣmābhiniviṣṭa-dṛṣṭer antar-gato 'rtho rajasā tanīyān
analyzed: tasya artha sūkṣma abhiniviṣṭa dṛṣṭeḥ antargataḥ rthaḥ rajasā

original: BhP_03.08.013/2 guṇena kālānugatena viddhaḥ sūṣyaṃs tadābhidyata nābhi-deśāt
analyzed: guṇena kāla anugatena viddhaḥ tadā abhidyata nābhi deśāt

original: BhP_03.08.014/1 sa padma-kośaḥ sahasodatiṣṭhat kālena karma-pratibodhanena
analyzed: sa padmakośaḥ sahasā udatiṣṭhat kālena karma pratibodhanena

original: BhP_03.08.014/2 sva-rociṣā tat salilaṃ viśālaṃ vidyotayann arka ivātma-yoniḥ
analyzed: sva rociṣā tat salilam viśālam vidyotayan arkaḥ iva ātmayoniḥ

original: BhP_03.08.015/1 tal loka-padmaṃ sa u eva viṣṇuḥ prāvīviśat sarva-guṇāvabhāsam
analyzed: tat loka padmam saḥ u eva viṣṇuḥ prāvīviśat sarva guṇa avabhāsam

original: BhP_03.08.015/2 tasmin svayaṃ vedamayo vidhātā svayambhuvaṃ yaṃ sma vadanti so 'bhūt
analyzed: tasmin svayam veda mayaḥ vidhātā svayambhuvam yam sma vadanti saḥ bhūt

original: BhP_03.08.016/1 tasyāṃ sa cāmbho-ruha-karṇikāyām avasthito lokam apaśyamānaḥ
analyzed: tasyām sa ca ambhoruha karṇikāyām avasthitaḥ lokam a paśyamānaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.016/2 parikraman vyomni vivṛtta-netraś catvāri lebhe 'nudiśaṃ mukhāni
analyzed: parikraman vyomni vivṛtta netraḥ catvāri lebhe nudiśam mukhāni

original: BhP_03.08.017/1 tasmād yugānta-śvasanāvaghūrṇa- jalormi-cakrāt salilād virūḍham
analyzed: tasmāt yugānta śvasana avaghūrṇa jala ūrmi cakrāt salilāt virūḍham

original: BhP_03.08.017/2 upāśritaḥ kañjam u loka-tattvaṃ nātmānam addhāvidad ādi-devaḥ
analyzed: upāśritaḥ kañjam u loka tattvam na ātmānam addhā avidat ādidevaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.018/1 ka eṣa yo 'sāv aham abja-pṛṣṭha etat kuto vābjam ananyad apsu
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa aham abja pṛṣṭhe etat kutas vā abjam ananyat apsu

original: BhP_03.08.018/2 asti hy adhastād iha kiñcanaitad adhiṣṭhitaṃ yatra satā nu bhāvyam
analyzed: asti hi adhastāt iha kiñcana etat adhiṣṭhitam yatra satā nu bhāvyam

original: BhP_03.08.019/1 sa ittham udvīkṣya tad-abja-nāla- nāḍībhir antar-jalam āviveśa
analyzed: saḥ ittham udvīkṣya tad abja nāla nāḍībhiḥ antar jalam āviveśa

original: BhP_03.08.019/2 nārvāg-gatas tat-khara-nāla-nāla- nābhiṃ vicinvaṃs tad avindatājaḥ
analyzed: nābhim vicinvan tat avindata ajaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.020/1 tamasy apāre vidurātma-sargaṃ vicinvato 'bhūt sumahāṃs tri-ṇemiḥ
analyzed: tamasi apāre vidura ātma sargam vicinvataḥ bhūt su mahān triṇemiḥ

original: BhP_03.08.020/2 yo deha-bhājāṃ bhayam īrayāṇaḥ parikṣiṇoty āyur ajasya hetiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dehabhājām bhayam īrayāṇaḥ parikṣiṇoti āyuḥ ajasya hetiḥ

original: BhP_03.08.021/1 tato nivṛtto 'pratilabdha-kāmaḥ sva-dhiṣṇyam āsādya punaḥ sa devaḥ
analyzed: tatas pratilabdha kāmaḥ sva dhiṣṇyam āsādya punar sa devaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.021/2 śanair jita-śvāsa-nivṛtta-citto nyaṣīdad ārūḍha-samādhi-yogaḥ
analyzed: śanais jita śvāsa nivṛtta cittaḥ nyaṣīdat ārūḍha samādhi yogaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.022/1 kālena so 'jaḥ puruṣāyuṣābhi- pravṛtta-yogena virūḍha-bodhaḥ
analyzed: kālena saḥ jaḥ puruṣa āyuṣā abhi pravṛtta yogena virūḍha bodhaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.022/2 svayaṃ tad antar-hṛdaye 'vabhātam apaśyatāpaśyata yan na pūrvam
analyzed: svayam tat antar hṛdaye vabhātam apaśyata apaśyata yat na pūrvam

original: BhP_03.08.023/1 mṛṇāla-gaurāyata-śeṣa-bhoga- paryaṅka ekaṃ puruṣaṃ śayānam
analyzed: mṛṇāla gaura āyata śeṣa bhoga paryaṅke ekam puruṣam śayānam

original: BhP_03.08.023/2 phaṇātapatrāyuta-mūrdha-ratna- dyubhir hata-dhvānta-yugānta-toye
analyzed: dyubhiḥ hata dhvānta yugānta toye

original: BhP_03.08.024/1 prekṣāṃ kṣipantaṃ haritopalādreḥ sandhyābhra-nīver uru-rukma-mūrdhnaḥ
analyzed: prekṣām kṣipantam haritopala adreḥ sandhyā abhra nīveḥ uru rukma mūrdhnaḥ

original: BhP_03.08.024/2 ratnodadhārauṣadhi-saumanasya vana-srajo veṇu-bhujāṅghripāṅghreḥ
analyzed: ratna uda dhārā oṣadhi saumanasya vanasrajaḥ veṇu bhuja aṅghripa aṅghreḥ

original: BhP_03.08.025/1 āyāmato vistarataḥ sva-māna- dehena loka-traya-saṅgraheṇa
analyzed: āyāmataḥ vistarataḥ dehena loka traya saṅgraheṇa

original: BhP_03.08.025/2 vicitra-divyābharaṇāṃśukānāṃ kṛta-śriyāpāśrita-veṣa-deham
analyzed: vicitra divya ābharaṇa aṃśukānām kṛta śriyā apāśrita veṣa deham

original: BhP_03.08.026/1 puṃsāṃ sva-kāmāya vivikta-mārgair abhyarcatāṃ kāma-dughāṅghri-padmam
analyzed: puṃsām sva kāmāya vivikta mārgaiḥ abhyarcatām kāmadughā aṅghri padmam

original: BhP_03.08.026/2 pradarśayantaṃ kṛpayā nakhendu- mayūkha-bhinnāṅguli-cāru-patram
analyzed: pradarśayantam kṛpayā nakha indu mayūkha bhinna aṅguli cāru patram

original: BhP_03.08.027/1 mukhena lokārti-hara-smitena parisphurat-kuṇḍala-maṇḍitena
analyzed: mukhena loka ārti hara smitena parisphurat kuṇḍala maṇḍitena

original: BhP_03.08.027/2 śoṇāyitenādhara-bimba-bhāsā pratyarhayantaṃ sunasena subhrvā
analyzed: śoṇa āyitena adhara bimba bhāsā pratyarhayantam su nasena su bhrvā

original: BhP_03.08.028/1 kadamba-kiñjalka-piśaṅga-vāsasā svalaṅkṛtaṃ mekhalayā nitambe
analyzed: kadamba kiñjalka piśaṅga vāsasā su alaṅkṛtam mekhalayā nitambe

original: BhP_03.08.028/2 hāreṇa cānanta-dhanena vatsa śrīvatsa-vakṣaḥ-sthala-vallabhena
analyzed: hāreṇa ca ananta dhanena vatsa śrīvatsa vakṣaḥsthala vallabhena

original: BhP_03.08.029/1 parārdhya-keyūra-maṇi-praveka- paryasta-dordaṇḍa-sahasra-śākham
analyzed: parārdhya keyūra maṇi praveka paryasta dordaṇḍa sahasra śākham

original: BhP_03.08.029/2 avyakta-mūlaṃ bhuvanāṅghripendram ahīndra-bhogair adhivīta-valśam
analyzed: avyakta mūlam bhuvana aṅghripa indram ahi indra bhogaiḥ adhivīta valśam

original: BhP_03.08.030/1 carācarauko bhagavan-mahīdhram ahīndra-bandhuṃ salilopagūḍham
analyzed: carācara okaḥ bhagavat mahīdhram ahi indra bandhum salila upagūḍham

original: BhP_03.08.030/2 kirīṭa-sāhasra-hiraṇya-śṛṅgam āvirbhavat kaustubha-ratna-garbham
analyzed: kirīṭa sāhasra hiraṇya śṛṅgam āvirbhavat kaustubha ratna garbham

original: BhP_03.08.031/1 nivītam āmnāya-madhu-vrata-śriyā sva-kīrti-mayyā vana-mālayā harim
analyzed: nivītam āmnāya madhu vrata śriyā sva kīrti mayyā vanamālayā harim

original: BhP_03.08.031/2 sūryendu-vāyv-agny-agamaṃ tri-dhāmabhiḥ parikramat-prādhanikair durāsadam
analyzed: sūrya indu vāyu agni agamam tridhāmabhiḥ parikramat prādhanikaiḥ durāsadam

original: BhP_03.08.032/1 tarhy eva tan-nābhi-saraḥ-sarojam ātmānam ambhaḥ śvasanaṃ viyac ca
analyzed: tarhi eva tat nābhi saraḥ sarojam ātmānam ambhaḥ śvasanam viyat ca

original: BhP_03.08.032/2 dadarśa devo jagato vidhātā nātaḥ paraṃ loka-visarga-dṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: dadarśa devaḥ jagataḥ vidhātā na atas param loka visarga dṛṣṭiḥ

original: BhP_03.08.033/1 sa karma-bījaṃ rajasoparaktaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣann iyad eva dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: sa karma bījam rajasā uparaktaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣan iyat eva dṛṣṭvā

original: BhP_03.08.033/2 astaud visargābhimukhas tam īḍyam avyakta-vartmany abhiveśitātmā
analyzed: astaut visarga abhimukhaḥ tam īḍyam avyakta vartmani abhiveśita ātmā

original: BhP_03.09.001/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.09.001/1 jñāto 'si me 'dya sucirān nanu deha-bhājāṃ
analyzed: jñātaḥ si me su cirāt nanu dehabhājām

original: BhP_03.09.001/2 na jñāyate bhagavato gatir ity avadyam
analyzed: na jñāyate bhagavataḥ gatiḥ iti avadyam

original: BhP_03.09.001/3 nānyat tvad asti bhagavann api tan na śuddhaṃ
analyzed: na anyat tvat asti bhagavan api tat na śuddham

original: BhP_03.09.001/4 māyā-guṇa-vyatikarād yad urur vibhāsi
analyzed: māyā guṇa vyatikarāt yat uruḥ vibhāsi

original: BhP_03.09.002/1 rūpaṃ yad etad avabodha-rasodayena
analyzed: rūpam yat etat avabodha rasa udayena

original: BhP_03.09.002/2 śaśvan-nivṛtta-tamasaḥ sad-anugrahāya
analyzed: śaśvat nivṛtta tamasaḥ sat anugrahāya

original: BhP_03.09.002/3 ādau gṛhītam avatāra-śataika-bījaṃ
analyzed: ādau gṛhītam avatāra śata eka bījam

original: BhP_03.09.002/4 yan-nābhi-padma-bhavanād aham āvirāsam
analyzed: yat nābhi padma bhavanāt aham āvirāsam

original: BhP_03.09.003/1 nātaḥ paraṃ parama yad bhavataḥ svarūpam
analyzed: na atas param parama yat bhavataḥ sva rūpam

original: BhP_03.09.003/2 ānanda-mātram avikalpam aviddha-varcaḥ
analyzed: ānanda mātram avikalpam aviddha varcaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.003/3 paśyāmi viśva-sṛjam ekam aviśvam ātman
analyzed: paśyāmi viśvasṛjam ekam aviśvam ātman

original: BhP_03.09.003/4 bhūtendriyātmaka-madas ta upāśrito 'smi
analyzed: bhūta indriya ātmakam adaḥ te upāśritaḥ smi

original: BhP_03.09.004/1 tad vā idaṃ bhuvana-maṅgala maṅgalāya
analyzed: tat vai idam bhuvana maṅgala maṅgalāya

original: BhP_03.09.004/2 dhyāne sma no darśitaṃ ta upāsakānām
analyzed: dhyāne sma naḥ darśitam te upāsakānām

original: BhP_03.09.004/3 tasmai namo bhagavate 'nuvidhema tubhyaṃ
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam

original: BhP_03.09.004/4 yo 'nādṛto naraka-bhāgbhir asat-prasaṅgaiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ na ādṛtaḥ naraka bhāgbhiḥ asat prasaṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.005/1 ye tu tvadīya-caraṇāmbuja-kośa-gandhaṃ
analyzed: ye tu tvadīya caraṇa ambuja kośa gandham

original: BhP_03.09.005/2 jighranti karṇa-vivaraiḥ śruti-vāta-nītam
analyzed: jighranti karṇa vivaraiḥ śruti vāta nītam

original: BhP_03.09.005/3 bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇaḥ parayā ca teṣāṃ
analyzed: bhaktyā gṛhīta caraṇaḥ parayā ca teṣām

original: BhP_03.09.005/4 nāpaiṣi nātha hṛdayāmburuhāt sva-puṃsām
analyzed: na apaiṣi nātha hṛdaya amburuhāt sva puṃsām

original: BhP_03.09.006/1 tāvad bhayaṃ draviṇa-deha-suhṛn-nimittaṃ
analyzed: tāvat bhayam draviṇa deha suhṛd nimittam

original: BhP_03.09.006/2 śokaḥ spṛhā paribhavo vipulaś ca lobhaḥ
analyzed: śokaḥ spṛhā paribhavaḥ vipulaḥ ca lobhaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.006/3 tāvan mamety asad-avagraha ārti-mūlaṃ
analyzed: tāvat mama iti asat avagrahaḥ ārti mūlam

original: BhP_03.09.006/4 yāvan na te 'ṅghrim abhayaṃ pravṛṇīta lokaḥ
analyzed: yāvat na te ṅghrim abhayam pravṛṇīta lokaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.007/1 daivena te hata-dhiyo bhavataḥ prasaṅgāt
analyzed: daivena te hatadhiyaḥ bhavataḥ prasaṅgāt

original: BhP_03.09.007/2 sarvāśubhopaśamanād vimukhendriyā ye
analyzed: sarva aśubha upaśamanāt vimukha indriyāḥ ye

original: BhP_03.09.007/3 kurvanti kāma-sukha-leśa-lavāya dīnā
analyzed: kurvanti kāma sukha leśa lavāya dīnā

original: BhP_03.09.007/4 lobhābhibhūta-manaso 'kuśalāni śaśvat
analyzed: lobha abhibhūta manasaḥ kuśalāni śaśvat

original: BhP_03.09.008/1 kṣut-tṛṭ-tridhātubhir imā muhur ardyamānāḥ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ tri dhātubhiḥ imāḥ muhur ardyamānāḥ

original: BhP_03.09.008/2 śītoṣṇa-vāta-varaṣair itaretarāc ca
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa vāta varaṣaiḥ itaretarāt ca

original: BhP_03.09.008/3 kāmāgninācyuta-ruṣā ca sudurbhareṇa
analyzed: kāma agninā acyuta ruṣā ca su durbhareṇa

original: BhP_03.09.008/4 sampaśyato mana urukrama sīdate me
analyzed: sampaśyataḥ manaḥ uru krama sīdate me

original: BhP_03.09.009/1 yāvat pṛthaktvam idam ātmana indriyārtha-
analyzed: yāvat pṛthaktvam idam ātmanaḥ indriyārtha

original: BhP_03.09.009/2 māyā-balaṃ bhagavato jana īśa paśyet
analyzed: māyā balam bhagavataḥ janaḥ īśa paśyet

original: BhP_03.09.009/3 tāvan na saṃsṛtir asau pratisaṅkrameta
analyzed: tāvat na saṃsṛtiḥ asau pratisaṅkrameta

original: BhP_03.09.009/4 vyarthāpi duḥkha-nivahaṃ vahatī kriyārthā
analyzed: vyarthā api duḥkha nivaham vahatī kriyā arthā

original: BhP_03.09.010/1 ahny āpṛtārta-karaṇā niśi niḥśayānā
analyzed: ahni āpṛta ārta karaṇā niśi niḥśayānā

original: BhP_03.09.010/2 nānā-manoratha-dhiyā kṣaṇa-bhagna-nidrāḥ
analyzed: nānā manoratha dhiyā kṣaṇa bhagna nidrāḥ

original: BhP_03.09.010/3 daivāhatārtha-racanā ṛṣayo 'pi deva
analyzed: daiva āhata artha racanāḥ ṛṣayaḥ pi deva

original: BhP_03.09.010/4 yuṣmat-prasaṅga-vimukhā iha saṃsaranti
analyzed: yuṣmad prasaṅga vimukhāḥ iha saṃsaranti

original: BhP_03.09.011/1 tvaṃ bhakti-yoga-paribhāvita-hṛt-saroja
analyzed: tvam bhaktiyoga paribhāvita hṛd saroja

original: BhP_03.09.011/2 āsse śrutekṣita-patho nanu nātha puṃsām
analyzed: āsse śruta īkṣita pathaḥ nanu nātha puṃsām

original: BhP_03.09.011/3 yad-yad-dhiyā ta urugāya vibhāvayanti
analyzed: yat yat dhiyā te urugāya vibhāvayanti

original: BhP_03.09.011/4 tat-tad-vapuḥ praṇayase sad-anugrahāya
analyzed: tat tat vapuḥ praṇayase sat anugrahāya

original: BhP_03.09.012/1 nātiprasīdati tathopacitopacārair
analyzed: na atiprasīdati tathā upacita upacāraiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.012/2 ārādhitaḥ sura-gaṇair hṛdi baddha-kāmaiḥ
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ hṛdi baddha kāmaiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.012/3 yat sarva-bhūta-dayayāsad-alabhyayaiko
analyzed: yat sarva bhūta dayayā asat alabhyayā ekaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.012/4 nānā-janeṣv avahitaḥ suhṛd antar-ātmā
analyzed: nānā janeṣu avahitaḥ suhṛd antarātmā

original: BhP_03.09.013/1 puṃsām ato vividha-karmabhir adhvarādyair
analyzed: puṃsām atas vividha karmabhiḥ adhvara ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.013/2 dānena cogra-tapasā paricaryayā ca
analyzed: dānena ca ugra tapasā paricaryayā ca

original: BhP_03.09.013/3 ārādhanaṃ bhagavatas tava sat-kriyārtho
analyzed: ārādhanam bhagavataḥ tava

original: BhP_03.09.013/4 dharmo 'rpitaḥ karhicid mriyate na yatra
analyzed: dharmaḥ rpitaḥ karhicit mriyate na yatra

original: BhP_03.09.014/1 śaśvat svarūpa-mahasaiva nipīta-bheda-
analyzed: śaśvat sva rūpa mahasā eva nipīta bheda

original: BhP_03.09.014/2 mohāya bodha-dhiṣaṇāya namaḥ parasmai
analyzed: mohāya bodha dhiṣaṇāya namaḥ parasmai

original: BhP_03.09.014/3 viśvodbhava-sthiti-layeṣu nimitta-līlā-
BhP_03.09.014/4 rāsāya te nama idaṃ cakṛmeśvarāya
analyzed: rāsāya te namaḥ idam cakṛma īśvarāya

original: BhP_03.09.015/1 yasyāvatāra-guṇa-karma-viḍambanāni
analyzed: yasya avatāra guṇa karma viḍambanāni

original: BhP_03.09.015/2 nāmāni ye 'su-vigame vivaśā gṛṇanti
analyzed: nāmāni ye su vigame vivaśāḥ gṛṇanti

original: BhP_03.09.015/3 te 'naika-janma-śamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā
analyzed: te na eka janma śamalam sahasā eva hitvā

original: BhP_03.09.015/4 saṃyānty apāvṛtāmṛtaṃ tam ajaṃ prapadye
analyzed: saṃyānti apāvṛta amṛtam tam ajam prapadye

original: BhP_03.09.016/1 yo vā ahaṃ ca giriśaś ca vibhuḥ svayaṃ ca
analyzed: yaḥ vai aham ca giriśaḥ ca vibhuḥ svayam ca

original: BhP_03.09.016/2 sthity-udbhava-pralaya-hetava ātma-mūlam
analyzed: sthiti udbhava pralaya hetavaḥ ātma mūlam

original: BhP_03.09.016/3 bhittvā tri-pād vavṛdha eka uru-prarohas
analyzed: bhittvā tripād vavṛdhe ekaḥ uru prarohaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.016/4 tasmai namo bhagavate bhuvana-drumāya
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate bhuvana drumāya

original: BhP_03.09.017/1 loko vikarma-nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ
analyzed: lokaḥ vikarma nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.017/2 karmaṇy ayaṃ tvad-udite bhavad-arcane sve
analyzed: karmaṇi ayam tvad udite bhavat arcane sve

original: BhP_03.09.017/3 yas tāvad asya balavān iha jīvitāśāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tāvat asya balavān iha jīvita āśām

original: BhP_03.09.017/4 sadyaś chinatty animiṣāya namo 'stu tasmai
analyzed: sadyas chinatti animiṣāya namaḥ stu tasmai

original: BhP_03.09.018/1 yasmād bibhemy aham api dviparārdha-dhiṣṇyam
analyzed: yasmāt bibhemi aham api dvi parārdha dhiṣṇyam

original: BhP_03.09.018/2 adhyāsitaḥ sakala-loka-namaskṛtaṃ yat
analyzed: adhyāsitaḥ sakala loka namaskṛtam yat

original: BhP_03.09.018/3 tepe tapo bahu-savo 'varurutsamānas
analyzed: tepe tapaḥ bahu savaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.018/4 tasmai namo bhagavate 'dhimakhāya tubhyam
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate dhi makhāya tubhyam

original: BhP_03.09.019/1 tiryaṅ-manuṣya-vibudhādiṣu jīva-yoniṣv
analyzed: tiryak manuṣya vibudha ādiṣu jīva yoniṣu

original: BhP_03.09.019/2 ātmecchayātma-kṛta-setu-parīpsayā yaḥ
analyzed: ātma icchayā ātma kṛta setu parīpsayā yaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.019/3 reme nirasta-viṣayo 'py avaruddha-dehas
analyzed: reme nirasta viṣayaḥ pi avaruddha dehaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.019/4 tasmai namo bhagavate puruṣottamāya
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate puruṣottamāya

original: BhP_03.09.020/1 yo 'vidyayānupahato 'pi daśārdha-vṛttyā
analyzed: yaḥ vidyayā anupahataḥ daśārdha vṛttyā

original: BhP_03.09.020/2 nidrām uvāha jaṭharī-kṛta-loka-yātraḥ
analyzed: nidrām uvāha jaṭharīkṛta lokayātraḥ

original: BhP_03.09.020/3 antar-jale 'hi-kaśipu-sparśānukūlāṃ
analyzed: antar jale hi kaśipu sparśa anukūlām

original: BhP_03.09.020/4 bhīmormi-mālini janasya sukhaṃ vivṛṇvan
analyzed: bhīma ūrmi mālini janasya sukham vivṛṇvan

original: BhP_03.09.021/1 yan-nābhi-padma-bhavanād aham āsam īḍya
analyzed: yad nābhi padma bhavanāt aham āsam īḍya

original: BhP_03.09.021/2 loka-trayopakaraṇo yad-anugraheṇa
BhP_03.09.021/3 tasmai namas ta udara-stha-bhavāya yoga-
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ te udarastha bhavāya yoga

original: BhP_03.09.021/4 nidrāvasāna-vikasan-nalinekṣaṇāya
BhP_03.09.022/1 so 'yaṃ samasta-jagatāṃ suhṛd eka ātmā
analyzed: saḥ yam samasta jagatām suhṛd ekaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_03.09.022/2 sattvena yan mṛḍayate bhagavān bhagena
analyzed: sattvena yat mṛḍayate bhagavān bhagena

original: BhP_03.09.022/3 tenaiva me dṛśam anuspṛśatād yathāhaṃ
analyzed: tena eva me dṛśam anuspṛśatāt yathā aham

original: BhP_03.09.022/4 srakṣyāmi pūrvavad idaṃ praṇata-priyo 'sau
analyzed: srakṣyāmi pūrvavat idam praṇata priyaḥ sau

original: BhP_03.09.023/1 eṣa prapanna-varado ramayātma-śaktyā
analyzed: eṣa prapanna varadaḥ ramayā ātma śaktyā

original: BhP_03.09.023/2 yad yat kariṣyati gṛhīta-guṇāvatāraḥ
analyzed: yat yat kariṣyati gṛhīta guṇāvatāraḥ

original: BhP_03.09.023/3 tasmin sva-vikramam idaṃ sṛjato 'pi ceto
analyzed: tasmin sva vikramam idam sṛjataḥ

original: BhP_03.09.023/4 yuñjīta karma-śamalaṃ ca yathā vijahyām
analyzed: yuñjīta karma śamalam ca yathā vijahyām

original: BhP_03.09.024/1 nābhi-hradād iha sato 'mbhasi yasya puṃso
analyzed: nābhi hradāt iha sataḥ mbhasi yasya puṃsaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.024/2 vijñāna-śaktir aham āsam ananta-śakteḥ
analyzed: vijñāna śaktiḥ aham āsam ananta śakteḥ

original: BhP_03.09.024/3 rūpaṃ vicitram idam asya vivṛṇvato me
analyzed: rūpam vicitram idam asya vivṛṇvataḥ me

original: BhP_03.09.024/4 mā rīriṣīṣṭa nigamasya girāṃ visargaḥ
analyzed: mā rīriṣīṣṭa nigamasya girām visargaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.025/1 so 'sāv adabhra-karuṇo bhagavān vivṛddha-
analyzed: saḥ saḥ adabhra karuṇaḥ bhagavān vivṛddha

original: BhP_03.09.025/2 prema-smitena nayanāmburuhaṃ vijṛmbhan
analyzed: prema smitena nayana amburuham vijṛmbhan

original: BhP_03.09.025/3 utthāya viśva-vijayāya ca no viṣādaṃ
analyzed: utthāya viśva vijayāya ca naḥ viṣādam

original: BhP_03.09.025/4 mādhvyā girāpanayatāt puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: mādhvyā girā apanayatāt puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.026/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.09.026/1 sva-sambhavaṃ niśāmyaivaṃ tapo-vidyā-samādhibhiḥ
analyzed: sva sambhavam niśāmya evam tapaḥ vidyā samādhibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.026/2 yāvan mano-vacaḥ stutvā virarāma sa khinnavat
analyzed: yāvat manaḥ vacaḥ stutvā virarāma sa khinna vat

original: BhP_03.09.027/1 athābhipretam anvīkṣya brahmaṇo madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: atha abhipretam anvīkṣya brahmaṇaḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.027/2 viṣaṇṇa-cetasaṃ tena kalpa-vyatikarāmbhasā
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa cetasam tena kalpa vyatikara ambhasā

original: BhP_03.09.028/1 loka-saṃsthāna-vijñāna ātmanaḥ parikhidyataḥ
analyzed: loka saṃsthāna vijñāne ātmanaḥ parikhidyataḥ

original: BhP_03.09.028/2 tam āhāgādhayā vācā kaśmalaṃ śamayann iva
analyzed: tam āha agādhayā vācā kaśmalam śamayan iva

original: BhP_03.09.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.09.029/1 mā veda-garbha gās tandrīṃ sarga udyamam āvaha
analyzed: mā vedagarbha gāḥ tandrīm sarge udyamam āvaha

original: BhP_03.09.029/2 tan mayāpāditaṃ hy agre yan māṃ prārthayate bhavān
analyzed: tat mayā āpāditam hi agre yat mām prārthayate bhavān

original: BhP_03.09.030/1 bhūyas tvaṃ tapa ātiṣṭha vidyāṃ caiva mad-āśrayām
analyzed: bhūyas tvam tapaḥ ātiṣṭha vidyām ca eva mad āśrayām

original: BhP_03.09.030/2 tābhyām antar-hṛdi brahman lokān drakṣyasy apāvṛtān
analyzed: tābhyām antar hṛdi brahman lokān drakṣyasi apāvṛtān

original: BhP_03.09.031/1 tata ātmani loke ca bhakti-yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: tatas ātmani loke ca bhakti yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.031/2 draṣṭāsi māṃ tataṃ brahman mayi lokāṃs tvam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭā asi mām tatam brahman mayi lokān tvam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.032/1 yadā tu sarva-bhūteṣu dāruṣv agnim iva sthitam
analyzed: yadā tu sarva bhūteṣu dāruṣu agnim iva sthitam

original: BhP_03.09.032/2 praticakṣīta māṃ loko jahyāt tarhy eva kaśmalam
analyzed: praticakṣīta mām lokaḥ jahyāt tarhi eva kaśmalam

original: BhP_03.09.033/1 yadā rahitam ātmānaṃ bhūtendriya-guṇāśayaiḥ
analyzed: yadā rahitam ātmānam bhūta indriya guṇa āśayaiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.033/2 svarūpeṇa mayopetaṃ paśyan svārājyam ṛcchati
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa mayā upetam paśyan svārājyam ṛcchati

original: BhP_03.09.034/1 nānā-karma-vitānena prajā bahvīḥ sisṛkṣataḥ
analyzed: nānā karma vitānena prajāḥ bahvīḥ sisṛkṣataḥ

original: BhP_03.09.034/2 nātmāvasīdaty asmiṃs te varṣīyān mad-anugrahaḥ
analyzed: na ātmā avasīdati asmin te varṣīyān mad anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.035/1 ṛṣim ādyaṃ na badhnāti pāpīyāṃs tvāṃ rajo-guṇaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣim ādyam na badhnāti pāpīyān tvām rajaḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.035/2 yan mano mayi nirbaddhaṃ prajāḥ saṃsṛjato 'pi te
analyzed: yat manaḥ mayi nirbaddham prajāḥ saṃsṛjataḥ upi te

original: BhP_03.09.036/1 jñāto 'haṃ bhavatā tv adya durvijñeyo 'pi dehinām
analyzed: jñātaḥ ham bhavatā tu adya durvijñeyaḥ dehinām

original: BhP_03.09.036/2 yan māṃ tvaṃ manyase 'yuktaṃ bhūtendriya-guṇātmabhiḥ
analyzed: yat mām tvam manyase yuktam bhūta indriya guṇa ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.09.037/1 tubhyaṃ mad-vicikitsāyām ātmā me darśito 'bahiḥ
analyzed: tubhyam mad vicikitsāyām ātmā me darśitaḥ bahis

original: BhP_03.09.037/2 nālena salile mūlaṃ puṣkarasya vicinvataḥ
analyzed: nālena salile mūlam puṣkarasya vicinvataḥ

original: BhP_03.09.038/1 yac cakarthāṅga mat-stotraṃ mat-kathābhyudayāṅkitam
analyzed: yat cakartha aṅga mad stotram mad kathā abhyudaya aṅkitam

original: BhP_03.09.038/2 yad vā tapasi te niṣṭhā sa eṣa mad-anugrahaḥ
analyzed: yat vā tapasi te niṣṭhā saḥ eṣa mad anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.039/1 prīto 'ham astu bhadraṃ te lokānāṃ vijayecchayā
analyzed: prītaḥ ham astu bhadram te lokānām vijaya icchayā

original: BhP_03.09.039/2 yad astauṣīr guṇamayaṃ nirguṇaṃ mānuvarṇayan
analyzed: yat astauṣīḥ guṇa mayam nirguṇam mā anuvarṇayan

original: BhP_03.09.040/1 ya etena pumān nityaṃ stutvā stotreṇa māṃ bhajet
analyzed: yaḥ etena pumān nityam stutvā stotreṇa mām bhajet

original: BhP_03.09.040/2 tasyāśu samprasīdeyaṃ sarva-kāma-vareśvaraḥ
analyzed: tasya āśu samprasīdeyam sarva kāma vara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.09.041/1 pūrtena tapasā yajñair dānair yoga-samādhinā
analyzed: pūrtena tapasā yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ yoga samādhinā

original: BhP_03.09.041/2 rāddhaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ puṃsāṃ mat-prītis tattvavin-matam
analyzed: rāddham niḥśreyasam puṃsām mad prītiḥ tattva vid matam

original: BhP_03.09.042/1 aham ātmātmanāṃ dhātaḥ preṣṭhaḥ san preyasām api
analyzed: aham ātmā ātmanām dhātar preṣṭhaḥ san preyasām api

original: BhP_03.09.042/2 ato mayi ratiṃ kuryād dehādir yat-kṛte priyaḥ
analyzed: atas mayi ratim kuryāt deha ādiḥ yat kṛte priyaḥ

original: BhP_03.09.043/1 sarva-veda-mayenedam ātmanātmātma-yoninā
analyzed: sarva veda mayena idam ātmanā ātmā ātmayoninā

original: BhP_03.09.043/2 prajāḥ sṛja yathā-pūrvaṃ yāś ca mayy anuśerate
analyzed: prajāḥ sṛja yathāpūrvam yāḥ ca mayi anuśerate

original: BhP_03.09.044/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.09.044/1 tasmā evaṃ jagat-sraṣṭre pradhāna-puruṣeśvaraḥ
analyzed: tasmai evam jagatsraṣṭre pradhāna puruṣa īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.09.044/2 vyajyedaṃ svena rūpeṇa kañja-nābhas tirodadhe
analyzed: vyajya idam svena rūpeṇa kañjana ābhaḥ tirodadhe

original: BhP_03.10.001/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.10.001/1 antarhite bhagavati brahmā loka-pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: antarhite bhagavati brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.001/2 prajāḥ sasarja katidhā daihikīr mānasīr vibhuḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ sasarja katidhā daihikīḥ mānasīḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.10.002/1 ye ca me bhagavan pṛṣṭās tvayy arthā bahuvittama
analyzed: ye ca me bhagavan pṛṣṭāḥ tvayi arthāḥ bahu vittama

original: BhP_03.10.002/2 tān vadasvānupūrvyeṇa chindhi naḥ sarva-saṃśayān
analyzed: tān vadasva ānupūrvyeṇa chindhi naḥ sarva saṃśayān

original: BhP_03.10.003/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.10.003/1 evaṃ sañcoditas tena kṣattrā kauṣāravir muniḥ
analyzed: evam sañcoditaḥ tena kṣattrā kauṣāraviḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_03.10.003/2 prītaḥ pratyāha tān praśnān hṛdi-sthān atha bhārgava
analyzed: prītaḥ pratyāha tān praśnān hṛdisthān atha bhārgava

original: BhP_03.10.004/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.10.004/1 viriñco 'pi tathā cakre divyaṃ varṣa-śataṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: viriñcaḥ pi tathā cakre divyam varṣa śatam tapaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.004/2 ātmany ātmānam āveśya yathāha bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: ātmani ātmānam āveśya yathā āha bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.005/1 tad vilokyābja-sambhūto vāyunā yad-adhiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: tat vilokya abja sambhūtaḥ vāyunā yad adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.005/2 padmam ambhaś ca tat-kāla- kṛta-vīryeṇa kampitam
analyzed: padmam ambhaḥ ca tad kāla kṛtavīryeṇa kampitam

original: BhP_03.10.006/1 tapasā hy edhamānena vidyayā cātma-saṃsthayā
analyzed: tapasā hi edhamānena vidyayā ca ātma saṃsthayā

original: BhP_03.10.006/2 vivṛddha-vijñāna-balo nyapād vāyuṃ sahāmbhasā
analyzed: vivṛddha vijñāna balaḥ nyapāt vāyum saha ambhasā

original: BhP_03.10.007/1 tad vilokya viyad-vyāpi puṣkaraṃ yad-adhiṣṭhitam
analyzed: tat vilokya viyat vyāpi puṣkaram yad adhiṣṭhitam

original: BhP_03.10.007/2 anena lokān prāg-līnān kalpitāsmīty acintayat
analyzed: anena lokān prāk līnān kalpitā asmi iti acintayat

original: BhP_03.10.008/1 padma-kośaṃ tadāviśya bhagavat-karma-coditaḥ
analyzed: padmakośam tat āviśya bhagavat karma coditaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.008/2 ekaṃ vyabhāṅkṣīd urudhā tridhā bhāvyaṃ dvi-saptadhā
analyzed: ekam vyabhāṅkṣīt urudhā tridhā bhāvyam dvi saptadhā

original: BhP_03.10.009/1 etāvāñ jīva-lokasya saṃsthā-bhedaḥ samāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: jīva lokasya saṃsthā bhedaḥ samāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.009/2 dharmasya hy animittasya vipākaḥ parameṣṭhy asau
analyzed: dharmasya hi animittasya vipākaḥ parameṣṭhī asau

original: BhP_03.10.010/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.10.010/1 yathāttha bahu-rūpasya harer adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: yathā āttha bahu rūpasya hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.010/2 kālākhyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahman yathā varṇaya naḥ prabho
analyzed: kāla ākhyam lakṣaṇam brahman yathā varṇaya naḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.10.011/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.10.011/1 guṇa-vyatikarākāro nirviśeṣo 'pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: guṇa vyatikara ākāraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.011/2 puruṣas tad-upādānam ātmānaṃ līlayāsṛjat
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tad upādānam ātmānam līlayā asṛjat

original: BhP_03.10.012/1 viśvaṃ vai brahma-tan-mātraṃ saṃsthitaṃ viṣṇu-māyayā
analyzed: viśvam vai brahma tanmātram saṃsthitam viṣṇu māyayā

original: BhP_03.10.012/2 īśvareṇa paricchinnaṃ kālenāvyakta-mūrtinā
analyzed: īśvareṇa paricchinnam kālena avyakta mūrtinā

original: BhP_03.10.013/1 yathedānīṃ tathāgre ca paścād apy etad īdṛśam
analyzed: yathā idānīm tathā agre ca paścāt api etat īdṛśam

original: BhP_03.10.013/2 sargo nava-vidhas tasya prākṛto vaikṛtas tu yaḥ
analyzed: sargaḥ navavidhaḥ tasya prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ tu yaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.014/1 kāla-dravya-guṇair asya tri-vidhaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ
analyzed: kāla dravya guṇaiḥ asya trividhaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.014/2 ādyas tu mahataḥ sargo guṇa-vaiṣamyam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: ādyaḥ tu mahataḥ sargaḥ guṇa vaiṣamyam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.015/1 dvitīyas tv ahamo yatra dravya-jñāna-kriyodayaḥ
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ tu ahamaḥ yatra dravya jñāna kriyā udayaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.015/2 bhūta-sargas tṛtīyas tu tan-mātro dravya-śaktimān
analyzed: bhūta sargaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu tanmātraḥ dravya śaktimān

original: BhP_03.10.016/1 caturtha aindriyaḥ sargo yas tu jñāna-kriyātmakaḥ
analyzed: caturthaḥ aindriyaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.016/2 vaikāriko deva-sargaḥ pañcamo yan-mayaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ deva sargaḥ pañcamaḥ yad mayam manaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.017/1 ṣaṣṭhas tu tamasaḥ sargo yas tv abuddhi-kṛtaḥ prabhoḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu tamasaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu a buddhi kṛtaḥ prabhoḥ

original: BhP_03.10.017/2 ṣaḍ ime prākṛtāḥ sargā vaikṛtān api me śṛṇu
analyzed: ṣaṭ ime prākṛtāḥ sargāḥ vaikṛtān api me śṛṇu

original: BhP_03.10.018/1 rajo-bhājo bhagavato līleyaṃ hari-medhasaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ bhājaḥ bhagavataḥ līlā iyam harimedhasaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.018/2 saptamo mukhya-sargas tu ṣaḍ-vidhas tasthuṣāṃ ca yaḥ
analyzed: saptamaḥ mukhya sargaḥ tu ṣaḍvidhaḥ tasthuṣām ca yaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.019/1 vanaspaty-oṣadhi-latā- tvaksārā vīrudho drumāḥ
analyzed: vanaspati oṣadhi latā tvac sārāḥ vīrudhaḥ drumāḥ

original: BhP_03.10.019/2 utsrotasas tamaḥ-prāyā antaḥ-sparśā viśeṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: utsrotasaḥ tamaḥ prāyāḥ antar sparśāḥ viśeṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.020/1 tiraścām aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ so 'ṣṭāviṃśad-vidho mataḥ
analyzed: tiraścām aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ saḥ ṣṭāviṃśadvidhaḥ mataḥ

original: BhP_03.10.020/2 avido bhūri-tamaso ghrāṇa-jñā hṛdy avedinaḥ
analyzed: avidaḥ bhūri tamasaḥ ghrāṇa jñāḥ hṛdi a vedinaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.021/1 gaur ajo mahiṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūkaro gavayo ruruḥ
analyzed: gauḥ ajaḥ mahiṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūkaraḥ gavayaḥ ruruḥ

original: BhP_03.10.021/2 dvi-śaphāḥ paśavaś ceme avir uṣṭraś ca sattama
analyzed: dvi śaphāḥ paśavaḥ ca ime aviḥ uṣṭraḥ ca sattama

original: BhP_03.10.022/1 kharo 'śvo 'śvataro gauraḥ śarabhaś camarī tathā
analyzed: kharaḥ śvaḥ śvataraḥ gauraḥ śarabhaḥ camarī tathā

original: BhP_03.10.022/2 ete caika-śaphāḥ kṣattaḥ śṛṇu pañca-nakhān paśūn
analyzed: ete ca eka śaphāḥ kṣattar śṛṇu pañcanakhān paśūn

original: BhP_03.10.023/1 śvā sṛgālo vṛko vyāghro mārjāraḥ śaśa-śallakau
analyzed: śvā sṛgālaḥ vṛkaḥ vyāghraḥ mārjāraḥ śaśa śallakau

original: BhP_03.10.023/2 siṃhaḥ kapir gajaḥ kūrmo godhā ca makarādayaḥ
analyzed: siṃhaḥ kapiḥ gajaḥ kūrmaḥ godhā ca makara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.024/1 kaṅka-gṛdhra-baka-śyena- bhāsa-bhallūka-barhiṇaḥ
analyzed: kaṅka gṛdhra baka śyena bhāsa bhallūka barhiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.024/2 haṃsa-sārasa-cakrāhva- kākolūkādayaḥ khagāḥ
BhP_03.10.025/1 arvāk-srotas tu navamaḥ kṣattar eka-vidho nṛṇām
analyzed: arvāksrotaḥ tu navamaḥ kṣattar ekavidhaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_03.10.025/2 rajo 'dhikāḥ karma-parā duḥkhe ca sukha-māninaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ dhikāḥ karma parāḥ duḥkhe ca sukha māninaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.026/1 vaikṛtās traya evaite deva-sargaś ca sattama
analyzed: vaikṛtāḥ trayaḥ eva ete deva sargaḥ ca sattama

original: BhP_03.10.026/2 vaikārikas tu yaḥ proktaḥ kaumāras tūbhayātmakaḥ
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ kaumāraḥ tu ubhaya ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.027/1 deva-sargaś cāṣṭa-vidho vibudhāḥ pitaro 'surāḥ
analyzed: deva sargaḥ ca aṣṭavidhaḥ vibudhāḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_03.10.027/2 gandharvāpsarasaḥ siddhā yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ siddhāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_03.10.028/1 bhūta-preta-piśācāś ca vidyādhrāḥ kinnarādayaḥ
analyzed: bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca vidyādhrāḥ kinnara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.10.028/2 daśaite vidurākhyātāḥ sargās te viśva-sṛk-kṛtāḥ
analyzed: daśā ete vidura ākhyātāḥ sargāḥ te viśvasṛkkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_03.10.029/1 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśān manvantarāṇi ca
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi vaṃśān manvantarāṇi ca

original: BhP_03.10.029/2 evaṃ rajaḥ-plutaḥ sraṣṭā kalpādiṣv ātmabhūr hariḥ
analyzed: evam rajaḥ plutaḥ sraṣṭā kalpa ādiṣu ātmabhūḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_03.10.029/3 sṛjaty amogha-saṅkalpa ātmaivātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: sṛjati amogha saṅkalpaḥ ātmā eva ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_03.11.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.11.001/1 caramaḥ sad-viśeṣāṇām aneko 'saṃyutaḥ sadā
analyzed: caramaḥ sat viśeṣāṇām saṃyutaḥ sadā

original: BhP_03.11.001/2 paramāṇuḥ sa vijñeyo nṛṇām aikya-bhramo yataḥ
analyzed: paramāṇuḥ sa vijñeyaḥ nṛṇām aikya bhramaḥ yatas

original: BhP_03.11.002/1 sata eva padārthasya svarūpāvasthitasya yat
analyzed: sataḥ eva padārthasya sva rūpa avasthitasya yat

original: BhP_03.11.002/2 kaivalyaṃ parama-mahān aviśeṣo nirantaraḥ
BhP_03.11.003/1 evaṃ kālo 'py anumitaḥ saukṣmye sthaulye ca sattama
analyzed: evam saukṣmye sthaulye ca sattama

original: BhP_03.11.003/2 saṃsthāna-bhuktyā bhagavān avyakto vyakta-bhug vibhuḥ
analyzed: saṃsthāna bhuktyā bhagavān avyaktaḥ vyakta bhuj vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.11.004/1 sa kālaḥ paramāṇur vai yo bhuṅkte paramāṇutām
analyzed: sa kālaḥ paramāṇuḥ vai yaḥ bhuṅkte parama aṇu tām

original: BhP_03.11.004/2 sato 'viśeṣa-bhug yas tu sa kālaḥ paramo mahān
analyzed: sataḥ viśeṣa bhuj yaḥ tu sa kālaḥ paramaḥ mahān

original: BhP_03.11.005/1 aṇur dvau paramāṇū syāt trasareṇus trayaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: aṇuḥ dvau paramāṇū syāt trasareṇuḥ trayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.005/2 jālārka-raśmy-avagataḥ kham evānupatann agāt
analyzed: jāla arka raśmi avagataḥ kham eva anupatan agāt

original: BhP_03.11.006/1 trasareṇu-trikaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ kālaḥ sa truṭiḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhuṅkte

original: BhP_03.11.006/2 śata-bhāgas tu vedhaḥ syāt tais tribhis tu lavaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: śata bhāgaḥ tu vedhaḥ syāt taiḥ tribhiḥ tu lavaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.007/1 nimeṣas tri-lavo jñeya āmnātas te trayaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: nimeṣaḥ tri lavaḥ jñeyaḥ āmnātaḥ te trayaḥ kṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.007/2 kṣaṇān pañca viduḥ kāṣṭhāṃ laghu tā daśa pañca ca
analyzed: kṣaṇān pañca viduḥ kāṣṭhām laghu tāḥ daśa pañca ca

original: BhP_03.11.008/1 laghūni vai samāmnātā daśa pañca ca nāḍikā
analyzed: laghūni vai samāmnātā daśa pañca ca nāḍikā

original: BhP_03.11.008/2 te dve muhūrtaḥ praharaḥ ṣaḍ yāmaḥ sapta vā nṛṇām
analyzed: te dve muhūrtaḥ praharaḥ ṣaṣ yāmaḥ sapta vā nṛṇām

original: BhP_03.11.009/1 dvādaśārdha-palonmānaṃ caturbhiś catur-aṅgulaiḥ
analyzed: dvādaśa ardha pala unmānam caturbhiḥ catur aṅgulaiḥ

original: BhP_03.11.009/2 svarṇa-māṣaiḥ kṛta-cchidraṃ yāvat prastha-jala-plutam
analyzed: svarṇa māṣaiḥ kṛta chidram yāvat prastha jala plutam

original: BhP_03.11.010/1 yāmāś catvāraś catvāro martyānām ahanī ubhe
analyzed: yāmāḥ catvāraḥ catvāraḥ martyānām ahanī ubhe

original: BhP_03.11.010/2 pakṣaḥ pañca-daśāhāni śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca mānada
analyzed: pakṣaḥ pañcadaśa ahāni śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca mānada

original: BhP_03.11.011/1 tayoḥ samuccayo māsaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tad ahar-niśam
analyzed: tayoḥ samuccayaḥ māsaḥ pitṝṇām tat aharniśam

original: BhP_03.11.011/2 dvau tāv ṛtuḥ ṣaḍ ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cottaraṃ divi
analyzed: dvau tau ṛtuḥ ṣaṣ ayanam dakṣiṇam ca uttaram divi

original: BhP_03.11.012/1 ayane cāhanī prāhur vatsaro dvādaśa smṛtaḥ
analyzed: ayane ca ahanī prāhuḥ vatsaraḥ dvādaśa smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.012/2 saṃvatsara-śataṃ n-ṇāṃ paramāyur nirūpitam
analyzed: saṃvatsara śatam parama āyuḥ nirūpitam

original: BhP_03.11.013/1 graharkṣa-tārā-cakra-sthaḥ paramāṇv-ādinā jagat
analyzed: graha ṛkṣa tārā cakra sthaḥ paramāṇu ādinā jagat

original: BhP_03.11.013/2 saṃvatsarāvasānena paryety animiṣo vibhuḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsara avasānena paryeti animiṣaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.11.014/1 saṃvatsaraḥ parivatsara iḍā-vatsara eva ca
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ parivatsaraḥ iḍā vatsaraḥ eva ca

original: BhP_03.11.014/2 anuvatsaro vatsaraś ca viduraivaṃ prabhāṣyate
analyzed: anuvatsaraḥ vatsaraḥ ca vidura evam prabhāṣyate

original: BhP_03.11.015/1 yaḥ sṛjya-śaktim urudhocchvasayan sva-śaktyā
analyzed: yaḥ sṛjya śaktim urudhā ucchvasayan sva śaktyā

original: BhP_03.11.015/2 puṃso 'bhramāya divi dhāvati bhūta-bhedaḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ bhramāya divi dhāvati bhūta bhedaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.015/3 kālākhyayā guṇamayaṃ kratubhir vitanvaṃs
analyzed: kāla ākhyayā guṇam ayam kratubhiḥ vitanvan

original: BhP_03.11.015/4 tasmai baliṃ harata vatsara-pañcakāya
analyzed: tasmai balim harata vatsara pañcakāya

original: BhP_03.11.016/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.11.016/1 pitṛ-deva-manuṣyāṇām āyuḥ param idaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām āyuḥ param idam smṛtam

original: BhP_03.11.016/2 pareṣāṃ gatim ācakṣva ye syuḥ kalpād bahir vidaḥ
analyzed: pareṣām gatim ācakṣva ye syuḥ kalpāt bahis vidaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.017/1 bhagavān veda kālasya gatiṃ bhagavato nanu
analyzed: bhagavān veda kālasya gatim bhagavataḥ nanu

original: BhP_03.11.017/2 viśvaṃ vicakṣate dhīrā yoga-rāddhena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: viśvam vicakṣate dhīrāḥ yoga rāddhena cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_03.11.018/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.11.018/1 kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti catur-yugam
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ ca iti caturyugam

original: BhP_03.11.018/2 divyair dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ sāvadhānaṃ nirūpitam
analyzed: divyaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ sāvadhānam nirūpitam

original: BhP_03.11.019/1 catvāri trīṇi dve caikaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathā-kramam
analyzed: catvāri trīṇi dve ca ekam kṛta ādiṣu yathākramam

original: BhP_03.11.019/2 saṅkhyātāni sahasrāṇi dvi-guṇāni śatāni ca
analyzed: saṅkhyātāni sahasrāṇi dviguṇāni śatāni ca

original: BhP_03.11.020/1 sandhyā-sandhyāṃśayor antar yaḥ kālaḥ śata-saṅkhyayoḥ
analyzed: sandhyā sandhyāṃśayoḥ antar yaḥ kālaḥ śata saṅkhyayoḥ

original: BhP_03.11.020/2 tam evāhur yugaṃ taj-jñā yatra dharmo vidhīyate
analyzed: tam eva āhuḥ yugam tajjñāḥ yatra dharmaḥ vidhīyate

original: BhP_03.11.021/1 dharmaś catuṣ-pān manujān kṛte samanuvartate
analyzed: dharmaḥ catuṣpād manujān kṛte samanuvartate

original: BhP_03.11.021/2 sa evānyeṣv adharmeṇa vyeti pādena vardhatā
analyzed: saḥ eva anyeṣu adharmeṇa vyeti pādena vardhatā

original: BhP_03.11.022/1 tri-lokyā yuga-sāhasraṃ bahir ābrahmaṇo dinam
analyzed: trilokyāḥ yuga sāhasram bahis ābrahmaṇas dinam

original: BhP_03.11.022/2 tāvaty eva niśā tāta yan nimīlati viśva-sṛk
analyzed: tāvatī eva niśā tāta yat nimīlati viśvasṛj

original: BhP_03.11.023/1 niśāvasāna ārabdho loka-kalpo 'nuvartate
analyzed: niśā avasāne ārabdhaḥ loka kalpaḥ nuvartate

original: BhP_03.11.023/2 yāvad dinaṃ bhagavato manūn bhuñjaṃś catur-daśa
analyzed: yāvat dinam bhagavataḥ manūn bhuñjan caturdaśa

original: BhP_03.11.024/1 svaṃ svaṃ kālaṃ manur bhuṅkte sādhikāṃ hy eka-saptatim
analyzed: svam svam kālam manuḥ bhuṅkte sādhikām hi ekasaptatim

original: BhP_03.11.024/2 manvantareṣu manavas tad-vaṃśyā ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: manvantareṣu manavaḥ tad vaṃśyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_03.11.024/3 bhavanti caiva yugapat sureśāś cānu ye ca tān
analyzed: bhavanti ca eva yugapad sureśāḥ ca anu ye ca tān

original: BhP_03.11.025/1 eṣa dainan-dinaḥ sargo brāhmas trailokya-vartanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa dainandinaḥ sargaḥ brāhmaḥ trailokya vartanaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.025/2 tiryaṅ-nṛ-pitṛ-devānāṃ sambhavo yatra karmabhiḥ
analyzed: tiryak nṛ pitṛ devānām sambhavaḥ yatra karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.11.026/1 manvantareṣu bhagavān bibhrat sattvaṃ sva-mūrtibhiḥ
analyzed: manvantareṣu bhagavān bibhrat sattvam sva mūrtibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.11.026/2 manv-ādibhir idaṃ viśvam avaty udita-pauruṣaḥ
analyzed: manu ādibhiḥ idam viśvam avati udita pauruṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.027/1 tamo-mātrām upādāya pratisaṃruddha-vikramaḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ mātrām upādāya pratisaṃruddha vikramaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.027/2 kālenānugatāśeṣa āste tūṣṇīṃ dinātyaye
analyzed: kālena anugata aśeṣaḥ āste tūṣṇīm dina atyaye

original: BhP_03.11.028/1 tam evānv api dhīyante lokā bhūr-ādayas trayaḥ
analyzed: tam eva anu api dhīyante lokāḥ bhūḥ ādayaḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.028/2 niśāyām anuvṛttāyāṃ nirmukta-śaśi-bhāskaram
analyzed: niśāyām anuvṛttāyām nirmukta śaśi bhāskaram

original: BhP_03.11.029/1 tri-lokyāṃ dahyamānāyāṃ śaktyā saṅkarṣaṇāgninā
analyzed: trilokyām dahyamānāyām śaktyā saṅkarṣaṇa agninā

original: BhP_03.11.029/2 yānty ūṣmaṇā maharlokāj janaṃ bhṛgv-ādayo 'rditāḥ
analyzed: yānti ūṣmaṇā mahar lokāt janam bhṛgu ādayaḥ rditāḥ

original: BhP_03.11.030/1 tāvat tri-bhuvanaṃ sadyaḥ kalpāntaidhita-sindhavaḥ
analyzed: tāvat tribhuvanam sadyas kalpānta edhita sindhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.030/2 plāvayanty utkaṭāṭopa- caṇḍa-vāteritormayaḥ
analyzed: plāvayanti utkaṭa āṭopa caṇḍa vāta īrita ūrmayaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.031/1 antaḥ sa tasmin salila āste 'nantāsano hariḥ
analyzed: antar sa tasmin salile āste nanta āsanaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_03.11.031/2 yoga-nidrā-nimīlākṣaḥ stūyamāno janālayaiḥ
analyzed: yoganidrā nimīlā akṣaḥ stūyamānaḥ janālayaiḥ

original: BhP_03.11.032/1 evaṃ-vidhair aho-rātraiḥ kāla-gatyopalakṣitaiḥ
analyzed: evaṃvidhaiḥ ahar rātraiḥ kāla gatyā upalakṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_03.11.032/2 apakṣitam ivāsyāpi paramāyur vayaḥ-śatam
analyzed: apakṣitam iva asya api parama āyuḥ vayaḥ śatam

original: BhP_03.11.033/1 yad ardham āyuṣas tasya parārdham abhidhīyate
analyzed: yat ardham āyuṣaḥ tasya parārdham abhidhīyate

original: BhP_03.11.033/2 pūrvaḥ parārdho 'pakrānto hy aparo 'dya pravartate
analyzed: pūrvaḥ parārdhaḥ u pakrāntaḥ hi aparaḥ pravartate

original: BhP_03.11.034/1 pūrvasyādau parārdhasya brāhmo nāma mahān abhūt
analyzed: pūrvasya ādau parārdhasya brāhmaḥ nāma mahān abhūt

original: BhP_03.11.034/2 kalpo yatrābhavad brahmā śabda-brahmeti yaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: kalpaḥ yatra abhavat brahmā śabdabrahma iti yam viduḥ

original: BhP_03.11.035/1 tasyaiva cānte kalpo 'bhūd yaṃ pādmam abhicakṣate
analyzed: tasya eva ca ante kalpaḥ bhūt yam pādmam abhicakṣate

original: BhP_03.11.035/2 yad dharer nābhi-sarasa āsīl loka-saroruham
analyzed: yat hareḥ nābhi sarase āsīt loka saroruham

original: BhP_03.11.036/1 ayaṃ tu kathitaḥ kalpo dvitīyasyāpi bhārata
analyzed: ayam tu kathitaḥ kalpaḥ dvitīyasya api bhārata

original: BhP_03.11.036/2 vārāha iti vikhyāto yatrāsīc chūkaro hariḥ
analyzed: vārāhaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ yatra āsīt śūkaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_03.11.037/1 kālo 'yaṃ dvi-parārdhākhyo nimeṣa upacaryate
analyzed: kālaḥ yam dvi parārdha ākhyaḥ nimeṣaḥ upacaryate

original: BhP_03.11.037/2 avyākṛtasyānantasya hy anāder jagad-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: avyākṛtasya anantasya hi anādeḥ jagadātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.038/1 kālo 'yaṃ paramāṇv-ādir dvi-parārdhānta īśvaraḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ yam paramāṇu ādiḥ dvi parārdha antaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.11.038/2 naiveśituṃ prabhur bhūmna īśvaro dhāma-māninām
analyzed: na eva īśitum prabhuḥ bhūmnaḥ īśvaraḥ dhāma māninām

original: BhP_03.11.039/1 vikāraiḥ sahito yuktair viśeṣādibhir āvṛtaḥ
analyzed: vikāraiḥ sahitaḥ yuktaiḥ viśeṣa ādibhiḥ āvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.039/2 āṇḍakośo bahir ayaṃ pañcāśat-koṭi-vistṛtaḥ
analyzed: āṇḍakośaḥ bahis ayam pañcāśat koṭi vistṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.040/1 daśottarādhikair yatra praviṣṭaḥ paramāṇuvat
analyzed: daśa uttara adhikaiḥ yatra praviṣṭaḥ paramāṇu vat

original: BhP_03.11.040/2 lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ
analyzed: lakṣyate ntargatāḥ ca anye koṭiśas hi aṇḍa rāśayaḥ

original: BhP_03.11.041/1 tad āhur akṣaraṃ brahma sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam
analyzed: tat āhuḥ akṣaram brahma sarva kāraṇa kāraṇam

original: BhP_03.11.041/2 viṣṇor dhāma paraṃ sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ dhāma param sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.12.001/1 iti te varṇitaḥ kṣattaḥ kālākhyaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti te varṇitaḥ kṣattar kāla ākhyaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.001/2 mahimā veda-garbho 'tha yathāsrākṣīn nibodha me
analyzed: mahimā yathā asrākṣīt nibodha me

original: BhP_03.12.002/1 sasarjāgre 'ndha-tāmisram atha tāmisram ādi-kṛt
analyzed: sasarja agre ndhatāmisram atha tāmisram ādi kṛt

original: BhP_03.12.002/2 mahāmohaṃ ca mohaṃ ca tamaś cājñāna-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: mahā moham ca moham ca tamaḥ ca ajñāna vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.003/1 dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nātmānaṃ bahv amanyata
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīm sṛṣṭim na ātmānam bahu amanyata

original: BhP_03.12.003/2 bhagavad-dhyāna-pūtena manasānyāṃ tato 'sṛjat
analyzed: bhagavat dhyāna pūtena manasā anyām sṛjat

original: BhP_03.12.004/1 sanakaṃ ca sanandaṃ ca sanātanam athātmabhūḥ
analyzed: sanakam ca sanandam ca sanātanam

original: BhP_03.12.004/2 sanat-kumāraṃ ca munīn niṣkriyān ūrdhva-retasaḥ
analyzed: sanatkumāram ca munīn niṣkriyān ūrdhvaretasaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.005/1 tān babhāṣe svabhūḥ putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ
analyzed: tān babhāṣe putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ

original: BhP_03.12.005/2 tan naicchan mokṣa-dharmāṇo vāsudeva-parāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: tat na aicchat mokṣa dharmāṇaḥ vāsudeva parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_03.12.006/1 so 'vadhyātaḥ sutair evaṃ pratyākhyātānuśāsanaiḥ
analyzed: saḥ vadhyātaḥ sutaiḥ evam pratyākhyāta anuśāsanaiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.006/2 krodhaṃ durviṣahaṃ jātaṃ niyantum upacakrame
analyzed: krodham durviṣaham jātam niyantum upacakrame

original: BhP_03.12.007/1 dhiyā nigṛhyamāṇo 'pi bhruvor madhyāt prajāpateḥ
analyzed: dhiyā nigṛhyamāṇaḥ u pi bhruvoḥ madhyāt prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_03.12.007/2 sadyo 'jāyata tan-manyuḥ kumāro nīla-lohitaḥ
analyzed: sadyas jāyata tad manyuḥ kumāraḥ nīlalohitaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.008/1 sa vai ruroda devānāṃ pūrvajo bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: sa vai ruroda devānām pūrvajaḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.008/2 nāmāni kuru me dhātaḥ sthānāni ca jagad-guro
analyzed: nāmāni kuru me dhātar sthānāni ca jagadguro

original: BhP_03.12.009/1 iti tasya vacaḥ pādmo bhagavān paripālayan
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ pādmaḥ bhagavān paripālayan

original: BhP_03.12.009/2 abhyadhād bhadrayā vācā mā rodīs tat karomi te
analyzed: abhyadhāt bhadrayā vācā mā rodīḥ tat karomi te

original: BhP_03.12.010/1 yad arodīḥ sura-śreṣṭha sodvega iva bālakaḥ
analyzed: yat arodīḥ suraśreṣṭha sa udvegaḥ iva bālakaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.010/2 tatas tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudra iti prajāḥ
analyzed: tatas tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudraḥ iti prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.12.011/1 hṛd indriyāṇy asur vyoma vāyur agnir jalaṃ mahī
analyzed: hṛd indriyāṇi asuḥ vyoma vāyuḥ agniḥ jalam mahī

original: BhP_03.12.011/2 sūryaś candras tapaś caiva sthānāny agre kṛtāni te
analyzed: sūryaḥ candraḥ tapaḥ ca eva sthānāni agre kṛtāni te

original: BhP_03.12.012/1 manyur manur mahinaso mahāñ chiva ṛtadhvajaḥ
analyzed: manyuḥ manuḥ mahinasaḥ mahān śivaḥ ṛta dhvajaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.012/2 ugraretā bhavaḥ kālo vāmadevo dhṛtavrataḥ
BhP_03.12.013/1 dhīr dhṛti-rasalomā ca niyut sarpir ilāmbikā
analyzed: dhīḥ dhṛti rasa lomā ca niyut sarpiḥ ilā ambikā

original: BhP_03.12.013/2 irāvatī svadhā dīkṣā rudrāṇyo rudra te striyaḥ
analyzed: irāvatī svadhā dīkṣā rudrāṇyaḥ rudra te striyaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.014/1 gṛhāṇaitāni nāmāni sthānāni ca sa-yoṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: gṛhāṇa etāni nāmāni sthānāni ca sayoṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.014/2 ebhiḥ sṛja prajā bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ
analyzed: ebhiḥ sṛja prajāḥ bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.015/1 ity ādiṣṭaḥ sva-guruṇā bhagavān nīla-lohitaḥ
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭaḥ sva guruṇā bhagavān nīlalohitaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.015/2 sattvākṛti-svabhāvena sasarjātma-samāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: sattva ākṛti svabhāvena sasarja ātma samāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.12.016/1 rudrāṇāṃ rudra-sṛṣṭānāṃ samantād grasatāṃ jagat
analyzed: rudrāṇām rudra sṛṣṭānām samantāt grasatām jagat

original: BhP_03.12.016/2 niśāmyāsaṅkhyaśo yūthān prajāpatir aśaṅkata
analyzed: niśāmya asaṅkhyaśas yūthān prajāpatiḥ aśaṅkata

original: BhP_03.12.017/1 alaṃ prajābhiḥ sṛṣṭābhir īdṛśībhiḥ surottama
analyzed: alam prajābhiḥ sṛṣṭābhiḥ īdṛśībhiḥ surottama

original: BhP_03.12.017/2 mayā saha dahantībhir diśaś cakṣurbhir ulbaṇaiḥ
analyzed: mayā saha dahantībhiḥ diśaḥ cakṣurbhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.018/1 tapa ātiṣṭha bhadraṃ te sarva-bhūta-sukhāvaham
analyzed: tapaḥ ātiṣṭha bhadram te sarva bhūta sukha āvaham

original: BhP_03.12.018/2 tapasaiva yathā pūrvaṃ sraṣṭā viśvam idaṃ bhavān
analyzed: tapasā eva yathā pūrvam sraṣṭā viśvam idam bhavān

original: BhP_03.12.019/1 tapasaiva paraṃ jyotir bhagavantam adhokṣajam
analyzed: tapasā eva param jyotiḥ bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_03.12.019/2 sarva-bhūta-guhāvāsam añjasā vindate pumān
analyzed: sarva bhūta guhā āvāsam añjasā vindate pumān

original: BhP_03.12.020/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.12.020/1 evam ātmabhuvādiṣṭaḥ parikramya girāṃ patim
analyzed: evam parikramya girām patim

original: BhP_03.12.020/2 bāḍham ity amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam
analyzed: bāḍham iti amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam

original: BhP_03.12.021/1 athābhidhyāyataḥ sargaṃ daśa putrāḥ prajajñire
analyzed: atha abhidhyāyataḥ sargam daśa putrāḥ prajajñire

original: BhP_03.12.021/2 bhagavac-chakti-yuktasya loka-santāna-hetavaḥ
BhP_03.12.022/1 marīcir atry-aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
analyzed: marīciḥ atri aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

original: BhP_03.12.022/2 bhṛgur vasiṣṭho dakṣaś ca daśamas tatra nāradaḥ
analyzed: bhṛguḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ dakṣaḥ ca daśamaḥ tatra nāradaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.023/1 utsaṅgān nārado jajñe dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhāt svayambhuvaḥ
analyzed: utsaṅgāt nāradaḥ jajñe dakṣaḥ ṅguṣṭhāt svayambhuvaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.023/2 prāṇād vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjāto bhṛgus tvaci karāt kratuḥ
analyzed: prāṇāt vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjātaḥ bhṛguḥ tvaci karāt kratuḥ

original: BhP_03.12.024/1 pulaho nābhito jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayor ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: pulahaḥ nābhitaḥ jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayoḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.024/2 aṅgirā mukhato 'kṣṇo 'trir marīcir manaso 'bhavat
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ mukhataḥ kṣṇo tris marīciḥ manasaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_03.12.025/1 dharmaḥ stanād dakṣiṇato yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
analyzed: dharmaḥ stanāt dakṣiṇatas yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam

original: BhP_03.12.025/2 adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasmān mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhatas yasmāt mṛtyuḥ loka bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_03.12.026/1 hṛdi kāmo bhruvaḥ krodho lobhaś cādhara-dacchadāt
analyzed: hṛdi kāmaḥ bhruvaḥ krodhaḥ lobhaḥ ca adhara dacchadāt

original: BhP_03.12.026/2 āsyād vāk sindhavo meḍhrān nirṛtiḥ pāyor aghāśrayaḥ
analyzed: āsyāt vāc sindhavaḥ meḍhrāt nirṛtiḥ pāyoḥ agha āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.027/1 chāyāyāḥ kardamo jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: chāyāyāḥ kardamaḥ jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.12.027/2 manaso dehataś cedaṃ jajñe viśva-kṛto jagat
analyzed: manasaḥ dehataḥ ca idam jajñe viśvakṛtaḥ jagat

original: BhP_03.12.028/1 vācaṃ duhitaraṃ tanvīṃ svayambhūr haratīṃ manaḥ
analyzed: vācam duhitaram tanvīm svayambhūḥ haratīm manaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.028/2 akāmāṃ cakame kṣattaḥ sa-kāma iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: akāmām cakame kṣattar sa kāmaḥ iti naḥ śrutam

original: BhP_03.12.029/1 tam adharme kṛta-matiṃ vilokya pitaraṃ sutāḥ
analyzed: tam adharme kṛtamatim vilokya pitaram sutāḥ

original: BhP_03.12.029/2 marīci-mukhyā munayo viśrambhāt pratyabodhayan
analyzed: marīci mukhyāḥ munayaḥ viśrambhāt pratyabodhayan

original: BhP_03.12.030/1 naitat pūrvaiḥ kṛtaṃ tvad ye na kariṣyanti cāpare
analyzed: na etat pūrvaiḥ kṛtam tvat ye na kariṣyanti ca apare

original: BhP_03.12.030/2 yas tvaṃ duhitaraṃ gaccher anigṛhyāṅgajaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam duhitaram gaccheḥ a nigṛhya aṅgajam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.12.031/1 tejīyasām api hy etan na suślokyaṃ jagad-guro
analyzed: tejīyasām api hi etat na suślokyam jagadguro

original: BhP_03.12.031/2 yad-vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate
analyzed: yad vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate

original: BhP_03.12.032/1 tasmai namo bhagavate ya idaṃ svena rociṣā
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate yaḥ idam svena rociṣā

original: BhP_03.12.032/2 ātma-sthaṃ vyañjayām āsa sa dharmaṃ pātum arhati
analyzed: ātma stham vyañjayām āsa sa dharmam pātum arhati

original: BhP_03.12.033/1 sa itthaṃ gṛṇataḥ putrān puro dṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn
analyzed: saḥ ittham gṛṇataḥ putrān puras dṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn

original: BhP_03.12.033/2 prajāpati-patis tanvaṃ tatyāja vrīḍitas tadā
analyzed: prajāpati patiḥ tanvam tatyāja vrīḍitaḥ tadā

original: BhP_03.12.033/3 tāṃ diśo jagṛhur ghorāṃ nīhāraṃ yad vidus tamaḥ
analyzed: tām diśaḥ jagṛhuḥ ghorām nīhāram yat viduḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.034/1 kadācid dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭur vedā āsaṃś catur-mukhāt
analyzed: kadācid dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭuḥ vedāḥ āsan caturmukhāt

original: BhP_03.12.034/2 kathaṃ srakṣyāmy ahaṃ lokān samavetān yathā purā
analyzed: katham srakṣyāmi aham lokān samavetān yathā purā

original: BhP_03.12.035/1 cātur-hotraṃ karma-tantram upaveda-nayaiḥ saha
analyzed: cāturhotram karma tantram upaveda nayaiḥ saha

original: BhP_03.12.035/2 dharmasya pādāś catvāras tathaivāśrama-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: dharmasya pādāḥ catvāraḥ tathā eva āśrama vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.036/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.12.036/1 sa vai viśva-sṛjām īśo vedādīn mukhato 'sṛjat
analyzed: sa vai viśvasṛjām īśaḥ veda ādīn mukhataḥ sṛjat

original: BhP_03.12.036/2 yad yad yenāsṛjad devas tan me brūhi tapo-dhana
analyzed: yat yat yena asṛjat devaḥ tat me brūhi tapodhana

original: BhP_03.12.037/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.12.037/1 ṛg-yajuḥ-sāmātharvākhyān vedān pūrvādibhir mukhaiḥ
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharva ākhyān vedān pūrva ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.037/2 śāstram ijyāṃ stuti-stomaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vyadhāt kramāt
analyzed: śāstram ijyām stuti stomam prāyaścittam vyadhāt kramāt

original: BhP_03.12.038/1 āyur-vedaṃ dhanur-vedaṃ gāndharvaṃ vedam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: āyurvedam dhanurvedam gāndharvam vedam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.038/2 sthāpatyaṃ cāsṛjad vedaṃ kramāt pūrvādibhir mukhaiḥ
analyzed: sthāpatyam ca asṛjat vedam kramāt pūrva ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.039/1 itihāsa-purāṇāni pañcamaṃ vedam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇāni pañcamam vedam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.12.039/2 sarvebhya eva vaktrebhyaḥ sasṛje sarva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ eva vaktrebhyaḥ sasṛje sarva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.040/1 ṣoḍaśy-ukthau pūrva-vaktrāt purīṣy-agniṣṭutāv atha
analyzed: ṣoḍaśī ukthau pūrva vaktrāt purīṣī agniṣṭutau atha

original: BhP_03.12.040/2 āptoryāmātirātrau ca vājapeyaṃ sagosavam
analyzed: āptoryāma atirātrau ca vājapeyam sagosavam

original: BhP_03.12.041/1 vidyā dānaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ dharmasyeti padāni ca
analyzed: vidyā dānam tapaḥ satyam dharmasya iti padāni ca

original: BhP_03.12.041/2 āśramāṃś ca yathā-saṅkhyam asṛjat saha vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: āśramān ca yathāsaṅkhyam asṛjat saha vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.12.042/1 sāvitraṃ prājāpatyaṃ ca brāhmaṃ cātha bṛhat tathā
analyzed: sāvitram prājāpatyam ca brāhmam ca atha bṛhat tathā

original: BhP_03.12.042/2 vārtā sañcaya-śālīna- śiloñcha iti vai gṛhe
analyzed: vārtā sañcaya śālīna śila uñchaḥ iti vai gṛhe

original: BhP_03.12.043/1 vaikhānasā vālakhilyau- dumbarāḥ phenapā vane
analyzed: vaikhānasāḥ vālakhilyau dumbarāḥ phenapāḥ vane

original: BhP_03.12.043/2 nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvaṃ bahvodo haṃsa-niṣkriyau
analyzed: nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvam haṃsa niṣkriyau

original: BhP_03.12.044/1 ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍa-nītis tathaiva ca
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ tathā eva ca

original: BhP_03.12.044/2 evaṃ vyāhṛtayaś cāsan praṇavo hy asya dahrataḥ
analyzed: evam vyāhṛtayaḥ ca āsan praṇavaḥ hi asya dahrataḥ

original: BhP_03.12.045/1 tasyoṣṇig āsīl lomabhyo gāyatrī ca tvaco vibhoḥ
analyzed: tasya uṣṇih āsīt lomabhyaḥ gāyatrī ca tvacaḥ vibhoḥ

original: BhP_03.12.045/2 triṣṭum māṃsāt snuto 'nuṣṭub jagaty asthnaḥ prajāpateḥ
analyzed: triṣṭubh māṃsāt snutaḥ nuṣṭubh jagatī asthnaḥ prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_03.12.046/1 majjāyāḥ paṅktir utpannā bṛhatī prāṇato 'bhavat
analyzed: majjāyāḥ paṅktiḥ utpannā bṛhatī prāṇataḥ bhavat

original: BhP_03.12.046/2 sparśas tasyābhavaj jīvaḥ svaro deha udāhṛta
analyzed: sparśaḥ tasya abhavat jīvaḥ svaraḥ dehaḥ udāhṛta

original: BhP_03.12.047/1 ūṣmāṇam indriyāṇy āhur antaḥ-sthā balam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: ūṣmāṇam indriyāṇi āhuḥ antaḥsthā balam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.047/2 svarāḥ sapta vihāreṇa bhavanti sma prajāpateḥ
analyzed: svarāḥ sapta vihāreṇa bhavanti sma prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_03.12.048/1 śabda-brahmātmanas tasya vyaktāvyaktātmanaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: śabdabrahma ātmanaḥ tasya vyakta avyakta ātmanaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_03.12.048/2 brahmāvabhāti vitato nānā-śakty-upabṛṃhitaḥ
analyzed: brahmā avabhāti vitataḥ nānā śakti upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.049/1 tato 'parām upādāya sa sargāya mano dadhe
analyzed: tatas parām upādāya sa sargāya manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_03.12.049/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ bhūri-vīryāṇām api sargam avistṛtam
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām bhūri vīryāṇām api sargam avistṛtam

original: BhP_03.12.050/1 jñātvā tad dhṛdaye bhūyaś cintayām āsa kaurava
analyzed: jñātvā tat hṛdaye bhūyas cintayām āsa kaurava

original: BhP_03.12.050/2 aho adbhutam etan me vyāpṛtasyāpi nityadā
analyzed: aho adbhutam etat me vyāpṛtasya api nityadā

original: BhP_03.12.051/1 na hy edhante prajā nūnaṃ daivam atra vighātakam
analyzed: na hi edhante prajāḥ nūnam daivam atra vighātakam

original: BhP_03.12.051/2 evaṃ yukta-kṛtas tasya daivaṃ cāvekṣatas tadā
analyzed: evam yuktakṛtaḥ tasya daivam ca avekṣataḥ tadā

original: BhP_03.12.052/1 kasya rūpam abhūd dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate
analyzed: kasya rūpam abhūt dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate

original: BhP_03.12.052/2 tābhyāṃ rūpa-vibhāgābhyāṃ mithunaṃ samapadyata
analyzed: tābhyām rūpa vibhāgābhyām mithunam samapadyata

original: BhP_03.12.053/1 yas tu tatra pumān so 'bhūn manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: yaḥ tu tatra pumān saḥ bhūt manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_03.12.053/2 strī yāsīc chatarūpākhyā mahiṣy asya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: strī yā āsīt śatarūpā ākhyā mahiṣī asya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.12.054/1 tadā mithuna-dharmeṇa prajā hy edhām babhūvire
analyzed: tadā mithuna dharmeṇa prajāḥ hi edhām babhūvire

original: BhP_03.12.054/2 sa cāpi śatarūpāyāṃ pañcāpatyāny ajījanat
analyzed: sa ca api śatarūpāyām pañca apatyāni ajījanat

original: BhP_03.12.055/1 priyavratottānapādau tisraḥ kanyāś ca bhārata
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau tisraḥ kanyāḥ ca bhārata

original: BhP_03.12.055/2 ākūtir devahūtiś ca prasūtir iti sattama
analyzed: ākūtiḥ devahūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ iti sattama

original: BhP_03.12.056/1 ākūtiṃ rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām
analyzed: ākūtim rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām

original: BhP_03.12.056/2 dakṣāyādāt prasūtiṃ ca yata āpūritaṃ jagat
analyzed: dakṣāya adāt prasūtim ca yatas āpūritam jagat

original: BhP_03.13.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.001/1 niśamya vācaṃ vadato muneḥ puṇyatamāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: niśamya vācam vadataḥ muneḥ puṇyatamām nṛpa

original: BhP_03.13.001/2 bhūyaḥ papraccha kauravyo vāsudeva-kathādṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas papraccha kauravyaḥ vāsudeva kathā ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.002/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.002/1 sa vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāṭ priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ
analyzed: sa vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāj priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.002/2 pratilabhya priyāṃ patnīṃ kiṃ cakāra tato mune
analyzed: pratilabhya priyām patnīm kim cakāra tatas mune

original: BhP_03.13.003/1 caritaṃ tasya rājarṣer ādi-rājasya sattama
analyzed: caritam tasya rājarṣeḥ ādi rājasya sattama

original: BhP_03.13.003/2 brūhi me śraddadhānāya viṣvaksenāśrayo hy asau
analyzed: brūhi me śraddadhānāya viṣvaksena āśrayaḥ hi asau

original: BhP_03.13.004/1 śrutasya puṃsāṃ sucira-śramasya nanv añjasā sūribhir īḍito 'rthaḥ
analyzed: śrutasya puṃsām su cira śramasya nanu añjasā sūribhiḥ īḍitaḥ rthaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.004/2 tat-tad-guṇānuśravaṇaṃ mukunda- pādāravindaṃ hṛdayeṣu yeṣām
analyzed: tad tad guṇa anuśravaṇam mukunda pāda aravindam hṛdayeṣu yeṣām

original: BhP_03.13.005/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.005/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ viduraṃ vinītaṃ sahasra-śīrṣṇaś caraṇopadhānam
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam viduram vinītam sahasraśīrṣṇaḥ caraṇa upadhānam

original: BhP_03.13.005/2 prahṛṣṭa-romā bhagavat-kathāyāṃ praṇīyamāno munir abhyacaṣṭa
analyzed: prahṛṣṭa romā bhagavat kathāyām praṇīyamānaḥ muniḥ abhyacaṣṭa

original: BhP_03.13.006/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.006/1 yadā sva-bhāryayā sārdhaṃ jātaḥ svāyambhuvo manuḥ
analyzed: yadā sva bhāryayā sārdham jātaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_03.13.006/2 prāñjaliḥ praṇataś cedaṃ veda-garbham abhāṣata
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ ca idam vedagarbham abhāṣata

original: BhP_03.13.007/1 tvam ekaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ janma-kṛd vṛttidaḥ pitā
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ sarva bhūtānām janma kṛt vṛtti daḥ pitā

original: BhP_03.13.007/2 tathāpi naḥ prajānāṃ te śuśrūṣā kena vā bhavet
analyzed: tathā api naḥ prajānām te śuśrūṣā kena vā bhavet

original: BhP_03.13.008/1 tad vidhehi namas tubhyaṃ karmasv īḍyātma-śaktiṣu
analyzed: tat vidhehi namaḥ tubhyam karmasu īḍya ātma śaktiṣu

original: BhP_03.13.008/2 yat kṛtveha yaśo viṣvag amutra ca bhaved gatiḥ
analyzed: yat kṛtvā iha yaśaḥ viṣvak amutra ca bhavet gatiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.009/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.009/1 prītas tubhyam ahaṃ tāta svasti stād vāṃ kṣitīśvara
analyzed: prītaḥ tubhyam aham tāta svasti stād vām kṣitīśvara

original: BhP_03.13.009/2 yan nirvyalīkena hṛdā śādhi mety ātmanārpitam
analyzed: yat nirvyalīkena hṛdā śādhi mā iti ātmanā arpitam

original: BhP_03.13.010/1 etāvaty ātmajair vīra kāryā hy apacitir gurau
analyzed: etāvatī ātmajaiḥ vīra kāryā hi apacitiḥ gurau

original: BhP_03.13.010/2 śaktyāpramattair gṛhyeta sādaraṃ gata-matsaraiḥ
analyzed: śaktyā apramattaiḥ gṛhyeta sa ādaram gata matsaraiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.011/1 sa tvam asyām apatyāni sadṛśāny ātmano guṇaiḥ
analyzed: sa tvam asyām apatyāni sadṛśāni ātmanaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.011/2 utpādya śāsa dharmeṇa gāṃ yajñaiḥ puruṣaṃ yaja
analyzed: utpādya śāsa dharmeṇa gām yajñaiḥ puruṣam yaja

original: BhP_03.13.012/1 paraṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ syāt prajā-rakṣayā nṛpa
analyzed: param śuśrūṣaṇam mahyam syāt prajā rakṣayā nṛpa

original: BhP_03.13.012/2 bhagavāṃs te prajā-bhartur hṛṣīkeśo 'nutuṣyati
analyzed: bhagavān te prajā bhartuḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ nutuṣyati

original: BhP_03.13.013/1 yeṣāṃ na tuṣṭo bhagavān yajña-liṅgo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām na tuṣṭaḥ bhagavān yajña liṅgaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.013/2 teṣāṃ śramo hy apārthāya yad ātmā nādṛtaḥ svayam
analyzed: teṣām śramaḥ hi apārthāya yat ātmā na ādṛtaḥ svayam

original: BhP_03.13.014/0 manur uvāca
analyzed: manuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.014/1 ādeśe 'haṃ bhagavato varteyāmīva-sūdana
analyzed: ādeśe ham bhagavataḥ varteyāmi ivasūdana

original: BhP_03.13.014/2 sthānaṃ tv ihānujānīhi prajānāṃ mama ca prabho
analyzed: sthānam tu iha anujānīhi prajānām mama ca prabho

original: BhP_03.13.015/1 yad okaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ mahī magnā mahāmbhasi
analyzed: yat okaḥ sarva bhūtānām mahī magnā mahā ambhasi

original: BhP_03.13.015/2 asyā uddharaṇe yatno deva devyā vidhīyatām
analyzed: asyāḥ uddharaṇe yatnaḥ deva devyāḥ vidhīyatām

original: BhP_03.13.016/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.016/1 parameṣṭhī tv apāṃ madhye tathā sannām avekṣya gām
analyzed: parameṣṭhī tu apām madhye tathā sannām avekṣya gām

original: BhP_03.13.016/2 katham enāṃ samunneṣya iti dadhyau dhiyā ciram
analyzed: katham enām samunneṣye iti dadhyau dhiyā ciram

original: BhP_03.13.017/1 sṛjato me kṣitir vārbhiḥ plāvyamānā rasāṃ gatā
analyzed: sṛjataḥ me kṣitiḥ vārbhiḥ plāvyamānā rasām gatā

original: BhP_03.13.017/2 athātra kim anuṣṭheyam asmābhiḥ sarga-yojitaiḥ
analyzed: atha atra kim anuṣṭheyam asmābhiḥ sarga yojitaiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.017/3 yasyāhaṃ hṛdayād āsaṃ sa īśo vidadhātu me
analyzed: yasya aham hṛdayāt āsam saḥ īśaḥ vidadhātu me

original: BhP_03.13.018/1 ity abhidhyāyato nāsā- vivarāt sahasānagha
analyzed: iti abhidhyāyataḥ nāsāḥ vivarāt sahasā anagha

original: BhP_03.13.018/2 varāha-toko niragād aṅguṣṭha-parimāṇakaḥ
analyzed: varāha tokaḥ niragāt aṅguṣṭha parimāṇakaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.019/1 tasyābhipaśyataḥ kha-sthaḥ kṣaṇena kila bhārata
analyzed: tasya abhipaśyataḥ kha sthaḥ kṣaṇena kila bhārata

original: BhP_03.13.019/2 gaja-mātraḥ pravavṛdhe tad adbhutam abhūn mahat
analyzed: gaja mātraḥ pravavṛdhe tat adbhutam abhūt mahat

original: BhP_03.13.020/1 marīci-pramukhair vipraiḥ kumārair manunā saha
analyzed: marīci pramukhaiḥ vipraiḥ kumāraiḥ manunā saha

original: BhP_03.13.020/2 dṛṣṭvā tat saukaraṃ rūpaṃ tarkayām āsa citradhā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tat saukaram rūpam tarkayām āsa citradhā

original: BhP_03.13.021/1 kim etat sūkara-vyājaṃ sattvaṃ divyam avasthitam
analyzed: kim etat sūkara vyājam sattvam divyam avasthitam

original: BhP_03.13.021/2 aho batāścaryam idaṃ nāsāyā me viniḥsṛtam
analyzed: aho bata āścaryam idam nāsāyāḥ me viniḥsṛtam

original: BhP_03.13.022/1 dṛṣṭo 'ṅguṣṭha-śiro-mātraḥ kṣaṇād gaṇḍa-śilā-samaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ṅguṣṭha śiraḥ mātraḥ kṣaṇāt gaṇḍa śilā samaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.022/2 api svid bhagavān eṣa yajño me khedayan manaḥ
analyzed: api svid bhagavān eṣa yajñaḥ me khedayan manaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.023/1 iti mīmāṃsatas tasya brahmaṇaḥ saha sūnubhiḥ
analyzed: iti mīmāṃsataḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ saha sūnubhiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.023/2 bhagavān yajña-puruṣo jagarjāgendra-sannibhaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān yajñapuruṣaḥ jagarjāga indra sannibhaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.024/1 brahmāṇaṃ harṣayām āsa haris tāṃś ca dvijottamān
analyzed: brahmāṇam harṣayām āsa hariḥ tān ca dvijottamān

original: BhP_03.13.024/2 sva-garjitena kakubhaḥ pratisvanayatā vibhuḥ
analyzed: sva garjitena kakubhaḥ pratisvanayatā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.13.025/1 niśamya te ghargharitaṃ sva-kheda- kṣayiṣṇu māyāmaya-sūkarasya
analyzed: niśamya te ghargharitam sva kheda kṣayiṣṇu māyā maya sūkarasya

original: BhP_03.13.025/2 janas-tapaḥ-satya-nivāsinas te tribhiḥ pavitrair munayo 'gṛṇan sma
analyzed: janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ te tribhiḥ pavitraiḥ munayaḥ gṛṇan sma

original: BhP_03.13.026/1 teṣāṃ satāṃ veda-vitāna-mūrtir brahmāvadhāryātma-guṇānuvādam
analyzed: teṣām satām veda vitāna mūrtiḥ brahma avadhārya ātma guṇa anuvādam

original: BhP_03.13.026/2 vinadya bhūyo vibudhodayāya gajendra-līlo jalam āviveśa
analyzed: vinadya bhūyas vibudha udayāya gaja indra līlaḥ jalam āviveśa

original: BhP_03.13.027/1 utkṣipta-vālaḥ kha-caraḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṭā vidhunvan khara-romaśa-tvak
analyzed: utkṣipta vālaḥ kha caraḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṭāḥ vidhunvan khara romaśa tvac

original: BhP_03.13.027/2 khurāhatābhraḥ sita-daṃṣṭra īkṣā- jyotir babhāse bhagavān mahīdhraḥ
analyzed: khura āhata abhraḥ sita daṃṣṭraḥ īkṣā jyotiḥ babhāse bhagavān mahīdhraḥ

original: BhP_03.13.028/1 ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīṃ vijighran kroḍāpadeśaḥ svayam adhvarāṅgaḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīm vijighran kroḍa apadeśaḥ svayam adhvara aṅgaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.028/2 karāla-daṃṣṭro 'py akarāla-dṛgbhyām udvīkṣya viprān gṛṇato 'viśat kam
analyzed: karāla daṃṣṭraḥ pi a karāla dṛgbhyām udvīkṣya viprān gṛṇataḥ viśat kam

original: BhP_03.13.029/1 sa vajra-kūṭāṅga-nipāta-vega- viśīrṇa-kukṣiḥ stanayann udanvān
analyzed: sa vajrakūṭa aṅga nipāta vega viśīrṇa kukṣiḥ stanayan udanvān

original: BhP_03.13.029/2 utsṛṣṭa-dīrghormi-bhujair ivārtaś cukrośa yajñeśvara pāhi meti
analyzed: utsṛṣṭa dīrgha ūrmi bhujaiḥ iva ārtaḥ cukrośa yajñeśvara pāhi mā iti

original: BhP_03.13.030/1 khuraiḥ kṣuraprair darayaṃs tad āpa utpāra-pāraṃ tri-parū rasāyām
analyzed: khuraiḥ kṣurapraiḥ darayan tat āpaḥ utpāra pāram triparuḥ rasāyām

original: BhP_03.13.030/2 dadarśa gāṃ tatra suṣupsur agre yāṃ jīva-dhānīṃ svayam abhyadhatta
analyzed: dadarśa gām tatra suṣupsuḥ agre yām jīva dhānīm svayam abhyadhatta

original: BhP_03.13.031/1 pātāla-mūleśvara-bhoga-saṃhatau vinyasya pādau pṛthivīṃ ca bibhrataḥ
analyzed: pātāla mūla īśvara bhoga saṃhatau vinyasya pādau pṛthivīm ca bibhrataḥ

original: BhP_03.13.031/2 yasyopamāno na babhūva so 'cyuto mamāstu māṅgalya-vivṛddhaye hariḥ
analyzed: yasya upamānaḥ na babhūva cyutaḥ mama astu māṅgalya vivṛddhaye hariḥ

original: BhP_03.13.032/1 sva-daṃṣṭrayoddhṛtya mahīṃ nimagnāṃ sa utthitaḥ saṃruruce rasāyāḥ
analyzed: sva daṃṣṭrayā uddhṛtya mahīm nimagnām saḥ utthitaḥ saṃruruce rasāyāḥ

original: BhP_03.13.032/2 tatrāpi daityaṃ gadayāpatantaṃ sunābha-sandīpita-tīvra-manyuḥ
analyzed: tatra api daityam gadayā āpatantam sunābha sandīpita tīvra manyuḥ

original: BhP_03.13.033/1 jaghāna rundhānam asahya-vikramaṃ sa līlayebhaṃ mṛgarāḍ ivāmbhasi
analyzed: jaghāna rundhānam asahya vikramam sa līlayā ibham mṛgarāj iva ambhasi

original: BhP_03.13.033/2 tad-rakta-paṅkāṅkita-gaṇḍa-tuṇḍo yathā gajendro jagatīṃ vibhindan
analyzed: tad rakta paṅka aṅkita gaṇḍa tuṇḍaḥ yathā gaja indraḥ jagatīm vibhindan

original: BhP_03.13.034/1 tamāla-nīlaṃ sita-danta-koṭyā kṣmām utkṣipantaṃ gaja-līlayāṅga
analyzed: tamāla nīlam sita danta koṭyā kṣmām utkṣipantam gaja līlayā aṅga

original: BhP_03.13.034/2 prajñāya baddhāñjalayo 'nuvākair viriñci-mukhyā upatasthur īśam
analyzed: prajñāya baddhāñjalayaḥ nuvākaiḥ viriñci mukhyāḥ upatasthuḥ īśam

original: BhP_03.13.035/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.13.035/1 jitaṃ jitaṃ te 'jita yajña-bhāvana trayīṃ tanuṃ svāṃ paridhunvate namaḥ
analyzed: jitam jitam te jita yajña bhāvana trayīm tanum svām paridhunvate namaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.035/2 yad-roma-garteṣu nililyur addhayas tasmai namaḥ kāraṇa-sūkarāya te
analyzed: yat roma garteṣu nililyuḥ addhayaḥ tasmai namaḥ kāraṇa sūkarāya te

original: BhP_03.13.036/1 rūpaṃ tavaitan nanu duṣkṛtātmanāṃ durdarśanaṃ deva yad adhvarātmakam
analyzed: rūpam tava etat nanu duṣkṛta ātmanām durdarśanam deva yat adhvara ātmakam

original: BhP_03.13.036/2 chandāṃsi yasya tvaci barhi-romasv ājyaṃ dṛśi tv aṅghriṣu cātur-hotram
analyzed: chandāṃsi yasya tvaci barhiḥ omasu ājyam dṛśi tu aṅghriṣu cāturhotram

original: BhP_03.13.037/1 srak tuṇḍa āsīt sruva īśa nāsayor iḍodare camasāḥ karṇa-randhre
analyzed: sraj tuṇḍaḥ āsīt sruvaḥ īśa nāsayoḥ iḍā udare camasāḥ karṇa randhre

original: BhP_03.13.037/2 prāśitram āsye grasane grahās tu te yac carvaṇaṃ te bhagavann agni-hotram
analyzed: prāśitram āsye grasane grahāḥ tu te yat carvaṇam te bhagavan agnihotram

original: BhP_03.13.038/1 dīkṣānujanmopasadaḥ śirodharaṃ tvaṃ prāyaṇīyodayanīya-daṃṣṭraḥ
analyzed: dīkṣā anujanma upasadaḥ śirodharam tvam prāyaṇīya udayanīya daṃṣṭraḥ

original: BhP_03.13.038/2 jihvā pravargyas tava śīrṣakaṃ kratoḥ satyāvasathyaṃ citayo 'savo hi te
analyzed: jihvā pravargyaḥ tava śīrṣakam kratoḥ satyā āvasathyam citayaḥ savaḥ hi te

original: BhP_03.13.039/1 somas tu retaḥ savanāny avasthitiḥ saṃsthā-vibhedās tava deva dhātavaḥ
analyzed: somaḥ tu retaḥ savanāni avasthitiḥ saṃsthā vibhedāḥ tava deva dhātavaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.039/2 satrāṇi sarvāṇi śarīra-sandhis tvaṃ sarva-yajña-kratur iṣṭi-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: satrāṇi sarvāṇi śarīra sandhiḥ tvam sarva yajña kratuḥ iṣṭi bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.040/1 namo namas te 'khila-mantra-devatā- dravyāya sarva-kratave kriyātmane
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te khila mantra devatā dravyāya sarva kratave kriyā ātmane

original: BhP_03.13.040/2 vairāgya-bhaktyātmajayānubhāvita- jñānāya vidyā-gurave namo namaḥ
analyzed: vairāgya bhakti ātmajayā anubhāvita jñānāya vidyā gurave namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.041/1 daṃṣṭrāgra-koṭyā bhagavaṃs tvayā dhṛtā virājate bhūdhara bhūḥ sa-bhūdharā
analyzed: daṃṣṭra agra koṭyā bhagavan tvayā dhṛtā virājate bhūdhara bhūḥ sa bhūdharā

original: BhP_03.13.041/2 yathā vanān niḥsarato datā dhṛtā mataṅ-gajendrasya sa-patra-padminī
analyzed: yathā vanāt niḥsarataḥ datā dhṛtā mataṅga ja indrasya sa patra padminī

original: BhP_03.13.042/1 trayīmayaṃ rūpam idaṃ ca saukaraṃ bhū-maṇḍalenātha datā dhṛtena te
analyzed: trayī mayam rūpam idam ca saukaram bhū maṇḍalena atha datā dhṛtena te

original: BhP_03.13.042/2 cakāsti śṛṅgoḍha-ghanena bhūyasā kulācalendrasya yathaiva vibhramaḥ
analyzed: cakāsti śṛṅga ūḍha ghanena bhūyasā kula acala indrasya yathā eva vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.043/1 saṃsthāpayaināṃ jagatāṃ sa-tasthuṣāṃ lokāya patnīm asi mātaraṃ pitā
analyzed: saṃsthāpaya enām jagatām satasthuṣām lokāya patnīm asi mātaram pitā

original: BhP_03.13.043/2 vidhema cāsyai namasā saha tvayā yasyāṃ sva-tejo 'gnim ivāraṇāv adhāḥ
analyzed: vidhema ca asyai namasā saha tvayā yasyām sva tejaḥ gnim iva araṇau adhāḥ

original: BhP_03.13.044/1 kaḥ śraddadhītānyatamas tava prabho rasāṃ gatāyā bhuva udvibarhaṇam
analyzed: kaḥ śraddadhīta anyatamaḥ tava prabhoḥ rasām gatāyāḥ bhuvaḥ udvibarhaṇam

original: BhP_03.13.044/2 na vismayo 'sau tvayi viśva-vismaye yo māyayedaṃ sasṛje 'tivismayam
analyzed: na sau tvayi viśva vismaye yaḥ māyayā idam sasṛje ti vismayam

original: BhP_03.13.045/1 vidhunvatā vedamayaṃ nijaṃ vapur janas-tapaḥ-satya-nivāsino vayam
analyzed: vidhunvatā veda mayam nijam vapuḥ janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ vayam

original: BhP_03.13.045/2 saṭā-śikhoddhūta-śivāmbu-bindubhir vimṛjyamānā bhṛśam īśa pāvitāḥ
analyzed: saṭā śikhā uddhūta śiva ambu bindubhiḥ vimṛjyamānāḥ bhṛśam īśa pāvitāḥ

original: BhP_03.13.046/1 sa vai bata bhraṣṭa-matis tavaiṣate yaḥ karmaṇāṃ pāram apāra-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bata bhraṣṭa matiḥ tava eṣate yaḥ karmaṇām pāram apāra karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.046/2 yad-yogamāyā-guṇa-yoga-mohitaṃ viśvaṃ samastaṃ bhagavan vidhehi śam
analyzed: yat yoga māyā guṇa yoga mohitam viśvam samastam bhagavan vidhehi śam

original: BhP_03.13.047/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.13.047/1 ity upasthīyamāno 'sau munibhir brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: iti upasthīyamānaḥ sau munibhiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.047/2 salile sva-khurākrānta upādhattāvitāvanim
analyzed: salile sva khura ākrāntaḥ upādhatta avita avanim

original: BhP_03.13.048/1 sa itthaṃ bhagavān urvīṃ viṣvaksenaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham bhagavān urvīm viṣvaksenaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.048/2 rasāyā līlayonnītām apsu nyasya yayau hariḥ
analyzed: rasāyāḥ līlayā unnītām apsu nyasya yayau hariḥ

original: BhP_03.13.049/1 ya evam etāṃ hari-medhaso hareḥ kathāṃ subhadrāṃ kathanīya-māyinaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ evam etām harimedhasaḥ hareḥ kathām su bhadrām kathanīya māyinaḥ

original: BhP_03.13.049/2 śṛṇvīta bhaktyā śravayeta vośatīṃ janārdano 'syāśu hṛdi prasīdati
analyzed: śṛṇvīta bhaktyā śravayeta vośatīm janārdanaḥ sya āśu hṛdi prasīdati

original: BhP_03.13.050/1 tasmin prasanne sakalāśiṣāṃ prabhau kiṃ durlabhaṃ tābhir alaṃ lavātmabhiḥ
analyzed: tasmin prasanne sakala āśiṣām prabhau kim durlabham tābhiḥ alam lava ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.13.050/2 ananya-dṛṣṭyā bhajatāṃ guhāśayaḥ svayaṃ vidhatte sva-gatiṃ paraḥ parām
analyzed: an anya dṛṣṭyā bhajatām guhā āśayaḥ svayam vidhatte sva gatim paraḥ parām

original: BhP_03.13.051/1 ko nāma loke puruṣārtha-sāravit purā-kathānāṃ bhagavat-kathā-sudhām
analyzed: kaḥ nāma loke puruṣa artha sāra vid purā kathānām bhagavat kathā sudhām

original: BhP_03.13.051/2 āpīya karṇāñjalibhir bhavāpahām aho virajyeta vinā naretaram
analyzed: āpīya karṇa añjalibhiḥ bhava apahām aho virajyeta vinā naretaram

original: BhP_03.14.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.001/1 niśamya kauṣāraviṇopavarṇitāṃ hareḥ kathāṃ kāraṇa-sūkarātmanaḥ
analyzed: niśamya kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitām hareḥ kathām kāraṇa sūkara ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.001/2 punaḥ sa papraccha tam udyatāñjalir na cātitṛpto viduro dhṛta-vrataḥ
analyzed: punar sa papraccha tam udyata añjaliḥ na ca atitṛptaḥ viduraḥ dhṛta vrataḥ

original: BhP_03.14.002/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.002/1 tenaiva tu muni-śreṣṭha hariṇā yajña-mūrtinā
analyzed: tena eva tu muni śreṣṭha hariṇā yajñamūrtinā

original: BhP_03.14.002/2 ādi-daityo hiraṇyākṣo hata ity anuśuśruma
analyzed: ādidaityaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ hataḥ iti anuśuśruma

original: BhP_03.14.003/1 tasya coddharataḥ kṣauṇīṃ sva-daṃṣṭrāgreṇa līlayā
analyzed: tasya ca uddharataḥ kṣauṇīm sva daṃṣṭra agreṇa līlayā

original: BhP_03.14.003/2 daitya-rājasya ca brahman kasmād dhetor abhūn mṛdhaḥ
analyzed: daitya rājasya ca brahman kasmāt hetoḥ abhūt mṛdhaḥ
