original: BhP_03.14.004/1 śraddadhānāya bhaktāya brūhi taj-janma-vistaram
analyzed: śraddadhānāya bhaktāya brūhi

original: BhP_03.14.004/2 ṛṣe na tṛpyati manaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
analyzed: ṛṣe na tṛpyati manaḥ param kautūhalam hi me

original: BhP_03.14.005/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.005/1 sādhu vīra tvayā pṛṣṭam avatāra-kathāṃ hareḥ
analyzed: sādhu vīra tvayā pṛṣṭam avatāra kathām hareḥ

original: BhP_03.14.005/2 yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi martyānāṃ mṛtyu-pāśa-viśātanīm
analyzed: yat tvam pṛcchasi martyānām mṛtyu pāśa viśātanīm

original: BhP_03.14.006/1 yayottānapadaḥ putro muninā gītayārbhakaḥ
analyzed: yayā uttānapadaḥ putraḥ muninā gītayā arbhakaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.006/2 mṛtyoḥ kṛtvaiva mūrdhny aṅghrim āruroha hareḥ padam
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ kṛtvā eva mūrdhni aṅghrim āruroha hareḥ padam

original: BhP_03.14.007/1 athātrāpītihāso 'yaṃ śruto me varṇitaḥ purā
analyzed: atha atrā api itihāsaḥ yam śrutaḥ me varṇitaḥ purā

original: BhP_03.14.007/2 brahmaṇā deva-devena devānām anupṛcchatām
analyzed: brahmaṇā devadevena devānām anupṛcchatām

original: BhP_03.14.008/1 ditir dākṣāyaṇī kṣattar mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ patim
analyzed: ditiḥ dākṣāyaṇī kṣattar mārīcam kaśyapam patim

original: BhP_03.14.008/2 apatya-kāmā cakame sandhyāyāṃ hṛc-chayārditā
analyzed: apatya kāmā cakame sandhyāyām hṛcchaya arditā

original: BhP_03.14.009/1 iṣṭvāgni-jihvaṃ payasā puruṣaṃ yajuṣāṃ patim
analyzed: iṣṭvā agni jihvam payasā puruṣam yajuṣām patim

original: BhP_03.14.009/2 nimlocaty arka āsīnam agny-agāre samāhitam
analyzed: nimlocati arke āsīnam agnyagāre samāhitam

original: BhP_03.14.010/0 ditir uvāca
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.010/1 eṣa māṃ tvat-kṛte vidvan kāma ātta-śarāsanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa mām tvad kṛte vidvan kāmaḥ ātta śarāsanaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.010/2 dunoti dīnāṃ vikramya rambhām iva mataṅgajaḥ
analyzed: dunoti dīnām vikramya rambhām iva mataṅga jaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.011/1 tad bhavān dahyamānāyāṃ sa-patnīnāṃ samṛddhibhiḥ
analyzed: tat bhavān dahyamānāyām sapatnīnām samṛddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.14.011/2 prajāvatīnāṃ bhadraṃ te mayy āyuṅktām anugraham
analyzed: prajāvatīnām bhadram te mayi āyuṅktām anugraham

original: BhP_03.14.012/1 bhartary āptorumānānāṃ lokān āviśate yaśaḥ
analyzed: bhartari āpta uru mānānām lokān yaśaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.012/2 patir bhavad-vidho yāsāṃ prajayā nanu jāyate
analyzed: patiḥ bhavadvidhaḥ yāsām prajayā nanu jāyate

original: BhP_03.14.013/1 purā pitā no bhagavān dakṣo duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: purā pitā naḥ bhagavān dakṣaḥ duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.013/2 kaṃ vṛṇīta varaṃ vatsā ity apṛcchata naḥ pṛthak
analyzed: kam vṛṇīta varam vatsā iti apṛcchata naḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_03.14.014/1 sa viditvātmajānāṃ no bhāvaṃ santāna-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: sa viditvā ātmajānām naḥ bhāvam santāna bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.014/2 trayodaśādadāt tāsāṃ yās te śīlam anuvratāḥ
analyzed: trayodaśa adadāt tāsām yāḥ te śīlam anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_03.14.015/1 atha me kuru kalyāṇaṃ kāmaṃ kamala-locana
analyzed: atha me kuru kalyāṇam kāmam kamala locana

original: BhP_03.14.015/2 ārtopasarpaṇaṃ bhūmann amoghaṃ hi mahīyasi
analyzed: ārta upasarpaṇam bhūman amogham hi mahīyasi

original: BhP_03.14.016/1 iti tāṃ vīra mārīcaḥ kṛpaṇāṃ bahu-bhāṣiṇīm
analyzed: iti tām vīra mārīcaḥ kṛpaṇām bahu bhāṣiṇīm

original: BhP_03.14.016/2 pratyāhānunayan vācā pravṛddhānaṅga-kaśmalām
analyzed: pratyāha anunayan vācā pravṛddha anaṅga kaśmalām

original: BhP_03.14.017/1 eṣa te 'haṃ vidhāsyāmi priyaṃ bhīru yad icchasi
analyzed: eṣa te ham vidhāsyāmi priyam bhīru yat icchasi

original: BhP_03.14.017/2 tasyāḥ kāmaṃ na kaḥ kuryāt siddhis traivargikī yataḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ kāmam na kaḥ kuryāt siddhiḥ traivargikī yatas

original: BhP_03.14.018/1 sarvāśramān upādāya svāśrameṇa kalatravān
analyzed: sarva āśramān upādāya sva āśrameṇa kalatravān

original: BhP_03.14.018/2 vyasanārṇavam atyeti jala-yānair yathārṇavam
analyzed: vyasana arṇavam atyeti jalayānaiḥ yathā arṇavam

original: BhP_03.14.019/1 yām āhur ātmano hy ardhaṃ śreyas-kāmasya mānini
analyzed: yām āhuḥ ātmanaḥ hi ardham śreyaskāmasya mānini

original: BhP_03.14.019/2 yasyāṃ sva-dhuram adhyasya pumāṃś carati vijvaraḥ
analyzed: yasyām svadhuram adhyasya pumān carati vijvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.14.020/1 yām āśrityendriyārātīn durjayān itarāśramaiḥ
analyzed: yām āśritya indriya arātīn durjayān itara āśramaiḥ

original: BhP_03.14.020/2 vayaṃ jayema helābhir dasyūn durga-patir yathā
analyzed: vayam jayema helābhiḥ dasyūn durga patiḥ yathā

original: BhP_03.14.021/1 na vayaṃ prabhavas tāṃ tvām anukartuṃ gṛheśvari
analyzed: na vayam prabhavaḥ tām tvām anukartum gṛheśvari

original: BhP_03.14.021/2 apy āyuṣā vā kārtsnyena ye cānye guṇa-gṛdhnavaḥ
analyzed: api āyuṣā vā kārtsnyena ye ca anye guṇa gṛdhnavaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.022/1 athāpi kāmam etaṃ te prajātyai karavāṇy alam
analyzed: atha api kāmam etam te prajātyai karavāṇi alam

original: BhP_03.14.022/2 yathā māṃ nātirocanti muhūrtaṃ pratipālaya
analyzed: yathā mām na atirocanti muhūrtam pratipālaya

original: BhP_03.14.023/1 eṣā ghoratamā velā ghorāṇāṃ ghora-darśanā
analyzed: eṣā ghoratamā velā ghorāṇām ghora darśanā

original: BhP_03.14.023/2 caranti yasyāṃ bhūtāni bhūteśānucarāṇi ha
analyzed: caranti yasyām bhūtāni bhūteśa anucarāṇi ha

original: BhP_03.14.024/1 etasyāṃ sādhvi sandhyāyāṃ bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: etasyām sādhvi sandhyāyām bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.024/2 parīto bhūta-parṣadbhir vṛṣeṇāṭati bhūtarāṭ
analyzed: parītaḥ bhūta parṣadbhiḥ vṛṣeṇa aṭati bhūta rāj

original: BhP_03.14.025/1 śmaśāna-cakrānila-dhūli-dhūmra- vikīrṇa-vidyota-jaṭā-kalāpaḥ
BhP_03.14.025/2 bhasmāvaguṇṭhāmala-rukma-deho devas tribhiḥ paśyati devaras te
analyzed: bhasma avaguṇṭha amala rukma dehaḥ devaḥ tribhiḥ paśyati devaraḥ te

original: BhP_03.14.026/1 na yasya loke sva-janaḥ paro vā nātyādṛto nota kaścid vigarhyaḥ
analyzed: na yasya loke sva janaḥ paraḥ vā na ati ādṛtaḥ na uta kaścid vigarhyaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.026/2 vayaṃ vratair yac-caraṇāpaviddhām āśāsmahe 'jāṃ bata bhukta-bhogām
analyzed: vayam vrataiḥ yad caraṇa apaviddhām āśāsmahe jām bata bhukta bhogām

original: BhP_03.14.027/1 yasyānavadyācaritaṃ manīṣiṇo gṛṇanty avidyā-paṭalaṃ bibhitsavaḥ
analyzed: yasya anavadya ācaritam manīṣiṇaḥ gṛṇanti avidyā paṭalam bibhitsavaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.027/2 nirasta-sāmyātiśayo 'pi yat svayaṃ piśāca-caryām acarad gatiḥ satām
analyzed: nirasta sāmya atiśayaḥ yat svayam piśāca caryām acarat gatiḥ satām

original: BhP_03.14.028/1 hasanti yasyācaritaṃ hi durbhagāḥ svātman-ratasyāviduṣaḥ samīhitam
analyzed: hasanti yasya ācaritam hi durbhagāḥ svātman ratasya aviduṣaḥ samīhitam

original: BhP_03.14.028/2 yair vastra-mālyābharaṇānulepanaiḥ śva-bhojanaṃ svātmatayopalālitam
analyzed: yaiḥ vastra mālya ābharaṇa anulepanaiḥ śva bhojanam svātmatayā upalālitam

original: BhP_03.14.029/1 brahmādayo yat-kṛta-setu-pālā yat-kāraṇaṃ viśvam idaṃ ca māyā
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ yad kṛta setu pālāḥ yad kāraṇam viśvam idam ca māyā

original: BhP_03.14.029/2 ājñā-karī yasya piśāca-caryā aho vibhūmnaś caritaṃ viḍambanam
analyzed: ājñākarī yasya piśāca caryā aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam

original: BhP_03.14.030/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.030/1 saivaṃ saṃvidite bhartrā manmathonmathitendriyā
analyzed: sā evam bhartrā manmatha unmathita indriyā

original: BhP_03.14.030/2 jagrāha vāso brahmarṣer vṛṣalīva gata-trapā
analyzed: jagrāha vāsaḥ brahmarṣeḥ vṛṣalī iva gatatrapā

original: BhP_03.14.031/1 sa viditvātha bhāryāyās taṃ nirbandhaṃ vikarmaṇi
analyzed: sa viditvā atha bhāryāyāḥ tam nirbandham vikarmaṇi

original: BhP_03.14.031/2 natvā diṣṭāya rahasi tayāthopaviveśa hi
analyzed: natvā diṣṭāya rahasi tayā athā upaviveśa hi

original: BhP_03.14.032/1 athopaspṛśya salilaṃ prāṇān āyamya vāg-yataḥ
analyzed: atha upaspṛśya salilam prāṇān āyamya vāgyataḥ

original: BhP_03.14.032/2 dhyāyañ jajāpa virajaṃ brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam
analyzed: dhyāyam jajāpa virajam brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam

original: BhP_03.14.033/1 ditis tu vrīḍitā tena karmāvadyena bhārata
analyzed: ditiḥ tu vrīḍitā tena karma avadyena bhārata

original: BhP_03.14.033/2 upasaṅgamya viprarṣim adho-mukhy abhyabhāṣata
analyzed: upasaṅgamya viprarṣim adhomukhī abhyabhāṣata

original: BhP_03.14.034/0 ditir uvāca
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.034/1 na me garbham imaṃ brahman bhūtānām ṛṣabho 'vadhīt
analyzed: na me garbham imam brahman bhūtānām ṛṣabhaḥ vadhīt

original: BhP_03.14.034/2 rudraḥ patir hi bhūtānāṃ yasyākaravam aṃhasam
analyzed: rudraḥ patiḥ hi bhūtānām yasya akaravam

original: BhP_03.14.035/1 namo rudrāya mahate devāyogrāya mīḍhuṣe
analyzed: namaḥ rudrāya mahate devāya ugrāya mīḍhuṣe

original: BhP_03.14.035/2 śivāya nyasta-daṇḍāya dhṛta-daṇḍāya manyave
analyzed: śivāya nyasta daṇḍāya dhṛta daṇḍāya manyave

original: BhP_03.14.036/1 sa naḥ prasīdatāṃ bhāmo bhagavān urv-anugrahaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ prasīdatām bhāmaḥ bhagavān uru anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.036/2 vyādhasyāpy anukampyānāṃ strīṇāṃ devaḥ satī-patiḥ
analyzed: vyādhasya api anukampyānām strīṇām devaḥ satī patiḥ

original: BhP_03.14.037/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.037/1 sva-sargasyāśiṣaṃ lokyām āśāsānāṃ pravepatīm
analyzed: svasargasya āśiṣam lokyām āśāsānām pravepatīm

original: BhP_03.14.037/2 nivṛtta-sandhyā-niyamo bhāryām āha prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: nivṛtta sandhyā niyamaḥ bhāryām āha prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_03.14.038/0 kaśyapa uvāca
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.038/1 aprāyatyād ātmanas te doṣān mauhūrtikād uta
analyzed: aprāyatyāt ātmanaḥ te doṣāt mauhūrtikāt uta

original: BhP_03.14.038/2 man-nideśāticāreṇa devānāṃ cātihelanāt
analyzed: mad nideśa aticāreṇa devānām ca atihelanāt

original: BhP_03.14.039/1 bhaviṣyatas tavābhadrāv abhadre jāṭharādhamau
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ tava abhadrau abhadre jāṭhara adhamau

original: BhP_03.14.039/2 lokān sa-pālāṃs trīṃś caṇḍi muhur ākrandayiṣyataḥ
analyzed: lokān sa pālān trīn caṇḍi muhur ākrandayiṣyataḥ

original: BhP_03.14.040/1 prāṇināṃ hanyamānānāṃ dīnānām akṛtāgasām
analyzed: prāṇinām hanyamānānām dīnānām a kṛta āgasām

original: BhP_03.14.040/2 strīṇāṃ nigṛhyamāṇānāṃ kopiteṣu mahātmasu
analyzed: strīṇām nigṛhyamāṇānām kopiteṣu mahātmasu

original: BhP_03.14.041/1 tadā viśveśvaraḥ kruddho bhagavāl loka-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: tadā viśveśvaraḥ kruddhaḥ bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.041/2 haniṣyaty avatīryāsau yathādrīn śataparva-dhṛk
analyzed: haniṣyati avatīrya asau yathā adrīn

original: BhP_03.14.042/0 ditir uvāca
analyzed: ditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.042/1 vadhaṃ bhagavatā sākṣāt sunābhodāra-bāhunā
analyzed: vadham bhagavatā sākṣāt sunābha udāra bāhunā

original: BhP_03.14.042/2 āśāse putrayor mahyaṃ mā kruddhād brāhmaṇād prabho
analyzed: āśāse putrayoḥ mahyam mā kruddhāt brāhmaṇāt prabho

original: BhP_03.14.043/1 na brahma-daṇḍa-dagdhasya na bhūta-bhayadasya ca
analyzed: na brahmadaṇḍa dagdhasya na bhūta bhaya dasya ca

original: BhP_03.14.043/2 nārakāś cānugṛhṇanti yāṃ yāṃ yonim asau gataḥ
analyzed: nārakāḥ ca anugṛhṇanti yām yām yonim asau gataḥ

original: BhP_03.14.044/0 kaśyapa uvāca
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.044/1 kṛta-śokānutāpena sadyaḥ pratyavamarśanāt
analyzed: kṛta śoka anutāpena sadyas pratyavamarśanāt

original: BhP_03.14.044/2 bhagavaty uru-mānāc ca bhave mayy api cādarāt
analyzed: bhagavati uru mānāt ca bhave mayi api ca ādarāt

original: BhP_03.14.045/1 putrasyaiva ca putrāṇāṃ bhavitaikaḥ satāṃ mataḥ
analyzed: putrasya eva ca putrāṇām bhavitā ekaḥ satām mataḥ

original: BhP_03.14.045/2 gāsyanti yad-yaśaḥ śuddhaṃ bhagavad-yaśasā samam
analyzed: gāsyanti yad yaśaḥ śuddham bhagavat yaśasā samam

original: BhP_03.14.046/1 yogair hemeva durvarṇaṃ bhāvayiṣyanti sādhavaḥ
analyzed: yogaiḥ hema iva durvarṇam bhāvayiṣyanti sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.046/2 nirvairādibhir ātmānaṃ yac-chīlam anuvartitum
analyzed: nirvaira ādibhiḥ ātmānam yacchīlam anuvartitum

original: BhP_03.14.047/1 yat-prasādād idaṃ viśvaṃ prasīdati yad-ātmakam
analyzed: yad prasādāt idam viśvam prasīdati yad ātmakam

original: BhP_03.14.047/2 sa sva-dṛg bhagavān yasya toṣyate 'nanyayā dṛśā
analyzed: sa svadṛś bhagavān yasya toṣyate na anyayā dṛśā

original: BhP_03.14.048/1 sa vai mahā-bhāgavato mahātmā mahānubhāvo mahatāṃ mahiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: sa vai mahābhāgavataḥ mahātmā mahā anubhāvaḥ mahatām mahiṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.048/2 pravṛddha-bhaktyā hy anubhāvitāśaye niveśya vaikuṇṭham imaṃ vihāsyati
analyzed: pravṛddha bhaktyā hi anubhāvita āśaye niveśya vaikuṇṭham imam vihāsyati

original: BhP_03.14.049/1 alampaṭaḥ śīla-dharo guṇākaro hṛṣṭaḥ pararddhyā vyathito duḥkhiteṣu
analyzed: alampaṭaḥ śīla dharaḥ guṇa ākaraḥ hṛṣṭaḥ para ṛddhyā vyathitaḥ duḥkhiteṣu

original: BhP_03.14.049/1 abhūta-śatrur jagataḥ śoka-hartā naidāghikaṃ tāpam ivoḍurājaḥ
analyzed: abhūtaśatruḥ jagataḥ śoka hartā naidāghikam tāpam iva uḍurājaḥ

original: BhP_03.14.050/1 antar bahiś cāmalam abja-netraṃ sva-pūruṣecchānugṛhīta-rūpam
analyzed: antar bahis ca amalam abja netram sva pūruṣa icchā anugṛhīta rūpam

original: BhP_03.14.050/2 pautras tava śrī-lalanā-lalāmaṃ draṣṭā sphurat-kuṇḍala-maṇḍitānanam
analyzed: pautraḥ tava śrī lalanā lalāmam draṣṭā sphurat kuṇḍala maṇḍita ānanam

original: BhP_03.14.051/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.14.051/1 śrutvā bhāgavataṃ pautram amodata ditir bhṛśam
analyzed: śrutvā bhāgavatam pautram amodata ditiḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.14.051/2 putrayoś ca vadhaṃ kṛṣṇād viditvāsīn mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: putrayoḥ ca vadham kṛṣṇāt viditvā āsīt mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.15.001/1 prājāpatyaṃ tu tat tejaḥ para-tejo-hanaṃ ditiḥ
analyzed: prājāpatyam tu tat tejaḥ para tejaḥ hanam ditiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.001/2 dadhāra varṣāṇi śataṃ śaṅkamānā surārdanāt
analyzed: dadhāra varṣāṇi śatam śaṅkamānā surārdanāt

original: BhP_03.15.002/1 loke tenāhatāloke loka-pālā hataujasaḥ
analyzed: loke tena āhata aloke lokapālāḥ hata ojasaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.002/2 nyavedayan viśva-sṛje dhvānta-vyatikaraṃ diśām
analyzed: nyavedayan viśvasṛje dhvānta vyatikaram diśām

original: BhP_03.15.003/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.003/1 tama etad vibho vettha saṃvignā yad vayaṃ bhṛśam
analyzed: tamaḥ etat vibho vettha saṃvignāḥ yat vayam bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.15.003/2 na hy avyaktaṃ bhagavataḥ kālenāspṛṣṭa-vartmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi avyaktam bhagavataḥ kālena a spṛṣṭa vartmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.004/1 deva-deva jagad-dhātar lokanātha-śikhāmaṇe
analyzed: devadeva lokanātha śikhāmaṇe

original: BhP_03.15.004/2 pareṣām apareṣāṃ tvaṃ bhūtānām asi bhāva-vit
analyzed: pareṣām apareṣām tvam bhūtānām asi bhāva vid

original: BhP_03.15.005/1 namo vijñāna-vīryāya māyayedam upeyuṣe
analyzed: namaḥ vijñāna vīryāya māyayā idam upeyuṣe

original: BhP_03.15.005/2 gṛhīta-guṇa-bhedāya namas te 'vyakta-yonaye
analyzed: gṛhīta guṇa bhedāya namaḥ te vyakta yonaye

original: BhP_03.15.006/1 ye tvānanyena bhāvena bhāvayanty ātma-bhāvanam
analyzed: ye tvā ananyena bhāvena bhāvayanti ātma bhāvanam

original: BhP_03.15.006/2 ātmani prota-bhuvanaṃ paraṃ sad-asad-ātmakam
analyzed: ātmani prota bhuvanam param sadasat ātmakam

original: BhP_03.15.007/1 teṣāṃ supakva-yogānāṃ jita-śvāsendriyātmanām
analyzed: teṣām supakva yogānām jita śvāsa indriya ātmanām

original: BhP_03.15.007/2 labdha-yuṣmat-prasādānāṃ na kutaścit parābhavaḥ
analyzed: labdha yuṣmad prasādānām na kutaścid parābhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.008/1 yasya vācā prajāḥ sarvā gāvas tantyeva yantritāḥ
analyzed: yasya vācā prajāḥ sarvāḥ gāvaḥ tantyā iva yantritāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.008/2 haranti balim āyattās tasmai mukhyāya te namaḥ
analyzed: haranti balim āyattāḥ tasmai mukhyāya te namaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.009/1 sa tvaṃ vidhatsva śaṃ bhūmaṃs tamasā lupta-karmaṇām
analyzed: sa tvam vidhatsva śam bhūman tamasā lupta karmaṇām

original: BhP_03.15.009/2 adabhra-dayayā dṛṣṭyā āpannān arhasīkṣitum
analyzed: adabhra dayayā dṛṣṭyā āpannān arhasi īkṣitum

original: BhP_03.15.010/1 eṣa deva diter garbha ojaḥ kāśyapam arpitam
analyzed: eṣa deva diteḥ garbhaḥ ojaḥ kāśyapam arpitam

original: BhP_03.15.010/2 diśas timirayan sarvā vardhate 'gnir ivaidhasi
analyzed: diśaḥ timirayan sarvāḥ vardhate gniḥ iva edhasi

original: BhP_03.15.011/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.15.011/1 sa prahasya mahā-bāho bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ
analyzed: sa prahasya mahā bāho bhagavān śabda gocaraḥ

original: BhP_03.15.011/2 pratyācaṣṭātma-bhūr devān prīṇan rucirayā girā
analyzed: pratyācaṣṭa ātmabhūḥ devān prīṇan rucirayā girā

original: BhP_03.15.012/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.15.012/1 mānasā me sutā yuṣmat- pūrvajāḥ sanakādayaḥ
analyzed: mānasāḥ me sutāḥ yuṣmat pūrvajāḥ sanaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.012/2 cerur vihāyasā lokāl lokeṣu vigata-spṛhāḥ
analyzed: ceruḥ vihāyasā lokāt lokeṣu vigata spṛhāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.013/1 ta ekadā bhagavato vaikuṇṭhasyāmalātmanaḥ
analyzed: te ekadā bhagavataḥ vaikuṇṭhasya amala ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.013/2 yayur vaikuṇṭha-nilayaṃ sarva-loka-namaskṛtam
analyzed: yayuḥ vaikuṇṭha nilayam sarva loka namaskṛtam

original: BhP_03.15.014/1 vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha-mūrtayaḥ
analyzed: vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha mūrtayaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.014/2 ye 'nimitta-nimittena dharmeṇārādhayan harim
analyzed: ye nimitta nimittena dharmeṇa ārādhayan harim

original: BhP_03.15.015/1 yatra cādyaḥ pumān āste bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ
analyzed: yatra ca ādyaḥ pumān āste bhagavān śabda gocaraḥ

original: BhP_03.15.015/2 sattvaṃ viṣṭabhya virajaṃ svānāṃ no mṛḍayan vṛṣaḥ
analyzed: sattvam viṣṭabhya virajam svānām naḥ mṛḍayan vṛṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.016/1 yatra naiḥśreyasaṃ nāma vanaṃ kāma-dughair drumaiḥ
analyzed: yatra naiḥśreyasam nāma vanam kāma dughaiḥ drumaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.016/2 sarvartu-śrībhir vibhrājat kaivalyam iva mūrtimat
analyzed: sarva ṛtu śrībhiḥ vibhrājat kaivalyam iva mūrtimat

original: BhP_03.15.017/1 vaimānikāḥ sa-lalanāś caritāni śaśvad
analyzed: vaimānikāḥ caritāni śaśvat

original: BhP_03.15.017/2 gāyanti yatra śamala-kṣapaṇāni bhartuḥ
analyzed: gāyanti yatra śamala kṣapaṇāni bhartuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.017/3 antar-jale 'nuvikasan-madhu-mādhavīnāṃ
analyzed: antar jale nu vikasat madhu mādhavīnām

original: BhP_03.15.017/4 gandhena khaṇḍita-dhiyo 'py anilaṃ kṣipantaḥ
analyzed: gandhena khaṇḍita dhiyaḥ pi anilam kṣipantaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.018/1 pārāvatānyabhṛta-sārasa-cakravāka-
BhP_03.15.018/2 dātyūha-haṃsa-śuka-tittiri-barhiṇāṃ yaḥ
analyzed: dātyūha haṃsa śuka tittiri barhiṇām yaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.018/3 kolāhalo viramate 'cira-mātram uccair
analyzed: kolāhalaḥ viramate cira mātram uccais

original: BhP_03.15.018/4 bhṛṅgādhipe hari-kathām iva gāyamāne
analyzed: bhṛṅga adhipe hari kathām iva gāyamāne

original: BhP_03.15.019/1 mandāra-kunda-kurabotpala-campakārṇa-
BhP_03.15.019/2 punnāga-nāga-bakulāmbuja-pārijātāḥ
BhP_03.15.019/3 gandhe 'rcite tulasikābharaṇena tasyā
analyzed: gandhe rcite tulasikā ābharaṇena tasyā

original: BhP_03.15.019/4 yasmiṃs tapaḥ sumanaso bahu mānayanti
analyzed: yasmin tapaḥ sumanasaḥ bahu mānayanti

original: BhP_03.15.020/1 yat saṅkulaṃ hari-padānati-mātra-dṛṣṭair
analyzed: yat saṅkulam hari pada ānati mātra dṛṣṭaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.020/2 vaidūrya-mārakata-hema-mayair vimānaiḥ
analyzed: vaidūrya mārakata hema mayaiḥ vimānaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.020/3 yeṣāṃ bṛhat-kaṭi-taṭāḥ smita-śobhi-mukhyaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām bṛhat kaṭi taṭāḥ smita śobhi mukhyaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.020/4 kṛṣṇātmanāṃ na raja ādadhur utsmayādyaiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ātmanām na rajaḥ ādadhuḥ utsmaya ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.021/1 śrī rūpiṇī kvaṇayatī caraṇāravindaṃ
analyzed: śrī rūpiṇī kvaṇayatī caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_03.15.021/2 līlāmbujena hari-sadmani mukta-doṣā
BhP_03.15.021/3 saṃlakṣyate sphaṭika-kuḍya upeta-hemni
analyzed: saṃlakṣyate sphaṭika kuḍye upeta hemni

original: BhP_03.15.021/4 sammārjatīva yad-anugrahaṇe 'nya-yatnaḥ
analyzed: sammārjati iva yad anugrahaṇe nyayatnaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.022/1 vāpīṣu vidruma-taṭāsv amalāmṛtāpsu
analyzed: vāpīṣu vidruma taṭāsu amala amṛta apsu

original: BhP_03.15.022/2 preṣyānvitā nija-vane tulasībhir īśam
analyzed: preṣya anvitā nija vane tulasībhiḥ īśam

original: BhP_03.15.022/3 abhyarcatī svalakam unnasam īkṣya vaktram
analyzed: abhyarcatī su alakam unnasam īkṣya vaktram

original: BhP_03.15.022/4 uccheṣitaṃ bhagavatety amatāṅga yac-chrīḥ
analyzed: uccheṣitam bhagavatā iti amata aṅga yat śrīḥ

original: BhP_03.15.023/1 yan na vrajanty agha-bhido racanānuvādāc
analyzed: yat na vrajanti agha bhidaḥ racanā anuvādāt

original: BhP_03.15.023/2 chṛṇvanti ye 'nya-viṣayāḥ kukathā mati-ghnīḥ
analyzed: chṛṇvanti ye nyaviṣayāḥ kukathāḥ mati ghnīḥ

original: BhP_03.15.023/3 yās tu śrutā hata-bhagair nṛbhir ātta-sārās
analyzed: yāḥ tu śrutāḥ hata bhagaiḥ nṛbhiḥ ātta sārāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.023/4 tāṃs tān kṣipanty aśaraṇeṣu tamaḥsu hanta
analyzed: tān tān kṣipanti aśaraṇeṣu tamaḥsu hanta

original: BhP_03.15.024/1 ye 'bhyarthitām api ca no nṛ-gatiṃ prapannā
analyzed: ye bhyarthitām api ca naḥ nṛ gatim prapannā

original: BhP_03.15.024/2 jñānaṃ ca tattva-viṣayaṃ saha-dharmaṃ yatra
analyzed: jñānam ca tattva viṣayam saha dharmam yatra

original: BhP_03.15.024/3 nārādhanaṃ bhagavato vitaranty amuṣya
analyzed: na ārādhanam bhagavataḥ vitaranti amuṣya

original: BhP_03.15.024/4 sammohitā vitatayā bata māyayā te
analyzed: sammohitāḥ vitatayā bata māyayā te

original: BhP_03.15.025/1 yac ca vrajanty animiṣām ṛṣabhānuvṛttyā
analyzed: yat ca vrajanti animiṣām ṛṣabha anuvṛttyā

original: BhP_03.15.025/2 dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ
analyzed: dūre yamāḥ hi upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya śīlāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.025/3 bhartur mithaḥ suyaśasaḥ kathanānurāga-
analyzed: bhartuḥ mithas su yaśasaḥ kathana anurāga

original: BhP_03.15.025/4 vaiklavya-bāṣpa-kalayā pulakī-kṛtāṅgāḥ
analyzed: vaiklavya bāṣpa kalayā pulakīkṛta aṅgāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.026/1 tad viśva-gurv-adhikṛtaṃ bhuvanaika-vandyaṃ
analyzed: tat viśva guru adhikṛtam bhuvana eka vandyam

original: BhP_03.15.026/2 divyaṃ vicitra-vibudhāgrya-vimāna-śociḥ
analyzed: divyam vicitra vibudha agrya vimāna śociḥ

original: BhP_03.15.026/3 āpuḥ parāṃ mudam apūrvam upetya yoga-
analyzed: āpuḥ parām mudam apūrvam upetya yoga

original: BhP_03.15.026/4 māyā-balena munayas tad atho vikuṇṭham
analyzed: māyā balena munayaḥ tat atho vikuṇṭham

original: BhP_03.15.027/1 tasminn atītya munayaḥ ṣaḍ asajjamānāḥ
analyzed: tasmin atītya munayaḥ ṣaṭ a sajjamānāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.027/2 kakṣāḥ samāna-vayasāv atha saptamāyām
analyzed: kakṣāḥ samāna vayasau atha sapta māyām

original: BhP_03.15.027/3 devāv acakṣata gṛhīta-gadau parārdhya-
analyzed: devau acakṣata gṛhīta gadau parārdhya

original: BhP_03.15.027/4 keyūra-kuṇḍala-kirīṭa-viṭaṅka-veṣau
analyzed: keyūra kuṇḍala kirīṭa viṭaṅka veṣau

original: BhP_03.15.028/1 matta-dvirepha-vanamālikayā nivītau
analyzed: matta dvirepha vanamālikayā nivītau

original: BhP_03.15.028/2 vinyastayāsita-catuṣṭaya-bāhu-madhye
analyzed: vinyasta yāsita catuṣṭaya bāhu madhye

original: BhP_03.15.028/3 vaktraṃ bhruvā kuṭilayā sphuṭa-nirgamābhyāṃ
analyzed: vaktram bhruvā kuṭilayā sphuṭa nirgamābhyām

original: BhP_03.15.028/4 raktekṣaṇena ca manāg rabhasaṃ dadhānau
analyzed: rakta īkṣaṇena ca manāk rabhasam dadhānau

original: BhP_03.15.029/1 dvāry etayor niviviśur miṣator apṛṣṭvā
analyzed: dvāri etayoḥ niviviśuḥ miṣatoḥ a pṛṣṭvā

original: BhP_03.15.029/2 pūrvā yathā puraṭa-vajra-kapāṭikā yāḥ
analyzed: pūrvāḥ yathā puraṭa vajra kapāṭikāḥ yāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.029/3 sarvatra te 'viṣamayā munayaḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā
analyzed: sarvatra te viṣamayā munayaḥ sva dṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_03.15.029/4 ye sañcaranty avihatā vigatābhiśaṅkāḥ
analyzed: ye sañcaranti a vihatāḥ vigata abhiśaṅkāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.030/1 tān vīkṣya vāta-raśanāṃś caturaḥ kumārān
analyzed: tān vīkṣya vāta raśanān caturaḥ kumārān

original: BhP_03.15.030/2 vṛddhān daśārdha-vayaso viditātma-tattvān
analyzed: vṛddhān daśārdha vayasaḥ vidita ātma tattvān

original: BhP_03.15.030/3 vetreṇa cāskhalayatām atad-arhaṇāṃs tau
analyzed: vetreṇa ca askhalayatām a tad arhaṇān tau

original: BhP_03.15.030/4 tejo vihasya bhagavat-pratikūla-śīlau
analyzed: tejaḥ vihasya bhagavat pratikūla śīlau

original: BhP_03.15.031/1 tābhyāṃ miṣatsv animiṣeṣu niṣidhyamānāḥ
analyzed: tābhyām miṣatsu animiṣeṣu niṣidhyamānāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.031/2 svarhattamā hy api hareḥ pratihāra-pābhyām
analyzed: svarhattamāḥ hi api hareḥ pratihāra pābhyām

original: BhP_03.15.031/3 ūcuḥ suhṛttama-didṛkṣita-bhaṅga īṣat
analyzed: ūcuḥ suhṛttama didṛkṣita bhaṅge īṣat

original: BhP_03.15.031/4 kāmānujena sahasā ta upaplutākṣāḥ
analyzed: kāma anujena sahasā te upapluta akṣāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.032/0 munaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.032/1 ko vām ihaitya bhagavat-paricaryayoccais
analyzed: kaḥ vām iha etya bhagavat paricaryayā uccais

original: BhP_03.15.032/2 tad-dharmiṇāṃ nivasatāṃ viṣamaḥ svabhāvaḥ
analyzed: tad dharmiṇām nivasatām viṣamaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.032/3 tasmin praśānta-puruṣe gata-vigrahe vāṃ
analyzed: tasmin praśānta puruṣe gata vigrahe vām

original: BhP_03.15.032/4 ko vātmavat kuhakayoḥ pariśaṅkanīyaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vā ātma vat kuhakayoḥ pariśaṅkanīyaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.033/1 na hy antaraṃ bhagavatīha samasta-kukṣāv
analyzed: na hi antaram bhagavati iha samasta kukṣau

original: BhP_03.15.033/2 ātmānam ātmani nabho nabhasīva dhīrāḥ
analyzed: ātmānam ātmani nabhaḥ nabhasi iva dhīrāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.033/3 paśyanti yatra yuvayoḥ sura-liṅginoḥ kiṃ
analyzed: paśyanti yatra yuvayoḥ sura liṅginoḥ kim

original: BhP_03.15.033/4 vyutpāditaṃ hy udara-bhedi bhayaṃ yato 'sya
analyzed: vyutpāditam hi udara bhedi bhayam

original: BhP_03.15.034/1 tad vām amuṣya paramasya vikuṇṭha-bhartuḥ
analyzed: tat vām amuṣya paramasya vikuṇṭha bhartuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.034/2 kartuṃ prakṛṣṭam iha dhīmahi manda-dhībhyām
analyzed: kartum prakṛṣṭam iha dhīmahi manda dhībhyām

original: BhP_03.15.034/3 lokān ito vrajatam antara-bhāva-dṛṣṭyā
analyzed: lokān itas vrajatam antara bhāva dṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_03.15.034/4 pāpīyasas traya ime ripavo 'sya yatra
analyzed: pāpīyasaḥ trayaḥ ime ripavaḥ sya yatra

original: BhP_03.15.035/1 teṣām itīritam ubhāv avadhārya ghoraṃ
analyzed: teṣām iti īritam ubhau avadhārya ghoram

original: BhP_03.15.035/2 taṃ brahma-daṇḍam anivāraṇam astra-pūgaiḥ
analyzed: tam brahmadaṇḍam anivāraṇam astra pūgaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.035/3 sadyo harer anucarāv uru bibhyatas tat-
analyzed: sadyas hareḥ anucarau uru bibhyataḥ tat

original: BhP_03.15.035/4 pāda-grahāv apatatām atikātareṇa
analyzed: pāda grahau apatatām ati kātareṇa

original: BhP_03.15.036/1 bhūyād aghoni bhagavadbhir akāri daṇḍo
analyzed: bhūyāt bhagavadbhiḥ akāri

original: BhP_03.15.036/2 yo nau hareta sura-helanam apy aśeṣam
analyzed: yaḥ nau hareta sura helanam api aśeṣam

original: BhP_03.15.036/3 mā vo 'nutāpa-kalayā bhagavat-smṛti-ghno
analyzed: mā vaḥ nu tāpa kalayā bhagavat smṛti ghno

original: BhP_03.15.036/4 moho bhaved iha tu nau vrajator adho 'dhaḥ
analyzed: mohaḥ bhavet iha tu nau vrajatoḥ adhas

original: BhP_03.15.037/1 evaṃ tadaiva bhagavān aravinda-nābhaḥ
analyzed: evam tadā eva bhagavān aravindanābhaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.037/2 svānāṃ vibudhya sad-atikramam ārya-hṛdyaḥ
analyzed: svānām vibudhya sat atikramam ārya hṛdyaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.037/3 tasmin yayau paramahaṃsa-mahā-munīnām
analyzed: tasmin yayau paramahaṃsa mahā munīnām

original: BhP_03.15.037/4 anveṣaṇīya-caraṇau calayan saha-śrīḥ
analyzed: anveṣaṇīya caraṇau calayan saha śrīḥ

original: BhP_03.15.038/1 taṃ tv āgataṃ pratihṛtaupayikaṃ sva-pumbhis
analyzed: tam tu āgatam pratihṛta aupayikam sva pumbhiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.038/2 te 'cakṣatākṣa-viṣayaṃ sva-samādhi-bhāgyam
analyzed: te cakṣata akṣa viṣayam sva samādhi bhāgyam

original: BhP_03.15.038/3 haṃsa-śriyor vyajanayoḥ śiva-vāyu-lolac-
analyzed: haṃsa śriyoḥ vyajanayoḥ śiva vāyu lolac

original: BhP_03.15.038/4 chubhrātapatra-śaśi-kesara-śīkarāmbum
BhP_03.15.039/1 kṛtsna-prasāda-sumukhaṃ spṛhaṇīya-dhāma
analyzed: kṛtsna prasāda sumukham spṛhaṇīya dhāma

original: BhP_03.15.039/2 snehāvaloka-kalayā hṛdi saṃspṛśantam
analyzed: sneha avaloka kalayā hṛdi saṃspṛśantam

original: BhP_03.15.039/3 śyāme pṛthāv urasi śobhitayā śriyā svaś-
analyzed: śyāme pṛthau urasi śobhitayā śriyā svaś

original: BhP_03.15.039/4 cūḍāmaṇiṃ subhagayantam ivātma-dhiṣṇyam
analyzed: cūḍāmaṇim subhagayantam iva ātma dhiṣṇyam

original: BhP_03.15.040/1 pītāṃśuke pṛthu-nitambini visphurantyā
analyzed: pīta aṃśuke pṛthu nitambini visphurantyā

original: BhP_03.15.040/2 kāñcyālibhir virutayā vana-mālayā ca
analyzed: kāñcyā ālibhiḥ virutayā vanamālayā ca

original: BhP_03.15.040/3 valgu-prakoṣṭha-valayaṃ vinatā-sutāṃse
analyzed: valgu prakoṣṭha valayam vinatāsuta aṃse

original: BhP_03.15.040/4 vinyasta-hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjam
analyzed: vinyasta hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjam

original: BhP_03.15.041/1 vidyut-kṣipan-makara-kuṇḍala-maṇḍanārha-
BhP_03.15.041/2 gaṇḍa-sthalonnasa-mukhaṃ maṇimat-kirīṭam
analyzed: gaṇḍa sthala unnasa mukham maṇimat kirīṭam

original: BhP_03.15.041/3 dor-daṇḍa-ṣaṇḍa-vivare haratā parārdhya-
analyzed: dordaṇḍa ṣaṇḍa vivare haratā parārdhya

original: BhP_03.15.041/4 hāreṇa kandhara-gatena ca kaustubhena
analyzed: hāreṇa kandhara gatena ca kaustubhena

original: BhP_03.15.042/1 atropasṛṣṭam iti cotsmitam indirāyāḥ
analyzed: atrā upasṛṣṭam iti ca utsmitam indirāyāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.042/2 svānāṃ dhiyā viracitaṃ bahu-sauṣṭhavāḍhyam
analyzed: svānām dhiyā viracitam bahu sauṣṭhava āḍhyam

original: BhP_03.15.042/3 mahyaṃ bhavasya bhavatāṃ ca bhajantam aṅgaṃ
analyzed: mahyam bhavasya bhavatām ca bhajantam aṅgam

original: BhP_03.15.042/4 nemur nirīkṣya na vitṛpta-dṛśo mudā kaiḥ
analyzed: nemuḥ nirīkṣya na vitṛpta dṛśaḥ mudā kaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.043/1 tasyāravinda-nayanasya padāravinda-
analyzed: tasya aravinda nayanasya pada aravinda

original: BhP_03.15.043/2 kiñjalka-miśra-tulasī-makaranda-vāyuḥ
BhP_03.15.043/3 antar-gataḥ sva-vivareṇa cakāra teṣāṃ
analyzed: antargataḥ sva vivareṇa cakāra teṣām

original: BhP_03.15.043/4 saṅkṣobham akṣara-juṣām api citta-tanvoḥ
analyzed: saṅkṣobham akṣara juṣām api citta tanvoḥ

original: BhP_03.15.044/1 te vā amuṣya vadanāsita-padma-kośam
analyzed: te vai amuṣya vadana asita padma kośam

original: BhP_03.15.044/2 udvīkṣya sundaratarādhara-kunda-hāsam
analyzed: udvīkṣya sundaratara adhara kunda hāsam

original: BhP_03.15.044/3 labdhāśiṣaḥ punar avekṣya tadīyam aṅghri-
analyzed: labdha āśiṣaḥ punar avekṣya tadīyam aṅghri

original: BhP_03.15.044/4 dvandvaṃ nakhāruṇa-maṇi-śrayaṇaṃ nidadhyuḥ
analyzed: dvandvam nakha aruṇa maṇi śrayaṇam nidadhyuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.045/1 puṃsāṃ gatiṃ mṛgayatām iha yoga-mārgair
analyzed: puṃsām gatim mṛgayatām iha yoga mārgaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.045/2 dhyānāspadaṃ bahu-mataṃ nayanābhirāmam
analyzed: dhyāna āspadam bahu matam nayana abhirāmam

original: BhP_03.15.045/3 pauṃsnaṃ vapur darśayānam ananya-siddhair
analyzed: pauṃsnam vapuḥ darśa yānam ananya siddhaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.045/4 autpattikaiḥ samagṛṇan yutam aṣṭa-bhogaiḥ
analyzed: autpattikaiḥ samagṛṇan yutam aṣṭa bhogaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.046/0 kumārā ūcuḥ
analyzed: kumārāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.15.046/1 yo 'ntarhito hṛdi gato 'pi durātmanāṃ tvaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ ntarhitaḥ hṛdi gataḥ durātmanām tvam

original: BhP_03.15.046/2 so 'dyaiva no nayana-mūlam ananta rāddhaḥ
analyzed: saḥ dyā eva naḥ nayana mūlam ananta rāddhaḥ

original: BhP_03.15.046/3 yarhy eva karṇa-vivareṇa guhāṃ gato naḥ
analyzed: yarhi eva karṇa vivareṇa guhām gataḥ naḥ

original: BhP_03.15.046/4 pitrānuvarṇita-rahā bhavad-udbhavena
analyzed: pitrā anuvarṇita rahāḥ bhavat udbhavena

original: BhP_03.15.047/1 taṃ tvāṃ vidāma bhagavan param ātma-tattvaṃ
analyzed: tam tvām vidāma bhagavan param ātma tattvam

original: BhP_03.15.047/2 sattvena samprati ratiṃ racayantam eṣām
analyzed: sattvena samprati ratim racayantam eṣām

original: BhP_03.15.047/3 yat te 'nutāpa-viditair dṛḍha-bhakti-yogair
analyzed: yat te nu tāpa viditaiḥ dṛḍha bhakti yogaiḥ

original: BhP_03.15.047/4 udgranthayo hṛdi vidur munayo virāgāḥ
analyzed: udgranthayaḥ hṛdi viduḥ munayaḥ virāgāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.048/1 nātyantikaṃ vigaṇayanty api te prasādaṃ
analyzed: na ātyantikam vigaṇayanti api te prasādam

original: BhP_03.15.048/2 kimv anyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te
analyzed: kimu anyat arpita bhayam bhruvaḥ unnayaiḥ te

original: BhP_03.15.048/3 ye 'ṅga tvad-aṅghri-śaraṇā bhavataḥ kathāyāḥ
analyzed: ye ṅga tvad aṅghri śaraṇāḥ bhavataḥ kathāyāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.048/4 kīrtanya-tīrtha-yaśasaḥ kuśalā rasa-jñāḥ
analyzed: kīrtanya tīrtha yaśasaḥ kuśalāḥ rasajñāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.049/1 kāmaṃ bhavaḥ sva-vṛjinair nirayeṣu naḥ stāc
analyzed: kāmam bhavaḥ sva vṛjinaiḥ nirayeṣu naḥ stāc

original: BhP_03.15.049/2 ceto 'livad yadi nu te padayo rameta
analyzed: cetaḥ livat yadi nu te padayoḥ rameta

original: BhP_03.15.049/3 vācaś ca nas tulasivad yadi te 'ṅghri-śobhāḥ
analyzed: vācaḥ ca naḥ tulasi vat yadi te ṅghri śobhāḥ

original: BhP_03.15.049/4 pūryeta te guṇa-gaṇair yadi karṇa-randhraḥ
analyzed: pūryeta te guṇa gaṇaiḥ yadi karṇa randhraḥ

original: BhP_03.15.050/1 prāduścakartha yad idaṃ puruhūta rūpaṃ
analyzed: prāduścakartha yat idam puruhūta rūpam

original: BhP_03.15.050/2 teneśa nirvṛtim avāpur alaṃ dṛśo naḥ
analyzed: tena īśa nirvṛtim avāpuḥ alam dṛśaḥ naḥ

original: BhP_03.15.050/3 tasmā idaṃ bhagavate nama id vidhema
analyzed: tasmai idam bhagavate namaḥ id vidhema

original: BhP_03.15.050/4 yo 'nātmanāṃ durudayo bhagavān pratītaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ na ātmanām durudayaḥ bhagavān pratītaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.001/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.16.001/1 iti tad gṛṇatāṃ teṣāṃ munīnāṃ yoga-dharmiṇām
analyzed: iti tat gṛṇatām teṣām munīnām yoga dharmiṇām

original: BhP_03.16.001/2 pratinandya jagādedaṃ vikuṇṭha-nilayo vibhuḥ
analyzed: pratinandya jagāda idam vikuṇṭha nilayaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.16.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.16.002/1 etau tau pārṣadau mahyaṃ jayo vijaya eva ca
analyzed: etau tau pārṣadau mahyam jayaḥ vijayaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_03.16.002/2 kadarthī-kṛtya māṃ yad vo bahv akrātām atikramam
analyzed: kadarthīkṛtya mām yat vaḥ bahu atikramam

original: BhP_03.16.003/1 yas tv etayor dhṛto daṇḍo bhavadbhir mām anuvrataiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu etayoḥ dhṛtaḥ daṇḍaḥ bhavadbhiḥ mām anuvrataiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.003/2 sa evānumato 'smābhir munayo deva-helanāt
analyzed: saḥ eva anumataḥ smābhiḥ munayaḥ deva helanāt

original: BhP_03.16.004/1 tad vaḥ prasādayāmy adya brahma daivaṃ paraṃ hi me
analyzed: tat vaḥ prasādayāmi adya brahma daivam param hi me

original: BhP_03.16.004/2 tad dhīty ātma-kṛtaṃ manye yat sva-pumbhir asat-kṛtāḥ
analyzed: tat dhī iti ātma kṛtam manye yat sva pumbhiḥ asatkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_03.16.005/1 yan-nāmāni ca gṛhṇāti loko bhṛtye kṛtāgasi
analyzed: yat nāmāni ca gṛhṇāti lokaḥ bhṛtye kṛta āgasi

original: BhP_03.16.005/2 so 'sādhu-vādas tat-kīrtiṃ hanti tvacam ivāmayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ sādhuvādaḥ tad kīrtim hanti tvacam iva āmayaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.006/1 yasyāmṛtāmala-yaśaḥ-śravaṇāvagāhaḥ
analyzed: yasya amṛta amala yaśaḥ śravaṇa avagāhaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.006/2 sadyaḥ punāti jagad āśvapacād vikuṇṭhaḥ
analyzed: sadyas punāti jagat āśva pacāt vikuṇṭhaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.006/3 so 'haṃ bhavadbhya upalabdha-sutīrtha-kīrtiś
analyzed: saḥ ham bhavadbhyaḥ upalabdha sutīrtha kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.006/4 chindyāṃ sva-bāhum api vaḥ pratikūla-vṛttim
analyzed: chindyām sva bāhum api vaḥ pratikūla vṛttim

original: BhP_03.16.007/1 yat-sevayā caraṇa-padma-pavitra-reṇuṃ
analyzed: yad sevayā caraṇa padma pavitra reṇum

original: BhP_03.16.007/2 sadyaḥ kṣatākhila-malaṃ pratilabdha-śīlam
analyzed: sadyas kṣata akhila malam pratilabdha śīlam

original: BhP_03.16.007/3 na śrīr viraktam api māṃ vijahāti yasyāḥ
analyzed: na śrīḥ viraktam api mām vijahāti yasyāḥ

original: BhP_03.16.007/4 prekṣā-lavārtha itare niyamān vahanti
analyzed: prekṣā lava arthe itare niyamān vahanti

original: BhP_03.16.008/1 nāhaṃ tathādmi yajamāna-havir vitāne
analyzed: na aham tathā admi yajamāna haviḥ vitāne

original: BhP_03.16.008/2 ścyotad-ghṛta-plutam adan huta-bhuṅ-mukhena
analyzed: ścyotat ghṛta plutam adan hutabhuj mukhena

original: BhP_03.16.008/3 yad brāhmaṇasya mukhataś carato 'nughāsaṃ
analyzed: yat brāhmaṇasya mukhatas carataḥ nughāsam

original: BhP_03.16.008/4 tuṣṭasya mayy avahitair nija-karma-pākaiḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭasya mayi avahitaiḥ nija karma pākaiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.009/1 yeṣāṃ bibharmy aham akhaṇḍa-vikuṇṭha-yoga-
analyzed: yeṣām bibharmi aham akhaṇḍa vikuṇṭha yoga

original: BhP_03.16.009/2 māyā-vibhūtir amalāṅghri-rajaḥ kirīṭaiḥ
analyzed: māyā vibhūtiḥ amala aṅghri rajaḥ kirīṭaiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.009/3 viprāṃs tu ko na viṣaheta yad-arhaṇāmbhaḥ
analyzed: viprān tu kaḥ na viṣaheta yad arhaṇa ambhaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.009/4 sadyaḥ punāti saha-candra-lalāma-lokān
analyzed: sadyas punāti saha candralalāma lokān

original: BhP_03.16.010/1 ye me tanūr dvija-varān duhatīr madīyā
analyzed: ye me tanūḥ dvijavarān duhatīḥ madīyā

original: BhP_03.16.010/2 bhūtāny alabdha-śaraṇāni ca bheda-buddhyā
analyzed: bhūtāni alabdha śaraṇāni ca bheda buddhyā

original: BhP_03.16.010/3 drakṣyanty agha-kṣata-dṛśo hy ahi-manyavas tān
analyzed: drakṣyanti agha kṣata dṛśaḥ hi ahimanyavaḥ tān

original: BhP_03.16.010/4 gṛdhrā ruṣā mama kuṣanty adhidaṇḍa-netuḥ
analyzed: gṛdhrāḥ ruṣā mama adhidaṇḍanetuḥ

original: BhP_03.16.011/1 ye brāhmaṇān mayi dhiyā kṣipato 'rcayantas
analyzed: ye brāhmaṇān mayi dhiyā kṣipataḥ rcayantaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.011/2 tuṣyad-dhṛdaḥ smita-sudhokṣita-padma-vaktrāḥ
analyzed: tuṣyat   smita sudhā ukṣita padma vaktrāḥ

original: BhP_03.16.011/3 vāṇyānurāga-kalayātmajavad gṛṇantaḥ
analyzed: vāṇyā anurāga kalayā ātmaja vat gṛṇantaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.011/4 sambodhayanty aham ivāham upāhṛtas taiḥ
analyzed: sambodhayanti aham iva aham upāhṛtaḥ taiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.012/1 tan me sva-bhartur avasāyam alakṣamāṇau
analyzed: tat me sva bhartuḥ avasāyam a lakṣamāṇau

original: BhP_03.16.012/2 yuṣmad-vyatikrama-gatiṃ pratipadya sadyaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmad vyatikrama gatim pratipadya sadyas

original: BhP_03.16.012/3 bhūyo mamāntikam itāṃ tad anugraho me
analyzed: bhūyas mama antikam itām tat anugrahaḥ me

original: BhP_03.16.012/4 yat kalpatām acirato bhṛtayor vivāsaḥ
analyzed: yat kalpatām aciratas bhṛtayoḥ vivāsaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.013/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.16.013/1 atha tasyośatīṃ devīm ṛṣi-kulyāṃ sarasvatīm
analyzed: atha tasya uśatīm devīm ṛṣikulyām sarasvatīm

original: BhP_03.16.013/2 nāsvādya manyu-daṣṭānāṃ teṣām ātmāpy atṛpyata
analyzed: na āsvādya manyu daṣṭānām teṣām ātmā api atṛpyata

original: BhP_03.16.014/1 satīṃ vyādāya śṛṇvanto laghvīṃ gurv-artha-gahvarām
analyzed: satīm vyādāya śṛṇvantaḥ laghvīm guru artha gahvarām

original: BhP_03.16.014/2 vigāhyāgādha-gambhīrāṃ na vidus tac-cikīrṣitam
analyzed: vigāhya agādha gambhīrām na viduḥ tad cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_03.16.015/1 te yoga-māyayārabdha- pārameṣṭhya-mahodayam
analyzed: te pārameṣṭhya mahā udayam

original: BhP_03.16.015/2 procuḥ prāñjalayo viprāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣubhita-tvacaḥ
analyzed: procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ viprāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣubhita tvacaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.016/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.16.016/1 na vayaṃ bhagavan vidmas tava deva cikīrṣitam
analyzed: na vayam bhagavan vidmaḥ tava deva cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_03.16.016/2 kṛto me 'nugrahaś ceti yad adhyakṣaḥ prabhāṣase
analyzed: kṛtaḥ me nugrahaḥ ca iti yat adhyakṣaḥ prabhāṣase

original: BhP_03.16.017/1 brahmaṇyasya paraṃ daivaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ kila te prabho
analyzed: brahmaṇyasya param daivam brāhmaṇāḥ kila te prabho

original: BhP_03.16.017/2 viprāṇāṃ deva-devānāṃ bhagavān ātma-daivatam
analyzed: viprāṇām devadevānām bhagavān ātma daivatam

original: BhP_03.16.018/1 tvattaḥ sanātano dharmo rakṣyate tanubhis tava
analyzed: tvattaḥ sanātanaḥ dharmaḥ rakṣyate tanubhiḥ tava

original: BhP_03.16.018/2 dharmasya paramo guhyo nirvikāro bhavān mataḥ
analyzed: dharmasya paramaḥ guhyaḥ nirvikāraḥ bhavān mataḥ

original: BhP_03.16.019/1 taranti hy añjasā mṛtyuṃ nivṛttā yad-anugrahāt
analyzed: taranti hi añjasā mṛtyum nivṛttāḥ yad anugrahāt

original: BhP_03.16.019/2 yoginaḥ sa bhavān kiṃ svid anugṛhyeta yat paraiḥ
analyzed: yoginaḥ sa bhavān kim svid anugṛhyeta yat paraiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.020/1 yaṃ vai vibhūtir upayāty anuvelam anyair
analyzed: yam vai vibhūtiḥ upayāti anuvelam anyaiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.020/2 arthārthibhiḥ sva-śirasā dhṛta-pāda-reṇuḥ
analyzed: artha arthibhiḥ sva śirasā dhṛta pāda reṇuḥ

original: BhP_03.16.020/3 dhanyārpitāṅghri-tulasī-nava-dāma-dhāmno
analyzed: dhanya arpita aṅghri tulasī nava dāma dhāmnaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.020/4 lokaṃ madhuvrata-pater iva kāma-yānā
analyzed: lokam madhu vrata pateḥ iva kāmayānā

original: BhP_03.16.021/1 yas tāṃ vivikta-caritair anuvartamānāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tām vivikta caritaiḥ anuvartamānām

original: BhP_03.16.021/2 nātyādriyat parama-bhāgavata-prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: na atyādriyat parama bhāgavata prasaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.021/3 sa tvaṃ dvijānupatha-puṇya-rajaḥ-punītaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam dvija anupatha puṇya rajaḥ punītaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.021/4 śrīvatsa-lakṣma kim agā bhaga-bhājanas tvam
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣma kim agāḥ bhaga bhājanaḥ tvam

original: BhP_03.16.022/1 dharmasya te bhagavatas tri-yuga tribhiḥ svaiḥ
analyzed: dharmasya te bhagavataḥ triyuga tribhiḥ svaiḥ

original: BhP_03.16.022/2 padbhiś carācaram idaṃ dvija-devatārtham
analyzed: padbhiḥ carācaram idam dvija devatā artham

original: BhP_03.16.022/3 nūnaṃ bhṛtaṃ tad-abhighāti rajas tamaś ca
analyzed: nūnam bhṛtam tad abhighāti rajaḥ tamaḥ ca

original: BhP_03.16.022/4 sattvena no varadayā tanuvā nirasya
analyzed: sattvena naḥ vara dayā tanuvā nirasya

original: BhP_03.16.023/1 na tvaṃ dvijottama-kulaṃ yadi hātma-gopaṃ
analyzed: na tvam dvijottama kulam yadi ha ātma gopam

original: BhP_03.16.023/2 goptā vṛṣaḥ svarhaṇena sa-sūnṛtena
analyzed: goptā vṛṣaḥ svarhaṇena sa sūnṛtena

original: BhP_03.16.023/3 tarhy eva naṅkṣyati śivas tava deva panthā
analyzed: tarhi eva naṅkṣyati śivaḥ tava deva panthā

original: BhP_03.16.023/4 loko 'grahīṣyad ṛṣabhasya hi tat pramāṇam
analyzed: lokaḥ grahīṣyat ṛṣabhasya hi tat pramāṇam

original: BhP_03.16.024/1 tat te 'nabhīṣṭam iva sattva-nidher vidhitsoḥ
analyzed: tat te na abhīṣṭam iva sattva nidheḥ vidhitsoḥ

original: BhP_03.16.024/2 kṣemaṃ janāya nija-śaktibhir uddhṛtāreḥ
analyzed: kṣemam janāya nija śaktibhiḥ uddhṛta areḥ

original: BhP_03.16.024/3 naitāvatā try-adhipater bata viśva-bhartus
analyzed: na etāvatā tryadhipateḥ bata viśvabhartuḥ

original: BhP_03.16.024/4 tejaḥ kṣataṃ tv avanatasya sa te vinodaḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ kṣatam tu avanatasya sa te vinodaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.025/1 yaṃ vānayor damam adhīśa bhavān vidhatte
analyzed: yam vā anayoḥ damam adhīśa bhavān vidhatte

original: BhP_03.16.025/2 vṛttiṃ nu vā tad anumanmahi nirvyalīkam
analyzed: vṛttim nu vā tat anumanmahi nirvyalīkam

original: BhP_03.16.025/3 asmāsu vā ya ucito dhriyatāṃ sa daṇḍo
analyzed: asmāsu vā yaḥ ucitaḥ dhriyatām sa daṇḍaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.025/4 ye 'nāgasau vayam ayuṅkṣmahi kilbiṣeṇa
analyzed: ye na āgasau vayam ayuṅkṣmahi kilbiṣeṇa

original: BhP_03.16.026/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.16.026/1 etau suretara-gatiṃ pratipadya sadyaḥ
analyzed: etau suretara gatim pratipadya sadyas

original: BhP_03.16.026/2 saṃrambha-sambhṛta-samādhy-anubaddha-yogau
analyzed: saṃrambha sambhṛta samādhi anubaddha yogau

original: BhP_03.16.026/3 bhūyaḥ sakāśam upayāsyata āśu yo vaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas sakāśam upayāsyate āśu yaḥ vaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.026/4 śāpo mayaiva nimitas tad aveta viprāḥ
analyzed: śāpaḥ mayā eva nimitaḥ tat aveta viprāḥ

original: BhP_03.16.027/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.16.027/1 atha te munayo dṛṣṭvā nayanānanda-bhājanam
analyzed: atha te munayaḥ dṛṣṭvā nayana ānanda bhājanam

original: BhP_03.16.027/2 vaikuṇṭhaṃ tad-adhiṣṭhānaṃ vikuṇṭhaṃ ca svayaṃ-prabham
analyzed: vaikuṇṭham tad adhiṣṭhānam vikuṇṭham ca svayaṃprabham

original: BhP_03.16.028/1 bhagavantaṃ parikramya praṇipatyānumānya ca
analyzed: bhagavantam parikramya praṇipatya anumānya ca

original: BhP_03.16.028/2 pratijagmuḥ pramuditāḥ śaṃsanto vaiṣṇavīṃ śriyam
analyzed: pratijagmuḥ pramuditāḥ śaṃsantaḥ vaiṣṇavīm śriyam

original: BhP_03.16.029/1 bhagavān anugāv āha yātaṃ mā bhaiṣṭam astu śam
analyzed: bhagavān anugau āha yātam mā astu śam

original: BhP_03.16.029/2 brahma-tejaḥ samartho 'pi hantuṃ necche mataṃ tu me
analyzed: brahma tejaḥ hantum na icche matam tu me

original: BhP_03.16.030/1 etat puraiva nirdiṣṭaṃ ramayā kruddhayā yadā
analyzed: etat purā eva nirdiṣṭam ramayā kruddhayā yadā

original: BhP_03.16.030/2 purāpavāritā dvāri viśantī mayy upārate
analyzed: pura apavāritā dvāri viśantī mayi upārate

original: BhP_03.16.031/1 mayi saṃrambha-yogena nistīrya brahma-helanam
analyzed: mayi saṃrambha yogena nistīrya brahma helanam

original: BhP_03.16.031/2 pratyeṣyataṃ nikāśaṃ me kālenālpīyasā punaḥ
analyzed: nikāśam me kālena alpīyasā punar

original: BhP_03.16.032/1 dvāḥsthāv ādiśya bhagavān vimāna-śreṇi-bhūṣaṇam
analyzed: dvāḥsthau ādiśya bhagavān vimāna śreṇi bhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.16.032/2 sarvātiśayayā lakṣmyā juṣṭaṃ svaṃ dhiṣṇyam āviśat
analyzed: sarva atiśayayā lakṣmyā juṣṭam svam dhiṣṇyam āviśat

original: BhP_03.16.033/1 tau tu gīrvāṇa-ṛṣabhau dustarād dhari-lokataḥ
analyzed: tau tu gīrvāṇa ṛṣabhau dustarāt hari lokataḥ

original: BhP_03.16.033/2 hata-śriyau brahma-śāpād abhūtāṃ vigata-smayau
analyzed: hata śriyau brahma śāpāt abhūtām vigata smayau

original: BhP_03.16.034/1 tadā vikuṇṭha-dhiṣaṇāt tayor nipatamānayoḥ
analyzed: tadā vikuṇṭha dhiṣaṇāt tayoḥ nipatamānayoḥ

original: BhP_03.16.034/2 hāhā-kāro mahān āsīd vimānāgryeṣu putrakāḥ
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt vimāna agryeṣu putrakāḥ

original: BhP_03.16.035/1 tāv eva hy adhunā prāptau pārṣada-pravarau hareḥ
analyzed: tau eva hi adhunā prāptau pārṣada pravarau hareḥ

original: BhP_03.16.035/2 diter jaṭhara-nirviṣṭaṃ kāśyapaṃ teja ulbaṇam
analyzed: diteḥ jaṭhara nirviṣṭam kāśyapam tejaḥ ulbaṇam

original: BhP_03.16.036/1 tayor asurayor adya tejasā yamayor hi vaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ asurayoḥ adya tejasā yamayoḥ hi vaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.036/2 ākṣiptaṃ teja etarhi bhagavāṃs tad vidhitsati
analyzed: ākṣiptam tejaḥ etarhi bhagavān tat vidhitsati

original: BhP_03.16.037/1 viśvasya yaḥ sthiti-layodbhava-hetur ādyo
analyzed: viśvasya yaḥ sthiti laya udbhava hetuḥ ādyaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.037/2 yogeśvarair api duratyaya-yogamāyaḥ
analyzed: yogeśvaraiḥ api duratyaya yoga māyaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.037/3 kṣemaṃ vidhāsyati sa no bhagavāṃs tryadhīśas
analyzed: kṣemam vidhāsyati sa naḥ bhagavān tryadhīśaḥ

original: BhP_03.16.037/4 tatrāsmadīya-vimṛśena kiyān ihārthaḥ
analyzed: tatra asmadīya vimṛśena kiyān iha arthaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.002/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.17.001/1 niśamyātma-bhuvā gītaṃ kāraṇaṃ śaṅkayojjhitāḥ
analyzed: niśamya ātmabhuvā gītam kāraṇam śaṅkayā ujjhitāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.001/2 tataḥ sarve nyavartanta tridivāya divaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas sarve nyavartanta tridivāya divaukasaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.002/1 ditis tu bhartur ādeśād apatya-pariśaṅkinī
analyzed: ditiḥ tu bhartuḥ ādeśāt apatya pariśaṅkinī

original: BhP_03.17.002/2 pūrṇe varṣa-śate sādhvī putrau prasuṣuve yamau
analyzed: pūrṇe varṣa śate sādhvī putrau prasuṣuve yamau

original: BhP_03.17.003/1 utpātā bahavas tatra nipetur jāyamānayoḥ
analyzed: utpātāḥ bahavaḥ tatra nipetuḥ jāyamānayoḥ

original: BhP_03.17.003/2 divi bhuvy antarikṣe ca lokasyoru-bhayāvahāḥ
analyzed: divi bhuvi antarikṣe ca lokasya uru bhaya āvahāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.004/1 sahācalā bhuvaś celur diśaḥ sarvāḥ prajajvaluḥ
analyzed: saha acalāḥ bhuvaḥ celuḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ prajajvaluḥ

original: BhP_03.17.004/2 solkāś cāśanayaḥ petuḥ ketavaś cārti-hetavaḥ
analyzed: sa ulkāḥ ca aśanayaḥ petuḥ ketavaḥ ca ārti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.005/1 vavau vāyuḥ suduḥsparśaḥ phūt-kārān īrayan muhuḥ
analyzed: vavau vāyuḥ su duḥsparśaḥ phūtkārān īrayan muhur

original: BhP_03.17.005/2 unmūlayan naga-patīn vātyānīko rajo-dhvajaḥ
analyzed: unmūlayan nagapatīn vātyā anīkaḥ rajaḥ dhvajaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.006/1 uddhasat-taḍid-ambhoda- ghaṭayā naṣṭa-bhāgaṇe
analyzed: ghaṭaya naṣṭa bhā gaṇe

original: BhP_03.17.006/2 vyomni praviṣṭa-tamasā na sma vyādṛśyate padam
analyzed: vyomni praviṣṭa tamasā na sma vyādṛśyate padam

original: BhP_03.17.007/1 cukrośa vimanā vārdhir udūrmiḥ kṣubhitodaraḥ
analyzed: cukrośa vimanāḥ vārdhiḥ udūrmiḥ kṣubhita udaraḥ

original: BhP_03.17.007/2 sodapānāś ca saritaś cukṣubhuḥ śuṣka-paṅkajāḥ
analyzed: sa udapānāḥ ca saritaḥ cukṣubhuḥ śuṣka paṅkajāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.008/1 muhuḥ paridhayo 'bhūvan sarāhvoḥ śaśi-sūryayoḥ
analyzed: muhur paridhayaḥ bhūvan sarāhvoḥ śaśi sūryayoḥ

original: BhP_03.17.008/2 nirghātā ratha-nirhrādā vivarebhyaḥ prajajñire
analyzed: nirghātāḥ ratha nirhrādāḥ vivarebhyaḥ prajajñire

original: BhP_03.17.009/1 antar-grāmeṣu mukhato vamantyo vahnim ulbaṇam
analyzed: antar grāmeṣu mukhatas vamantyaḥ vahnim ulbaṇam

original: BhP_03.17.009/2 sṛgālolūka-ṭaṅkāraiḥ praṇedur aśivaṃ śivāḥ
analyzed: sṛgāla ulūka ṭaṅka araiḥ praṇeduḥ aśivam śivāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.010/1 saṅgītavad rodanavad unnamayya śirodharām
analyzed: saṅgīta vat rodana vat unnamayya śirodharām

original: BhP_03.17.010/2 vyamuñcan vividhā vāco grāma-siṃhās tatas tataḥ
analyzed: vyamuñcan vividhāḥ vācaḥ grāmasiṃhāḥ tatas tatas

original: BhP_03.17.011/1 kharāś ca karkaśaiḥ kṣattaḥ khurair ghnanto dharā-talam
analyzed: kharāḥ ca karkaśaiḥ kṣattar khuraiḥ ghnantaḥ dharā talam

original: BhP_03.17.011/2 khārkāra-rabhasā mattāḥ paryadhāvan varūthaśaḥ
analyzed: khārkāra rabhasāḥ mattāḥ paryadhāvan varūthaśas

original: BhP_03.17.012/1 rudanto rāsabha-trastā nīḍād udapatan khagāḥ
analyzed: rudantaḥ rāsabha trastāḥ nīḍāt udapatan khagāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.012/2 ghoṣe 'raṇye ca paśavaḥ śakṛn-mūtram akurvata
analyzed: ghoṣe raṇye ca paśavaḥ śakṛt mūtram akurvata

original: BhP_03.17.013/1 gāvo 'trasann asṛg-dohās toyadāḥ pūya-varṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ trasan asṛgdohāḥ toya dāḥ pūya varṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.013/2 vyarudan deva-liṅgāni drumāḥ petur vinānilam
analyzed: vyarudan devaliṅgāni drumāḥ petuḥ vinā anilam

original: BhP_03.17.014/1 grahān puṇyatamān anye bhagaṇāṃś cāpi dīpitāḥ
analyzed: grahān puṇyatamān anye bhagaṇān ca api dīpitāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.014/2 aticerur vakra-gatyā yuyudhuś ca parasparam
analyzed: aticeruḥ vakragatyā yuyudhuḥ ca parasparam

original: BhP_03.17.015/1 dṛṣṭvānyāṃś ca mahotpātān atat-tattva-vidaḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā anyān ca mahā utpātān a tad tattva vidaḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.015/2 brahma-putrān ṛte bhītā menire viśva-samplavam
analyzed: brahma putrān ṛte bhītāḥ menire viśva samplavam

original: BhP_03.17.016/1 tāv ādi-daityau sahasā vyajyamānātma-pauruṣau
analyzed: tau ādidaityau sahasā vyajyamāna ātma pauruṣau

original: BhP_03.17.016/2 vavṛdhāte 'śma-sāreṇa kāyenādri-patī iva
analyzed: vavṛdhāte śmasāreṇa kāyena adripatī iva

original: BhP_03.17.017/1 divi-spṛśau hema-kirīṭa-koṭibhir niruddha-kāṣṭhau sphurad-aṅgadā-bhujau
analyzed: divispṛśau hema kirīṭa koṭibhiḥ niruddha kāṣṭhau sphurat aṅgada ābhujau

original: BhP_03.17.017/2 gāṃ kampayantau caraṇaiḥ pade pade kaṭyā sukāñcyārkam atītya tasthatuḥ
analyzed: gām kampayantau caraṇaiḥ pade pade kaṭyā su kāñcyā arkam atītya tasthatuḥ

original: BhP_03.17.018/1 prajāpatir nāma tayor akārṣīd yaḥ prāk sva-dehād yamayor ajāyata
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ nāma tayoḥ akārṣīt yaḥ prāk sva dehāt yamayoḥ ajāyata

original: BhP_03.17.018/2 taṃ vai hiraṇyakaśipuṃ viduḥ prajā yaṃ taṃ hiraṇyākṣam asūta sāgrataḥ
analyzed: tam vai hiraṇyakaśipum viduḥ prajāḥ yam tam hiraṇyākṣam asūta sāgrataḥ

original: BhP_03.17.019/1 cakre hiraṇyakaśipur dorbhyāṃ brahma-vareṇa ca
analyzed: cakre hiraṇyakaśipuḥ dorbhyām brahma vareṇa ca

original: BhP_03.17.019/2 vaśe sa-pālān lokāṃs trīn akuto-mṛtyur uddhataḥ
analyzed: vaśe sa pālān lokān trīn akutas mṛtyuḥ uddhataḥ

original: BhP_03.17.020/1 hiraṇyākṣo 'nujas tasya priyaḥ prīti-kṛd anvaham
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣaḥ nujaḥ tasya priyaḥ prīti kṛt anvaham

original: BhP_03.17.020/2 gadā-pāṇir divaṃ yāto yuyutsur mṛgayan raṇam
analyzed: gadā pāṇiḥ divam yātaḥ yuyutsuḥ mṛgayan raṇam

original: BhP_03.17.021/1 taṃ vīkṣya duḥsaha-javaṃ raṇat-kāñcana-nūpuram
analyzed: tam vīkṣya duḥsaha javam raṇat kāñcana nūpuram

original: BhP_03.17.021/2 vaijayantyā srajā juṣṭam aṃsa-nyasta-mahā-gadam
analyzed: vaijayantyā srajā juṣṭam aṃsa nyasta mahā gadam

original: BhP_03.17.022/1 mano-vīrya-varotsiktam asṛṇyam akuto-bhayam
analyzed: manaḥ vīrya vara utsiktam akutobhayam

original: BhP_03.17.022/2 bhītā nililyire devās tārkṣya-trastā ivāhayaḥ
analyzed: bhītāḥ nililyire devāḥ tārkṣya trastāḥ iva ahayaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.023/1 sa vai tirohitān dṛṣṭvā mahasā svena daitya-rāṭ
analyzed: sa vai tirohitān dṛṣṭvā mahasā svena daitya rāj

original: BhP_03.17.023/2 sendrān deva-gaṇān kṣībān apaśyan vyanadad bhṛśam
analyzed: sa indrān deva gaṇān kṣībān apaśyan vyanadat bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.17.024/1 tato nivṛttaḥ krīḍiṣyan gambhīraṃ bhīma-nisvanam
analyzed: tatas nivṛttaḥ krīḍiṣyan gambhīram bhīma nisvanam

original: BhP_03.17.024/2 vijagāhe mahā-sattvo vārdhiṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: vijagāhe mahāsattvaḥ vārdhim mattaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.025/1 tasmin praviṣṭe varuṇasya sainikā yādo-gaṇāḥ sanna-dhiyaḥ sasādhvasāḥ
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭe varuṇasya sainikāḥ yādaḥ gaṇāḥ sanna dhiyaḥ sa sādhvasāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.025/2 ahanyamānā api tasya varcasā pradharṣitā dūrataraṃ pradudruvuḥ
analyzed: a hanyamānāḥ api tasya varcasā pradharṣitāḥ dūrataram pradudruvuḥ

original: BhP_03.17.026/1 sa varṣa-pūgān udadhau mahā-balaś caran mahormīñ chvasaneritān muhuḥ
analyzed: sa varṣa pūgān udadhau mahā balaḥ caran mahā ūrmīm śvasana īritān muhur

original: BhP_03.17.026/2 maurvyābhijaghne gadayā vibhāvarīm āsedivāṃs tāta purīṃ pracetasaḥ
analyzed: maurvyā abhijaghne gadayā vibhāvarīm āsedivān tāta purīm pracetasaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.027/1 tatropalabhyāsura-loka-pālakaṃ yādo-gaṇānām ṛṣabhaṃ pracetasam
analyzed: tatra upalabhya asura lokapālakam yādaḥ gaṇānām ṛṣabham pracetasam

original: BhP_03.17.027/2 smayan pralabdhuṃ praṇipatya nīcavaj jagāda me dehy adhirāja saṃyugam
analyzed: smayan pralabdhum praṇipatya nīca vat jagāda me dehi adhirāja saṃyugam

original: BhP_03.17.028/1 tvaṃ loka-pālo 'dhipatir bṛhac-chravā vīryāpaho durmada-vīra-māninām
analyzed: tvam lokapālaḥ dhipatiḥ bṛhacchravāḥ vīrya apahaḥ durmada vīra māninām

original: BhP_03.17.028/2 vijitya loke 'khila-daitya-dānavān yad rājasūyena purāyajat prabho
analyzed: vijitya loke khila daitya dānavān yat rājasūyena purā ayajat prabho

original: BhP_03.17.029/1 sa evam utsikta-madena vidviṣā dṛḍhaṃ pralabdho bhagavān apāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam utsikta madena vidviṣā dṛḍham pralabdhaḥ bhagavān apām patiḥ

original: BhP_03.17.029/2 roṣaṃ samutthaṃ śamayan svayā dhiyā vyavocad aṅgopaśamaṃ gatā vayam
analyzed: roṣam samuttham śamayan svayā dhiyā vyavocat aṅga upaśamam gatāḥ vayam

original: BhP_03.17.030/1 paśyāmi nānyaṃ puruṣāt purātanād yaḥ saṃyuge tvāṃ raṇa-mārga-kovidam
analyzed: paśyāmi nā anyam puruṣāt purātanāt yaḥ saṃyuge tvām raṇa mārga kovidam

original: BhP_03.17.030/2 ārādhayiṣyaty asurarṣabhehi taṃ manasvino yaṃ gṛṇate bhavādṛśāḥ
analyzed: ārādhayiṣyati asura ṛṣabhe hi tam manasvinaḥ yam gṛṇate bhavādṛśāḥ

original: BhP_03.17.031/1 taṃ vīram ārād abhipadya vismayaḥ śayiṣyase vīra-śaye śvabhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tam vīram ārāt abhipadya vismayaḥ śayiṣyase vīraśaye śvabhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.17.031/2 yas tvad-vidhānām asatāṃ praśāntaye rūpāṇi dhatte sad-anugrahecchayā
analyzed: yaḥ tvadvidhānām asatām praśāntaye rūpāṇi dhatte sat anugraha icchayā

original: BhP_03.18.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.18.001/1 tad evam ākarṇya jaleśa-bhāṣitaṃ mahā-manās tad vigaṇayya durmadaḥ
analyzed: tat evam ākarṇya jaleśa bhāṣitam mahā manāḥ tat vigaṇayya durmadaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.001/2 harer viditvā gatim aṅga nāradād rasātalaṃ nirviviśe tvarānvitaḥ
analyzed: hareḥ viditvā gatim aṅga nāradāt rasātalam nirviviśe tvarā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.002/1 dadarśa tatrābhijitaṃ dharā-dharaṃ pronnīyamānāvanim agra-daṃṣṭrayā
analyzed: dadarśa tatra abhijitam dharādharam pronnīyamāna avanim agra daṃṣṭrayā

original: BhP_03.18.002/2 muṣṇantam akṣṇā sva-ruco 'ruṇa-śriyā jahāsa cāho vana-gocaro mṛgaḥ
analyzed: muṣṇantam akṣṇā sva rucaḥ ruṇa śriyā jahāsa ca aho vana gocaraḥ mṛgaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.003/1 āhainam ehy ajña mahīṃ vimuñca no rasaukasāṃ viśva-sṛjeyam arpitā
analyzed: āha enam ehi ajña mahīm vimuñca naḥ rasaukasām viśvasṛjā iyam arpitā

original: BhP_03.18.003/2 na svasti yāsyasy anayā mamekṣataḥ surādhamāsādita-sūkarākṛte
analyzed: na svasti yāsyasi anayā mama īkṣataḥ su rādham āsādita sūkara ākṛte

original: BhP_03.18.004/1 tvaṃ naḥ sapatnair abhavāya kiṃ bhṛto yo māyayā hanty asurān parokṣa-jit
analyzed: tvam naḥ sapatnaiḥ abhavāya kim bhṛtaḥ yaḥ māyayā hanti asurān parokṣa jit

original: BhP_03.18.004/2 tvāṃ yogamāyā-balam alpa-pauruṣaṃ saṃsthāpya mūḍha pramṛje suhṛc-chucaḥ
analyzed: tvām yoga māyā balam alpa pauruṣam saṃsthāpya mūḍha pramṛje suhṛd śucaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.005/1 tvayi saṃsthite gadayā śīrṇa-śīrṣaṇy asmad-bhuja-cyutayā ye ca tubhyam
analyzed: tvayi saṃsthite gadayā śīrṇa śīrṣaṇi asmad bhuja cyutayā ye ca tubhyam

original: BhP_03.18.005/2 baliṃ haranty ṛṣayo ye ca devāḥ svayaṃ sarve na bhaviṣyanty amūlāḥ
analyzed: balim haranti ṛṣayaḥ ye ca devāḥ svayam sarve na bhaviṣyanti amūlāḥ

original: BhP_03.18.006/1 sa tudyamāno 'ri-durukta-tomarair daṃṣṭrāgra-gāṃ gām upalakṣya bhītām
analyzed: sa tudyamānaḥ ridurukta tomaraiḥ daṃṣṭra agra gām gām upalakṣya bhītām

original: BhP_03.18.006/2 todaṃ mṛṣan niragād ambu-madhyād grāhāhataḥ sa-kareṇur yathebhaḥ
analyzed: todam mṛṣan niragāt ambu madhyāt grāha āhataḥ sa kareṇuḥ yathā ibhaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.007/1 taṃ niḥsarantaṃ salilād anudruto hiraṇya-keśo dviradaṃ yathā jhaṣaḥ
analyzed: tam niḥsarantam salilāt anudrutaḥ hiraṇyakeśaḥ dviradam yathā jhaṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.007/2 karāla-daṃṣṭro 'śani-nisvano 'bravīd gata-hriyāṃ kiṃ tv asatāṃ vigarhitam
analyzed: karāla daṃṣṭraḥ śani nisvanaḥ bravīt gata hriyām kim tu asatām vigarhitam

original: BhP_03.18.008/1 sa gām udastāt salilasya gocare vinyasya tasyām adadhāt sva-sattvam
analyzed: sa gām udastāt salilasya gocare vinyasya tasyām adadhāt sva sattvam

original: BhP_03.18.008/2 abhiṣṭuto viśva-sṛjā prasūnair āpūryamāṇo vibudhaiḥ paśyato 'reḥ
analyzed: abhiṣṭutaḥ viśvasṛjā prasūnaiḥ āpūryamāṇaḥ vibudhaiḥ paśyataḥ reḥ

original: BhP_03.18.009/1 parānuṣaktaṃ tapanīyopakalpaṃ mahā-gadaṃ kāñcana-citra-daṃśam
analyzed: para anuṣaktam tapanīya upakalpam mahā gadam kāñcana citra daṃśam

original: BhP_03.18.009/2 marmāṇy abhīkṣṇaṃ pratudantaṃ duruktaiḥ pracaṇḍa-manyuḥ prahasaṃs taṃ babhāṣe
analyzed: marmāṇi abhīkṣṇam pratudantam duruktaiḥ pracaṇḍa manyuḥ prahasan tam babhāṣe

original: BhP_03.18.010/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.18.010/1 satyaṃ vayaṃ bho vana-gocarā mṛgā yuṣmad-vidhān mṛgaye grāma-siṃhān
analyzed: satyam vayam bho vana gocarāḥ mṛgāḥ yuṣmadvidhān mṛgaye grāma siṃhān

original: BhP_03.18.010/2 na mṛtyu-pāśaiḥ pratimuktasya vīrā vikatthanaṃ tava gṛhṇanty abhadra
analyzed: na mṛtyu pāśaiḥ pratimuktasya vīrāḥ vikatthanam tava gṛhṇanti abhadra

original: BhP_03.18.011/1 ete vayaṃ nyāsa-harā rasaukasāṃ gata-hriyo gadayā drāvitās te
analyzed: ete vayam nyāsa harāḥ rasaukasām gata hriyaḥ gadayā drāvitāḥ te

original: BhP_03.18.011/2 tiṣṭhāmahe 'thāpi kathañcid ājau stheyaṃ kva yāmo balinotpādya vairam
analyzed: tiṣṭhāmahe thā api kathañcid ājau stheyam kva yāmaḥ balinā utpādya vairam

original: BhP_03.18.012/1 tvaṃ pad-rathānāṃ kila yūthapādhipo ghaṭasva no 'svastaya āśv anūhaḥ
analyzed: tvam pad rathānām kila yūthapa adhipaḥ ghaṭasva no svastaye āśu anūhaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.012/2 saṃsthāpya cāsmān pramṛjāśru svakānāṃ yaḥ svāṃ pratijñāṃ nātipiparty asabhyaḥ
analyzed: saṃsthāpya ca asmān pramṛja aśru svakānām yaḥ svām pratijñām na atipiparti asabhyaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.013/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.18.013/1 so 'dhikṣipto bhagavatā pralabdhaś ca ruṣā bhṛśam
analyzed: saḥ dhikṣiptaḥ bhagavatā pralabdhaḥ ca ruṣā bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.18.013/2 ājahārolbaṇaṃ krodhaṃ krīḍyamāno 'hi-rāḍ iva
analyzed: ājahāra ulbaṇam krodham krīḍyamānaḥ hirāj iva

original: BhP_03.18.014/1 sṛjann amarṣitaḥ śvāsān manyu-pracalitendriyaḥ
analyzed: sṛjan amarṣitaḥ śvāsān manyu pracalita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.014/2 āsādya tarasā daityo gadayā nyahanad dharim
analyzed: āsādya tarasā daityaḥ gadayā nyahanat harim

original: BhP_03.18.015/1 bhagavāṃs tu gadā-vegaṃ visṛṣṭaṃ ripuṇorasi
analyzed: bhagavān tu gadā vegam visṛṣṭam ripuṇā urasi

original: BhP_03.18.015/2 avañcayat tiraścīno yogārūḍha ivāntakam
analyzed: avañcayat tiraścīnaḥ yoga ārūḍhaḥ iva antakam

original: BhP_03.18.016/1 punar gadāṃ svām ādāya bhrāmayantam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: punar gadām svām ādāya bhrāmayantam abhīkṣṇaśas

original: BhP_03.18.016/2 abhyadhāvad dhariḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrambhād daṣṭa-dacchadam
analyzed: abhyadhāvat hariḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrambhāt daṣṭa dacchadam

original: BhP_03.18.017/1 tataś ca gadayārātiṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ bhruvi prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas ca gadayā arātim dakṣiṇasyām bhruvi prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.18.017/2 ājaghne sa tu tāṃ saumya gadayā kovido 'hanat
analyzed: ājaghne sa tu tām saumya gadayā kovidaḥ hanat

original: BhP_03.18.018/1 evaṃ gadābhyāṃ gurvībhyāṃ haryakṣo harir eva ca
analyzed: evam gadābhyām gurvībhyām haryakṣaḥ hariḥ eva ca

original: BhP_03.18.018/2 jigīṣayā susaṃrabdhāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
analyzed: jigīṣayā su saṃrabdhau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ

original: BhP_03.18.019/1 tayoḥ spṛdhos tigma-gadāhatāṅgayoḥ kṣatāsrava-ghrāṇa-vivṛddha-manyvoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ spṛdhoḥ tigma gadā hata aṅgayoḥ kṣata āsrava ghrāṇa vivṛddha manyvoḥ

original: BhP_03.18.019/2 vicitra-mārgāṃś carator jigīṣayā vyabhād ilāyām iva śuṣmiṇor mṛdhaḥ
analyzed: vicitra mārgān caratoḥ jigīṣayā vyabhāt ilāyām iva śuṣmiṇoḥ mṛdhaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.020/1 daityasya yajñāvayavasya māyā- gṛhīta-vārāha-tanor mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: daityasya yajña avayavasya māyā gṛhīta vārāha tanoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.020/2 kauravya mahyāṃ dviṣator vimardanaṃ didṛkṣur āgād ṛṣibhir vṛtaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: kauravya mahyām dviṣatoḥ vimardanam didṛkṣuḥ āgāt ṛṣibhiḥ vṛtaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_03.18.021/1 āsanna-śauṇḍīram apeta-sādhvasaṃ kṛta-pratīkāram ahārya-vikramam
analyzed: āsanna śauṇḍīram apeta sādhvasam kṛta pratīkāram a hārya vikramam

original: BhP_03.18.021/2 vilakṣya daityaṃ bhagavān sahasra-ṇīr jagāda nārāyaṇam ādi-sūkaram
analyzed: vilakṣya daityam bhagavān sahasraṇīḥ jagāda nārāyaṇam ādi sūkaram

original: BhP_03.18.022/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.18.022/1 eṣa te deva devānām aṅghri-mūlam upeyuṣām
analyzed: eṣa te deva devānām aṅghri mūlam upeyuṣām

original: BhP_03.18.022/2 viprāṇāṃ saurabheyīṇāṃ bhūtānām apy anāgasām
analyzed: viprāṇām saurabheyīṇām bhūtānām api anāgasām

original: BhP_03.18.023/1 āgas-kṛd bhaya-kṛd duṣkṛd asmad-rāddha-varo 'suraḥ
analyzed: āgaskṛt bhaya kṛt duṣkṛt suraḥ

original: BhP_03.18.023/2 anveṣann apratiratho lokān aṭati kaṇṭakaḥ
analyzed: anveṣan apratirathaḥ lokān aṭati kaṇṭakaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.024/1 mainaṃ māyāvinaṃ dṛptaṃ niraṅkuśam asattamam
analyzed: mā enam māyāvinam dṛptam niraṅkuśam asattamam

original: BhP_03.18.024/2 ākrīḍa bālavad deva yathāśīviṣam utthitam
analyzed: ākrīḍa bāla vat deva yathā āśīviṣam utthitam

original: BhP_03.18.025/1 na yāvad eṣa vardheta svāṃ velāṃ prāpya dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: na yāvat eṣa vardheta svām velām prāpya dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.18.025/2 svāṃ deva māyām āsthāya tāvaj jahy agham acyuta
analyzed: svām deva māyām āsthāya tāvat jahi agham acyuta

original: BhP_03.18.026/1 eṣā ghoratamā sandhyā loka-cchambaṭ-karī prabho
analyzed: eṣā ghoratamā sandhyā loka chambaṭkarī prabho

original: BhP_03.18.026/2 upasarpati sarvātman surāṇāṃ jayam āvaha
analyzed: upasarpati sarvātman surāṇām jayam āvaha

original: BhP_03.18.027/1 adhunaiṣo 'bhijin nāma yogo mauhūrtiko hy agāt
analyzed: adhunā eṣaḥ bhijit nāma yogaḥ mauhūrtikaḥ hi agāt

original: BhP_03.18.027/2 śivāya nas tvaṃ suhṛdām āśu nistara dustaram
analyzed: śivāya naḥ tvam suhṛdām āśu nistara dustaram

original: BhP_03.18.028/1 diṣṭyā tvāṃ vihitaṃ mṛtyum ayam āsāditaḥ svayam
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvām vihitam mṛtyum ayam āsāditaḥ svayam

original: BhP_03.18.028/2 vikramyainaṃ mṛdhe hatvā lokān ādhehi śarmaṇi
analyzed: vikramya enam mṛdhe hatvā lokān ādhehi śarmaṇi

original: BhP_03.19.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.19.001/1 avadhārya viriñcasya nirvyalīkāmṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: avadhārya viriñcasya nirvyalīka amṛtam vacaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.001/2 prahasya prema-garbheṇa tad apāṅgena so 'grahīt
analyzed: prahasya prema garbheṇa tat apāṅgena saḥ grahīt

original: BhP_03.19.002/1 tataḥ sapatnaṃ mukhataś carantam akuto-bhayam
analyzed: tatas sapatnam mukhatas carantam akutobhayam

original: BhP_03.19.002/2 jaghānotpatya gadayā hanāv asuram akṣajaḥ
analyzed: jaghāna utpatya gadayā hanau asuram akṣajaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.003/1 sā hatā tena gadayā vihatā bhagavat-karāt
analyzed: sā hatā tena gadayā vihatā bhagavat karāt

original: BhP_03.19.003/2 vighūrṇitāpatad reje tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: vighūrṇitā apatat reje tat adbhutam iva abhavat

original: BhP_03.19.004/1 sa tadā labdha-tīrtho 'pi na babādhe nirāyudham
analyzed: sa tadā labdhatīrthaḥ na babādhe nirāyudham

original: BhP_03.19.004/2 mānayan sa mṛdhe dharmaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ prakopayan
analyzed: mānayan sa mṛdhe dharmam viṣvaksenam prakopayan

original: BhP_03.19.005/1 gadāyām apaviddhāyāṃ hāhā-kāre vinirgate
analyzed: gadāyām apaviddhāyām hāhākāre vinirgate

original: BhP_03.19.005/2 mānayām āsa tad-dharmaṃ sunābhaṃ cāsmarad vibhuḥ
analyzed: mānayām āsa tad dharmam sunābham ca asmarat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.19.006/1 taṃ vyagra-cakraṃ diti-putrādhamena sva-pārṣada-mukhyena viṣajjamānam
analyzed: tam vyagra cakram diti putra adhamena sva pārṣada mukhyena viṣajjamānam

original: BhP_03.19.006/2 citrā vāco 'tad-vidāṃ khe-carāṇāṃ tatra smāsan svasti te 'muṃ jahīti
analyzed: citrāḥ vācaḥ tad vidām khecarāṇām tatra sma āsan svasti te mum jahi iti

original: BhP_03.19.007/1 sa taṃ niśāmyātta-rathāṅgam agrato vyavasthitaṃ padma-palāśa-locanam
analyzed: sa tam niśāmya ātta rathāṅgam agratas vyavasthitam padma palāśa locanam

original: BhP_03.19.007/2 vilokya cāmarṣa-pariplutendriyo ruṣā sva-danta-cchadam ādaśac chvasan
analyzed: vilokya ca āmarṣa paripluta indriyaḥ ruṣā sva dantacchadam ādaśat śvasan

original: BhP_03.19.008/1 karāla-daṃṣṭraś cakṣurbhyāṃ sañcakṣāṇo dahann iva
analyzed: karāla daṃṣṭraḥ cakṣurbhyām sañcakṣāṇaḥ dahan iva

original: BhP_03.19.008/2 abhiplutya sva-gadayā hato 'sīty āhanad dharim
analyzed: abhiplutya sva gadayā hataḥ sītī āhanat harim

original: BhP_03.19.009/1 padā savyena tāṃ sādho bhagavān yajña-sūkaraḥ
analyzed: savyena tām sādho bhagavān yajñasūkaraḥ

original: BhP_03.19.009/2 līlayā miṣataḥ śatroḥ prāharad vāta-raṃhasam
analyzed: līlayā miṣataḥ śatroḥ prāharat vāta raṃhasam

original: BhP_03.19.010/1 āha cāyudham ādhatsva ghaṭasva tvaṃ jigīṣasi
analyzed: āha ca āyudham ādhatsva ghaṭasva tvam jigīṣasi

original: BhP_03.19.010/2 ity uktaḥ sa tadā bhūyas tāḍayan vyanadad bhṛśam
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tadā bhūyas tāḍayan vyanadat bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.19.011/1 tāṃ sa āpatatīṃ vīkṣya bhagavān samavasthitaḥ
analyzed: tām saḥ āpatatīm vīkṣya bhagavān samavasthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.011/2 jagrāha līlayā prāptāṃ garutmān iva pannagīm
analyzed: jagrāha līlayā prāptām garutmān iva pannagīm

original: BhP_03.19.012/1 sva-pauruṣe pratihate hata-māno mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: sva pauruṣe pratihate hata mānaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: BhP_03.19.012/2 naicchad gadāṃ dīyamānāṃ hariṇā vigata-prabhaḥ
analyzed: na aicchat gadām dīyamānām hariṇā vigata prabhaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.013/1 jagrāha tri-śikhaṃ śūlaṃ jvalaj-jvalana-lolupam
analyzed: jagrāha tri śikham śūlam jvalat jvalana lolupam

original: BhP_03.19.013/2 yajñāya dhṛta-rūpāya viprāyābhicaran yathā
analyzed: yajñāya dhṛta rūpāya viprāya abhicaran yathā

original: BhP_03.19.014/1 tad ojasā daitya-mahā-bhaṭārpitaṃ cakāsad antaḥ-kha udīrṇa-dīdhiti
analyzed: tat ojasā daitya mahābhaṭa arpitam cakāsat antar khe udīrṇadīdhiti

original: BhP_03.19.014/2 cakreṇa ciccheda niśāta-neminā harir yathā tārkṣya-patatram ujjhitam
analyzed: cakreṇa ciccheda niśāta neminā hariḥ yathā tārkṣya patatram ujjhitam

original: BhP_03.19.015/1 vṛkṇe sva-śūle bahudhāriṇā hareḥ pratyetya vistīrṇam uro vibhūtimat
analyzed: vṛkṇe sva śūle bahu dhāriṇā hareḥ pratyetya vistīrṇam uraḥ vibhūtimat

original: BhP_03.19.015/2 pravṛddha-roṣaḥ sa kaṭhora-muṣṭinā nadan prahṛtyāntaradhīyatāsuraḥ
analyzed: pravṛddha roṣaḥ sa kaṭhora muṣṭinā nadan prahṛtya antaradhīyata asuraḥ

original: BhP_03.19.016/1 tenettham āhataḥ kṣattar bhagavān ādi-sūkaraḥ
analyzed: tena ittham āhataḥ kṣattar bhagavān ādi sūkaraḥ

original: BhP_03.19.016/2 nākampata manāk kvāpi srajā hata iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na akampata manāk kvāpi srajā hataḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.017/1 athorudhāsṛjan māyāṃ yoga-māyeśvare harau
analyzed: atha urudhā asṛjat māyām yoga māyā īśvare harau

original: BhP_03.19.017/2 yāṃ vilokya prajās trastā menire 'syopasaṃyamam
analyzed: yām vilokya prajāḥ trastāḥ menire sya upasaṃyamam

original: BhP_03.19.018/1 pravavur vāyavaś caṇḍās tamaḥ pāṃsavam airayan
analyzed: pravavuḥ vāyavaḥ caṇḍāḥ tamaḥ pāṃsavam airayan

original: BhP_03.19.018/2 digbhyo nipetur grāvāṇaḥ kṣepaṇaiḥ prahitā iva
analyzed: digbhyaḥ nipetuḥ grāvāṇaḥ kṣepaṇaiḥ prahitāḥ iva

original: BhP_03.19.019/1 dyaur naṣṭa-bhagaṇābhraughaiḥ sa-vidyut-stanayitnubhiḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ naṣṭa bhagaṇa abhra oghaiḥ sa vidyut stanayitnubhiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.019/2 varṣadbhiḥ pūya-keśāsṛg- viṇ-mūtrāsthīni cāsakṛt
analyzed: varṣadbhiḥ pūya keśa asṛj viṣ mūtra asthīni ca asakṛt

original: BhP_03.19.020/1 girayaḥ pratyadṛśyanta nānāyudha-muco 'nagha
analyzed: girayaḥ pratyadṛśyanta nānā āyudha mucaḥ nagha

original: BhP_03.19.020/2 dig-vāsaso yātudhānyaḥ śūlinyo mukta-mūrdhajāḥ
analyzed: digvāsasaḥ yātudhānyaḥ śūlinyaḥ mukta mūrdhajāḥ

original: BhP_03.19.021/1 bahubhir yakṣa-rakṣobhiḥ patty-aśva-ratha-kuñjaraiḥ
analyzed: bahubhiḥ yakṣa rakṣobhiḥ patti aśva ratha kuñjaraiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.021/2 ātatāyibhir utsṛṣṭā hiṃsrā vāco 'tivaiśasāḥ
analyzed: ātatāyibhiḥ utsṛṣṭāḥ hiṃsrāḥ vācaḥ tivaiśasāḥ

original: BhP_03.19.022/1 prāduṣkṛtānāṃ māyānām āsurīṇāṃ vināśayat
analyzed: prāduṣkṛtānām māyānām āsurīṇām vināśayat

original: BhP_03.19.022/2 sudarśanāstraṃ bhagavān prāyuṅkta dayitaṃ tri-pāt
analyzed: sudarśana astram bhagavān prāyuṅkta dayitam tripād

original: BhP_03.19.023/1 tadā diteḥ samabhavat sahasā hṛdi vepathuḥ
analyzed: tadā diteḥ samabhavat sahasā hṛdi vepathuḥ

original: BhP_03.19.023/2 smarantyā bhartur ādeśaṃ stanāc cāsṛk prasusruve
analyzed: smarantyāḥ bhartuḥ ādeśam stanāt ca asṛk prasusruve

original: BhP_03.19.024/1 vinaṣṭāsu sva-māyāsu bhūyaś cāvrajya keśavam
analyzed: vinaṣṭāsu sva māyāsu bhūyas ca āvrajya keśavam

original: BhP_03.19.024/2 ruṣopagūhamāno 'muṃ dadṛśe 'vasthitaṃ bahiḥ
analyzed: ruṣā upagūhamānaḥ mum dadṛśe vasthitam bahis

original: BhP_03.19.025/1 taṃ muṣṭibhir vinighnantaṃ vajra-sārair adhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: tam muṣṭibhiḥ vinighnantam vajrasāraiḥ adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.025/2 kareṇa karṇa-mūle 'han yathā tvāṣṭraṃ marut-patiḥ
analyzed: kareṇa karṇa mūle han yathā tvāṣṭram marutpatiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.026/1 sa āhato viśva-jitā hy avajñayā paribhramad-gātra udasta-locanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ āhataḥ viśvajitā hi avajñayā paribhramat gātraḥ udasta locanaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.026/2 viśīrṇa-bāhv-aṅghri-śiroruho 'patad yathā nagendro lulito nabhasvatā
analyzed: viśīrṇa bāhu aṅghri śiroruhaḥ patat yathā nagendraḥ lulitaḥ nabhasvatā

original: BhP_03.19.027/1 kṣitau śayānaṃ tam akuṇṭha-varcasaṃ karāla-daṃṣṭraṃ paridaṣṭa-dacchadam
analyzed: kṣitau śayānam tam akuṇṭha varcasam karāla daṃṣṭram paridaṣṭa dacchadam

original: BhP_03.19.027/2 ajādayo vīkṣya śaśaṃsur āgatā aho imaṃ ko nu labheta saṃsthitim
analyzed: aja ādayaḥ vīkṣya śaśaṃsuḥ āgatāḥ aho imam kaḥ nu labheta saṃsthitim

original: BhP_03.19.028/1 yaṃ yogino yoga-samādhinā raho dhyāyanti liṅgād asato mumukṣayā
analyzed: yam yoginaḥ yoga samādhinā rahaḥ dhyāyanti liṅgāt asataḥ mumukṣayā

original: BhP_03.19.028/2 tasyaiṣa daitya-ṛṣabhaḥ padāhato mukhaṃ prapaśyaṃs tanum utsasarja ha
analyzed: tasya eṣa daitya ṛṣabhaḥ pada āhataḥ mukham prapaśyan tanum utsasarja ha

original: BhP_03.19.029/1 etau tau pārṣadāv asya śāpād yātāv asad-gatim
analyzed: etau tau pārṣadau asya śāpāt yātau asat gatim

original: BhP_03.19.029/2 punaḥ katipayaiḥ sthānaṃ prapatsyete ha janmabhiḥ
analyzed: punar katipayaiḥ sthānam prapatsyete ha janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.030/0 devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_03.19.030/1 namo namas te 'khila-yajña-tantave sthitau gṛhītāmala-sattva-mūrtaye
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te khila yajña tantave sthitau gṛhīta amala sattva mūrtaye

original: BhP_03.19.030/2 diṣṭyā hato 'yaṃ jagatām aruntudas tvat-pāda-bhaktyā vayam īśa nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā hataḥ yam jagatām tvad pāda bhaktyā vayam īśa nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_03.19.031/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.19.031/1 evaṃ hiraṇyākṣam asahya-vikramaṃ sa sādayitvā harir ādi-sūkaraḥ
analyzed: evam hiraṇyākṣam asahya vikramam sa sādayitvā hariḥ ādi sūkaraḥ

original: BhP_03.19.031/2 jagāma lokaṃ svam akhaṇḍitotsavaṃ samīḍitaḥ puṣkara-viṣṭarādibhiḥ
analyzed: jagāma lokam svam akhaṇḍita utsavam samīḍitaḥ puṣkara viṣṭara ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.032/1 mayā yathānūktam avādi te hareḥ kṛtāvatārasya sumitra ceṣṭitam
analyzed: mayā yathā anūktam avādi te hareḥ kṛta avatārasya sumitra ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_03.19.032/2 yathā hiraṇyākṣa udāra-vikramo mahā-mṛdhe krīḍanavan nirākṛtaḥ
analyzed: yathā hiraṇyākṣaḥ udāra vikramaḥ mahā mṛdhe krīḍana vat nirākṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.033/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.19.033/1 iti kauṣāravākhyātām āśrutya bhagavat-kathām
analyzed: iti kauṣārava ākhyātām āśrutya bhagavat kathām

original: BhP_03.19.033/2 kṣattānandaṃ paraṃ lebhe mahā-bhāgavato dvija
analyzed: kṣattā ānandam param lebhe mahā bhāgavataḥ dvija

original: BhP_03.19.034/1 anyeṣāṃ puṇya-ślokānām uddāma-yaśasāṃ satām
analyzed: anyeṣām puṇya ślokānām uddāma yaśasām satām

original: BhP_03.19.034/2 upaśrutya bhaven modaḥ śrīvatsāṅkasya kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: upaśrutya bhavet modaḥ śrīvatsa aṅkasya kim punar

original: BhP_03.19.035/1 yo gajendraṃ jhaṣa-grastaṃ dhyāyantaṃ caraṇāmbujam
analyzed: yaḥ gaja indram jhaṣa grastam dhyāyantam caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_03.19.035/2 krośantīnāṃ kareṇūnāṃ kṛcchrato 'mocayad drutam
analyzed: krośantīnām kareṇūnām kṛcchratas mocayat drutam

original: BhP_03.19.036/1 taṃ sukhārādhyam ṛjubhir ananya-śaraṇair nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: tam sukha ārādhyam ṛjubhiḥ ananya śaraṇaiḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.036/2 kṛtajñaḥ ko na seveta durārādhyam asādhubhiḥ
analyzed: kṛtajñaḥ kaḥ na seveta durārādhyam asādhubhiḥ

original: BhP_03.19.037/1 yo vai hiraṇyākṣa-vadhaṃ mahādbhutaṃ vikrīḍitaṃ kāraṇa-sūkarātmanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai hiraṇyākṣa vadham mahā adbhutam vikrīḍitam kāraṇa sūkara ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.19.037/2 śṛṇoti gāyaty anumodate 'ñjasā vimucyate brahma-vadhād api dvijāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇoti gāyati anumodate ñjasā vimucyate brahma vadhāt api dvijāḥ

original: BhP_03.19.038/1 etan mahā-puṇyam alaṃ pavitraṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ padam āyur-āśiṣām
analyzed: etat mahā puṇyam alam pavitram dhanyam yaśasyam padam āyuḥ āśiṣām

original: BhP_03.19.038/2 prāṇendriyāṇāṃ yudhi śaurya-vardhanaṃ nārāyaṇo 'nte gatir aṅga śṛṇvatām
analyzed: prāṇa indriyāṇām yudhi śaurya vardhanam nārāyaṇaḥ nte gatiḥ aṅga śṛṇvatām

original: BhP_03.20.001/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.20.001/1 mahīṃ pratiṣṭhām adhyasya saute svāyambhuvo manuḥ
analyzed: mahīm pratiṣṭhām adhyasya saute svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.001/2 kāny anvatiṣṭhad dvārāṇi mārgāyāvara-janmanām
analyzed: kāni anvatiṣṭhat dvārāṇi mārgāya avara janmanām

original: BhP_03.20.002/1 kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ kṛṣṇasyaikāntikaḥ suhṛt
analyzed: kṣattā mahā bhāgavataḥ kṛṣṇasya aikāntikaḥ suhṛd

original: BhP_03.20.002/2 yas tatyājāgrajaṃ kṛṣṇe sāpatyam aghavān iti
analyzed: yaḥ tatyāja agrajam kṛṣṇe sāpatyam aghavān iti

original: BhP_03.20.003/1 dvaipāyanād anavaro mahitve tasya dehajaḥ
analyzed: dvaipāyanāt an avaraḥ mahitve tasya dehajaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.003/2 sarvātmanā śritaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tat-parāṃś cāpy anuvrataḥ
analyzed: sarva ātmanā śritaḥ kṛṣṇam tad parān ca api anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_03.20.004/1 kim anvapṛcchan maitreyaṃ virajās tīrtha-sevayā
analyzed: kim anvapṛcchat maitreyam virajāḥ tīrtha sevayā

original: BhP_03.20.004/2 upagamya kuśāvarta āsīnaṃ tattva-vittamam
analyzed: upagamya kuśāvarte āsīnam tattva vittamam

original: BhP_03.20.005/1 tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ sūta pravṛttā hy amalāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ sūta pravṛttāḥ hi amalāḥ kathāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.005/2 āpo gāṅgā ivāgha-ghnīr hareḥ pādāmbujāśrayāḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ gāṅgāḥ iva agha ghnīḥ hareḥ pāda ambuja āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.006/1 tā naḥ kīrtaya bhadraṃ te kīrtanyodāra-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ kīrtaya bhadram te kīrtanya udāra karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.006/2 rasajñaḥ ko nu tṛpyeta hari-līlāmṛtaṃ piban
analyzed: rasajñaḥ kaḥ nu tṛpyeta hari līlā amṛtam piban

original: BhP_03.20.007/1 evam ugraśravāḥ pṛṣṭa ṛṣibhir naimiṣāyanaiḥ
analyzed: evam ugraśravāḥ pṛṣṭaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ naimiṣa ayanaiḥ

original: BhP_03.20.007/2 bhagavaty arpitādhyātmas tān āha śrūyatām iti
analyzed: bhagavati arpita adhyātmaḥ tān āha śrūyatām iti

original: BhP_03.20.008/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.20.008/1 harer dhṛta-kroḍa-tanoḥ sva-māyayā niśamya gor uddharaṇaṃ rasātalāt
analyzed: hareḥ dhṛta kroḍa tanoḥ sva māyayā niśamya goḥ uddharaṇam rasātalāt

original: BhP_03.20.008/2 līlāṃ hiraṇyākṣam avajñayā hataṃ sañjāta-harṣo munim āha bhārataḥ
analyzed: līlām hiraṇyākṣam avajñayā hatam sañjāta harṣaḥ munim āha bhārataḥ

original: BhP_03.20.009/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.20.009/1 prajāpati-patiḥ sṛṣṭvā prajā-sarge prajāpatīn
analyzed: prajāpati patiḥ sṛṣṭvā prajā sarge prajāpatīn

original: BhP_03.20.009/2 kim ārabhata me brahman prabrūhy avyakta-mārga-vit
analyzed: kim ārabhata me brahman prabrūhi avyakta mārga vid

original: BhP_03.20.010/1 ye marīcy-ādayo viprā yas tu svāyambhuvo manuḥ
analyzed: ye marīci ādayaḥ viprāḥ yaḥ tu svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.010/2 te vai brahmaṇa ādeśāt katham etad abhāvayan
analyzed: te vai brahmaṇaḥ ādeśāt katham etat abhāvayan

original: BhP_03.20.011/1 sa-dvitīyāḥ kim asṛjan svatantrā uta karmasu
analyzed: sa dvitīyāḥ kim asṛjan svatantrāḥ uta karmasu

original: BhP_03.20.011/2 āho svit saṃhatāḥ sarva idaṃ sma samakalpayan
analyzed: āho svid saṃhatāḥ sarve idam sma samakalpayan

original: BhP_03.20.012/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.20.012/1 daivena durvitarkyeṇa pareṇānimiṣeṇa ca
analyzed: daivena durvitarkyeṇa pareṇa animiṣeṇa ca

original: BhP_03.20.012/2 jāta-kṣobhād bhagavato mahān āsīd guṇa-trayāt
analyzed: jāta kṣobhāt bhagavataḥ mahān āsīt guṇa trayāt

original: BhP_03.20.013/1 rajaḥ-pradhānān mahatas tri-liṅgo daiva-coditāt
analyzed: rajaḥ pradhānāt mahataḥ triliṅgaḥ daiva coditāt

original: BhP_03.20.013/2 jātaḥ sasarja bhūtādir viyad-ādīni pañcaśaḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ sasarja bhūtādiḥ viyat ādīni pañcaśas

original: BhP_03.20.014/1 tāni caikaikaśaḥ sraṣṭum asamarthāni bhautikam
analyzed: tāni ca ekaikaśas sraṣṭum asamarthāni bhautikam

original: BhP_03.20.014/2 saṃhatya daiva-yogena haimam aṇḍam avāsṛjan
analyzed: saṃhatya daiva yogena haimam aṇḍam avāsṛjan
