original: BhP_03.20.015/1 so 'śayiṣṭābdhi-salile āṇḍakośo nirātmakaḥ
analyzed: saḥ śayiṣṭa abdhi salile āṇḍakośaḥ nirātmakaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.015/2 sāgraṃ vai varṣa-sāhasram anvavātsīt tam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: sāgram vai varṣa sāhasram anvavātsīt tam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.20.016/1 tasya nābher abhūt padmaṃ sahasrārkoru-dīdhiti
analyzed: tasya nābheḥ abhūt padmam

original: BhP_03.20.016/2 sarva-jīvanikāyauko yatra svayam abhūt svarāṭ
analyzed: sarva jīva nikāya okaḥ yatra svayam abhūt svarāj

original: BhP_03.20.017/1 so 'nuviṣṭo bhagavatā yaḥ śete salilāśaye
analyzed: saḥ nuviṣṭaḥ bhagavatā yaḥ śete salilāśaye

original: BhP_03.20.017/2 loka-saṃsthāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ nirmame saṃsthayā svayā
analyzed: loka saṃsthām yathā pūrvam nirmame saṃsthayā svayā

original: BhP_03.20.018/1 sasarja cchāyayāvidyāṃ pañca-parvāṇam agrataḥ
analyzed: sasarja chāyayā avidyām pañca parvāṇam agratas

original: BhP_03.20.018/2 tāmisram andha-tāmisraṃ tamo moho mahā-tamaḥ
analyzed: tāmisram andhatāmisram tamaḥ mohaḥ mahātamaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.019/1 visasarjātmanaḥ kāyaṃ nābhinandaṃs tamomayam
analyzed: visasarja ātmanaḥ kāyam na abhinandan tamaḥ mayam

original: BhP_03.20.019/2 jagṛhur yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi rātriṃ kṣut-tṛṭ-samudbhavām
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi rātrim kṣudh tṛṣ samudbhavām

original: BhP_03.20.020/1 kṣut-tṛḍbhyām upasṛṣṭās te taṃ jagdhum abhidudruvuḥ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛḍbhyām upasṛṣṭāḥ te tam jagdhum abhidudruvuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.020/2 mā rakṣatainaṃ jakṣadhvam ity ūcuḥ kṣut-tṛḍ-arditāḥ
analyzed: mā rakṣata enam jakṣadhvam iti ūcuḥ kṣuttṛṣ arditāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.021/1 devas tān āha saṃvigno mā māṃ jakṣata rakṣata
analyzed: devaḥ tān āha saṃvignaḥ mā mām jakṣata rakṣata

original: BhP_03.20.021/2 aho me yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi prajā yūyaṃ babhūvitha
analyzed: aho me yakṣa rakṣāṃsi prajā yūyam babhūvitha

original: BhP_03.20.022/1 devatāḥ prabhayā yā yā dīvyan pramukhato 'sṛjat
analyzed: devatāḥ prabhayā yāḥ yāḥ dīvyan pramukhatas sṛjat

original: BhP_03.20.022/2 te ahārṣur devayanto visṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ prabhām ahaḥ
analyzed: te ahārṣuḥ devayantaḥ visṛṣṭām tām prabhām ahar

original: BhP_03.20.023/1 devo 'devāñ jaghanataḥ sṛjati smātilolupān
analyzed: devaḥ devām jaghanatas sṛjati sma atilolupān

original: BhP_03.20.023/2 ta enaṃ lolupatayā maithunāyābhipedire
analyzed: te enam lolupa tayā maithunāya abhipedire

original: BhP_03.20.024/1 tato hasan sa bhagavān asurair nirapatrapaiḥ
analyzed: tatas hasan sa bhagavān asuraiḥ nirapatrapaiḥ

original: BhP_03.20.024/2 anvīyamānas tarasā kruddho bhītaḥ parāpatat
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ tarasā kruddhaḥ bhītaḥ parāpatat

original: BhP_03.20.025/1 sa upavrajya varadaṃ prapannārti-haraṃ harim
analyzed: saḥ upavrajya vara dam prapanna ārti haram harim

original: BhP_03.20.025/2 anugrahāya bhaktānām anurūpātma-darśanam
analyzed: anugrahāya bhaktānām anurūpa ātma darśanam

original: BhP_03.20.026/1 pāhi māṃ paramātmaṃs te preṣaṇenāsṛjaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: pāhi mām paramātman te preṣaṇena asṛjam prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.026/2 tā imā yabhituṃ pāpā upākrāmanti māṃ prabho
analyzed: tāḥ imāḥ yabhitum pāpāḥ upākrāmanti mām prabho

original: BhP_03.20.027/1 tvam ekaḥ kila lokānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ kleśa-nāśanaḥ
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ kila lokānām kliṣṭānām kleśa nāśanaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.027/2 tvam ekaḥ kleśadas teṣām anāsanna-padāṃ tava
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ kleśa daḥ teṣām anāsannapadām tava

original: BhP_03.20.028/1 so 'vadhāryāsya kārpaṇyaṃ viviktādhyātma-darśanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ vadhārya asya kārpaṇyam vivikta adhyātma darśanaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.028/2 vimuñcātma-tanuṃ ghorām ity ukto vimumoca ha
analyzed: vimuñca ātma tanum ghorām iti uktaḥ vimumoca ha

original: BhP_03.20.029/1 tāṃ kvaṇac-caraṇāmbhojāṃ mada-vihvala-locanām
analyzed: tām kvaṇat caraṇa ambhojām mada vihvala locanām

original: BhP_03.20.029/2 kāñcī-kalāpa-vilasad- dukūla-cchanna-rodhasam
analyzed: kāñcī kalāpa vilasat dukūla channa rodhasam

original: BhP_03.20.030/1 anyonya-śleṣayottuṅga- nirantara-payodharām
analyzed: anyonya śleṣayā uttuṅga nirantara payodharām

original: BhP_03.20.030/2 sunāsāṃ sudvijāṃ snigdha- hāsa-līlāvalokanām
analyzed: su nāsām su dvijām snigdha hāsa līlā avalokanām

original: BhP_03.20.031/1 gūhantīṃ vrīḍayātmānaṃ nīlālaka-varūthinīm
analyzed: gūhantīm vrīḍayā ātmānam nīla alaka varūthinīm

original: BhP_03.20.031/2 upalabhyāsurā dharma sarve sammumuhuḥ striyam
analyzed: upalabhya asurāḥ dharma sarve sammumuhuḥ striyam

original: BhP_03.20.032/1 aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho asyā navaṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho asyāḥ navam vayaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.032/2 madhye kāmayamānānām akāmeva visarpati
analyzed: madhye kāmayamānānām akāmā iva visarpati

original: BhP_03.20.033/1 vitarkayanto bahudhā tāṃ sandhyāṃ pramadākṛtim
analyzed: vitarkayantaḥ bahudhā tām sandhyām pramadā ākṛtim

original: BhP_03.20.033/2 abhisambhāvya viśrambhāt paryapṛcchan kumedhasaḥ
analyzed: abhisambhāvya viśrambhāt paryapṛcchan kumedhasaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.034/1 kāsi kasyāsi rambhoru ko vārthas te 'tra bhāmini
analyzed: kā asi kasya asi rambhā ūru kaḥ vā arthaḥ te bhāmini

original: BhP_03.20.034/2 rūpa-draviṇa-paṇyena durbhagān no vibādhase
analyzed: rūpa draviṇa paṇyena durbhagān naḥ vibādhase

original: BhP_03.20.035/1 yā vā kācit tvam abale diṣṭyā sandarśanaṃ tava
analyzed: yā vā kācid tvam abale diṣṭyā sandarśanam tava

original: BhP_03.20.035/2 utsunoṣīkṣamāṇānāṃ kanduka-krīḍayā manaḥ
analyzed: utsunoṣi īkṣamāṇānām kanduka krīḍayā manaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.036/1 naikatra te jayati śālini pāda-padmaṃ
analyzed: na ekatra te jayati śālini pāda padmam

original: BhP_03.20.036/2 ghnantyā muhuḥ kara-talena patat-pataṅgam
analyzed: ghnantyāḥ muhur kara talena patat pataṅgam

original: BhP_03.20.036/3 madhyaṃ viṣīdati bṛhat-stana-bhāra-bhītaṃ
analyzed: madhyam viṣīdati bṛhat stana bhāra bhītam

original: BhP_03.20.036/4 śānteva dṛṣṭir amalā suśikhā-samūhaḥ
analyzed: śāntā iva dṛṣṭiḥ amalā suśikhā samūhaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.037/1 iti sāyantanīṃ sandhyām asurāḥ pramadāyatīm
analyzed: iti sāyantanīm sandhyām asurāḥ pramadāyatīm

original: BhP_03.20.037/2 pralobhayantīṃ jagṛhur matvā mūḍha-dhiyaḥ striyam
analyzed: pralobhayantīm jagṛhuḥ matvā mūḍha dhiyaḥ striyam

original: BhP_03.20.038/1 prahasya bhāva-gambhīraṃ jighrantyātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: prahasya bhāvagambhīram jighranti ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_03.20.038/2 kāntyā sasarja bhagavān gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇān
analyzed: kāntyā sasarja bhagavān gandharva apsarasām gaṇān

original: BhP_03.20.039/1 visasarja tanuṃ tāṃ vai jyotsnāṃ kāntimatīṃ priyām
analyzed: visasarja tanum tām vai jyotsnām kāntimatīm priyām

original: BhP_03.20.039/2 ta eva cādaduḥ prītyā viśvāvasu-purogamāḥ
analyzed: te eva ca ādaduḥ prītyā viśvāvasu purogamāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.040/1 sṛṣṭvā bhūta-piśācāṃś ca bhagavān ātma-tandriṇā
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā bhūta piśācān ca bhagavān

original: BhP_03.20.040/2 dig-vāsaso mukta-keśān vīkṣya cāmīlayad dṛśau
analyzed: digvāsasaḥ muktakeśān vīkṣya ca āmīlayat dṛśau

original: BhP_03.20.041/1 jagṛhus tad-visṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ jṛmbhaṇākhyāṃ tanuṃ prabhoḥ
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ tad visṛṣṭām tām jṛmbhaṇa ākhyām tanum prabhoḥ

original: BhP_03.20.041/2 nidrām indriya-vikledo yayā bhūteṣu dṛśyate
analyzed: nidrām indriya vikledaḥ yayā bhūteṣu dṛśyate

original: BhP_03.20.041/3 yenocchiṣṭān dharṣayanti tam unmādaṃ pracakṣate
analyzed: yena ucchiṣṭān dharṣayanti tam unmādam pracakṣate

original: BhP_03.20.042/1 ūrjasvantaṃ manyamāna ātmānaṃ bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: ūrjasvantam manyamānaḥ ātmānam bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.042/2 sādhyān gaṇān pitṛ-gaṇān parokṣeṇāsṛjat prabhuḥ
analyzed: sādhyān gaṇān pitṛ gaṇān parokṣeṇa asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.043/1 ta ātma-sargaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ pitaraḥ pratipedire
analyzed: te ātma sargam tam kāyam pitaraḥ pratipedire

original: BhP_03.20.043/2 sādhyebhyaś ca pitṛbhyaś ca kavayo yad vitanvate
analyzed: sādhyebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ca kavayaḥ yat vitanvate

original: BhP_03.20.044/1 siddhān vidyādharāṃś caiva tirodhānena so 'sṛjat
analyzed: siddhān vidyādharān ca eva tirodhānena saḥ sṛjat

original: BhP_03.20.044/2 tebhyo 'dadāt tam ātmānam antardhānākhyam adbhutam
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dadāt tam ātmānam antardhāna ākhyam adbhutam

original: BhP_03.20.045/1 sa kinnarān kimpuruṣān pratyātmyenāsṛjat prabhuḥ
analyzed: sa kinnarān kimpuruṣān pratyātmyena asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.045/2 mānayann ātmanātmānam ātmābhāsaṃ vilokayan
analyzed: mānayan ātmanā ātmānam ātma ābhāsam vilokayan

original: BhP_03.20.046/1 te tu taj jagṛhū rūpaṃ tyaktaṃ yat parameṣṭhinā
analyzed: te tu tat jagṛhuḥ rūpam tyaktam yat parameṣṭhinā

original: BhP_03.20.046/2 mithunī-bhūya gāyantas tam evoṣasi karmabhiḥ
analyzed: mithunībhūya gāyantaḥ tam eva uṣasi karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.20.047/1 dehena vai bhogavatā śayāno bahu-cintayā
analyzed: dehena vai bhogavatā śayānaḥ bahu cintayā

original: BhP_03.20.047/2 sarge 'nupacite krodhād utsasarja ha tad vapuḥ
analyzed: sarge n upacite krodhāt utsasarja ha tat vapuḥ

original: BhP_03.20.048/1 ye 'hīyantāmutaḥ keśā ahayas te 'ṅga jajñire
analyzed: ye hīyanta amutas keśāḥ ahayaḥ te ṅga jajñire

original: BhP_03.20.048/2 sarpāḥ prasarpataḥ krūrā nāgā bhogoru-kandharāḥ
analyzed: sarpāḥ prasarpataḥ krūrāḥ nāgāḥ bhoga ūru kandharāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.049/1 sa ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṛta-kṛtyam ivātmabhūḥ
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam manyamānaḥ kṛtakṛtyam iva ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_03.20.049/2 tadā manūn sasarjānte manasā loka-bhāvanān
analyzed: tadā manūn sasarja ante manasā loka bhāvanān

original: BhP_03.20.050/1 tebhyaḥ so 'sṛjat svīyaṃ puraṃ puruṣam ātmavān
analyzed: tebhyaḥ saḥ sṛjat svīyam puram puruṣam ātmavān

original: BhP_03.20.050/2 tān dṛṣṭvā ye purā sṛṣṭāḥ praśaśaṃsuḥ prajāpatim
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā ye purā sṛṣṭāḥ praśaśaṃsuḥ prajāpatim

original: BhP_03.20.051/1 aho etaj jagat-sraṣṭaḥ sukṛtaṃ bata te kṛtam
analyzed: aho etat jagatsraṣṭar su kṛtam bata te kṛtam

original: BhP_03.20.051/2 pratiṣṭhitāḥ kriyā yasmin sākam annam adāma he
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitāḥ kriyāḥ yasmin sākam annam adāma he

original: BhP_03.20.052/1 tapasā vidyayā yukto yogena susamādhinā
analyzed: tapasā vidyayā yuktaḥ yogena susamādhinā

original: BhP_03.20.052/2 ṛṣīn ṛṣir hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasarjābhimatāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīn ṛṣiḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasarja abhimatāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.20.053/1 tebhyaś caikaikaśaḥ svasya dehasyāṃśam adād ajaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca ekaikaśas svasya dehasya aṃśam adāt ajaḥ

original: BhP_03.20.053/2 yat tat samādhi-yogarddhi- tapo-vidyā-viraktimat
analyzed: yat tat samādhi yoga ṛddhi tapaḥ vidyā viraktimat

original: BhP_03.21.001/0 vidura uvāca
analyzed: viduraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.001/1 svāyambhuvasya ca manor aṃśaḥ parama-sammataḥ
analyzed: svāyambhuvasya ca manoḥ aṃśaḥ parama sammataḥ

original: BhP_03.21.001/2 kathyatāṃ bhagavan yatra maithunenaidhire prajāḥ
analyzed: kathyatām bhagavan yatra maithunena edhire prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.21.002/1 priyavratottānapādau sutau svāyambhuvasya vai
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau sutau svāyambhuvasya vai

original: BhP_03.21.002/2 yathā-dharmaṃ jugupatuḥ sapta-dvīpavatīṃ mahīm
analyzed: yathādharmam jugupatuḥ sapta dvīpavatīm mahīm

original: BhP_03.21.003/1 tasya vai duhitā brahman devahūtīti viśrutā
analyzed: tasya vai duhitā brahman devahūtī iti viśrutā

original: BhP_03.21.003/2 patnī prajāpater uktā kardamasya tvayānagha
analyzed: patnī prajāpateḥ uktā kardamasya tvayā anagha

original: BhP_03.21.004/1 tasyāṃ sa vai mahā-yogī yuktāyāṃ yoga-lakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: tasyām sa vai mahā yogī yuktāyām yoga lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.004/2 sasarja katidhā vīryaṃ tan me śuśrūṣave vada
analyzed: sasarja katidhā vīryam tat me śuśrūṣave vada

original: BhP_03.21.005/1 rucir yo bhagavān brahman dakṣo vā brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: ruciḥ yaḥ bhagavān brahman dakṣaḥ vā brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.005/2 yathā sasarja bhūtāni labdhvā bhāryāṃ ca mānavīm
analyzed: yathā sasarja bhūtāni labdhvā bhāryām ca mānavīm

original: BhP_03.21.006/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.006/1 prajāḥ sṛjeti bhagavān kardamo brahmaṇoditaḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ sṛja iti bhagavān kardamaḥ brahmaṇā uditaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.006/2 sarasvatyāṃ tapas tepe sahasrāṇāṃ samā daśa
analyzed: sarasvatyām tapaḥ tepe sahasrāṇām samāḥ daśa

original: BhP_03.21.007/1 tataḥ samādhi-yuktena kriyā-yogena kardamaḥ
analyzed: tatas samādhi yuktena kriyā yogena kardamaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.007/2 samprapede hariṃ bhaktyā prapanna-varadāśuṣam
analyzed: samprapede harim bhaktyā prapanna varadā aśuṣam

original: BhP_03.21.008/1 tāvat prasanno bhagavān puṣkarākṣaḥ kṛte yuge
analyzed: tāvat prasannaḥ bhagavān puṣkarākṣaḥ kṛte yuge

original: BhP_03.21.008/2 darśayām āsa taṃ kṣattaḥ śābdaṃ brahma dadhad vapuḥ
analyzed: darśayām āsa tam kṣattar śābdam brahma dadhat vapuḥ

original: BhP_03.21.009/1 sa taṃ virajam arkābhaṃ sita-padmotpala-srajam
analyzed: sa tam virajam arka ābham sita padma utpala srajam

original: BhP_03.21.009/2 snigdha-nīlālaka-vrāta- vaktrābjaṃ virajo 'mbaram
BhP_03.21.010/1 kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharam
analyzed: kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: BhP_03.21.010/2 śvetotpala-krīḍanakaṃ manaḥ-sparśa-smitekṣaṇam
BhP_03.21.011/1 vinyasta-caraṇāmbhojam aṃsa-deśe garutmataḥ
analyzed: vinyasta caraṇa ambhojam aṃsa deśe garutmataḥ

original: BhP_03.21.011/2 dṛṣṭvā khe 'vasthitaṃ vakṣaḥ- śriyaṃ kaustubha-kandharam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā khe vasthitam vakṣaḥ śriyam kaustubha kandharam

original: BhP_03.21.012/1 jāta-harṣo 'patan mūrdhnā kṣitau labdha-manorathaḥ
analyzed: jāta harṣaḥ patan mūrdhnā kṣitau labdha manorathaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.012/2 gīrbhis tv abhyagṛṇāt prīti- svabhāvātmā kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ tu abhyagṛṇāt svabhāva ātmā kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_03.21.013/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.013/1 juṣṭaṃ batādyākhila-sattva-rāśeḥ sāṃsiddhyam akṣṇos tava darśanān naḥ
analyzed: juṣṭam bata adya akhila sattva rāśeḥ sāṃsiddhyam akṣṇoḥ tava darśanāt naḥ

original: BhP_03.21.013/2 yad-darśanaṃ janmabhir īḍya sadbhir āśāsate yogino rūḍha-yogāḥ
analyzed: yat darśanam janmabhiḥ īḍya sadbhiḥ āśāsate yoginaḥ rūḍha yogāḥ

original: BhP_03.21.014/1 ye māyayā te hata-medhasas tvat- pādāravindaṃ bhava-sindhu-potam
analyzed: ye māyayā te hatamedhasaḥ tvat pāda aravindam bhava sindhu potam

original: BhP_03.21.014/2 upāsate kāma-lavāya teṣāṃ rāsīśa kāmān niraye 'pi ye syuḥ
analyzed: upāsate kāma lavāya teṣām rāsi īśa kāmān niraye pi ye syuḥ

original: BhP_03.21.015/1 tathā sa cāhaṃ parivoḍhu-kāmaḥ samāna-śīlāṃ gṛhamedha-dhenum
analyzed: tathā sa ca aham parivoḍhu kāmaḥ samāna śīlām gṛhamedha dhenum

original: BhP_03.21.015/2 upeyivān mūlam aśeṣa-mūlaṃ durāśayaḥ kāma-dughāṅghripasya
analyzed: upeyivān mūlam aśeṣa mūlam durāśayaḥ kāmadughā aṅghripasya

original: BhP_03.21.016/1 prajāpates te vacasādhīśa tantyā lokaḥ kilāyaṃ kāma-hato 'nubaddhaḥ
analyzed: prajāpateḥ te vacasā adhīśa tantyā lokaḥ kila ayam kāma hataḥ nubaddhaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.016/2 ahaṃ ca lokānugato vahāmi baliṃ ca śuklānimiṣāya tubhyam
analyzed: aham ca loka anugataḥ vahāmi balim ca śukla animiṣāya tubhyam

original: BhP_03.21.017/1 lokāṃś ca lokānugatān paśūṃś ca hitvā śritās te caraṇātapatram
analyzed: lokān ca loka anugatān paśūn ca hitvā śritāḥ te caraṇa ātapatram

original: BhP_03.21.017/2 parasparaṃ tvad-guṇa-vāda-sīdhu- pīyūṣa-niryāpita-deha-dharmāḥ
analyzed: parasparam tvad guṇa vāda sīdhu pīyūṣa niryāpita deha dharmāḥ

original: BhP_03.21.018/1 na te 'jarākṣa-bhramir āyur eṣāṃ trayodaśāraṃ tri-śataṃ ṣaṣṭi-parva
analyzed: na te jarā akṣa bhramiḥ āyuḥ eṣām trayodaśa aram triśatam ṣaṣṭi parva

original: BhP_03.21.018/2 ṣaṇ-nemy ananta-cchadi yat tri-ṇābhi karāla-sroto jagad ācchidya dhāvat
analyzed: ṣaṣ nemi ananta chadi yat tri nābhi karāla srotaḥ jagat ācchidya dhāvat

original: BhP_03.21.019/1 ekaḥ svayaṃ san jagataḥ sisṛkṣayā- dvitīyayātmann adhi-yogamāyayā
analyzed: ekaḥ svayam san jagataḥ sisṛkṣayā dvitīyayā ātman adhi yogamāyayā

original: BhP_03.21.019/2 sṛjasy adaḥ pāsi punar grasiṣyase yathorṇa-nābhir bhagavan sva-śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: sṛjasi adaḥ pāsi punar grasiṣyase yathā ūrṇanābhiḥ bhagavan sva śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.020/1 naitad batādhīśa padaṃ tavepsitaṃ yan māyayā nas tanuṣe bhūta-sūkṣmam
analyzed: na etat bata adhīśa padam tava īpsitam yat māyayā naḥ tanuṣe bhūta sūkṣmam

original: BhP_03.21.020/2 anugrahāyāstv api yarhi māyayā lasat-tulasyā bhagavān vilakṣitaḥ
analyzed: anugrahāya astu api yarhi māyayā lasat tulasyā bhagavān vilakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.021/1 taṃ tvānubhūtyoparata-kriyārthaṃ sva-māyayā vartita-loka-tantram
analyzed: tam tvā anubhūtyā uparata kriyā artham sva māyayā vartita lokatantram

original: BhP_03.21.021/2 namāmy abhīkṣṇaṃ namanīya-pāda- sarojam alpīyasi kāma-varṣam
analyzed: namāmi abhīkṣṇam namanīya pāda sarojam alpīyasi kāma varṣam

original: BhP_03.21.022/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.022/1 ity avyalīkaṃ praṇuto 'bja-nābhas tam ābabhāṣe vacasāmṛtena
analyzed: iti avyalīkam praṇutaḥ bjanābhaḥ tam ābabhāṣe vacasā amṛtena

original: BhP_03.21.022/2 suparṇa-pakṣopari rocamānaḥ prema-smitodvīkṣaṇa-vibhramad-bhrūḥ
analyzed: suparṇa pakṣa upari rocamānaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.023/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.023/1 viditvā tava caityaṃ me puraiva samayoji tat
analyzed: viditvā tava caityam me purā eva tat

original: BhP_03.21.023/2 yad-artham ātma-niyamais tvayaivāhaṃ samarcitaḥ
analyzed: yad artham ātma niyamaiḥ tvayā eva aham samarcitaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.024/1 na vai jātu mṛṣaiva syāt prajādhyakṣa mad-arhaṇam
analyzed: na vai jātu mṛṣā eva syāt prajādhyakṣa mad arhaṇam

original: BhP_03.21.024/2 bhavad-vidheṣv atitarāṃ mayi saṅgṛbhitātmanām
analyzed: bhavadvidheṣu atitarām mayi saṅgṛbhita ātmanām

original: BhP_03.21.025/1 prajāpati-sutaḥ samrāṇ manur vikhyāta-maṅgalaḥ
BhP_03.21.025/2 brahmāvartaṃ yo 'dhivasan śāsti saptārṇavāṃ mahīm
analyzed: brahmāvartam yaḥ dhivasan śāsti sapta arṇavām mahīm

original: BhP_03.21.026/1 sa ceha vipra rājarṣir mahiṣyā śatarūpayā
analyzed: sa ca iha vipra rājarṣiḥ mahiṣyā śatarūpayā

original: BhP_03.21.026/2 āyāsyati didṛkṣus tvāṃ paraśvo dharma-kovidaḥ
analyzed: āyāsyati didṛkṣuḥ tvām paraśvas dharma kovidaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.027/1 ātmajām asitāpāṅgīṃ vayaḥ-śīla-guṇānvitām
analyzed: ātmajām asita apāṅgīm vayaḥ śīla guṇa anvitām

original: BhP_03.21.027/2 mṛgayantīṃ patiṃ dāsyaty anurūpāya te prabho
analyzed: mṛgayantīm patim dāsyati anurūpāya te prabho

original: BhP_03.21.028/1 samāhitaṃ te hṛdayaṃ yatremān parivatsarān
analyzed: samāhitam te hṛdayam yatra imān parivatsarān

original: BhP_03.21.028/2 sā tvāṃ brahman nṛpa-vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyati
analyzed: sā tvām brahman nṛpa vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyati

original: BhP_03.21.029/1 yā ta ātma-bhṛtaṃ vīryaṃ navadhā prasaviṣyati
analyzed: yā te ātma bhṛtam vīryam navadhā prasaviṣyati

original: BhP_03.21.029/2 vīrye tvadīye ṛṣaya ādhāsyanty añjasātmanaḥ
analyzed: vīrye tvadīye ṛṣayaḥ ādhāsyanti añjasā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.030/1 tvaṃ ca samyag anuṣṭhāya nideśaṃ ma uśattamaḥ
analyzed: tvam ca samyak anuṣṭhāya nideśam me uśattamaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.030/2 mayi tīrthī-kṛtāśeṣa- kriyārtho māṃ prapatsyase
analyzed: mayi tīrthīkṛta aśeṣa kriyā arthaḥ mām prapatsyase

original: BhP_03.21.031/1 kṛtvā dayāṃ ca jīveṣu dattvā cābhayam ātmavān
analyzed: kṛtvā dayām ca jīveṣu dattvā ca abhayam ātmavān

original: BhP_03.21.031/2 mayy ātmānaṃ saha jagad drakṣyasy ātmani cāpi mām
analyzed: mayi ātmānam saha jagat drakṣyasi ātmani ca api mām

original: BhP_03.21.032/1 sahāhaṃ svāṃśa-kalayā tvad-vīryeṇa mahā-mune
analyzed: saha aham sva aṃśakalayā tvad vīryeṇa mahā mune

original: BhP_03.21.032/2 tava kṣetre devahūtyāṃ praṇeṣye tattva-saṃhitām
analyzed: tava kṣetre devahūtyām praṇeṣye tattva saṃhitām

original: BhP_03.21.033/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.21.033/1 evaṃ tam anubhāṣyātha bhagavān pratyag-akṣajaḥ
analyzed: evam tam anubhāṣya atha bhagavān pratyak akṣajaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.033/2 jagāma bindusarasaḥ sarasvatyā pariśritāt
analyzed: jagāma bindusarasaḥ sarasvatyā pariśritāt

original: BhP_03.21.034/1 nirīkṣatas tasya yayāv aśeṣa- siddheśvarābhiṣṭuta-siddha-mārgaḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣataḥ tasya yayau aśeṣa siddha īśvara abhiṣṭuta siddha mārgaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.034/2 ākarṇayan patra-rathendra-pakṣair uccāritaṃ stomam udīrṇa-sāma
analyzed: ākarṇayan patraratha indra pakṣaiḥ uccāritam stomam udīrṇa sāma

original: BhP_03.21.035/1 atha samprasthite śukle kardamo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: atha samprasthite śukle kardamaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.035/2 āste sma bindusarasi taṃ kālaṃ pratipālayan
analyzed: āste sma bindusarasi tam kālam pratipālayan

original: BhP_03.21.036/1 manuḥ syandanam āsthāya śātakaumbha-paricchadam
analyzed: manuḥ syandanam āsthāya śātakaumbha paricchadam

original: BhP_03.21.036/2 āropya svāṃ duhitaraṃ sa-bhāryaḥ paryaṭan mahīm
analyzed: āropya svām duhitaram sa bhāryaḥ paryaṭan mahīm

original: BhP_03.21.037/1 tasmin sudhanvann ahani bhagavān yat samādiśat
analyzed: tasmin sudhanvan ahani bhagavān yat samādiśat

original: BhP_03.21.037/2 upāyād āśrama-padaṃ muneḥ śānta-vratasya tat
analyzed: upāyāt āśrama padam muneḥ śānta vratasya tat

original: BhP_03.21.038/1 yasmin bhagavato netrān nyapatann aśru-bindavaḥ
analyzed: yasmin bhagavataḥ netrāt nyapatan aśru bindavaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.038/2 kṛpayā samparītasya prapanne 'rpitayā bhṛśam
analyzed: kṛpayā samparītasya prapanne rpitayā bhṛśam

original: BhP_03.21.039/1 tad vai bindusaro nāma sarasvatyā pariplutam
analyzed: tat vai bindusaraḥ nāma sarasvatyā pariplutam

original: BhP_03.21.039/2 puṇyaṃ śivāmṛta-jalaṃ maharṣi-gaṇa-sevitam
analyzed: puṇyam śivāmṛta jalam mahā ṛṣi gaṇa sevitam

original: BhP_03.21.040/1 puṇya-druma-latā-jālaiḥ kūjat-puṇya-mṛga-dvijaiḥ
analyzed: puṇya druma latā jālaiḥ kūjat puṇya mṛga dvijaiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.040/2 sarvartu-phala-puṣpāḍhyaṃ vana-rāji-śriyānvitam
analyzed: sarva ṛtu phala puṣpa āḍhyam vana rāji śriyā anvitam

original: BhP_03.21.041/1 matta-dvija-gaṇair ghuṣṭaṃ matta-bhramara-vibhramam
analyzed: matta dvija gaṇaiḥ ghuṣṭam matta bhramara vibhramam

original: BhP_03.21.041/2 matta-barhi-naṭāṭopam āhvayan-matta-kokilam
analyzed: matta barhi naṭa āṭopam āhvayat matta kokilam

original: BhP_03.21.042/1 kadamba-campakāśoka- karañja-bakulāsanaiḥ
BhP_03.21.042/2 kunda-mandāra-kuṭajaiś cūta-potair alaṅkṛtam
analyzed: kunda mandāra kuṭajaiḥ cūta potaiḥ alaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_03.21.043/1 kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavair haṃsaiḥ kurarair jala-kukkuṭaiḥ
analyzed: kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavaiḥ haṃsaiḥ kuraraiḥ jalakukkuṭaiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.043/2 sārasaiś cakravākaiś ca cakorair valgu kūjitam
analyzed: sārasaiḥ cakravākaiḥ ca cakoraiḥ valgu kūjitam

original: BhP_03.21.044/1 tathaiva hariṇaiḥ kroḍaiḥ śvāvid-gavaya-kuñjaraiḥ
analyzed: tathā eva hariṇaiḥ kroḍaiḥ śvāvidh gavaya kuñjaraiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.044/2 gopucchair haribhir markair nakulair nābhibhir vṛtam
analyzed: go pucchaiḥ haribhiḥ markaiḥ nakulaiḥ nābhibhiḥ vṛtam

original: BhP_03.21.045/1 praviśya tat tīrtha-varam ādi-rājaḥ sahātmajaḥ
analyzed: praviśya tat tīrtha varam ādirājaḥ saha ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.045/2 dadarśa munim āsīnaṃ tasmin huta-hutāśanam
analyzed: dadarśa munim āsīnam tasmin huta hutāśanam

original: BhP_03.21.046/1 vidyotamānaṃ vapuṣā tapasy ugra-yujā ciram
analyzed: vidyotamānam vapuṣā tapasi ugra yujā ciram

original: BhP_03.21.046/2 nātikṣāmaṃ bhagavataḥ snigdhāpāṅgāvalokanāt
analyzed: na ati kṣāmam bhagavataḥ snigdha apāṅga avalokanāt

original: BhP_03.21.046/3 tad-vyāhṛtāmṛta-kalā- pīyūṣa-śravaṇena ca
analyzed: tad vyāhṛta amṛta kalā pīyūṣa śravaṇena ca

original: BhP_03.21.047/1 prāṃśuṃ padma-palāśākṣaṃ jaṭilaṃ cīra-vāsasam
analyzed: prāṃśum padma palāśa akṣam jaṭilam cīra vāsasam

original: BhP_03.21.047/2 upasaṃśritya malinaṃ yathārhaṇam asaṃskṛtam
analyzed: upasaṃśritya malinam yathārhaṇam a saṃskṛtam

original: BhP_03.21.048/1 athoṭajam upāyātaṃ nṛdevaṃ praṇataṃ puraḥ
analyzed: atha uṭajam upāyātam nṛdevam praṇatam puras

original: BhP_03.21.048/2 saparyayā paryagṛhṇāt pratinandyānurūpayā
analyzed: saparyayā paryagṛhṇāt pratinandya anurūpayā

original: BhP_03.21.049/1 gṛhītārhaṇam āsīnaṃ saṃyataṃ prīṇayan muniḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta arhaṇam āsīnam saṃyatam prīṇayan muniḥ

original: BhP_03.21.049/2 smaran bhagavad-ādeśam ity āha ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: smaran bhagavat ādeśam iti āha ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_03.21.050/1 nūnaṃ caṅkramaṇaṃ deva satāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya te
analyzed: nūnam caṅkramaṇam deva satām saṃrakṣaṇāya te

original: BhP_03.21.050/2 vadhāya cāsatāṃ yas tvaṃ hareḥ śaktir hi pālinī
analyzed: vadhāya ca asatām yaḥ tvam hareḥ śaktiḥ hi pālinī

original: BhP_03.21.051/1 yo 'rkendv-agnīndra-vāyūnāṃ yama-dharma-pracetasām
analyzed: yaḥ rka indu agni indra vāyūnām yama dharma pracetasām

original: BhP_03.21.051/2 rūpāṇi sthāna ādhatse tasmai śuklāya te namaḥ
analyzed: rūpāṇi sthāne ādhatse tasmai śuklāya te namaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.052/1 na yadā ratham āsthāya jaitraṃ maṇi-gaṇārpitam
analyzed: na yadā ratham āsthāya jaitram maṇi gaṇa arpitam

original: BhP_03.21.052/2 visphūrjac-caṇḍa-kodaṇḍo rathena trāsayann aghān
analyzed: visphūrjat caṇḍa kodaṇḍaḥ rathena trāsayan aghān

original: BhP_03.21.053/1 sva-sainya-caraṇa-kṣuṇṇaṃ vepayan maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: sva sainya caraṇa kṣuṇṇam vepayan maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_03.21.053/2 vikarṣan bṛhatīṃ senāṃ paryaṭasy aṃśumān iva
analyzed: vikarṣan bṛhatīm senām paryaṭasi aṃśumān iva

original: BhP_03.21.054/1 tadaiva setavaḥ sarve varṇāśrama-nibandhanāḥ
analyzed: tadā eva setavaḥ sarve varṇa āśrama nibandhanāḥ

original: BhP_03.21.054/2 bhagavad-racitā rājan bhidyeran bata dasyubhiḥ
analyzed: bhagavat racitāḥ rājan bhidyeran bata dasyubhiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.055/1 adharmaś ca samedheta lolupair vyaṅkuśair nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: adharmaḥ ca samedheta lolupaiḥ vyaṅkuśaiḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_03.21.055/2 śayāne tvayi loko 'yaṃ dasyu-grasto vinaṅkṣyati
analyzed: śayāne tvayi lokaḥ yam dasyu grastaḥ vinaṅkṣyati

original: BhP_03.21.056/1 athāpi pṛcche tvāṃ vīra yad-arthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ
analyzed: atha api pṛcche tvām vīra yad artham tvam iha āgataḥ

original: BhP_03.21.056/2 tad vayaṃ nirvyalīkena pratipadyāmahe hṛdā
analyzed: tat vayam nirvyalīkena pratipadyāmahe hṛdā

original: BhP_03.22.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.22.001/1 evam āviṣkṛtāśeṣa- guṇa-karmodayo munim
analyzed: evam guṇa karma udayaḥ munim

original: BhP_03.22.001/2 savrīḍa iva taṃ samrāḍ upāratam uvāca ha
analyzed: sa vrīḍaḥ iva tam samrāj upāratam uvāca ha

original: BhP_03.22.002/0 manur uvāca
analyzed: manuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.22.002/1 brahmāsṛjat sva-mukhato yuṣmān ātma-parīpsayā
analyzed: brahmā asṛjat sva mukhataḥ yuṣmān ātma parīpsayā

original: BhP_03.22.002/2 chandomayas tapo-vidyā- yoga-yuktān alampaṭān
analyzed: chandaḥ mayaḥ tapaḥ vidyāḥ yoga yuktān alampaṭān

original: BhP_03.22.003/1 tat-trāṇāyāsṛjac cāsmān doḥ-sahasrāt sahasra-pāt
analyzed: tad trāṇāya asṛjat ca asmān dos sahasrāt sahasrapād

original: BhP_03.22.003/2 hṛdayaṃ tasya hi brahma kṣatram aṅgaṃ pracakṣate
analyzed: hṛdayam tasya hi brahma kṣatram aṅgam pracakṣate

original: BhP_03.22.004/1 ato hy anyonyam ātmānaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ ca rakṣataḥ
analyzed: atas hi anyonyam ātmānam brahma kṣatram ca rakṣataḥ

original: BhP_03.22.004/2 rakṣati smāvyayo devaḥ sa yaḥ sad-asad-ātmakaḥ
analyzed: rakṣati sma avyayaḥ devaḥ sa yaḥ sat asat ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.005/1 tava sandarśanād eva cchinnā me sarva-saṃśayāḥ
analyzed: tava sandarśanāt eva chinnāḥ me sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.005/2 yat svayaṃ bhagavān prītyā dharmam āha rirakṣiṣoḥ
analyzed: yat svayam bhagavān prītyā dharmam āha rirakṣiṣoḥ

original: BhP_03.22.006/1 diṣṭyā me bhagavān dṛṣṭo durdarśo yo 'kṛtātmanām
analyzed: diṣṭyā me bhagavān dṛṣṭaḥ durdarśaḥ kṛtātmanām

original: BhP_03.22.006/2 diṣṭyā pāda-rajaḥ spṛṣṭaṃ śīrṣṇā me bhavataḥ śivam
analyzed: diṣṭyā pāda rajaḥ spṛṣṭam śīrṣṇā me bhavataḥ śivam

original: BhP_03.22.007/1 diṣṭyā tvayānuśiṣṭo 'haṃ kṛtaś cānugraho mahān
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvayā anuśiṣṭaḥ ham kṛtaḥ ca anugrahaḥ mahān

original: BhP_03.22.007/2 apāvṛtaiḥ karṇa-randhrair juṣṭā diṣṭyośatīr giraḥ
analyzed: apāvṛtaiḥ karṇa randhraiḥ juṣṭāḥ diṣṭyā uśatīḥ giraḥ

original: BhP_03.22.008/1 sa bhavān duhitṛ-sneha- parikliṣṭātmano mama
analyzed: sa bhavān duhitṛ sneha parikliṣṭa ātmanaḥ mama

original: BhP_03.22.008/2 śrotum arhasi dīnasya śrāvitaṃ kṛpayā mune
analyzed: śrotum arhasi dīnasya śrāvitam kṛpayā mune

original: BhP_03.22.009/1 priyavratottānapadoḥ svaseyaṃ duhitā mama
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapadoḥ svasā iyam duhitā mama

original: BhP_03.22.009/2 anvicchati patiṃ yuktaṃ vayaḥ-śīla-guṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: anvicchati patim yuktam vayaḥ śīla guṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.22.010/1 yadā tu bhavataḥ śīla- śruta-rūpa-vayo-guṇān
analyzed: yadā tu bhavataḥ śīla śruta rūpa vayaḥ guṇān

original: BhP_03.22.010/2 aśṛṇon nāradād eṣā tvayy āsīt kṛta-niścayā
analyzed: aśṛṇot nāradāt eṣā tvayi āsīt kṛta niścayā

original: BhP_03.22.011/1 tat pratīccha dvijāgryemāṃ śraddhayopahṛtāṃ mayā
analyzed: tat pratīccha dvijāgrya imām śraddhayā upahṛtām mayā

original: BhP_03.22.011/2 sarvātmanānurūpāṃ te gṛhamedhiṣu karmasu
analyzed: sarva ātmanā anurūpām te gṛhamedhiṣu karmasu

original: BhP_03.22.012/1 udyatasya hi kāmasya prativādo na śasyate
analyzed: udyatasya hi kāmasya prativādaḥ na śasyate

original: BhP_03.22.012/2 api nirmukta-saṅgasya kāma-raktasya kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: api nirmukta saṅgasya kāma raktasya kim punar

original: BhP_03.22.013/1 ya udyatam anādṛtya kīnāśam abhiyācate
analyzed: yaḥ udyatam an ādṛtya kīnāśam abhiyācate

original: BhP_03.22.013/2 kṣīyate tad-yaśaḥ sphītaṃ mānaś cāvajñayā hataḥ
analyzed: kṣīyate tat yaśaḥ sphītam mānaḥ ca avajñayā hataḥ

original: BhP_03.22.014/1 ahaṃ tvāśṛṇavaṃ vidvan vivāhārthaṃ samudyatam
analyzed: aham tvā aśṛṇavam vidvan vivāha artham samudyatam

original: BhP_03.22.014/2 atas tvam upakurvāṇaḥ prattāṃ pratigṛhāṇa me
analyzed: atas tvam upakurvāṇaḥ prattām pratigṛhāṇa me

original: BhP_03.22.015/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.22.015/1 bāḍham udvoḍhu-kāmo 'ham aprattā ca tavātmajā
analyzed: bāḍham udvoḍhu kāmaḥ ham aprattā ca tava ātmajā

original: BhP_03.22.015/2 āvayor anurūpo 'sāv ādyo vaivāhiko vidhiḥ
analyzed: āvayoḥ sau ādyaḥ vaivāhikaḥ vidhiḥ

original: BhP_03.22.016/1 kāmaḥ sa bhūyān naradeva te 'syāḥ putryāḥ samāmnāya-vidhau pratītaḥ
analyzed: kāmaḥ sa bhūyāt naradeva te syāḥ putryāḥ samāmnāya vidhau pratītaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.016/2 ka eva te tanayāṃ nādriyeta svayaiva kāntyā kṣipatīm iva śriyam
analyzed: kaḥ eva te tanayām na ādriyeta svayā eva kāntyā kṣipatīm iva śriyam

original: BhP_03.22.017/1 yāṃ harmya-pṛṣṭhe kvaṇad-aṅghri-śobhāṃ vikrīḍatīṃ kanduka-vihvalākṣīm
analyzed: yām harmya pṛṣṭhe kvaṇat aṅghri śobhām vikrīḍatīm kanduka vihvala akṣīm

original: BhP_03.22.017/2 viśvāvasur nyapatat svād vimānād vilokya sammoha-vimūḍha-cetāḥ
analyzed: viśvāvasuḥ nyapatat svāt vimānāt vilokya sammoha vimūḍha cetāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.018/1 tāṃ prārthayantīṃ lalanā-lalāmam asevita-śrī-caraṇair adṛṣṭām
analyzed: tām prārthayantīm lalanā lalāmam a sevita śrī caraṇaiḥ adṛṣṭām

original: BhP_03.22.018/2 vatsāṃ manor uccapadaḥ svasāraṃ ko nānumanyeta budho 'bhiyātām
analyzed: vatsām manoḥ ucca padaḥ svasāram kaḥ nā anumanyeta budhaḥ bhiyātām

original: BhP_03.22.019/1 ato bhajiṣye samayena sādhvīṃ yāvat tejo bibhṛyād ātmano me
analyzed: atas bhajiṣye samayena sādhvīm yāvat tejaḥ bibhṛyāt ātmanaḥ me

original: BhP_03.22.019/2 ato dharmān pāramahaṃsya-mukhyān śukla-proktān bahu manye 'vihiṃsrān
analyzed: atas dharmān pāramahaṃsya mukhyān śukla proktān bahu manye vihiṃsrān

original: BhP_03.22.020/1 yato 'bhavad viśvam idaṃ vicitraṃ saṃsthāsyate yatra ca vāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: yatas bhavat viśvam idam vicitram saṃsthāsyate yatra ca vā avatiṣṭhate

original: BhP_03.22.020/2 prajāpatīnāṃ patir eṣa mahyaṃ paraṃ pramāṇaṃ bhagavān anantaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatīnām patiḥ eṣa mahyam param pramāṇam bhagavān anantaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.021/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.22.021/1 sa ugra-dhanvann iyad evābabhāṣe āsīc ca tūṣṇīm aravinda-nābham
analyzed: saḥ ugra dhanvan iyat eva ābabhāṣe āsīt ca tūṣṇīm aravinda nābham

original: BhP_03.22.021/2 dhiyopagṛhṇan smita-śobhitena mukhena ceto lulubhe devahūtyāḥ
analyzed: dhiyā upagṛhṇan smita śobhitena mukhena cetaḥ lulubhe devahūtyāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.022/1 so 'nu jñātvā vyavasitaṃ mahiṣyā duhituḥ sphuṭam
analyzed: saḥ nu jñātvā vyavasitam mahiṣyāḥ duhituḥ sphuṭam

original: BhP_03.22.022/2 tasmai guṇa-gaṇāḍhyāya dadau tulyāṃ praharṣitaḥ
analyzed: tasmai guṇa gaṇa āḍhyāya dadau tulyām praharṣitaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.023/1 śatarūpā mahā-rājñī pāribarhān mahā-dhanān
analyzed: śatarūpā mahā rājñī pāribarhān mahādhanān

original: BhP_03.22.023/2 dampatyoḥ paryadāt prītyā bhūṣā-vāsaḥ paricchadān
analyzed: dampatyoḥ paryadāt prītyā bhūṣā vāsaḥ paricchadān

original: BhP_03.22.024/1 prattāṃ duhitaraṃ samrāṭ sadṛkṣāya gata-vyathaḥ
analyzed: prattām duhitaram samrāj sadṛkṣāya gata vyathaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.024/2 upaguhya ca bāhubhyām autkaṇṭhyonmathitāśayaḥ
analyzed: upaguhya ca bāhubhyām autkaṇṭhya unmathita āśayaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.025/1 aśaknuvaṃs tad-virahaṃ muñcan bāṣpa-kalāṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: aśaknuvan tad viraham muñcan bāṣpa kalām muhur

original: BhP_03.22.025/2 āsiñcad amba vatseti netrodair duhituḥ śikhāḥ
analyzed: āsiñcat amba vatsa iti netra udaiḥ duhituḥ śikhāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.026/1 āmantrya taṃ muni-varam anujñātaḥ sahānugaḥ
analyzed: āmantrya tam muni varam anujñātaḥ saha anugaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.026/2 pratasthe ratham āruhya sabhāryaḥ sva-puraṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: pratasthe ratham āruhya sa bhāryaḥ sva puram nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.027/1 ubhayor ṛṣi-kulyāyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ surodhasoḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ ṛṣikulyāyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ surodhasoḥ

original: BhP_03.22.027/2 ṛṣīṇām upaśāntānāṃ paśyann āśrama-sampadaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām upaśāntānām paśyan āśrama sampadaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.028/1 tam āyāntam abhipretya brahmāvartāt prajāḥ patim
analyzed: tam āyāntam abhipretya brahmāvartāt prajāḥ patim

original: BhP_03.22.028/2 gīta-saṃstuti-vāditraiḥ pratyudīyuḥ praharṣitāḥ
analyzed: gīta saṃstuti vāditraiḥ pratyudīyuḥ praharṣitāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.029/1 barhiṣmatī nāma purī sarva-sampat-samanvitā
analyzed: barhiṣmatī nāma purī sarva sampad samanvitā

original: BhP_03.22.029/2 nyapatan yatra romāṇi yajñasyāṅgaṃ vidhunvataḥ
analyzed: nyapatan yatra romāṇi yajñasya aṅgam vidhunvataḥ

original: BhP_03.22.030/1 kuśāḥ kāśās ta evāsan śaśvad-dharita-varcasaḥ
analyzed: kuśāḥ kāśāḥ te eva āsan śaśvat harita varcasaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.030/2 ṛṣayo yaiḥ parābhāvya yajña-ghnān yajñam ījire
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ yaiḥ parābhāvya yajña ghnān yajñam ījire

original: BhP_03.22.031/1 kuśa-kāśamayaṃ barhir āstīrya bhagavān manuḥ
analyzed: kuśa kāśa mayam barhiḥ āstīrya bhagavān manuḥ

original: BhP_03.22.031/2 ayajad yajña-puruṣaṃ labdhā sthānaṃ yato bhuvam
analyzed: ayajat yajñapuruṣam labdhā sthānam yatas bhuvam

original: BhP_03.22.032/1 barhiṣmatīṃ nāma vibhur yāṃ nirviśya samāvasat
analyzed: barhiṣmatīm nāma vibhuḥ yām nirviśya samāvasat

original: BhP_03.22.032/2 tasyāṃ praviṣṭo bhavanaṃ tāpa-traya-vināśanam
analyzed: tasyām praviṣṭaḥ bhavanam tāpa traya vināśanam

original: BhP_03.22.033/1 sabhāryaḥ saprajaḥ kāmān bubhuje 'nyāvirodhataḥ
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ sa prajaḥ kāmān bubhuje

original: BhP_03.22.033/2 saṅgīyamāna-sat-kīrtiḥ sastrībhiḥ sura-gāyakaiḥ
analyzed: saṅgīya māna sat kīrtiḥ sa strībhiḥ sura gāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_03.22.033/3 praty-ūṣeṣv anubaddhena hṛdā śṛṇvan hareḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: pratyūṣeṣu anubaddhena hṛdā śṛṇvan hareḥ kathāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.034/1 niṣṇātaṃ yogamāyāsu muniṃ svāyambhuvaṃ manum
analyzed: niṣṇātam yoga māyāsu munim svāyambhuvam manum

original: BhP_03.22.034/2 yad ābhraṃśayituṃ bhogā na śekur bhagavat-param
analyzed: yat ābhraṃśayitum bhogāḥ na śekuḥ bhagavat param

original: BhP_03.22.035/1 ayāta-yāmās tasyāsan yāmāḥ svāntara-yāpanāḥ
analyzed: ayātayāmāḥ tasya āsan yāmāḥ sva antara yāpanāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.035/2 śṛṇvato dhyāyato viṣṇoḥ kurvato bruvataḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ dhyāyataḥ viṣṇoḥ kurvataḥ bruvataḥ kathāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.036/1 sa evaṃ svāntaraṃ ninye yugānām eka-saptatim
analyzed: saḥ evam sva antaram ninye yugānām ekasaptatim

original: BhP_03.22.036/2 vāsudeva-prasaṅgena paribhūta-gati-trayaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva prasaṅgena paribhūta gati trayaḥ

original: BhP_03.22.037/1 śārīrā mānasā divyā vaiyāse ye ca mānuṣāḥ
analyzed: śārīrāḥ mānasāḥ divyāḥ vaiyāse ye ca mānuṣāḥ

original: BhP_03.22.037/2 bhautikāś ca kathaṃ kleśā bādhante hari-saṃśrayam
analyzed: bhautikāḥ ca katham kleśāḥ bādhante hari saṃśrayam

original: BhP_03.22.038/1 yaḥ pṛṣṭo munibhiḥ prāha dharmān nānā-vidhān chubhān
analyzed: yaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ munibhiḥ prāha dharmān nānāvidhān śubhān

original: BhP_03.22.038/2 nṛṇāṃ varṇāśramāṇāṃ ca sarva-bhūta-hitaḥ sadā
analyzed: nṛṇām varṇa āśramāṇām ca sarva bhūta hitaḥ sadā

original: BhP_03.22.039/1 etat ta ādi-rājasya manoś caritam adbhutam
analyzed: etat te ādirājasya manoḥ caritam adbhutam

original: BhP_03.22.039/2 varṇitaṃ varṇanīyasya tad-apatyodayaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: varṇitam varṇanīyasya tad apatya udayam śṛṇu

original: BhP_03.23.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.23.001/1 pitṛbhyāṃ prasthite sādhvī patim iṅgita-kovidā
analyzed: pitṛbhyām prasthite sādhvī patim iṅgita kovidā

original: BhP_03.23.001/2 nityaṃ paryacarat prītyā bhavānīva bhavaṃ prabhum
analyzed: nityam paryacarat prītyā bhavānī iva bhavam prabhum

original: BhP_03.23.002/1 viśrambheṇātma-śaucena gauraveṇa damena ca
analyzed: viśrambheṇa ātma śaucena gauraveṇa damena ca

original: BhP_03.23.002/2 śuśrūṣayā sauhṛdena vācā madhurayā ca bhoḥ
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā sauhṛdena vācā madhurayā ca bhoḥ

original: BhP_03.23.003/1 visṛjya kāmaṃ dambhaṃ ca dveṣaṃ lobham aghaṃ madam
analyzed: visṛjya kāmam dambham ca dveṣam lobham agham madam

original: BhP_03.23.003/2 apramattodyatā nityaṃ tejīyāṃsam atoṣayat
analyzed: apramattā udyatā nityam tejīyāṃsam atoṣayat

original: BhP_03.23.004/1 sa vai devarṣi-varyas tāṃ mānavīṃ samanuvratām
analyzed: sa vai deva ṛṣi varyaḥ tām mānavīm samanuvratām

original: BhP_03.23.004/2 daivād garīyasaḥ patyur āśāsānāṃ mahāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: daivāt garīyasaḥ patyuḥ āśāsānām mahā āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.005/1 kālena bhūyasā kṣāmāṃ karśitāṃ vrata-caryayā
analyzed: kālena bhūyasā kṣāmām karśitām vrata caryayā

original: BhP_03.23.005/2 prema-gadgadayā vācā pīḍitaḥ kṛpayābravīt
analyzed: prema gadgadayā vācā pīḍitaḥ kṛpayā abravīt

original: BhP_03.23.006/0 kardama uvāca
analyzed: kardamaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.23.006/1 tuṣṭo 'ham adya tava mānavi mānadāyāḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ ham adya tava mānavi mānadāyāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.006/2 śuśrūṣayā paramayā parayā ca bhaktyā
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā paramayā parayā ca bhaktyā

original: BhP_03.23.006/3 yo dehinām ayam atīva suhṛt sa deho
analyzed: yaḥ dehinām ayam atīva suhṛd sa

original: BhP_03.23.006/4 nāvekṣitaḥ samucitaḥ kṣapituṃ mad-arthe
analyzed: na avekṣitaḥ samucitaḥ kṣapitum mad arthe

original: BhP_03.23.007/1 ye me sva-dharma-niratasya tapaḥ-samādhi-
analyzed: ye me svadharma niratasya tapaḥ samādhi

original: BhP_03.23.007/2 vidyātma-yoga-vijitā bhagavat-prasādāḥ
analyzed: vidyā ātma yoga vijitāḥ bhagavat prasādāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.007/3 tān eva te mad-anusevanayāvaruddhān
analyzed: tān eva te mad anusevanayā avaruddhān

original: BhP_03.23.007/4 dṛṣṭiṃ prapaśya vitarāmy abhayān aśokān
analyzed: dṛṣṭim prapaśya vitarāmi abhayān aśokān

original: BhP_03.23.008/1 anye punar bhagavato bhruva udvijṛmbha-
analyzed: anye punar bhagavataḥ bhruvaḥ udvijṛmbha

original: BhP_03.23.008/2 vibhraṃśitārtha-racanāḥ kim urukramasya
analyzed: vibhraṃśita artha racanāḥ kim urukramasya

original: BhP_03.23.008/3 siddhāsi bhuṅkṣva vibhavān nija-dharma-dohān
analyzed: siddhā asi bhuṅkṣva vibhavān nija dharma dohān

original: BhP_03.23.008/4 divyān narair duradhigān nṛpa-vikriyābhiḥ
analyzed: divyān naraiḥ duradhigān nṛpa vikriyābhiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.009/1 evaṃ bruvāṇam abalākhila-yogamāyā-
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam abala akhila yoga māyā

original: BhP_03.23.009/2 vidyā-vicakṣaṇam avekṣya gatādhir āsīt
analyzed: vidyā vicakṣaṇam avekṣya gata ādhiḥ āsīt

original: BhP_03.23.009/3 sampraśraya-praṇaya-vihvalayā gireṣad-
analyzed: sampraśraya praṇaya vihvalayā

original: BhP_03.23.009/4 vrīḍāvaloka-vilasad-dhasitānanāha
analyzed: vrīḍā avaloka vilasat hasita ānanā āha

original: BhP_03.23.010/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.23.010/1 rāddhaṃ bata dvija-vṛṣaitad amogha-yoga-
analyzed: rāddham bata dvija vṛṣa etat amogha yoga

original: BhP_03.23.010/2 māyādhipe tvayi vibho tad avaimi bhartaḥ
analyzed: māyā adhipe tvayi vibho tat avaimi bhartar

original: BhP_03.23.010/3 yas te 'bhyadhāyi samayaḥ sakṛd aṅga-saṅgo
analyzed: yaḥ te bhyadhāyi samayaḥ sakṛt aṅgasaṅgo

original: BhP_03.23.010/4 bhūyād garīyasi guṇaḥ prasavaḥ satīnām
analyzed: bhūyāt garīyasi guṇaḥ prasavaḥ satīnām

original: BhP_03.23.011/1 tatreti-kṛtyam upaśikṣa yathopadeśaṃ
analyzed: tatra iti kṛtyam upaśikṣa yathopadeśam

original: BhP_03.23.011/2 yenaiṣa me karśito 'tiriraṃsayātmā
analyzed: yena eṣa me karśitaḥ tiriraṃsayā ātmā

original: BhP_03.23.011/3 siddhyeta te kṛta-manobhava-dharṣitāyā
analyzed: siddhyeta te kṛta manobhava dharṣitāyā

original: BhP_03.23.011/4 dīnas tad īśa bhavanaṃ sadṛśaṃ vicakṣva
analyzed: dīnaḥ tat īśa bhavanam sadṛśam vicakṣva

original: BhP_03.23.012/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.23.012/1 priyāyāḥ priyam anvicchan kardamo yogam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: priyāyāḥ priyam anvicchan kardamaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.012/2 vimānaṃ kāma-gaṃ kṣattas tarhy evāviracīkarat
analyzed: vimānam kāma gam kṣattar tarhi eva a viracīkarat

original: BhP_03.23.013/1 sarva-kāma-dughaṃ divyaṃ sarva-ratna-samanvitam
analyzed: sarva kāma dugham divyam sarva ratna samanvitam

original: BhP_03.23.013/2 sarvarddhy-upacayodarkaṃ maṇi-stambhair upaskṛtam
analyzed: sarva ṛddhi upacaya udarkam maṇi stambhaiḥ upaskṛtam

original: BhP_03.23.014/1 divyopakaraṇopetaṃ sarva-kāla-sukhāvaham
analyzed: divya upakaraṇa upetam sarva kāla sukha āvaham

original: BhP_03.23.014/2 paṭṭikābhiḥ patākābhir vicitrābhir alaṅkṛtam
analyzed: paṭṭikābhiḥ patākābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ alaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_03.23.015/1 sragbhir vicitra-mālyābhir mañju-śiñjat-ṣaḍ-aṅghribhiḥ
analyzed: sragbhiḥ vicitra mālyābhiḥ mañju śiñjat ṣaṣ aṅghribhiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.015/2 dukūla-kṣauma-kauśeyair nānā-vastrair virājitam
analyzed: dukūla kṣauma kauśeyaiḥ nānā vastraiḥ virājitam

original: BhP_03.23.016/1 upary upari vinyasta- nilayeṣu pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: upari upari vinyasta nilayeṣu pṛthak pṛthak

original: BhP_03.23.016/2 kṣiptaiḥ kaśipubhiḥ kāntaṃ paryaṅka-vyajanāsanaiḥ
analyzed: kṣiptaiḥ kaśipubhiḥ kāntam paryaṅka vyajana āsanaiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.017/1 tatra tatra vinikṣipta- nānā-śilpopaśobhitam
analyzed: tatra tatra vinikṣipta nānā śilpa upaśobhitam

original: BhP_03.23.017/2 mahā-marakata-sthalyā juṣṭaṃ vidruma-vedibhiḥ
analyzed: mahā marakata sthalyā juṣṭam vidruma vedibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.018/1 dvāḥsu vidruma-dehalyā bhātaṃ vajra-kapāṭavat
analyzed: dvāḥsu vidruma dehalyā bhātam vajra kapāṭa vat

original: BhP_03.23.018/2 śikhareṣv indranīleṣu hema-kumbhair adhiśritam
analyzed: śikhareṣu indranīleṣu hema kumbhaiḥ adhiśritam

original: BhP_03.23.019/1 cakṣuṣmat padmarāgāgryair vajra-bhittiṣu nirmitaiḥ
analyzed: cakṣuṣmat padmarāga agryaiḥ vajra bhittiṣu nirmitaiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.019/2 juṣṭaṃ vicitra-vaitānair mahārhair hema-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭam vicitra vaitānaiḥ mahārhaiḥ hema toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.020/1 haṃsa-pārāvata-vrātais tatra tatra nikūjitam
analyzed: haṃsa pārāvata vrātaiḥ tatra tatra nikūjitam

original: BhP_03.23.020/2 kṛtrimān manyamānaiḥ svān adhiruhyādhiruhya ca
analyzed: kṛtrimān manyamānaiḥ svān adhiruhya adhiruhya ca

original: BhP_03.23.021/1 vihāra-sthāna-viśrāma- saṃveśa-prāṅgaṇājiraiḥ
BhP_03.23.021/2 yathopajoṣaṃ racitair vismāpanam ivātmanaḥ
analyzed: yathopajoṣam racitaiḥ vismāpanam iva ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.022/1 īdṛg gṛhaṃ tat paśyantīṃ nātiprītena cetasā
analyzed: īdṛś gṛham tat paśyantīm na ati prītena cetasā

original: BhP_03.23.022/2 sarva-bhūtāśayābhijñaḥ prāvocat kardamaḥ svayam
analyzed: sarva bhūta āśaya abhijñaḥ prāvocat kardamaḥ svayam

original: BhP_03.23.023/1 nimajjyāsmin hrade bhīru vimānam idam āruha
analyzed: nimajjya asmin hrade bhīru vimānam idam āruha

original: BhP_03.23.023/2 idaṃ śukla-kṛtaṃ tīrtham āśiṣāṃ yāpakaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: idam śukla kṛtam tīrtham āśiṣām yāpakam nṛṇām

original: BhP_03.23.024/1 sā tad bhartuḥ samādāya vacaḥ kuvalayekṣaṇā
analyzed: sā tat bhartuḥ samādāya vacaḥ kuvalaya īkṣaṇā

original: BhP_03.23.024/2 sarajaṃ bibhratī vāso veṇī-bhūtāṃś ca mūrdhajān
analyzed: sarajam bibhratī vāsaḥ veṇī bhūtān ca mūrdhajān

original: BhP_03.23.025/1 aṅgaṃ ca mala-paṅkena sañchannaṃ śabala-stanam
analyzed: aṅgam ca mala paṅkena sañchannam śabala stanam

original: BhP_03.23.025/2 āviveśa sarasvatyāḥ saraḥ śiva-jalāśayam
analyzed: āviveśa sarasvatyāḥ saraḥ śiva jalāśayam

original: BhP_03.23.026/1 sāntaḥ sarasi veśma-sthāḥ śatāni daśa kanyakāḥ
analyzed: sa antar sarasi veśma sthāḥ śatāni daśa kanyakāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.026/2 sarvāḥ kiśora-vayaso dadarśotpala-gandhayaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ kiśora vayasaḥ dadarśa utpala gandhayaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.027/1 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.027/2 vayaṃ karma-karīs tubhyaṃ śādhi naḥ karavāma kim
analyzed: vayam karma karīḥ tubhyam śādhi naḥ karavāma kim

original: BhP_03.23.028/1 snānena tāṃ mahārheṇa snāpayitvā manasvinīm
analyzed: snānena tām mahārheṇa snāpayitvā manasvinīm

original: BhP_03.23.028/2 dukūle nirmale nūtne dadur asyai ca mānadāḥ
analyzed: dukūle nirmale nūtne daduḥ asyai ca mānadāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.029/1 bhūṣaṇāni parārdhyāni varīyāṃsi dyumanti ca
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni parārdhyāni varīyāṃsi dyumanti ca

original: BhP_03.23.029/2 annaṃ sarva-guṇopetaṃ pānaṃ caivāmṛtāsavam
analyzed: annam sarva guṇa upetam pānam ca eva amṛta āsavam

original: BhP_03.23.030/1 athādarśe svam ātmānaṃ sragviṇaṃ virajāmbaram
analyzed: atha ādarśe svam ātmānam sragviṇam viraja ambaram

original: BhP_03.23.030/2 virajaṃ kṛta-svastyayanaṃ kanyābhir bahu-mānitam
analyzed: virajam kṛta svastyayanam kanyābhiḥ bahu mānitam

original: BhP_03.23.031/1 snātaṃ kṛta-śiraḥ-snānaṃ sarvābharaṇa-bhūṣitam
analyzed: snātam kṛta śiraḥsnānam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam

original: BhP_03.23.031/2 niṣka-grīvaṃ valayinaṃ kūjat-kāñcana-nūpuram
analyzed: niṣka grīvam valayinam kūjat kāñcana nūpuram

original: BhP_03.23.032/1 śroṇyor adhyastayā kāñcyā kāñcanyā bahu-ratnayā
analyzed: śroṇyoḥ adhyastayā kāñcyā kāñcanyā bahu ratnayā

original: BhP_03.23.032/2 hāreṇa ca mahārheṇa rucakena ca bhūṣitam
analyzed: hāreṇa ca mahārheṇa rucakena ca bhūṣitam

original: BhP_03.23.033/1 sudatā subhruvā ślakṣṇa- snigdhāpāṅgena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: su datā su bhruvā ślakṣṇa snigdha apāṅgena cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_03.23.033/2 padma-kośa-spṛdhā nīlair alakaiś ca lasan-mukham
analyzed: nīlaiḥ alakaiḥ ca lasat mukham

original: BhP_03.23.034/1 yadā sasmāra ṛṣabham ṛṣīṇāṃ dayitaṃ patim
analyzed: yadā sasmāra ṛṣabham ṛṣīṇām dayitam patim

original: BhP_03.23.034/2 tatra cāste saha strībhir yatrāste sa prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: tatra ca āste saha strībhiḥ yatra āste sa prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_03.23.035/1 bhartuḥ purastād ātmānaṃ strī-sahasra-vṛtaṃ tadā
analyzed: bhartuḥ purastāt ātmānam strī sahasra vṛtam tadā

original: BhP_03.23.035/2 niśāmya tad-yoga-gatiṃ saṃśayaṃ pratyapadyata
analyzed: niśāmya tad yoga gatim saṃśayam pratyapadyata

original: BhP_03.23.036/1 sa tāṃ kṛta-mala-snānāṃ vibhrājantīm apūrvavat
analyzed: sa tām kṛta mala snānām vibhrājantīm apūrvavat

original: BhP_03.23.036/2 ātmano bibhratīṃ rūpaṃ saṃvīta-rucira-stanīm
analyzed: ātmanaḥ bibhratīm rūpam saṃvīta rucira stanīm

original: BhP_03.23.037/1 vidyādharī-sahasreṇa sevyamānāṃ suvāsasam
analyzed: vidyādharī sahasreṇa sevyamānām su vāsasam

original: BhP_03.23.037/2 jāta-bhāvo vimānaṃ tad ārohayad amitra-han
analyzed: jāta bhāvaḥ vimānam tat ārohayat amitra han

original: BhP_03.23.038/1 tasminn alupta-mahimā priyayānurakto
analyzed: tasmin alupta mahimā priyayā anuraktaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.038/2 vidyādharībhir upacīrṇa-vapur vimāne
analyzed: vidyādharībhiḥ upacīrṇa vapuḥ vimāne

original: BhP_03.23.038/3 babhrāja utkaca-kumud-gaṇavān apīcyas
analyzed: babhrāje utkaca kumud gaṇavān apīcyaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.038/4 tārābhir āvṛta ivoḍu-patir nabhaḥ-sthaḥ
analyzed: tārābhiḥ āvṛtaḥ iva uḍupatiḥ nabhaḥ sthaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.039/1 tenāṣṭa-lokapa-vihāra-kulācalendra-
analyzed: tena aṣṭa lokapa vihāra kula acala indra

original: BhP_03.23.039/2 droṇīṣv anaṅga-sakha-māruta-saubhagāsu
analyzed: droṇīṣu anaṅga sakha māruta saubhagāsu

original: BhP_03.23.039/3 siddhair nuto dyudhuni-pāta-śiva-svanāsu
analyzed: siddhaiḥ nutaḥ dyu dhu nipāta śiva svanāsu

original: BhP_03.23.039/4 reme ciraṃ dhanadaval-lalanā-varūthī
analyzed: reme ciram

original: BhP_03.23.040/1 vaiśrambhake surasane nandane puṣpabhadrake
BhP_03.23.040/2 mānase caitrarathye ca sa reme rāmayā rataḥ
analyzed: mānase caitrarathye ca sa reme rāmayā rataḥ

original: BhP_03.23.041/1 bhrājiṣṇunā vimānena kāma-gena mahīyasā
analyzed: bhrājiṣṇunā vimānena kāmagena mahīyasā

original: BhP_03.23.041/2 vaimānikān atyaśeta caral lokān yathānilaḥ
analyzed: vaimānikān atyaśeta carat lokān yathā anilaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.042/1 kiṃ durāpādanaṃ teṣāṃ puṃsām uddāma-cetasām
analyzed: kim durāpādanam teṣām puṃsām uddāma cetasām

original: BhP_03.23.042/2 yair āśritas tīrtha-padaś caraṇo vyasanātyayaḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ āśritaḥ tīrtha padaḥ caraṇaḥ vyasana atyayaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.043/1 prekṣayitvā bhuvo golaṃ patnyai yāvān sva-saṃsthayā
analyzed: prekṣayitvā bhuvaḥ golam patnyai yāvān sva saṃsthayā

original: BhP_03.23.043/2 bahv-āścaryaṃ mahā-yogī svāśramāya nyavartata
analyzed: bahu āścaryam mahā yogī sva āśramāya nyavartata

original: BhP_03.23.044/1 vibhajya navadhātmānaṃ mānavīṃ suratotsukām
analyzed: vibhajya navadhā ātmānam mānavīm surata utsukām

original: BhP_03.23.044/2 rāmāṃ niramayan reme varṣa-pūgān muhūrtavat
analyzed: rāmām niramayan reme varṣa pūgān muhūrta vat

original: BhP_03.23.045/1 tasmin vimāna utkṛṣṭāṃ śayyāṃ rati-karīṃ śritā
analyzed: tasmin vimāne utkṛṣṭām śayyām rati karīm śritā

original: BhP_03.23.045/2 na cābudhyata taṃ kālaṃ patyāpīcyena saṅgatā
analyzed: na ca abudhyata tam kālam patyā āpīcyena saṅga tā

original: BhP_03.23.046/1 evaṃ yogānubhāvena dam-patyo ramamāṇayoḥ
analyzed: evam yoga anubhāvena dampatyoḥ ramamāṇayoḥ

original: BhP_03.23.046/2 śataṃ vyatīyuḥ śaradaḥ kāma-lālasayor manāk
analyzed: śatam vyatīyuḥ śaradaḥ kāma lālasayoḥ manāk

original: BhP_03.23.047/1 tasyām ādhatta retas tāṃ bhāvayann ātmanātma-vit
analyzed: tasyām ādhatta retaḥ tām bhāvayan ātmanā ātma vid

original: BhP_03.23.047/2 nodhā vidhāya rūpaṃ svaṃ sarva-saṅkalpa-vid vibhuḥ
analyzed: nodhāḥ vidhāya rūpam svam sarva saṅkalpa vid vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.23.048/1 ataḥ sā suṣuve sadyo devahūtiḥ striyaḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: atas sā suṣuve sadyas deva hūtiḥ striyaḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.048/2 sarvās tāś cāru-sarvāṅgyo lohitotpala-gandhayaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ cāru sarva aṅgyaḥ lohita utpala gandhayaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.049/1 patiṃ sā pravrajiṣyantaṃ tadālakṣyośatī bahiḥ
analyzed: patim sā pravrajiṣyantam tadā ālakṣya uśatī bahis

original: BhP_03.23.049/2 smayamānā viklavena hṛdayena vidūyatā
analyzed: smayamānā viklavena hṛdayena vidūyatā

original: BhP_03.23.050/1 likhanty adho-mukhī bhūmiṃ padā nakha-maṇi-śriyā
analyzed: likhantī adhomukhī bhūmim padā nakhamaṇi śriyā

original: BhP_03.23.050/2 uvāca lalitāṃ vācaṃ nirudhyāśru-kalāṃ śanaiḥ
analyzed: uvāca lalitām vācam nirudhya aśru kalām śanais

original: BhP_03.23.051/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.23.051/1 sarvaṃ tad bhagavān mahyam upovāha pratiśrutam
analyzed: sarvam tat bhagavān mahyam upovāha pratiśrutam

original: BhP_03.23.051/2 athāpi me prapannāyā abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
analyzed: atha api me prapannāyāḥ abhayam dātum arhasi

original: BhP_03.23.052/1 brahman duhitṛbhis tubhyaṃ vimṛgyāḥ patayaḥ samāḥ
analyzed: brahman duhitṛbhiḥ tubhyam vimṛgyāḥ patayaḥ samāḥ

original: BhP_03.23.052/2 kaścit syān me viśokāya tvayi pravrajite vanam
analyzed: kaścid syāt me viśokāya tvayi pravrajite vanam

original: BhP_03.23.053/1 etāvatālaṃ kālena vyatikrāntena me prabho
analyzed: etāvatā alam kālena vyatikrāntena me prabho

original: BhP_03.23.053/2 indriyārtha-prasaṅgena parityakta-parātmanaḥ
analyzed: indriya artha prasaṅgena parityakta parātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.054/1 indriyārtheṣu sajjantyā prasaṅgas tvayi me kṛtaḥ
analyzed: indriya artheṣu sajjantyā prasaṅgaḥ tvayi me kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.23.054/2 ajānantyā paraṃ bhāvaṃ tathāpy astv abhayāya me
analyzed: a jānantyā param bhāvam tathā api astu abhayāya me

original: BhP_03.23.055/1 saṅgo yaḥ saṃsṛter hetur asatsu vihito 'dhiyā
analyzed: saṅgaḥ yaḥ saṃsṛteḥ hetuḥ asatsu vihitaḥ dhiyā

original: BhP_03.23.055/2 sa eva sādhuṣu kṛto niḥsaṅgatvāya kalpate
analyzed: saḥ eva sādhuṣu kṛtaḥ niḥsaṅga tvāya kalpate

original: BhP_03.23.056/1 neha yat karma dharmāya na virāgāya kalpate
analyzed: na iha yat karma dharmāya na virāgāya kalpate

original: BhP_03.23.056/2 na tīrtha-pada-sevāyai jīvann api mṛto hi saḥ
analyzed: na tīrtha pada sevāyai jīvan api mṛtaḥ hi saḥ

original: BhP_03.23.057/1 sāhaṃ bhagavato nūnaṃ vañcitā māyayā dṛḍham
analyzed: sā aham bhagavataḥ nūnam vañcitā māyayā dṛḍham

original: BhP_03.23.057/2 yat tvāṃ vimuktidaṃ prāpya na mumukṣeya bandhanāt
analyzed: yat tvām vimukti dam prāpya na mumukṣeya bandhanāt

original: BhP_03.24.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.001/1 nirveda-vādinīm evaṃ manor duhitaraṃ muniḥ
analyzed: nirveda vādinīm evam manoḥ duhitaram muniḥ

original: BhP_03.24.001/2 dayāluḥ śālinīm āha śuklābhivyāhṛtaṃ smaran
analyzed: dayāluḥ śālinīm āha śukla abhivyāhṛtam smaran

original: BhP_03.24.002/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.002/1 mā khido rāja-putrīttham ātmānaṃ praty anindite
analyzed: mā khidaḥ rāja putri ittham ātmānam prati anindite

original: BhP_03.24.002/2 bhagavāṃs te 'kṣaro garbham adūrāt samprapatsyate
analyzed: bhagavān te kṣaraḥ garbham adūrāt samprapatsyate

original: BhP_03.24.003/1 dhṛta-vratāsi bhadraṃ te damena niyamena ca
analyzed: dhṛta vratā asi bhadram te damena niyamena ca

original: BhP_03.24.003/2 tapo-draviṇa-dānaiś ca śraddhayā ceśvaraṃ bhaja
analyzed: tapaḥ draviṇa dānaiḥ ca śraddhayā ca īśvaram bhaja

original: BhP_03.24.004/1 sa tvayārādhitaḥ śuklo vitanvan māmakaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: sa tvayā ārādhitaḥ śuklaḥ vitanvan māmakam yaśaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.004/2 chettā te hṛdaya-granthim audaryo brahma-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: chettā te hṛdaya granthim audaryaḥ brahma bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.005/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.005/1 devahūty api sandeśaṃ gauraveṇa prajāpateḥ
analyzed: devahūtī api sandeśam gauraveṇa prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_03.24.005/2 samyak śraddhāya puruṣaṃ kūṭa-stham abhajad gurum
analyzed: samyak śraddhāya puruṣam kūṭastham abhajat gurum

original: BhP_03.24.006/1 tasyāṃ bahu-tithe kāle bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: tasyām bahutithe kāle bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.006/2 kārdamaṃ vīryam āpanno jajñe 'gnir iva dāruṇi
analyzed: kārdamam vīryam āpannaḥ jajñe gniḥ iva dāruṇi

original: BhP_03.24.007/1 avādayaṃs tadā vyomni vāditrāṇi ghanāghanāḥ
analyzed: avādayan tadā vyomni vāditrāṇi ghanāghanāḥ

original: BhP_03.24.007/2 gāyanti taṃ sma gandharvā nṛtyanty apsaraso mudā
analyzed: gāyanti tam sma gandharvāḥ nṛtyanti apsarasaḥ mudā

original: BhP_03.24.008/1 petuḥ sumanaso divyāḥ khe-carair apavarjitāḥ
analyzed: petuḥ sumanasaḥ divyāḥ khecaraiḥ apavarjitāḥ

original: BhP_03.24.008/2 praseduś ca diśaḥ sarvā ambhāṃsi ca manāṃsi ca
analyzed: praseduḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ ambhāṃsi ca manāṃsi ca

original: BhP_03.24.009/1 tat kardamāśrama-padaṃ sarasvatyā pariśritam
analyzed: tat kardama āśrama padam sarasvatyā pariśritam

original: BhP_03.24.009/2 svayambhūḥ sākam ṛṣibhir marīcy-ādibhir abhyayāt
analyzed: svayambhūḥ sākam ṛṣibhiḥ marīci ādibhiḥ abhyayāt

original: BhP_03.24.010/1 bhagavantaṃ paraṃ brahma sattvenāṃśena śatru-han
analyzed: bhagavantam param brahma sattvena aṃśena śatru han

original: BhP_03.24.010/2 tattva-saṅkhyāna-vijñaptyai jātaṃ vidvān ajaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: tattva saṅkhyāna vijñaptyai jātam vidvān ajaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_03.24.011/1 sabhājayan viśuddhena cetasā tac-cikīrṣitam
analyzed: sabhājayan viśuddhena cetasā tad cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_03.24.011/2 prahṛṣyamāṇair asubhiḥ kardamaṃ cedam abhyadhāt
analyzed: prahṛṣyamāṇaiḥ asubhiḥ kardamam ca idam abhyadhāt

original: BhP_03.24.012/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.012/1 tvayā me 'pacitis tāta kalpitā nirvyalīkataḥ
analyzed: tvayā me pacitiḥ tāta kalpitā nirvyalīkataḥ

original: BhP_03.24.012/2 yan me sañjagṛhe vākyaṃ bhavān mānada mānayan
analyzed: yat me sañjagṛhe vākyam bhavān mānada mānayan

original: BhP_03.24.013/1 etāvaty eva śuśrūṣā kāryā pitari putrakaiḥ
analyzed: etāvati eva śuśrūṣā kāryā pitari putrakaiḥ

original: BhP_03.24.013/2 bāḍham ity anumanyeta gauraveṇa guror vacaḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti anumanyeta gauraveṇa guroḥ vacaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.014/1 imā duhitaraḥ satyas tava vatsa sumadhyamāḥ
analyzed: imāḥ duhitaraḥ satyaḥ tava vatsa su madhyamāḥ

original: BhP_03.24.014/2 sargam etaṃ prabhāvaiḥ svair bṛṃhayiṣyanty anekadhā
analyzed: sargam etam prabhāvaiḥ svaiḥ bṛṃhayiṣyanti anekadhā

original: BhP_03.24.015/1 atas tvam ṛṣi-mukhyebhyo yathā-śīlaṃ yathā-ruci
analyzed: atas tvam ṛṣi mukhyebhyaḥ yathāśīlam yathāruci

original: BhP_03.24.015/2 ātmajāḥ paridehy adya vistṛṇīhi yaśo bhuvi
analyzed: ātmajāḥ paridehi adya vistṛṇīhi yaśaḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_03.24.016/1 vedāham ādyaṃ puruṣam avatīrṇaṃ sva-māyayā
analyzed: veda aham ādyam puruṣam avatīrṇam sva māyayā

original: BhP_03.24.016/2 bhūtānāṃ śevadhiṃ dehaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ kapilaṃ mune
analyzed: bhūtānām śevadhim deham bibhrāṇam kapilam mune

original: BhP_03.24.017/1 jñāna-vijñāna-yogena karmaṇām uddharan jaṭāḥ
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna yogena karmaṇām uddharan jaṭāḥ

original: BhP_03.24.017/2 hiraṇya-keśaḥ padmākṣaḥ padma-mudrā-padāmbujaḥ
BhP_03.24.018/1 eṣa mānavi te garbhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ kaiṭabhārdanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa mānavi te garbham praviṣṭaḥ kaiṭabha ardanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.018/2 avidyā-saṃśaya-granthiṃ chittvā gāṃ vicariṣyati
analyzed: avidyā saṃśaya granthim chittvā gām vicariṣyati

original: BhP_03.24.019/1 ayaṃ siddha-gaṇādhīśaḥ sāṅkhyācāryaiḥ susammataḥ
analyzed: ayam siddha gaṇa adhīśaḥ sāṅkhya ācāryaiḥ su sammataḥ

original: BhP_03.24.019/2 loke kapila ity ākhyāṃ gantā te kīrti-vardhanaḥ
analyzed: loke kapilaḥ iti ākhyām gantā te kīrti vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.020/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.020/1 tāv āśvāsya jagat-sraṣṭā kumāraiḥ saha-nāradaḥ
analyzed: tau āśvāsya jagatsraṣṭā kumāraiḥ saha nāradaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.020/2 haṃso haṃsena yānena tri-dhāma-paramaṃ yayau
analyzed: haṃsaḥ haṃsena yānena tridhām aparamam yayau

original: BhP_03.24.021/1 gate śata-dhṛtau kṣattaḥ kardamas tena coditaḥ
analyzed: gate śatadhṛtau kṣattar kardamaḥ tena coditaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.021/2 yathoditaṃ sva-duhit-ḥ prādād viśva-sṛjāṃ tataḥ
analyzed: yathā uditam sva duhitrī prādāt viśvasṛjām tatas

original: BhP_03.24.022/1 marīcaye kalāṃ prādād anasūyām athātraye
analyzed: marīcaye kalām prādāt anasūyām atha atraye

original: BhP_03.24.022/2 śraddhām aṅgirase 'yacchat pulastyāya havirbhuvam
analyzed: śraddhām aṅgirase yacchat pulastyāya haviḥ bhuvam

original: BhP_03.24.023/1 pulahāya gatiṃ yuktāṃ kratave ca kriyāṃ satīm
analyzed: pulahāya gatim yuktām kratave ca kriyām satīm

original: BhP_03.24.023/2 khyātiṃ ca bhṛgave 'yacchad vasiṣṭhāyāpy arundhatīm
analyzed: khyātim ca bhṛgave yacchat vasiṣṭhāya api arundhatīm

original: BhP_03.24.024/1 atharvaṇe 'dadāc chāntiṃ yayā yajño vitanyate
analyzed: atharvaṇe dadāt śāntim yayā yajñaḥ vitanyate

original: BhP_03.24.024/2 viprarṣabhān kṛtodvāhān sadārān samalālayat
analyzed: vipra ṛṣabhān kṛta udvāhān sa dārān samalālayat

original: BhP_03.24.025/1 tatas ta ṛṣayaḥ kṣattaḥ kṛta-dārā nimantrya tam
analyzed: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ kṣattar kṛtadārāḥ nimantrya tam

original: BhP_03.24.025/2 prātiṣṭhan nandim āpannāḥ svaṃ svam āśrama-maṇḍalam
analyzed: prātiṣṭhat nandim āpannāḥ svam svam āśrama maṇḍalam

original: BhP_03.24.026/1 sa cāvatīrṇaṃ tri-yugam ājñāya vibudharṣabham
analyzed: sa ca avatīrṇam tri yugam ājñāya vibudha ṛṣabham

original: BhP_03.24.026/2 vivikta upasaṅgamya praṇamya samabhāṣata
analyzed: viviktaḥ upasaṅgamya praṇamya samabhāṣata

original: BhP_03.24.027/1 aho pāpacyamānānāṃ niraye svair amaṅgalaiḥ
analyzed: aho pāpacyamānānām niraye svaiḥ amaṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_03.24.027/2 kālena bhūyasā nūnaṃ prasīdantīha devatāḥ
analyzed: kālena bhūyasā nūnam prasīdanti iha devatāḥ

original: BhP_03.24.028/1 bahu-janma-vipakvena samyag-yoga-samādhinā
analyzed: bahu janma vipakvena samyak yoga samādhinā

original: BhP_03.24.028/2 draṣṭuṃ yatante yatayaḥ śūnyāgāreṣu yat-padam
analyzed: draṣṭum yatante yatayaḥ śūnya āgāreṣu yat padam

original: BhP_03.24.029/1 sa eva bhagavān adya helanaṃ na gaṇayya naḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān adya helanam na gaṇayya naḥ

original: BhP_03.24.029/2 gṛheṣu jāto grāmyāṇāṃ yaḥ svānāṃ pakṣa-poṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu jātaḥ grāmyāṇām yaḥ svānām pakṣa poṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.030/1 svīyaṃ vākyam ṛtaṃ kartum avatīrṇo 'si me gṛhe
analyzed: svīyam vākyam ṛtam kartum avatīrṇaḥ u si me gṛhe

original: BhP_03.24.030/2 cikīrṣur bhagavān jñānaṃ bhaktānāṃ māna-vardhanaḥ
analyzed: cikīrṣuḥ bhagavān jñānam bhaktānām māna vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.031/1 tāny eva te 'bhirūpāṇi rūpāṇi bhagavaṃs tava
analyzed: tāni eva te bhirūpāṇi rūpāṇi bhagavan tava

original: BhP_03.24.031/2 yāni yāni ca rocante sva-janānām arūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: yāni yāni ca rocante sva janānām arūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.032/1 tvāṃ sūribhis tattva-bubhutsayāddhā sadābhivādārhaṇa-pāda-pīṭham
analyzed: tvām sūribhiḥ tattva bubhutsayā addhā sadā abhivāda arhaṇa pāda pīṭham

original: BhP_03.24.032/2 aiśvarya-vairāgya-yaśo-'vabodha- vīrya-śriyā pūrtam ahaṃ prapadye
analyzed: aiśvarya vairāgya yaśaḥ vabodha vīrya śriyā pūrtam aham prapadye

original: BhP_03.24.033/1 paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntaṃ kālaṃ kaviṃ tri-vṛtaṃ loka-pālam
analyzed: param pradhānam puruṣam mahāntam kālam kavim trivṛtam lokapālam

original: BhP_03.24.033/2 ātmānubhūtyānugata-prapañcaṃ svacchanda-śaktiṃ kapilaṃ prapadye
analyzed: ātma anubhūtyā anugata prapañcam svacchanda śaktim kapilam prapadye

original: BhP_03.24.034/1 a smābhipṛcche 'dya patiṃ prajānāṃ tvayāvatīrṇarṇa utāpta-kāmaḥ
analyzed: a sma abhipṛcche dya patim prajānām tvayā avatīrṇa ṛṇaḥ uta āpta kāmaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.034/2 parivrajat-padavīm āsthito 'haṃ cariṣye tvāṃ hṛdi yuñjan viśokaḥ
analyzed: parivrajat padavīm āsthitaḥ ham cariṣye tvām hṛdi yuñjan viśokaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.035/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.035/1 mayā proktaṃ hi lokasya pramāṇaṃ satya-laukike
analyzed: mayā proktam hi lokasya pramāṇam satya laukike

original: BhP_03.24.035/2 athājani mayā tubhyaṃ yad avocam ṛtaṃ mune
analyzed: atha ajani mayā tubhyam yat avocam ṛtam mune

original: BhP_03.24.036/1 etan me janma loke 'smin mumukṣūṇāṃ durāśayāt
analyzed: etat me janma loke smin mumukṣūṇām durāśayāt

original: BhP_03.24.036/2 prasaṅkhyānāya tattvānāṃ sammatāyātma-darśane
analyzed: prasaṅkhyānāya tattvānām sammatāya ātma darśane

original: BhP_03.24.037/1 eṣa ātma-patho 'vyakto naṣṭaḥ kālena bhūyasā
analyzed: eṣaḥ ātma pathaḥ vyaktaḥ naṣṭaḥ kālena bhūyasā

original: BhP_03.24.037/2 taṃ pravartayituṃ deham imaṃ viddhi mayā bhṛtam
analyzed: tam pravartayitum deham imam viddhi mayā bhṛtam

original: BhP_03.24.038/1 gaccha kāmaṃ mayāpṛṣṭo mayi sannyasta-karmaṇā
analyzed: gaccha kāmam mayā āpṛṣṭaḥ mayi sannyasta karmaṇā

original: BhP_03.24.038/2 jitvā sudurjayaṃ mṛtyum amṛtatvāya māṃ bhaja
analyzed: jitvā su durjayam mṛtyum amṛta tvāya mām bhaja

original: BhP_03.24.039/1 mām ātmānaṃ svayaṃ-jyotiḥ sarva-bhūta-guhāśayam
analyzed: mām ātmānam svayam jyotiḥ sarva bhūta guhā āśayam

original: BhP_03.24.039/2 ātmany evātmanā vīkṣya viśoko 'bhayam ṛcchasi
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanā vīkṣya viśokaḥ bhayam ṛcchasi

original: BhP_03.24.040/1 mātra ādhyātmikīṃ vidyāṃ śamanīṃ sarva-karmaṇām
analyzed: mātre ādhyātmikīm vidyām śamanīm sarva karmaṇām

original: BhP_03.24.040/2 vitariṣye yayā cāsau bhayaṃ cātitariṣyati
analyzed: vitariṣye yayā ca asau bhayam ca atitariṣyati

original: BhP_03.24.041/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.24.041/1 evaṃ samuditas tena kapilena prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: evam samuditaḥ tena kapilena prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_03.24.041/2 dakṣiṇī-kṛtya taṃ prīto vanam eva jagāma ha
analyzed: dakṣiṇīkṛtya tam prītaḥ vanam eva jagāma ha

original: BhP_03.24.042/1 vrataṃ sa āsthito maunam ātmaika-śaraṇo muniḥ
analyzed: vratam saḥ āsthitaḥ maunam ātma eka śaraṇaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_03.24.042/2 niḥsaṅgo vyacarat kṣoṇīm anagnir aniketanaḥ
analyzed: niḥsaṅgaḥ vyacarat kṣoṇīm anagniḥ aniketanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.043/1 mano brahmaṇi yuñjāno yat tat sad-asataḥ param
analyzed: manaḥ brahmaṇi yuñjānaḥ yat tat sat asataḥ param

original: BhP_03.24.043/2 guṇāvabhāse viguṇa eka-bhaktyānubhāvite
analyzed: guṇa avabhāse viguṇe eka bhaktyā anubhāvite

original: BhP_03.24.044/1 nirahaṅkṛtir nirmamaś ca nirdvandvaḥ sama-dṛk sva-dṛk
analyzed: nirahaṅkṛtiḥ nirmamaḥ ca nirdvandvaḥ samadṛś svadṛś

original: BhP_03.24.044/2 pratyak-praśānta-dhīr dhīraḥ praśāntormir ivodadhiḥ
analyzed: pratyak praśānta dhīḥ dhīraḥ praśānta ūrmiḥ iva udadhiḥ

original: BhP_03.24.045/1 vāsudeve bhagavati sarva-jñe pratyag-ātmani
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati sarvajñe pratyagātmani

original: BhP_03.24.045/2 pareṇa bhakti-bhāvena labdhātmā mukta-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: pareṇa bhakti bhāvena labdha ātmā mukta bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_03.24.046/1 ātmānaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu bhagavantam avasthitam
analyzed: ātmānam sarva bhūteṣu bhagavantam avasthitam

original: BhP_03.24.046/2 apaśyat sarva-bhūtāni bhagavaty api cātmani
analyzed: apaśyat sarva bhūtāni bhagavati api ca ātmani

original: BhP_03.24.047/1 icchā-dveṣa-vihīnena sarvatra sama-cetasā
analyzed: icchā dveṣa vihīnena sarvatra sama cetasā

original: BhP_03.24.047/2 bhagavad-bhakti-yuktena prāptā bhāgavatī gatiḥ
analyzed: bhagavat bhakti yuktena prāptā bhāgavatī gatiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.001/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.001/1 kapilas tattva-saṅkhyātā bhagavān ātma-māyayā
BhP_03.25.001/2 jātaḥ svayam ajaḥ sākṣād ātma-prajñaptaye nṛṇām
analyzed: jātaḥ svayam ajaḥ sākṣāt ātma prajñaptaye nṛṇām

original: BhP_03.25.002/1 na hy asya varṣmaṇaḥ puṃsāṃ varimṇaḥ sarva-yoginām
analyzed: na hi asya varṣmaṇaḥ puṃsām varimṇaḥ sarva yoginām

original: BhP_03.25.002/2 viśrutau śruta-devasya bhūri tṛpyanti me 'savaḥ
analyzed: viśrutau śrutadevasya bhūri tṛpyanti me savaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.003/1 yad yad vidhatte bhagavān svacchandātmātma-māyayā
analyzed: yat yat vidhatte bhagavān svacchanda ātmā ātma māyayā

original: BhP_03.25.003/2 tāni me śraddadhānasya kīrtanyāny anukīrtaya
analyzed: tāni me śraddadhānasya kīrtanyāni anukīrtaya

original: BhP_03.25.004/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.004/1 dvaipāyana-sakhas tv evaṃ maitreyo bhagavāṃs tathā
analyzed: dvaipāyana sakhaḥ tu evam maitreyaḥ bhagavān tathā

original: BhP_03.25.004/2 prāhedaṃ viduraṃ prīta ānvīkṣikyāṃ pracoditaḥ
analyzed: prāha idam viduram prītaḥ ānvīkṣikyām pracoditaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.005/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.005/1 pitari prasthite 'raṇyaṃ mātuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: pitari prasthite raṇyam mātuḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_03.25.005/2 tasmin bindusare 'vātsīd bhagavān kapilaḥ kila
analyzed: tasmin bindusare vātsīt bhagavān kapilaḥ kila

original: BhP_03.25.006/1 tam āsīnam akarmāṇaṃ tattva-mārgāgra-darśanam
analyzed: tam āsīnam akarmāṇam tattva mārga agra darśanam

original: BhP_03.25.006/2 sva-sutaṃ devahūty āha dhātuḥ saṃsmaratī vacaḥ
analyzed: sva sutam devahūtī āha dhātuḥ saṃsmaratī vacaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.007/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.007/1 nirviṇṇā nitarāṃ bhūmann asad-indriya-tarṣaṇāt
analyzed: nirviṇṇāḥ nitarām bhūman asat indriya tarṣaṇāt

original: BhP_03.25.007/2 yena sambhāvyamānena prapannāndhaṃ tamaḥ prabho
analyzed: yena sambhāvyamānena prapanna andham tamaḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.25.008/1 tasya tvaṃ tamaso 'ndhasya duṣpārasyādya pāragam
analyzed: tasya tvam tamasaḥ ndhasya duṣpārasya adya pāragam

original: BhP_03.25.008/2 sac-cakṣur janmanām ante labdhaṃ me tvad-anugrahāt
analyzed: janmanām ante labdham me tvad anugrahāt

original: BhP_03.25.009/1 ya ādyo bhagavān puṃsām īśvaro vai bhavān kila
analyzed: yaḥ ādyaḥ bhagavān puṃsām īśvaraḥ vai bhavān kila

original: BhP_03.25.009/2 lokasya tamasāndhasya cakṣuḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
analyzed: lokasya tamasā andhasya cakṣuḥ sūryaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.010/1 atha me deva sammoham apākraṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: atha me deva sammoham apākraṣṭum tvam arhasi

original: BhP_03.25.010/2 yo 'vagraho 'haṃ mametīty etasmin yojitas tvayā
analyzed: yaḥ vagrahaḥ ham mama iti iti etasmin yojitaḥ tvayā

original: BhP_03.25.011/1 taṃ tvā gatāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ sva-bhṛtya-saṃsāra-taroḥ kuṭhāram
analyzed: tam tvā gatā aham śaraṇam śaraṇyam sva bhṛtya saṃsāra taroḥ kuṭhāram

original: BhP_03.25.011/2 jijñāsayāhaṃ prakṛteḥ pūruṣasya namāmi sad-dharma-vidāṃ variṣṭham
analyzed: jijñāsayā aham prakṛteḥ pūruṣasya namāmi sat dharma vidām variṣṭham

original: BhP_03.25.012/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.012/1 iti sva-mātur niravadyam īpsitaṃ niśamya puṃsām apavarga-vardhanam
analyzed: iti sva mātuḥ niravadyam īpsitam niśamya puṃsām apavarga vardhanam

original: BhP_03.25.012/2 dhiyābhinandyātmavatāṃ satāṃ gatir babhāṣa īṣat-smita-śobhitānanaḥ
analyzed: dhiyā abhinandya ātmavatām satām gatiḥ babhāṣe īṣat smita śobhita ānanaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.013/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.013/1 yoga ādhyātmikaḥ puṃsāṃ mato niḥśreyasāya me
analyzed: yogaḥ ādhyātmikaḥ puṃsām mataḥ niḥśreyasāya me

original: BhP_03.25.013/2 atyantoparatir yatra duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
analyzed: atyantā uparatiḥ yatra duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca

original: BhP_03.25.014/1 tam imaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yam avocaṃ purānaghe
analyzed: tam imam te pravakṣyāmi yam avocam purā anaghe

original: BhP_03.25.014/2 ṛṣīṇāṃ śrotu-kāmānāṃ yogaṃ sarvāṅga-naipuṇam
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām śrotu kāmānām yogam sarva aṅga naipuṇam

original: BhP_03.25.015/1 cetaḥ khalv asya bandhāya muktaye cātmano matam
analyzed: cetaḥ khalu asya bandhāya muktaye ca ātmanaḥ matam

original: BhP_03.25.015/2 guṇeṣu saktaṃ bandhāya rataṃ vā puṃsi muktaye
analyzed: guṇeṣu saktam bandhāya ratam vā puṃsi muktaye

original: BhP_03.25.016/1 ahaṃ mamābhimānotthaiḥ kāma-lobhādibhir malaiḥ
analyzed: aham mama abhimāna utthaiḥ kāma lobha ādibhiḥ malaiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.016/2 vītaṃ yadā manaḥ śuddham aduḥkham asukhaṃ samam
analyzed: vītam yadā manaḥ śuddham aduḥkham asukham samam

original: BhP_03.25.017/1 tadā puruṣa ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ prakṛteḥ param
analyzed: tadā puruṣaḥ ātmānam kevalam prakṛteḥ param

original: BhP_03.25.017/2 nirantaraṃ svayaṃ-jyotir aṇimānam akhaṇḍitam
analyzed: nirantaram svayam jyotiḥ aṇimānam akhaṇḍitam

original: BhP_03.25.018/1 jñāna-vairāgya-yuktena bhakti-yuktena cātmanā
analyzed: jñāna vairāgya yuktena bhakti yuktena ca ātmanā

original: BhP_03.25.018/2 paripaśyaty udāsīnaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca hataujasam
analyzed: paripaśyati udāsīnam prakṛtim ca hata ojasam

original: BhP_03.25.019/1 na yujyamānayā bhaktyā bhagavaty akhilātmani
analyzed: na yujyamānayā bhaktyā bhagavati akhilātmani

original: BhP_03.25.019/2 sadṛśo 'sti śivaḥ panthā yogināṃ brahma-siddhaye
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ sti śivaḥ panthāḥ yoginām brahma siddhaye

original: BhP_03.25.020/1 prasaṅgam ajaraṃ pāśam ātmanaḥ kavayo viduḥ
analyzed: prasaṅgam ajaram pāśam ātmanaḥ kavayaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_03.25.020/2 sa eva sādhuṣu kṛto mokṣa-dvāram apāvṛtam
analyzed: saḥ eva sādhuṣu kṛtaḥ mokṣa dvāram apāvṛtam

original: BhP_03.25.021/1 titikṣavaḥ kāruṇikāḥ suhṛdaḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: titikṣavaḥ kāruṇikāḥ suhṛdaḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_03.25.021/2 ajāta-śatravaḥ śāntāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu-bhūṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: ajāta śatravaḥ śāntāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.022/1 mayy ananyena bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām
analyzed: mayi ananyena bhāvena bhaktim kurvanti ye dṛḍhām

original: BhP_03.25.022/2 mat-kṛte tyakta-karmāṇas tyakta-svajana-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: mad kṛte tyakta karmāṇaḥ tyakta sva jana bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.023/1 mad-āśrayāḥ kathā mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca
analyzed: mad āśrayāḥ kathāḥ mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca

original: BhP_03.25.023/2 tapanti vividhās tāpā naitān mad-gata-cetasaḥ
analyzed: tapanti vividhāḥ tāpāḥ na etān mad gata cetasaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.024/1 ta ete sādhavaḥ sādhvi sarva-saṅga-vivarjitāḥ
analyzed: te ete sādhavaḥ sādhvi sarva saṅga vivarjitāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.024/2 saṅgas teṣv atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga-doṣa-harā hi te
analyzed: saṅgaḥ teṣu atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga doṣa harāḥ hi te

original: BhP_03.25.025/1 satāṃ prasaṅgān mama vīrya-saṃvido bhavanti hṛt-karṇa-rasāyanāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: satām prasaṅgāt mama vīrya saṃvidaḥ bhavanti hṛd karṇa rasāyanāḥ kathāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.025/2 taj-joṣaṇād āśv apavarga-vartmani śraddhā ratir bhaktir anukramiṣyati
analyzed: āśu apavarga vartmani śraddhā ratiḥ bhaktiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.026/1 bhaktyā pumān jāta-virāga aindriyād dṛṣṭa-śrutān mad-racanānucintayā
analyzed: bhaktyā pumān jāta virāgaḥ aindriyāt dṛṣṭa śrutāt mad racanā anucintayā

original: BhP_03.25.026/2 cittasya yatto grahaṇe yoga-yukto yatiṣyate ṛjubhir yoga-mārgaiḥ
analyzed: cittasya yattaḥ grahaṇe yoga yuktaḥ yatiṣyate ṛjubhiḥ yoga mārgaiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.027/1 asevayāyaṃ prakṛter guṇānāṃ jñānena vairāgya-vijṛmbhitena
analyzed: asevayā ayam prakṛteḥ guṇānām jñānena vairāgya vijṛmbhitena

original: BhP_03.25.027/2 yogena mayy arpitayā ca bhaktyā māṃ pratyag-ātmānam ihāvarundhe
analyzed: yogena mayi arpitayā ca bhaktyā mām pratyak ātmānam iha avarundhe

original: BhP_03.25.028/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.028/1 kācit tvayy ucitā bhaktiḥ kīdṛśī mama gocarā
analyzed: kācid tvayi ucitā bhaktiḥ kīdṛśī mama gocarā

original: BhP_03.25.028/2 yayā padaṃ te nirvāṇam añjasānvāśnavā aham
analyzed: yayā padam te nirvāṇam aham

original: BhP_03.25.029/1 yo yogo bhagavad-bāṇo nirvāṇātmaṃs tvayoditaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yogaḥ bhagavat bāṇaḥ nirvāṇa ātman tvayā uditaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.029/2 kīdṛśaḥ kati cāṅgāni yatas tattvāvabodhanam
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ ca aṅgāni yatas tattva avabodhanam

original: BhP_03.25.030/1 tad etan me vijānīhi yathāhaṃ manda-dhīr hare
analyzed: tat etat me vijānīhi yathā aham manda dhīḥ hare

original: BhP_03.25.030/2 sukhaṃ buddhyeya durbodhaṃ yoṣā bhavad-anugrahāt
analyzed: sukham durbodham yoṣāḥ bhavat anugrahāt

original: BhP_03.25.031/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.031/1 viditvārthaṃ kapilo mātur itthaṃ jāta-sneho yatra tanvābhijātaḥ
analyzed: viditvā artham kapilaḥ mātuḥ ittham jāta snehaḥ yatra tanvā abhijātaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.031/2 tattvāmnāyaṃ yat pravadanti sāṅkhyaṃ provāca vai bhakti-vitāna-yogam
analyzed: tattva āmnāyam yat pravadanti sāṅkhyam provāca vai bhakti vitāna yogam

original: BhP_03.25.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.25.032/1 devānāṃ guṇa-liṅgānām ānuśravika-karmaṇām
analyzed: devānām guṇa liṅgānām ānuśravika karmaṇām

original: BhP_03.25.032/2 sattva evaika-manaso vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā
analyzed: sattve eva ekamanasaḥ vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā

original: BhP_03.25.034/1 animittā bhāgavatī bhaktiḥ siddher garīyasī
BhP_03.25.034/2 jarayaty āśu yā kośaṃ nigīrṇam analo yathā
analyzed: jarayati āśu yā kośam nigīrṇam analaḥ yathā

original: BhP_03.25.035/1 naikātmatāṃ me spṛhayanti kecin mat-pāda-sevābhiratā mad-īhāḥ
analyzed: na ekātma tām me spṛhayanti kecid mad pāda sevā abhiratāḥ mad īhāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.035/2 ye 'nyonyato bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi
analyzed: ye nyonyatas bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi

original: BhP_03.25.036/1 paśyanti te me rucirāṇy amba santaḥ prasanna-vaktrāruṇa-locanāni
analyzed: paśyanti te me rucirāṇi amba santaḥ prasanna vaktra aruṇa locanāni

original: BhP_03.25.036/2 rūpāṇi divyāni vara-pradāni sākaṃ vācaṃ spṛhaṇīyāṃ vadanti
analyzed: rūpāṇi divyāni vara pradāni sākam vācam spṛhaṇīyām vadanti

original: BhP_03.25.037/1 tair darśanīyāvayavair udāra- vilāsa-hāsekṣita-vāma-sūktaiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ darśanīya avayavaiḥ udāra vilāsa hāsa īkṣita vāma sūktaiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.037/2 hṛtātmano hṛta-prāṇāṃś ca bhaktir anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte
analyzed: hṛta ātmanaḥ hṛta prāṇān ca bhaktiḥ an icchataḥ me gatim aṇvīm prayuṅkte

original: BhP_03.25.038/1 atho vibhūtiṃ mama māyāvinas tām aiśvaryam aṣṭāṅgam anupravṛttam
analyzed: atho vibhūtim mama māyāvinaḥ tām aiśvaryam aṣṭāṅgam anupravṛttam

original: BhP_03.25.038/2 śriyaṃ bhāgavatīṃ vāspṛhayanti bhadrāṃ parasya me te 'śnuvate tu loke
analyzed: śriyam bhāgavatīm vā spṛhayanti bhadrām parasya me te śnuvate tu loke

original: BhP_03.25.039/1 na karhicin mat-parāḥ śānta-rūpe naṅkṣyanti no me 'nimiṣo leḍhi hetiḥ
analyzed: na karhicit mad parāḥ śānta rūpe naṅkṣyanti no me nimiṣaḥ leḍhi hetiḥ

original: BhP_03.25.039/2 yeṣām ahaṃ priya ātmā sutaś ca sakhā guruḥ suhṛdo daivam iṣṭam
analyzed: yeṣām aham priyaḥ ātmā sutaḥ ca sakhā guruḥ suhṛdaḥ daivam iṣṭam

original: BhP_03.25.040/1 imaṃ lokaṃ tathaivāmum ātmānam ubhayāyinam
analyzed: imam lokam tathā eva amum ātmānam ubhayāyinam

original: BhP_03.25.040/2 ātmānam anu ye ceha ye rāyaḥ paśavo gṛhāḥ
analyzed: ātmānam anu ye ca iha ye rāyaḥ paśavaḥ gṛhāḥ

original: BhP_03.25.041/1 visṛjya sarvān anyāṃś ca mām evaṃ viśvato-mukham
analyzed: visṛjya sarvān anyān ca mām evam viśvatomukham

original: BhP_03.25.041/2 bhajanty ananyayā bhaktyā tān mṛtyor atipāraye
analyzed: bhajantī ananyayā bhaktyā tān mṛtyoḥ atipāraye

original: BhP_03.25.042/1 nānyatra mad bhagavataḥ pradhāna-puruṣeśvarāt
analyzed: na anyatra mat bhagavataḥ pradhāna puruṣa īśvarāt

original: BhP_03.25.042/2 ātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ nivartate
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sarva bhūtānām bhayam tīvram nivartate

original: BhP_03.25.043/1 mad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati mad-bhayāt
analyzed: mad bhayāt vāti vātaḥ yam sūryaḥ tapati mad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.25.043/2 varṣatīndro dahaty agnir mṛtyuś carati mad-bhayāt
analyzed: varṣati indraḥ dahati agniḥ mṛtyuḥ carati mad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.25.044/1 jñāna-vairāgya-yuktena bhakti-yogena yoginaḥ
analyzed: jñāna vairāgya yuktena bhakti yogena yoginaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.044/2 kṣemāya pāda-mūlaṃ me praviśanty akuto-bhayam
analyzed: kṣemāya pāda mūlam me praviśanti akutobhayam

original: BhP_03.25.045/1 etāvān eva loke 'smin puṃsāṃ niḥśreyasodayaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva loke smin puṃsām niḥśreyasa udayaḥ

original: BhP_03.25.045/2 tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena mano mayy arpitaṃ sthiram
analyzed: tīvreṇa bhakti yogena manaḥ mayi arpitam sthiram

original: BhP_03.26.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.26.001/1 atha te sampravakṣyāmi tattvānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak
analyzed: atha te sampravakṣyāmi tattvānām lakṣaṇam pṛthak

original: BhP_03.26.001/2 yad viditvā vimucyeta puruṣaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: yat viditvā vimucyeta puruṣaḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.26.002/1 jñānaṃ niḥśreyasārthāya puruṣasyātma-darśanam
analyzed: jñānam niḥśreyasa arthāya puruṣasya ātma darśanam
