original: BhP_03.26.002/2 yad āhur varṇaye tat te hṛdaya-granthi-bhedanam
analyzed: yat āhuḥ varṇaye tat te hṛdaya granthi bhedanam

original: BhP_03.26.003/1 anādir ātmā puruṣo nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: anādiḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_03.26.003/2 pratyag-dhāmā svayaṃ-jyotir viśvaṃ yena samanvitam
analyzed: pratyagdhāmā svayam jyotiḥ viśvam yena samanvitam

original: BhP_03.26.004/1 sa eṣa prakṛtiṃ sūkṣmāṃ daivīṃ guṇamayīṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa prakṛtim sūkṣmām daivīm guṇa mayīm vibhuḥ

original: BhP_03.26.004/2 yadṛcchayaivopagatām abhyapadyata līlayā
analyzed: yadṛcchayā eva upagatām abhyapadyata līlayā

original: BhP_03.26.005/1 guṇair vicitrāḥ sṛjatīṃ sa-rūpāḥ prakṛtiṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: guṇaiḥ vicitrāḥ sṛjatīm sarūpāḥ prakṛtim prajāḥ

original: BhP_03.26.005/2 vilokya mumuhe sadyaḥ sa iha jñāna-gūhayā
analyzed: vilokya mumuhe sadyas saḥ iha jñāna gūhayā

original: BhP_03.26.006/1 evaṃ parābhidhyānena kartṛtvaṃ prakṛteḥ pumān
analyzed: evam para abhidhyānena kartṛ tvam prakṛteḥ pumān

original: BhP_03.26.006/2 karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu guṇair ātmani manyate
analyzed: karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu guṇaiḥ ātmani manyate

original: BhP_03.26.007/1 tad asya saṃsṛtir bandhaḥ pāra-tantryaṃ ca tat-kṛtam
analyzed: tat asya saṃsṛtiḥ bandhaḥ pāratantryam ca tat kṛtam

original: BhP_03.26.007/2 bhavaty akartur īśasya sākṣiṇo nirvṛtātmanaḥ
analyzed: bhavati akartuḥ īśasya sākṣiṇaḥ nirvṛta ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.008/1 kārya-kāraṇa-kartṛtve kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiṃ viduḥ
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve kāraṇam prakṛtim viduḥ

original: BhP_03.26.008/2 bhoktṛtve sukha-duḥkhānāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param
analyzed: bhoktṛ tve sukha duḥkhānām puruṣam prakṛteḥ param

original: BhP_03.26.009/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.26.009/1 prakṛteḥ puruṣasyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣottama
analyzed: prakṛteḥ puruṣasya api lakṣaṇam puruṣottama

original: BhP_03.26.009/2 brūhi kāraṇayor asya sad-asac ca yad-ātmakam
analyzed: brūhi kāraṇayoḥ asya sat asat ca yad ātmakam

original: BhP_03.26.010/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.26.010/1 yat tat tri-guṇam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ sad-asad-ātmakam
analyzed: yat tat triguṇam avyaktam nityam sat asat ātmakam

original: BhP_03.26.010/2 pradhānaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhur aviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavat
analyzed: pradhānam prakṛtim prāhuḥ aviśeṣam viśeṣa vat

original: BhP_03.26.011/1 pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir brahma caturbhir daśabhis tathā
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ brahma caturbhiḥ daśabhiḥ tathā

original: BhP_03.26.011/2 etac catur-viṃśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ prādhānikaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: etat caturviṃśatikam gaṇam prādhānikam viduḥ

original: BhP_03.26.012/1 mahā-bhūtāni pañcaiva bhūr āpo 'gnir marun nabhaḥ
analyzed: mahābhūtāni pañca eva bhūḥ āpaḥ gniḥ marut nabhaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.012/2 tan-mātrāṇi ca tāvanti gandhādīni matāni me
analyzed: tanmātrāṇi ca tāvanti gandha ādīni matāni me

original: BhP_03.26.013/1 indriyāṇi daśa śrotraṃ tvag dṛg rasana-nāsikāḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi daśa śrotram tvac dṛś rasana nāsikāḥ

original: BhP_03.26.013/2 vāk karau caraṇau meḍhraṃ pāyur daśama ucyate
analyzed: vāc karau caraṇau meḍhram pāyuḥ daśamaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_03.26.014/1 mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cittam ity antar-ātmakam
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ cittam iti antara ātmakam

original: BhP_03.26.014/2 caturdhā lakṣyate bhedo vṛttyā lakṣaṇa-rūpayā
analyzed: caturdhā lakṣyate bhedaḥ vṛttyā lakṣaṇa rūpayā

original: BhP_03.26.015/1 etāvān eva saṅkhyāto brahmaṇaḥ sa-guṇasya ha
analyzed: etāvān eva saṅkhyātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ saguṇasya ha

original: BhP_03.26.015/2 sanniveśo mayā prokto yaḥ kālaḥ pañca-viṃśakaḥ
analyzed: sanniveśaḥ mayā proktaḥ yaḥ kālaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.016/1 prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam
analyzed: prabhāvam pauruṣam prāhuḥ kālam eke yatas bhayam

original: BhP_03.26.016/2 ahaṅkāra-vimūḍhasya kartuḥ prakṛtim īyuṣaḥ
analyzed: ahaṅkāra vimūḍhasya kartuḥ prakṛtim īyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.017/1 prakṛter guṇa-sāmyasya nirviśeṣasya mānavi
analyzed: prakṛteḥ guṇa sāmyasya nirviśeṣasya mānavi

original: BhP_03.26.017/2 ceṣṭā yataḥ sa bhagavān kāla ity upalakṣitaḥ
analyzed: ceṣṭā yatas sa bhagavān kālaḥ iti upalakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.018/1 antaḥ puruṣa-rūpeṇa kāla-rūpeṇa yo bahiḥ
analyzed: antar puruṣa rūpeṇa kāla rūpeṇa yaḥ bahis

original: BhP_03.26.018/2 samanvety eṣa sattvānāṃ bhagavān ātma-māyayā
analyzed: samanveti eṣa sattvānām bhagavān ātma māyayā

original: BhP_03.26.019/1 daivāt kṣubhita-dharmiṇyāṃ svasyāṃ yonau paraḥ pumān
analyzed: daivāt kṣubhita dharmiṇyām svasyām yonau paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_03.26.019/2 ādhatta vīryaṃ sāsūta mahat-tattvaṃ hiraṇmayam
analyzed: ādhatta vīryam sā asūta mahat tattvam hiraṇmayam

original: BhP_03.26.020/1 viśvam ātma-gataṃ vyañjan kūṭa-stho jagad-aṅkuraḥ
analyzed: viśvam ātma gatam vyañjan kūṭasthaḥ jagat aṅkuraḥ

original: BhP_03.26.020/2 sva-tejasāpibat tīvram ātma-prasvāpanaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: sva tejasā apibat tīvram ātma prasvāpanam tamaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.021/1 yat tat sattva-guṇaṃ svacchaṃ śāntaṃ bhagavataḥ padam
analyzed: yat tat sattva guṇam svaccham śāntam bhagavataḥ padam

original: BhP_03.26.021/2 yad āhur vāsudevākhyaṃ cittaṃ tan mahad-ātmakam
analyzed: yat āhuḥ vāsudeva ākhyam cittam tat mahat ātmakam

original: BhP_03.26.022/1 svacchatvam avikāritvaṃ śāntatvam iti cetasaḥ
analyzed: svaccha tvam avikāri tvam śānta tvam iti cetasaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.022/2 vṛttibhir lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yathāpāṃ prakṛtiḥ parā
analyzed: vṛttibhiḥ lakṣaṇam proktam yathā apām prakṛtiḥ parā

original: BhP_03.26.023/1 mahat-tattvād vikurvāṇād bhagavad-vīrya-sambhavāt
BhP_03.26.023/2 kriyā-śaktir ahaṅkāras tri-vidhaḥ samapadyata
analyzed: kriyāśaktiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ trividhaḥ samapadyata

original: BhP_03.26.024/1 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś ca yato bhavaḥ
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca yatas bhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.024/2 manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām api
analyzed: manasaḥ ca indriyāṇām ca bhūtānām mahatām api

original: BhP_03.26.025/1 sahasra-śirasaṃ sākṣād yam anantaṃ pracakṣate
analyzed: sahasra śirasam sākṣāt yam anantam pracakṣate

original: BhP_03.26.025/2 saṅkarṣaṇākhyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhūtendriya-manomayam
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇa ākhyam puruṣam bhūta indriya manaḥ mayam

original: BhP_03.26.026/1 kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca kāryatvaṃ ceti lakṣaṇam
analyzed: ca

original: BhP_03.26.026/2 śānta-ghora-vimūḍhatvam iti vā syād ahaṅkṛteḥ
analyzed: śānta ghora vimūḍha tvam iti vā syāt ahaṅkṛteḥ

original: BhP_03.26.027/1 vaikārikād vikurvāṇān manas-tattvam ajāyata
analyzed: vaikārikāt vikurvāṇāt manaḥ tattvam ajāyata

original: BhP_03.26.027/2 yat-saṅkalpa-vikalpābhyāṃ vartate kāma-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: yat saṅkalpa vikalpābhyām vartate kāma sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.028/1 yad vidur hy aniruddhākhyaṃ hṛṣīkāṇām adhīśvaram
analyzed: yat viduḥ hi aniruddha ākhyam hṛṣīkāṇām adhīśvaram

original: BhP_03.26.028/2 śāradendīvara-śyāmaṃ saṃrādhyaṃ yogibhiḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: śārada indīvara śyāmam saṃrādhyam yogibhiḥ śanais

original: BhP_03.26.029/1 taijasāt tu vikurvāṇād buddhi-tattvam abhūt sati
analyzed: taijasāt tu vikurvāṇāt buddhi tattvam abhūt sati

original: BhP_03.26.029/2 dravya-sphuraṇa-vijñānam indriyāṇām anugrahaḥ
analyzed: dravya sphuraṇa vijñānam indriyāṇām anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.030/1 saṃśayo 'tha viparyāso niścayaḥ smṛtir eva ca
analyzed: viparyāsaḥ niścayaḥ smṛtiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.030/2 svāpa ity ucyate buddher lakṣaṇaṃ vṛttitaḥ pṛthak
analyzed: svāpaḥ iti ucyate buddheḥ lakṣaṇam vṛttitaḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_03.26.031/1 taijasānīndriyāṇy eva kriyā-jñāna-vibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: taijasāni indriyāṇi eva kriyā jñāna vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.031/2 prāṇasya hi kriyā-śaktir buddher vijñāna-śaktitā
analyzed: prāṇasya hi kriyā śaktiḥ buddheḥ vijñāna śakti tā

original: BhP_03.26.032/1 tāmasāc ca vikurvāṇād bhagavad-vīrya-coditāt
analyzed: tāmasāt ca vikurvāṇāt bhagavat vīrya coditāt

original: BhP_03.26.032/2 śabda-mātram abhūt tasmān nabhaḥ śrotraṃ tu śabdagam
analyzed: śabda mātram abhūt tasmāt nabhaḥ śrotram tu śabda gam

original: BhP_03.26.033/1 arthāśrayatvaṃ śabdasya draṣṭur liṅgatvam eva ca
analyzed: artha āśraya tvam śabdasya draṣṭuḥ liṅga tvam eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.033/2 tan-mātratvaṃ ca nabhaso lakṣaṇaṃ kavayo viduḥ
analyzed: tanmātra tvam ca nabhasaḥ lakṣaṇam kavayaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_03.26.034/1 bhūtānāṃ chidra-dātṛtvaṃ bahir antaram eva ca
analyzed: bhūtānām chidra dātṛ tvam bahis antaram eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.034/2 prāṇendriyātma-dhiṣṇyatvaṃ nabhaso vṛtti-lakṣaṇam
BhP_03.26.035/1 nabhasaḥ śabda-tanmātrāt kāla-gatyā vikurvataḥ
analyzed: nabhasaḥ śabda tanmātrāt kāla gatyāḥ vikurvataḥ

original: BhP_03.26.035/2 sparśo 'bhavat tato vāyus tvak sparśasya ca saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: sparśaḥ bhavat tatas vāyuḥ tvac sparśasya ca saṅgrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.036/1 mṛdutvaṃ kaṭhinatvaṃ ca śaityam uṣṇatvam eva ca
analyzed: mṛdu tvam kaṭhina tvam ca śaityam uṣṇa tvam eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.036/2 etat sparśasya sparśatvaṃ tan-mātratvaṃ nabhasvataḥ
analyzed: etat sparśasya sparśa tvam tanmātra tvam nabhasvataḥ

original: BhP_03.26.037/1 cālanaṃ vyūhanaṃ prāptir netṛtvaṃ dravya-śabdayoḥ
BhP_03.26.037/2 sarvendriyāṇām ātmatvaṃ vāyoḥ karmābhilakṣaṇam
analyzed: sarva indriyāṇām ātmatvam vāyoḥ karma abhilakṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.26.038/1 vāyoś ca sparśa-tanmātrād rūpaṃ daiveritād abhūt
analyzed: vāyoḥ ca sparśa tanmātrāt rūpam daiva īritāt abhūt

original: BhP_03.26.038/2 samutthitaṃ tatas tejaś cakṣū rūpopalambhanam
analyzed: samutthitam tatas tejaḥ cakṣuḥ rūpa upalambhanam

original: BhP_03.26.039/1 dravyākṛtitvaṃ guṇatā vyakti-saṃsthātvam eva ca
analyzed: dravya ākṛti tvam guṇatā vyakti saṃsthā tvam eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.039/2 tejastvaṃ tejasaḥ sādhvi rūpa-mātrasya vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ tvam tejasaḥ sādhvi rūpa mātrasya vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.040/1 dyotanaṃ pacanaṃ pānam adanaṃ hima-mardanam
analyzed: dyotanam pacanam pānam adanam hima mardanam

original: BhP_03.26.040/2 tejaso vṛttayas tv etāḥ śoṣaṇaṃ kṣut tṛḍ eva ca
analyzed: tejasaḥ vṛttayaḥ tu etāḥ śoṣaṇam kṣudh tṛṣ eva ca

original: BhP_03.26.041/1 rūpa-mātrād vikurvāṇāt tejaso daiva-coditāt
analyzed: rūpa mātrāt vikurvāṇāt tejasaḥ daiva coditāt

original: BhP_03.26.041/2 rasa-mātram abhūt tasmād ambho jihvā rasa-grahaḥ
analyzed: rasa mātram abhūt tasmāt ambhaḥ jihvā rasa grahaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.042/1 kaṣāyo madhuras tiktaḥ kaṭv amla iti naikadhā
analyzed: kaṣāyaḥ madhuraḥ tiktaḥ kaṭu amlaḥ iti na ekadhā

original: BhP_03.26.042/2 bhautikānāṃ vikāreṇa rasa eko vibhidyate
analyzed: bhautikānām vikāreṇa rasaḥ ekaḥ vibhidyate

original: BhP_03.26.043/1 kledanaṃ piṇḍanaṃ tṛptiḥ prāṇanāpyāyanondanam
analyzed: kledanam piṇḍanam tṛptiḥ prāṇana āpyāyana undanam

original: BhP_03.26.043/2 tāpāpanodo bhūyastvam ambhaso vṛttayas tv imāḥ
analyzed: tāpa apanodaḥ bhūyastvam ambhasaḥ vṛttayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_03.26.044/1 rasa-mātrād vikurvāṇād ambhaso daiva-coditāt
analyzed: rasa mātrāt vikurvāṇāt ambhasaḥ daiva coditāt

original: BhP_03.26.044/2 gandha-mātram abhūt tasmāt pṛthvī ghrāṇas tu gandhagaḥ
analyzed: gandha mātram abhūt tasmāt pṛthvī ghrāṇaḥ tu gandha gaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.045/1 karambha-pūti-saurabhya- śāntogrāmlādibhiḥ pṛthak
BhP_03.26.045/2 dravyāvayava-vaiṣamyād gandha eko vibhidyate
analyzed: dravya avayava vaiṣamyāt gandhaḥ ekaḥ vibhidyate

original: BhP_03.26.046/1 bhāvanaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ dhāraṇaṃ sad-viśeṣaṇam
BhP_03.26.046/2 sarva-sattva-guṇodbhedaḥ pṛthivī-vṛtti-lakṣaṇam
BhP_03.26.047/1 nabho-guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tac chrotram ucyate
analyzed: nabhaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ rthaḥ yasya tat śrotram ucyate

original: BhP_03.26.047/2 vāyor guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tat sparśanaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: vāyoḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ rthaḥ yasya tat sparśanam viduḥ

original: BhP_03.26.048/1 tejo-guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tac cakṣur ucyate
analyzed: tejaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ rthaḥ yasya tat cakṣuḥ ucyate

original: BhP_03.26.048/2 ambho-guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya tad rasanaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: ambhaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ rthaḥ yasya tat rasanam viduḥ

original: BhP_03.26.048/3 bhūmer guṇa-viśeṣo 'rtho yasya sa ghrāṇa ucyate
analyzed: bhūmeḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ rthaḥ yasya sa ghrāṇaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_03.26.049/1 parasya dṛśyate dharmo hy aparasmin samanvayāt
analyzed: parasya dṛśyate dharmaḥ hi aparasmin samanvayāt

original: BhP_03.26.049/2 ato viśeṣo bhāvānāṃ bhūmāv evopalakṣyate
analyzed: atas viśeṣaḥ bhāvānām bhūmau eva upalakṣyate

original: BhP_03.26.050/1 etāny asaṃhatya yadā mahad-ādīni sapta vai
analyzed: etāni a saṃhatya yadā mahat ādīni sapta vai

original: BhP_03.26.050/2 kāla-karma-guṇopeto jagad-ādir upāviśat
analyzed: kāla karma guṇa upetaḥ jagat ādiḥ upāviśat

original: BhP_03.26.051/1 tatas tenānuviddhebhyo yuktebhyo 'ṇḍam acetanam
analyzed: tatas tena anuviddhebhyaḥ yuktebhyaḥ ṇḍam acetanam

original: BhP_03.26.051/2 utthitaṃ puruṣo yasmād udatiṣṭhad asau virāṭ
analyzed: utthitam puruṣaḥ yasmāt udatiṣṭhat asau virāj

original: BhP_03.26.052/1 etad aṇḍaṃ viśeṣākhyaṃ krama-vṛddhair daśottaraiḥ
BhP_03.26.052/2 toyādibhiḥ parivṛtaṃ pradhānenāvṛtair bahiḥ
analyzed: toya ādibhiḥ parivṛtam pradhānena āvṛtaiḥ bahis

original: BhP_03.26.052/3 yatra loka-vitāno 'yaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato hareḥ
analyzed: yatra loka vitānaḥ yam rūpam bhagavataḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_03.26.053/1 hiraṇmayād aṇḍa-kośād utthāya salile śayāt
analyzed: hiraṇmayāt aṇḍa kośāt utthāya salile śayāt

original: BhP_03.26.053/2 tam āviśya mahā-devo bahudhā nirbibheda kham
analyzed: tam āviśya mahādevaḥ bahudhā nirbibheda kham

original: BhP_03.26.054/1 nirabhidyatāsya prathamaṃ mukhaṃ vāṇī tato 'bhavat
analyzed: nirabhidyata asya prathamam mukham vāṇī tatas bhavat

original: BhP_03.26.054/2 vāṇyā vahnir atho nāse prāṇoto ghrāṇa etayoḥ
analyzed: vāṇyāḥ vahniḥ atha u nāse prāṇa utaḥ ghrāṇaḥ etayoḥ

original: BhP_03.26.055/1 ghrāṇād vāyur abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣur etayoḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇāt vāyuḥ abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣuḥ etayoḥ

original: BhP_03.26.055/2 tasmāt sūryo nyabhidyetāṃ karṇau śrotraṃ tato diśaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sūryaḥ nyabhidyetām karṇau śrotram tatas diśaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.056/1 nirbibheda virājas tvag- roma-śmaśrv-ādayas tataḥ
analyzed: nirbibheda virājaḥ tvac roma śmaśru ādayaḥ tatas

original: BhP_03.26.056/2 tata oṣadhayaś cāsan śiśnaṃ nirbibhide tataḥ
analyzed: tatas oṣadhayaḥ ca āsan śiśnam nirbibhide tatas

original: BhP_03.26.057/1 retas tasmād āpa āsan nirabhidyata vai gudam
analyzed: retaḥ tasmāt āpaḥ āsan nirabhidyata vai gudam

original: BhP_03.26.057/2 gudād apāno 'pānāc ca mṛtyur loka-bhayaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: gudāt pānāt ca mṛtyuḥ loka bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_03.26.058/1 hastau ca nirabhidyetāṃ balaṃ tābhyāṃ tataḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: hastau ca nirabhidyetām balam tābhyām tatas svarāj

original: BhP_03.26.058/2 pādau ca nirabhidyetāṃ gatis tābhyāṃ tato hariḥ
analyzed: pādau ca nirabhidyetām gatiḥ tābhyām tatas hariḥ

original: BhP_03.26.059/1 nāḍyo 'sya nirabhidyanta tābhyo lohitam ābhṛtam
analyzed: nāḍyaḥ sya nirabhidyanta tābhyaḥ lohitam ābhṛtam

original: BhP_03.26.059/2 nadyas tataḥ samabhavann udaraṃ nirabhidyata
analyzed: nadyaḥ tatas samabhavan udaram nirabhidyata

original: BhP_03.26.060/1 kṣut-pipāse tataḥ syātāṃ samudras tv etayor abhūt
analyzed: kṣudh pipāse tatas syātām samudraḥ tu etayoḥ abhūt

original: BhP_03.26.060/2 athāsya hṛdayaṃ bhinnaṃ hṛdayān mana utthitam
analyzed: atha asya hṛdayam bhinnam hṛdayāt manaḥ utthitam

original: BhP_03.26.061/1 manasaś candramā jāto buddhir buddher girāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: manasaḥ candramāḥ jātaḥ buddhiḥ buddheḥ girām patiḥ

original: BhP_03.26.061/2 ahaṅkāras tato rudraś cittaṃ caityas tato 'bhavat
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ tatas rudraḥ cittam caityaḥ tatas bhavat

original: BhP_03.26.062/1 ete hy abhyutthitā devā naivāsyotthāpane 'śakan
analyzed: ete hi abhyutthitāḥ devāḥ na eva asya utthāpane śakan

original: BhP_03.26.062/2 punar āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayituṃ kramāt
analyzed: punar āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayitum kramāt

original: BhP_03.26.063/1 vahnir vācā mukhaṃ bheje nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: vahniḥ vācā mukham bheje na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.063/2 ghrāṇena nāsike vāyur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: ghrāṇena nāsike vāyuḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.064/1 akṣiṇī cakṣuṣādityo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: akṣiṇī cakṣuṣā ādityaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.064/2 śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.065/1 tvacaṃ romabhir oṣadhyo nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: tvacam romabhiḥ oṣadhyaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.065/2 retasā śiśnam āpas tu nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: retasā śiśnam āpaḥ tu na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.066/1 gudaṃ mṛtyur apānena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: gudam mṛtyuḥ apānena na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.066/2 hastāv indro balenaiva nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: hastau indraḥ balena eva na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.067/1 viṣṇur gatyaiva caraṇau nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ gatya eva caraṇau na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.067/2 nāḍīr nadyo lohitena nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: nāḍīḥ nadyaḥ lohitena na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.068/1 kṣut-tṛḍbhyām udaraṃ sindhur nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛḍbhyām udaram sindhuḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.068/2 hṛdayaṃ manasā candro nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: hṛdayam manasā candraḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.069/1 buddhyā brahmāpi hṛdayaṃ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: buddhyā brahmā api hṛdayam na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.069/2 rudro 'bhimatyā hṛdayaṃ nodatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
analyzed: rudraḥ bhimatyā hṛdayam na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāj

original: BhP_03.26.070/1 cittena hṛdayaṃ caityaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ prāviśad yadā
analyzed: cittena hṛdayam caityaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ prāviśat yadā

original: BhP_03.26.070/2 virāṭ tadaiva puruṣaḥ salilād udatiṣṭhata
analyzed: virāj tadā eva puruṣaḥ salilāt udatiṣṭhata

original: BhP_03.26.071/1 yathā prasuptaṃ puruṣaṃ prāṇendriya-mano-dhiyaḥ
analyzed: yathā prasuptam puruṣam prāṇa indriya manaḥ dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_03.26.071/2 prabhavanti vinā yena notthāpayitum ojasā
analyzed: prabhavanti vinā yena nā utthāpayitum ojasā

original: BhP_03.26.072/1 tam asmin pratyag-ātmānaṃ dhiyā yoga-pravṛttayā
analyzed: tam asmin pratyagātmānam dhiyā yoga pravṛttayā

original: BhP_03.26.072/2 bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicyātmani cintayet
analyzed: bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicya ātmani cintayet

original: BhP_03.27.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.27.001/1 prakṛti-stho 'pi puruṣo nājyate prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: prakṛti sthaḥ pi puruṣaḥ na ajyate prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.27.001/2 avikārād akartṛtvān nirguṇatvāj jalārkavat
analyzed: avikārāt akartṛ tvāt nirguṇa tvāt jala arka vat

original: BhP_03.27.002/1 sa eṣa yarhi prakṛter guṇeṣv abhiviṣajjate
analyzed: saḥ eṣa yarhi prakṛteḥ guṇeṣu abhiviṣajjate

original: BhP_03.27.002/2 ahaṅkriyā-vimūḍhātmā kartāsmīty abhimanyate
analyzed: ahaṅkriyā vimūḍha ātmā kartāsmi iti abhimanyate

original: BhP_03.27.003/1 tena saṃsāra-padavīm avaśo 'bhyety anirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: tena saṃsāra padavīm avaśaḥ bhyeti anirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.003/2 prāsaṅgikaiḥ karma-doṣaiḥ sad-asan-miśra-yoniṣu
analyzed: prāsaṅgikaiḥ karma doṣaiḥ sat asat miśra yoniṣu

original: BhP_03.27.004/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_03.27.004/2 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne nartha āgamaḥ yathā

original: BhP_03.27.005/1 ata eva śanaiś cittaṃ prasaktam asatāṃ pathi
analyzed: atas eva śanais cittam prasaktam asatām pathi

original: BhP_03.27.005/2 bhakti-yogena tīvreṇa viraktyā ca nayed vaśam
analyzed: bhakti yogena tīvreṇa viraktyā ca nayet vaśam

original: BhP_03.27.006/1 yamādibhir yoga-pathair abhyasañ śraddhayānvitaḥ
analyzed: yama ādibhiḥ yoga pathaiḥ śraddhayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.006/2 mayi bhāvena satyena mat-kathā-śravaṇena ca
analyzed: mayi bhāvena satyena mad kathā śravaṇena ca

original: BhP_03.27.007/1 sarva-bhūta-samatvena nirvaireṇāprasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: sarva bhūta samatvena nirvaireṇa aprasaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_03.27.007/2 brahmacaryeṇa maunena sva-dharmeṇa balīyasā
analyzed: brahmacaryeṇa maunena svadharmeṇa balīyasā

original: BhP_03.27.008/1 yadṛcchayopalabdhena santuṣṭo mita-bhuṅ muniḥ
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upalabdhena santuṣṭaḥ mita bhuj muniḥ

original: BhP_03.27.008/2 vivikta-śaraṇaḥ śānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān
analyzed: vivikta śaraṇaḥ śāntaḥ maitraḥ karuṇaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_03.27.009/1 sānubandhe ca dehe 'sminn akurvann asad-āgraham
analyzed: sānubandhe ca dehe smin akurvan asadāgraham

original: BhP_03.27.009/2 jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
analyzed: jñānena dṛṣṭa tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca

original: BhP_03.27.010/1 nivṛtta-buddhy-avasthāno dūrī-bhūtānya-darśanaḥ
analyzed: nivṛtta buddhi avasthānaḥ dūrībhūtāni adarśanaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.010/2 upalabhyātmanātmānaṃ cakṣuṣevārkam ātma-dṛk
analyzed: upalabhya ātmanā ātmānam cakṣuṣā iva arkam ātma dṛś

original: BhP_03.27.011/1 mukta-liṅgaṃ sad-ābhāsam asati pratipadyate
analyzed: mukta liṅgam sat ābhāsam asati pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.27.011/2 sato bandhum asac-cakṣuḥ sarvānusyūtam advayam
analyzed: sataḥ bandhum sarva anusyūtam advayam

original: BhP_03.27.012/1 yathā jala-stha ābhāsaḥ sthala-sthenāvadṛśyate
analyzed: yathā jala sthaḥ ābhāsaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.012/2 svābhāsena tathā sūryo jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ
analyzed: sva ābhāsena tathā sūryaḥ jala sthena divi sthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.013/1 evaṃ trivṛd-ahaṅkāro bhūtendriya-manomayaiḥ
analyzed: evam trivṛt ahaṅkāraḥ bhūta indriya manaḥ mayaiḥ

original: BhP_03.27.013/2 svābhāsair lakṣito 'nena sad-ābhāsena satya-dṛk
analyzed: sva ābhāsaiḥ lakṣitaḥ nena sat ābhāsena satya dṛś

original: BhP_03.27.014/1 bhūta-sūkṣmendriya-mano- buddhy-ādiṣv iha nidrayā
analyzed: bhūta sūkṣma indriya manaḥ buddhi ādiṣu iha nidrayā

original: BhP_03.27.014/2 līneṣv asati yas tatra vinidro nirahaṅkriyaḥ
BhP_03.27.015/1 manyamānas tadātmānam anaṣṭo naṣṭavan mṛṣā
analyzed: manyamānaḥ tad ātmānam a naṣṭaḥ naṣṭa vat mṛṣā

original: BhP_03.27.015/2 naṣṭe 'haṅkaraṇe draṣṭā naṣṭa-vitta ivāturaḥ
analyzed: naṣṭe haṅkaraṇe draṣṭā naṣṭa vittaḥ iva āturaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.016/1 evaṃ pratyavamṛśyāsāv ātmānaṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: evam pratyavamṛśya asau ātmānam pratipadyate

original: BhP_03.27.016/2 sāhaṅkārasya dravyasya yo 'vasthānam anugrahaḥ
analyzed: sa ahaṅkārasya dravyasya yaḥ anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.017/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.27.017/1 puruṣaṃ prakṛtir brahman na vimuñcati karhicit
analyzed: puruṣam prakṛtiḥ brahman na vimuñcati karhicit

original: BhP_03.27.017/2 anyonyāpāśrayatvāc ca nityatvād anayoḥ prabho
analyzed: anyonya apāśraya tvāt ca nitya tvāt anayoḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.27.018/1 yathā gandhasya bhūmeś ca na bhāvo vyatirekataḥ
analyzed: yathā gandhasya bhūmeḥ ca na bhāvaḥ vyatirekataḥ

original: BhP_03.27.018/2 apāṃ rasasya ca yathā tathā buddheḥ parasya ca
analyzed: apām rasasya ca yathā tathā buddheḥ parasya ca

original: BhP_03.27.019/1 akartuḥ karma-bandho 'yaṃ puruṣasya yad-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: akartuḥ karma bandho yam puruṣasya yadā āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.019/2 guṇeṣu satsu prakṛteḥ kaivalyaṃ teṣv ataḥ katham
analyzed: guṇeṣu satsu prakṛteḥ kaivalyam teṣu atas katham

original: BhP_03.27.020/1 kvacit tattvāvamarśena nivṛttaṃ bhayam ulbaṇam
analyzed: kvacid tattva avamarśena nivṛttam bhayam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_03.27.020/2 anivṛtta-nimittatvāt punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate
analyzed: a nivṛtta nimitta tvāt punar pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: BhP_03.27.021/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.27.021/1 animitta-nimittena sva-dharmeṇāmalātmanā
analyzed: animitta nimittena svadharmeṇa amala ātmanā

original: BhP_03.27.021/2 tīvrayā mayi bhaktyā ca śruta-sambhṛtayā ciram
analyzed: tīvrayā mayi bhaktyā ca śruta sambhṛtayā ciram

original: BhP_03.27.022/1 jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā
analyzed: jñānena dṛṣṭa tattvena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā

original: BhP_03.27.022/2 tapo-yuktena yogena tīvreṇātma-samādhinā
analyzed: tapaḥ yuktena yogena tīvreṇa ātma samādhinā

original: BhP_03.27.023/1 prakṛtiḥ puruṣasyeha dahyamānā tv ahar-niśam
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ puruṣasya iha dahyamānā tu aharniśam

original: BhP_03.27.023/2 tiro-bhavitrī śanakair agner yonir ivāraṇiḥ
analyzed: tirobhavitrī śanakais agneḥ yoniḥ iva araṇiḥ

original: BhP_03.27.024/1 bhukta-bhogā parityaktā dṛṣṭa-doṣā ca nityaśaḥ
analyzed: bhukta bhogā parityaktā dṛṣṭa doṣā ca nityaśas

original: BhP_03.27.024/2 neśvarasyāśubhaṃ dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca
analyzed: na īśvarasya aśubham dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca

original: BhP_03.27.025/1 yathā hy apratibuddhasya prasvāpo bahv-anartha-bhṛt
analyzed: yathā hi a pratibuddhasya prasvāpaḥ bahu anartha bhṛt

original: BhP_03.27.025/2 sa eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate
analyzed: saḥ eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate

original: BhP_03.27.026/1 evaṃ vidita-tattvasya prakṛtir mayi mānasam
analyzed: evam vidita tattvasya prakṛtiḥ mayi mānasam

original: BhP_03.27.026/2 yuñjato nāpakuruta ātmārāmasya karhicit
analyzed: yuñjataḥ na apakurute ātma ārāmasya karhicit

original: BhP_03.27.027/1 yadaivam adhyātma-rataḥ kālena bahu-janmanā
analyzed: yadā evam adhyātma rataḥ kālena bahu janmanā

original: BhP_03.27.027/2 sarvatra jāta-vairāgya ābrahma-bhuvanān muniḥ
analyzed: sarvatra jāta vairāgyaḥ ābrahma bhuvanāt muniḥ

original: BhP_03.27.028/1 mad-bhaktaḥ pratibuddhārtho mat-prasādena bhūyasā
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ pratibuddha arthaḥ mad prasādena bhūyasā

original: BhP_03.27.028/2 niḥśreyasaṃ sva-saṃsthānaṃ kaivalyākhyaṃ mad-āśrayam
analyzed: niḥśreyasam sva saṃsthānam kaivalya ākhyam mad āśrayam

original: BhP_03.27.029/1 prāpnotīhāñjasā dhīraḥ sva-dṛśā cchinna-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prāpnoti iha añjasā dhīraḥ sva dṛśā chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_03.27.029/2 yad gatvā na nivarteta yogī liṅgād vinirgame
analyzed: yat gatvā na nivarteta yogī liṅgāt vinirgame

original: BhP_03.27.030/1 yadā na yogopacitāsu ceto māyāsu siddhasya viṣajjate 'ṅga
analyzed: yadā na yoga upacitāsu cetaḥ māyāsu siddhasya viṣajjate ṅga

original: BhP_03.27.030/2 ananya-hetuṣv atha me gatiḥ syād ātyantikī yatra na mṛtyu-hāsaḥ
analyzed: an anya hetuṣu atha me gatiḥ syāt ātyantikī yatra na mṛtyu hāsaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.28.001/1 yogasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye sabījasya nṛpātmaje
analyzed: yogasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye sa bījasya nṛpa ātmaje

original: BhP_03.28.001/2 mano yenaiva vidhinā prasannaṃ yāti sat-patham
analyzed: manaḥ yena eva vidhinā prasannam yāti sat patham

original: BhP_03.28.002/1 sva-dharmācaraṇaṃ śaktyā vidharmāc ca nivartanam
analyzed: svadharma ācaraṇam śaktyā vidharmāt ca nivartanam

original: BhP_03.28.002/2 daivāl labdhena santoṣa ātmavic-caraṇārcanam
analyzed: daivāt labdhena santoṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.003/1 grāmya-dharma-nivṛttiś ca mokṣa-dharma-ratis tathā
analyzed: grāmya dharma nivṛttiḥ ca mokṣa dharma ratiḥ tathā

original: BhP_03.28.003/2 mita-medhyādanaṃ śaśvad vivikta-kṣema-sevanam
analyzed: mita medhya adanam śaśvat vivikta kṣema sevanam

original: BhP_03.28.004/1 ahiṃsā satyam asteyaṃ yāvad-artha-parigrahaḥ
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam yāvat artha parigrahaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.004/2 brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ svādhyāyaḥ puruṣārcanam
analyzed: brahmacaryam tapaḥ śaucam svādhyāyaḥ puruṣa arcanam

original: BhP_03.28.005/1 maunaṃ sad-āsana-jayaḥ sthairyaṃ prāṇa-jayaḥ śanaiḥ
BhP_03.28.005/2 pratyāhāraś cendriyāṇāṃ viṣayān manasā hṛdi
analyzed: pratyāhāraḥ ca indriyāṇām viṣayāt manasā hṛdi

original: BhP_03.28.006/1 sva-dhiṣṇyānām eka-deśe manasā prāṇa-dhāraṇam
analyzed: sva dhiṣṇyānām eka deśe manasā prāṇa dhāraṇam

original: BhP_03.28.006/2 vaikuṇṭha-līlābhidhyānaṃ samādhānaṃ tathātmanaḥ
BhP_03.28.007/1 etair anyaiś ca pathibhir mano duṣṭam asat-patham
analyzed: etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca pathibhiḥ manaḥ duṣṭam asat patham

original: BhP_03.28.007/2 buddhyā yuñjīta śanakair jita-prāṇo hy atandritaḥ
analyzed: buddhyā yuñjīta śanakais jita prāṇaḥ hi atandritaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.008/1 śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya vijitāsana āsanam
analyzed: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya vijita āsanaḥ āsanam

original: BhP_03.28.008/2 tasmin svasti samāsīna ṛju-kāyaḥ samabhyaset
analyzed: tasmin svasti samāsīnaḥ ṛju kāyaḥ samabhyaset

original: BhP_03.28.009/1 prāṇasya śodhayen mārgaṃ pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ
analyzed: prāṇasya śodhayet mārgam pūra kumbhaka recakaiḥ

original: BhP_03.28.009/2 pratikūlena vā cittaṃ yathā sthiram acañcalam
analyzed: pratikūlena vā cittam yathā sthiram acañcalam

original: BhP_03.28.010/1 mano 'cirāt syād virajaṃ jita-śvāsasya yoginaḥ
analyzed: mano cirāt syāt virajam jita śvāsasya yoginaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.010/2 vāyv-agnibhyāṃ yathā lohaṃ dhmātaṃ tyajati vai malam
analyzed: vāyu agnibhyām yathā loham dhmātam tyajati vai malam

original: BhP_03.28.011/1 prāṇāyāmair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣān
analyzed: dahet

original: BhP_03.28.011/2 pratyāhāreṇa saṃsargān dhyānenānīśvarān guṇān
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa saṃsargān dhyānena anīśvarān guṇān

original: BhP_03.28.012/1 yadā manaḥ svaṃ virajaṃ yogena susamāhitam
analyzed: yadā manaḥ svam virajam yogena su samāhitam

original: BhP_03.28.012/2 kāṣṭhāṃ bhagavato dhyāyet sva-nāsāgrāvalokanaḥ
analyzed: kāṣṭhām bhagavataḥ dhyāyet sva nāsā agra avalokanaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.013/1 prasanna-vadanāmbhojaṃ padma-garbhāruṇekṣaṇam
analyzed: prasanna vadana ambhojam padmagarbha aruṇa īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.28.013/2 nīlotpala-dala-śyāmaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharam
analyzed: nīlotpala dala śyāmam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: BhP_03.28.014/1 lasat-paṅkaja-kiñjalka- pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
BhP_03.28.014/2 śrīvatsa-vakṣasaṃ bhrājat kaustubhāmukta-kandharam
analyzed: śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubha mukta kandharam

original: BhP_03.28.015/1 matta-dvirepha-kalayā parītaṃ vana-mālayā
analyzed: matta dvirepha kalayā parītam vanamālayā

original: BhP_03.28.015/2 parārdhya-hāra-valaya- kirīṭāṅgada-nūpuram
BhP_03.28.016/1 kāñcī-guṇollasac-chroṇiṃ hṛdayāmbhoja-viṣṭaram
analyzed: kāñcī guṇa ullasat śroṇim hṛdaya ambhoja viṣṭaram

original: BhP_03.28.016/2 darśanīyatamaṃ śāntaṃ mano-nayana-vardhanam
analyzed: darśanīyatamam śāntam manaḥ nayana vardhanam

original: BhP_03.28.017/1 apīcya-darśanaṃ śaśvat sarva-loka-namaskṛtam
analyzed: apīcya darśanam śaśvat sarva loka namaskṛtam

original: BhP_03.28.017/2 santaṃ vayasi kaiśore bhṛtyānugraha-kātaram
analyzed: santam vayasi kaiśore bhṛtya anugraha kātaram

original: BhP_03.28.018/1 kīrtanya-tīrtha-yaśasaṃ puṇya-śloka-yaśaskaram
BhP_03.28.018/2 dhyāyed devaṃ samagrāṅgaṃ yāvan na cyavate manaḥ
analyzed: dhyāyet devam samagra aṅgam yāvat na cyavate manaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.019/1 sthitaṃ vrajantam āsīnaṃ śayānaṃ vā guhāśayam
analyzed: sthitam vrajantam āsīnam śayānam vā guhā āśayam

original: BhP_03.28.019/2 prekṣaṇīyehitaṃ dhyāyec chuddha-bhāvena cetasā
analyzed: prekṣaṇīya īhitam dhyāyet śuddha bhāvena cetasā

original: BhP_03.28.020/1 tasmin labdha-padaṃ cittaṃ sarvāvayava-saṃsthitam
analyzed: tasmin labdha padam cittam sarva avayava saṃsthitam

original: BhP_03.28.020/2 vilakṣyaikatra saṃyujyād aṅge bhagavato muniḥ
analyzed: vilakṣya ekatra saṃyujyāt aṅge bhagavataḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_03.28.021/1 sañcintayed bhagavataś caraṇāravindaṃ
analyzed: sañcintayet bhagavataḥ caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_03.28.021/2 vajrāṅkuśa-dhvaja-saroruha-lāñchanāḍhyam
BhP_03.28.021/3 uttuṅga-rakta-vilasan-nakha-cakravāla-
analyzed: uttuṅga rakta vilasat nakha cakravāla

original: BhP_03.28.021/4 jyotsnābhir āhata-mahad-dhṛdayāndhakāram
analyzed: jyotsnābhiḥ āhata mahat hṛdaya andhakāram

original: BhP_03.28.022/1 yac-chauca-niḥsṛta-sarit-pravarodakena
analyzed: yat śauca niḥsṛta sarit pravara udakena

original: BhP_03.28.022/2 tīrthena mūrdhny adhikṛtena śivaḥ śivo 'bhūt
analyzed: tīrthena mūrdhni adhikṛtena śivaḥ śivaḥ bhūt

original: BhP_03.28.022/3 dhyātur manaḥ-śamala-śaila-nisṛṣṭa-vajraṃ
analyzed: dhyātuḥ manaḥ śamala śaila nisṛṣṭa vajram

original: BhP_03.28.022/4 dhyāyec ciraṃ bhagavataś caraṇāravindam
analyzed: dhyāyet ciram bhagavataḥ caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_03.28.023/1 jānu-dvayaṃ jalaja-locanayā jananyā
analyzed: jānu dvayam jalaja locanayā jananyā

original: BhP_03.28.023/2 lakṣmyākhilasya sura-vanditayā vidhātuḥ
analyzed: lakṣmyā akhilasya sura vanditayā vidhātuḥ

original: BhP_03.28.023/3 ūrvor nidhāya kara-pallava-rociṣā yat
analyzed: ūrvoḥ nidhāya karapallava rociṣā yat

original: BhP_03.28.023/4 saṃlālitaṃ hṛdi vibhor abhavasya kuryāt
analyzed: saṃlālitam hṛdi vibhoḥ abhavasya kuryāt

original: BhP_03.28.024/1 ūrū suparṇa-bhujayor adhi śobhamānāv
analyzed: ūrū suparṇa bhujayoḥ adhi śobhamānau

original: BhP_03.28.024/2 ojo-nidhī atasikā-kusumāvabhāsau
analyzed: ojaḥ nidhī atasikā kusuma avabhāsau

original: BhP_03.28.024/3 vyālambi-pīta-vara-vāsasi vartamāna-
analyzed: vyālambi pīta vara vāsasi vartamāna

original: BhP_03.28.024/4 kāñcī-kalāpa-parirambhi nitamba-bimbam
analyzed: kāñcī kalāpa parirambhi nitamba bimbam

original: BhP_03.28.025/1 nābhi-hradaṃ bhuvana-kośa-guhodara-sthaṃ
analyzed: nābhi hradam bhuvanakośa guhā udara stham

original: BhP_03.28.025/2 yatrātma-yoni-dhiṣaṇākhila-loka-padmam
analyzed: yatra ātmayoni dhiṣaṇa akhila loka padmam

original: BhP_03.28.025/3 vyūḍhaṃ harin-maṇi-vṛṣa-stanayor amuṣya
analyzed: vyūḍham harinmaṇi vṛṣa stanayoḥ amuṣya

original: BhP_03.28.025/4 dhyāyed dvayaṃ viśada-hāra-mayūkha-gauram
BhP_03.28.026/1 vakṣo 'dhivāsam ṛṣabhasya mahā-vibhūteḥ
analyzed: vakṣaḥ dhivāsam ṛṣabhasya mahā vibhūteḥ

original: BhP_03.28.026/2 puṃsāṃ mano-nayana-nirvṛtim ādadhānam
analyzed: puṃsām manaḥ nayana nirvṛtim ādadhānam

original: BhP_03.28.026/3 kaṇṭhaṃ ca kaustubha-maṇer adhibhūṣaṇārthaṃ
analyzed: kaṇṭham ca kaustubha maṇeḥ adhibhūṣaṇa artham

original: BhP_03.28.026/4 kuryān manasy akhila-loka-namaskṛtasya
analyzed: kuryāt manasi akhila loka namaskṛtasya

original: BhP_03.28.027/1 bāhūṃś ca mandara-gireḥ parivartanena
analyzed: bāhūn ca mandara gireḥ parivartanena

original: BhP_03.28.027/2 nirṇikta-bāhu-valayān adhiloka-pālān
analyzed: nirṇikta bāhu valayān adhi lokapālān

original: BhP_03.28.027/3 sañcintayed daśa-śatāram asahya-tejaḥ
analyzed: sañcintayet daśa śatāram asahya tejaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.027/4 śaṅkhaṃ ca tat-kara-saroruha-rāja-haṃsam
analyzed: śaṅkham ca tad kara saroruha rājahaṃsam

original: BhP_03.28.028/1 kaumodakīṃ bhagavato dayitāṃ smareta
analyzed: kaumodakīm bhagavataḥ dayitām smareta

original: BhP_03.28.028/2 digdhām arāti-bhaṭa-śoṇita-kardamena
analyzed: digdhām arāti bhaṭa śoṇita kardamena

original: BhP_03.28.028/3 mālāṃ madhuvrata-varūtha-giropaghuṣṭāṃ
analyzed: mālām madhu vrata varūtha girā upaghuṣṭām

original: BhP_03.28.028/4 caityasya tattvam amalaṃ maṇim asya kaṇṭhe
analyzed: caityasya tattvam amalam maṇim asya kaṇṭhe

original: BhP_03.28.029/1 bhṛtyānukampita-dhiyeha gṛhīta-mūrteḥ
analyzed: bhṛtya anukampita dhiyā iha gṛhīta mūrteḥ

original: BhP_03.28.029/2 sañcintayed bhagavato vadanāravindam
analyzed: sañcintayet bhagavataḥ vadana aravindam

original: BhP_03.28.029/3 yad visphuran-makara-kuṇḍala-valgitena
analyzed: yat visphurat makara kuṇḍala valgitena

original: BhP_03.28.029/4 vidyotitāmala-kapolam udāra-nāsam
analyzed: vidyotita amala kapolam udāra nāsam

original: BhP_03.28.030/1 yac chrī-niketam alibhiḥ parisevyamānaṃ
analyzed: yat śrīniketam alibhiḥ parisevyamānam

original: BhP_03.28.030/2 bhūtyā svayā kuṭila-kuntala-vṛnda-juṣṭam
analyzed: bhūtyā svayā kuṭila kuntala vṛnda juṣṭam

original: BhP_03.28.030/3 mīna-dvayāśrayam adhikṣipad abja-netraṃ
analyzed: mīna dvaya āśrayam adhikṣipat abja netram

original: BhP_03.28.030/4 dhyāyen manomayam atandrita ullasad-bhru
analyzed: dhyāyet manaḥ mayam atandritaḥ ullasat bhru

original: BhP_03.28.031/1 tasyāvalokam adhikaṃ kṛpayātighora-
analyzed: tasya avalokam adhikam kṛpayā ati ghora

original: BhP_03.28.031/2 tāpa-trayopaśamanāya nisṛṣṭam akṣṇoḥ
analyzed: tāpa traya upaśamanāya nisṛṣṭam akṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_03.28.031/3 snigdha-smitānuguṇitaṃ vipula-prasādaṃ
analyzed: snigdha smita anuguṇitam vipula prasādam

original: BhP_03.28.031/4 dhyāyec ciraṃ vipula-bhāvanayā guhāyām
analyzed: dhyāyet ciram vipula bhāvanayā guhāyām

original: BhP_03.28.032/1 hāsaṃ harer avanatākhila-loka-tīvra-
analyzed: hāsam hareḥ avanata akhila loka tīvra

original: BhP_03.28.032/2 śokāśru-sāgara-viśoṣaṇam atyudāram
analyzed: śoka aśru sāgara viśoṣaṇam ati udāram

original: BhP_03.28.032/3 sammohanāya racitaṃ nija-māyayāsya
analyzed: sammohanāya racitam nija māyayā asya

original: BhP_03.28.032/4 bhrū-maṇḍalaṃ muni-kṛte makara-dhvajasya
analyzed: bhrū maṇḍalam muni kṛte makaradhvajasya

original: BhP_03.28.033/1 dhyānāyanaṃ prahasitaṃ bahulādharoṣṭha-
analyzed: dhyāna ayanam prahasitam bahula adhara uṣṭha

original: BhP_03.28.033/2 bhāsāruṇāyita-tanu-dvija-kunda-paṅkti
BhP_03.28.033/3 dhyāyet svadeha-kuhare 'vasitasya viṣṇor
analyzed: dhyāyet sva deha kuhare vasitasya viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_03.28.033/4 bhaktyārdrayārpita-manā na pṛthag didṛkṣet
analyzed: bhakti ārdrayā arpita manāḥ na pṛthak didṛkṣet

original: BhP_03.28.034/1 evaṃ harau bhagavati pratilabdha-bhāvo
analyzed: evam harau bhagavati

original: BhP_03.28.034/2 bhaktyā dravad-dhṛdaya utpulakaḥ pramodāt
analyzed: bhaktyā dravat hṛdayaḥ utpulakaḥ pramodāt

original: BhP_03.28.034/3 autkaṇṭhya-bāṣpa-kalayā muhur ardyamānas
analyzed: autkaṇṭhya bāṣpa kalayā muhur ardyamānaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.034/4 tac cāpi citta-baḍiśaṃ śanakair viyuṅkte
analyzed: tat ca api citta baḍiśam śanakais viyuṅkte

original: BhP_03.28.035/1 muktāśrayaṃ yarhi nirviṣayaṃ viraktaṃ
analyzed: mukta āśrayam yarhi nirviṣayam viraktam

original: BhP_03.28.035/2 nirvāṇam ṛcchati manaḥ sahasā yathārciḥ
analyzed: nirvāṇam ṛcchati manaḥ sahasā yathā arciḥ

original: BhP_03.28.035/3 ātmānam atra puruṣo 'vyavadhānam ekam
analyzed: ātmānam atra puruṣaḥ vyavadhānam ekam

original: BhP_03.28.035/4 anvīkṣate pratinivṛtta-guṇa-pravāhaḥ
analyzed: anvīkṣate pratinivṛtta guṇa pravāhaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.036/1 so 'py etayā caramayā manaso nivṛttyā
analyzed: saḥ u pi etayā caramayā manasaḥ nivṛttyā

original: BhP_03.28.036/2 tasmin mahimny avasitaḥ sukha-duḥkha-bāhye
analyzed: tasmin mahimni avasitaḥ sukha duḥkha bāhye

original: BhP_03.28.036/3 hetutvam apy asati kartari duḥkhayor yat
analyzed: hetu tvam api asati kartari duḥkhayoḥ yat

original: BhP_03.28.036/4 svātman vidhatta upalabdha-parātma-kāṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: sva ātman vidhatte upalabdha parātma kāṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.037/1 dehaṃ ca taṃ na caramaḥ sthitam utthitaṃ vā
analyzed: deham ca tam na caramaḥ sthitam utthitam vā

original: BhP_03.28.037/2 siddho vipaśyati yato 'dhyagamat svarūpam
analyzed: siddhaḥ vipaśyati yatas dhi agamat sva rūpam

original: BhP_03.28.037/3 daivād upetam atha daiva-vaśād apetaṃ
analyzed: daivāt upetam atha daiva vaśāt apetam

original: BhP_03.28.037/4 vāso yathā parikṛtaṃ madirā-madāndhaḥ
analyzed: vāsaḥ yathā parikṛtam madirā mada andhaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.038/1 deho 'pi daiva-vaśagaḥ khalu karma yāvat
analyzed: dehaḥ pi daiva vaśagaḥ khalu karma yāvat

original: BhP_03.28.038/2 svārambhakaṃ pratisamīkṣata eva sāsuḥ
analyzed: sva ārambhakam pratisamīkṣate eva sāsuḥ

original: BhP_03.28.038/3 taṃ sa-prapañcam adhirūḍha-samādhi-yogaḥ
analyzed: tam sa prapañcam adhirūḍha samādhi yogaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.038/4 svāpnaṃ punar na bhajate pratibuddha-vastuḥ
analyzed: svāpnam punar na bhajate pratibuddha vastuḥ

original: BhP_03.28.039/1 yathā putrāc ca vittāc ca pṛthaṅ martyaḥ pratīyate
analyzed: yathā putrāt ca vittāt ca pṛthak martyaḥ pratīyate

original: BhP_03.28.039/2 apy ātmatvenābhimatād dehādeḥ puruṣas tathā
analyzed: api ātma tvena abhimatāt deha ādeḥ puruṣaḥ tathā

original: BhP_03.28.040/1 yatholmukād visphuliṅgād dhūmād vāpi sva-sambhavāt
analyzed: yathā ulmukāt visphuliṅgāt dhūmāt vā api sva sambhavāt

original: BhP_03.28.040/2 apy ātmatvenābhimatād yathāgniḥ pṛthag ulmukāt
analyzed: api ātma tvena abhimatāt yathā agniḥ pṛthak ulmukāt

original: BhP_03.28.041/1 bhūtendriyāntaḥ-karaṇāt pradhānāj jīva-saṃjñitāt
analyzed: bhūta indriya antaḥkaraṇāt pradhānāt jīva saṃjñitāt

original: BhP_03.28.041/2 ātmā tathā pṛthag draṣṭā bhagavān brahma-saṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: ātmā tathā pṛthak draṣṭā bhagavān brahma saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.042/1 sarva-bhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarva-bhūtāni cātmani
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu ca ātmānam sarva bhūtāni ca ātmani

original: BhP_03.28.042/2 īkṣetānanya-bhāvena bhūteṣv iva tad-ātmatām
analyzed: īkṣeta ananya bhāvena bhūteṣu iva tadā ātmatām

original: BhP_03.28.043/1 sva-yoniṣu yathā jyotir ekaṃ nānā pratīyate
analyzed: sva yoniṣu yathā jyotiḥ ekam nānā pratīyate

original: BhP_03.28.043/2 yonīnāṃ guṇa-vaiṣamyāt tathātmā prakṛtau sthitaḥ
analyzed: yonīnām guṇa vaiṣamyāt tathā ātmā prakṛtau sthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.28.044/1 tasmād imāṃ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ daivīṃ sad-asad-ātmikām
analyzed: tasmāt imām svām prakṛtim daivīm sadasat ātmikām

original: BhP_03.28.044/2 durvibhāvyāṃ parābhāvya svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: durvibhāvyām parābhāvya sva rūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate

original: BhP_03.29.001/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.29.001/1 lakṣaṇaṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
analyzed: lakṣaṇam mahat ādīnām prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca

original: BhP_03.29.001/2 svarūpaṃ lakṣyate 'mīṣāṃ yena tat-pāramārthikam
analyzed: svarūpam lakṣyate mīṣām yena tat pāramārthikam

original: BhP_03.29.002/1 yathā sāṅkhyeṣu kathitaṃ yan-mūlaṃ tat pracakṣate
analyzed: yathā sāṅkhyeṣu kathitam yat mūlam tat pracakṣate

original: BhP_03.29.002/2 bhakti-yogasya me mārgaṃ brūhi vistaraśaḥ prabho
analyzed: bhakti yogasya me mārgam brūhi vistaraśaḥ prabho

original: BhP_03.29.003/1 virāgo yena puruṣo bhagavan sarvato bhavet
analyzed: virāgaḥ yena puruṣaḥ bhagavan sarvatas bhavet

original: BhP_03.29.003/2 ācakṣva jīva-lokasya vividhā mama saṃsṛtīḥ
analyzed: ācakṣva jīva lokasya vividhāḥ mama saṃsṛtīḥ

original: BhP_03.29.004/1 kālasyeśvara-rūpasya pareṣāṃ ca parasya te
analyzed: kālasya īśvara rūpasya pareṣām ca parasya te

original: BhP_03.29.004/2 svarūpaṃ bata kurvanti yad-dhetoḥ kuśalaṃ janāḥ
analyzed: sva rūpam bata kurvanti yaddhetoḥ kuśalam janāḥ

original: BhP_03.29.005/1 lokasya mithyābhimater acakṣuṣaś ciraṃ prasuptasya tamasy anāśraye
analyzed: lokasya mithyā abhimateḥ a cakṣuṣaḥ ciram prasuptasya tamasi anāśraye

original: BhP_03.29.005/2 śrāntasya karmasv anuviddhayā dhiyā tvam āvirāsīḥ kila yoga-bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: śrāntasya karmasu anuviddhayā dhiyā tvam āvirāsīḥ kila yoga bhāskaraḥ

original: BhP_03.29.006/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.29.006/1 iti mātur vacaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ pratinandya mahā-muniḥ
analyzed: iti mātuḥ vacaḥ ślakṣṇam pratinandya mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_03.29.006/2 ābabhāṣe kuru-śreṣṭha prītas tāṃ karuṇārditaḥ
analyzed: ābabhāṣe kuru śreṣṭha prītaḥ tām karuṇā arditaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.007/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.29.007/1 bhakti-yogo bahu-vidho mārgair bhāmini bhāvyate
analyzed: bhakti yogaḥ bahuvidhaḥ mārgaiḥ bhāmini bhāvyate

original: BhP_03.29.007/2 svabhāva-guṇa-mārgeṇa puṃsāṃ bhāvo vibhidyate
analyzed: svabhāva guṇa mārgeṇa puṃsām bhāvaḥ vibhidyate

original: BhP_03.29.008/1 abhisandhāya yo hiṃsāṃ dambhaṃ mātsaryam eva vā
analyzed: abhisandhāya yaḥ hiṃsām dambham mātsaryam eva vā

original: BhP_03.29.008/2 saṃrambhī bhinna-dṛg bhāvaṃ mayi kuryāt sa tāmasaḥ
analyzed: saṃrambhī bhinnadṛś bhāvam mayi kuryāt sa tāmasaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.009/1 viṣayān abhisandhāya yaśa aiśvaryam eva vā
analyzed: viṣayān abhisandhāya yaśaḥ aiśvaryam eva vā

original: BhP_03.29.009/2 arcādāv arcayed yo māṃ pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa rājasaḥ
analyzed: arcā ādau arcayet yaḥ mām pṛthak bhāvaḥ sa rājasaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.010/1 karma-nirhāram uddiśya parasmin vā tad-arpaṇam
analyzed: karma nirhāram uddiśya parasmin vā tad arpaṇam

original: BhP_03.29.010/2 yajed yaṣṭavyam iti vā pṛthag-bhāvaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ
analyzed: yajet yaṣṭavyam iti vā pṛthak bhāvaḥ sa sāttvikaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.011/1 mad-guṇa-śruti-mātreṇa mayi sarva-guhāśaye
analyzed: mad guṇa śruti mātreṇa mayi sarva guhā āśaye

original: BhP_03.29.011/2 mano-gatir avicchinnā yathā gaṅgāmbhaso 'mbudhau
analyzed: manogatiḥ avicchinnā yathā gaṅgā ambhasaḥ mbudhau

original: BhP_03.29.012/1 lakṣaṇaṃ bhakti-yogasya nirguṇasya hy udāhṛtam
analyzed: lakṣaṇam bhakti yogasya nirguṇasya hi udāhṛtam

original: BhP_03.29.012/2 ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame
BhP_03.29.013/1 sālokya-sārṣṭi-sāmīpya- sārūpyaikatvam apy uta
BhP_03.29.013/2 dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ
analyzed: dīyamānam na gṛhṇanti vinā mad sevanam janāḥ

original: BhP_03.29.014/1 sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva bhakti yoga ākhyaḥ ātyantikaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.014/2 yenātivrajya tri-guṇaṃ mad-bhāvāyopapadyate
analyzed: yena ativrajya triguṇam mad bhāvāya upapadyate

original: BhP_03.29.015/1 niṣevitenānimittena sva-dharmeṇa mahīyasā
analyzed: niṣevitena animittena svadharmeṇa mahīyasā

original: BhP_03.29.015/2 kriyā-yogena śastena nātihiṃsreṇa nityaśaḥ
analyzed: kriyā yogena śastena na ati hiṃsreṇa nityaśas

original: BhP_03.29.016/1 mad-dhiṣṇya-darśana-sparśa- pūjā-stuty-abhivandanaiḥ
analyzed: mad dhiṣṇya darśana sparśa pūjā stuti abhivandanaiḥ

original: BhP_03.29.016/2 bhūteṣu mad-bhāvanayā sattvenāsaṅgamena ca
analyzed: bhūteṣu mad bhāvanayā sattvena asaṅgamena ca

original: BhP_03.29.017/1 mahatāṃ bahu-mānena dīnānām anukampayā
analyzed: mahatām bahu mānena dīnānām anukampayā

original: BhP_03.29.017/2 maitryā caivātma-tulyeṣu yamena niyamena ca
analyzed: maitryā ca eva ātma tulyeṣu yamena niyamena ca

original: BhP_03.29.018/1 ādhyātmikānuśravaṇān nāma-saṅkīrtanāc ca me
analyzed: ādhyātmika anuśravaṇāt nāma saṅkīrtanāt ca me

original: BhP_03.29.018/2 ārjavenārya-saṅgena nirahaṅkriyayā tathā
analyzed: ārjavena ari asaṅgena nirahaṅkriyayā tathā

original: BhP_03.29.019/1 mad-dharmaṇo guṇair etaiḥ parisaṃśuddha āśayaḥ
analyzed: mad dharmaṇaḥ guṇaiḥ etaiḥ parisaṃśuddhaḥ āśayaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.019/2 puruṣasyāñjasābhyeti śruta-mātra-guṇaṃ hi mām
analyzed: puruṣasya añjasā abhyeti śruta mātra guṇam hi mām

original: BhP_03.29.020/1 yathā vāta-ratho ghrāṇam āvṛṅkte gandha āśayāt
analyzed: yathā vāta rathaḥ ghrāṇam āvṛṅkte gandhaḥ āśayāt

original: BhP_03.29.020/2 evaṃ yoga-rataṃ ceta ātmānam avikāri yat
analyzed: evam yoga ratam cetaḥ ātmānam avikāri yat

original: BhP_03.29.021/1 ahaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūtātmāvasthitaḥ sadā
analyzed: aham sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūta ātmā avasthitaḥ sadā

original: BhP_03.29.021/2 tam avajñāya māṃ martyaḥ kurute 'rcā-viḍambanam
analyzed: tam avajñāya mām martyaḥ kurute rcā viḍambanam

original: BhP_03.29.022/1 yo māṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu santam ātmānam īśvaram
analyzed: yaḥ mām sarveṣu bhūteṣu santam ātmānam īśvaram

original: BhP_03.29.022/2 hitvārcāṃ bhajate mauḍhyād bhasmany eva juhoti saḥ
analyzed: hitvā arcām bhajate mauḍhyāt bhasmani eva juhoti saḥ

original: BhP_03.29.023/1 dviṣataḥ para-kāye māṃ mānino bhinna-darśinaḥ
analyzed: dviṣataḥ para kāye mām māninaḥ bhinnadarśinaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.023/2 bhūteṣu baddha-vairasya na manaḥ śāntim ṛcchati
analyzed: bhūteṣu baddhavairasya na manaḥ śāntim ṛcchati

original: BhP_03.29.024/1 aham uccāvacair dravyaiḥ kriyayotpannayānaghe
analyzed: aham uccāvacaiḥ dravyaiḥ kriyayā utpannayā anaghe

original: BhP_03.29.024/2 naiva tuṣye 'rcito 'rcāyāṃ bhūta-grāmāvamāninaḥ
analyzed: na eva tuṣye rcitaḥ rcāyām bhūta grāma avamāninaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.025/1 arcādāv arcayet tāvad īśvaraṃ māṃ sva-karma-kṛt
analyzed: arcā ādau arcayet tāvat īśvaram mām sva karma kṛt

original: BhP_03.29.025/2 yāvan na veda sva-hṛdi sarva-bhūteṣv avasthitam
analyzed: yāvat na veda sva hṛdi sarva bhūteṣu avasthitam

original: BhP_03.29.026/1 ātmanaś ca parasyāpi yaḥ karoty antarodaram
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca parasya api yaḥ karoti antara udaram

original: BhP_03.29.026/2 tasya bhinna-dṛśo mṛtyur vidadhe bhayam ulbaṇam
analyzed: tasya bhinnadṛśaḥ mṛtyuḥ vidadhe bhayam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_03.29.027/1 atha māṃ sarva-bhūteṣu bhūtātmānaṃ kṛtālayam
analyzed: atha mām sarva bhūteṣu bhūtātmānam kṛta ālayam

original: BhP_03.29.027/2 arhayed dāna-mānābhyāṃ maitryābhinnena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: arhayet dāna mānābhyām maitryā abhinnena cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_03.29.028/1 jīvāḥ śreṣṭhā hy ajīvānāṃ tataḥ prāṇa-bhṛtaḥ śubhe
analyzed: jīvāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ hi ajīvānām tatas prāṇabhṛtaḥ śubhe

original: BhP_03.29.028/2 tataḥ sa-cittāḥ pravarās tataś cendriya-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa cittāḥ pravarāḥ tatas ca indriya vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.029/1 tatrāpi sparśa-vedibhyaḥ pravarā rasa-vedinaḥ
analyzed: tatra api sparśa vedibhyaḥ pravarāḥ rasa vedinaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.029/2 tebhyo gandha-vidaḥ śreṣṭhās tataḥ śabda-vido varāḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ gandha vidaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ tatas śabda vidaḥ varāḥ

original: BhP_03.29.030/1 rūpa-bheda-vidas tatra tataś cobhayato-dataḥ
analyzed: rūpa bheda vidaḥ tatra tatas ca ubhaya todataḥ

original: BhP_03.29.030/2 teṣāṃ bahu-padāḥ śreṣṭhāś catuṣ-pādas tato dvi-pāt
analyzed: teṣām bahu padāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ catuṣpādaḥ tatas dvipād

original: BhP_03.29.031/1 tato varṇāś ca catvāras teṣāṃ brāhmaṇa uttamaḥ
analyzed: tatas varṇāḥ ca catvāraḥ teṣām brāhmaṇaḥ uttamaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.031/2 brāhmaṇeṣv api veda-jño hy artha-jño 'bhyadhikas tataḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇeṣu api veda jñaḥ hi artha jñaḥ bhyadhikaḥ tatas

original: BhP_03.29.032/1 artha-jñāt saṃśaya-cchettā tataḥ śreyān sva-karma-kṛt
analyzed: artha jñāt saṃśaya chettā tatas śreyān sva karma kṛt

original: BhP_03.29.032/2 mukta-saṅgas tato bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ tatas bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.033/1 tasmān mayy arpitāśeṣa- kriyārthātmā nirantaraḥ
analyzed: tasmāt mayi arpita aśeṣa kriyā artha ātmā nirantaraḥ

original: BhP_03.29.033/2 mayy arpitātmanaḥ puṃso mayi sannyasta-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: mayi arpita ātmanaḥ puṃsaḥ mayi sannyasta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.033/3 na paśyāmi paraṃ bhūtam akartuḥ sama-darśanāt
analyzed: na paśyāmi param bhūtam akartuḥ samadarśanāt

original: BhP_03.29.034/1 manasaitāni bhūtāni praṇamed bahu-mānayan
analyzed: manasā etāni bhūtāni praṇamet bahu mānayan

original: BhP_03.29.034/2 īśvaro jīva-kalayā praviṣṭo bhagavān iti
analyzed: īśvaraḥ jīva kalayā praviṣṭaḥ bhagavān iti

original: BhP_03.29.035/1 bhakti-yogaś ca yogaś ca mayā mānavy udīritaḥ
analyzed: bhakti yogaḥ ca yogaḥ ca mayā mānavi udīritaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.035/2 yayor ekatareṇaiva puruṣaḥ puruṣaṃ vrajet
analyzed: yayoḥ ekatareṇa eva puruṣaḥ puruṣam vrajet

original: BhP_03.29.036/1 etad bhagavato rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: etat bhagavataḥ rūpam brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.036/2 paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ daivaṃ karma-viceṣṭitam
analyzed: param pradhānam puruṣam daivam karma viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_03.29.037/1 rūpa-bhedāspadaṃ divyaṃ kāla ity abhidhīyate
analyzed: rūpa bheda āspadam divyam kālaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: BhP_03.29.037/2 bhūtānāṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ yato bhinna-dṛśāṃ bhayam
analyzed: bhūtānām mahat ādīnām yatas bhinnadṛśām bhayam

original: BhP_03.29.038/1 yo 'ntaḥ praviśya bhūtāni bhūtair atty akhilāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ntar praviśya bhūtāni bhūtaiḥ atti akhila āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.038/2 sa viṣṇv-ākhyo 'dhiyajño 'sau kālaḥ kalayatāṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: sa viṣṇu ākhyaḥ sau kālaḥ kalayatām prabhuḥ

original: BhP_03.29.039/1 na cāsya kaścid dayito na dveṣyo na ca bāndhavaḥ
analyzed: na ca asya kaścid dayitaḥ na dveṣyaḥ na ca bāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.039/2 āviśaty apramatto 'sau pramattaṃ janam anta-kṛt
analyzed: āviśati apramattaḥ sau pramattam janam anta kṛt

original: BhP_03.29.040/1 yad-bhayād vāti vāto 'yaṃ sūryas tapati yad-bhayāt
analyzed: yad bhayāt vāti vātaḥ yam sūryaḥ tapati yad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.29.040/2 yad-bhayād varṣate devo bha-gaṇo bhāti yad-bhayāt
analyzed: yad bhayāt varṣate devaḥ bhagaṇaḥ bhāti yad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.29.041/1 yad vanaspatayo bhītā latāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
analyzed: yat vanaspatayaḥ bhītāḥ latāḥ ca oṣadhibhiḥ saha

original: BhP_03.29.041/2 sve sve kāle 'bhigṛhṇanti puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
analyzed: sve sve kāle bhigṛhṇanti puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca

original: BhP_03.29.042/1 sravanti sarito bhītā notsarpaty udadhir yataḥ
analyzed: sravanti saritaḥ bhītāḥ nā utsarpati udadhiḥ yatas

original: BhP_03.29.042/2 agnir indhe sa-giribhir bhūr na majjati yad-bhayāt
analyzed: agniḥ indhe sa giribhiḥ bhūḥ na majjati yad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.29.043/1 nabho dadāti śvasatāṃ padaṃ yan-niyamād adaḥ
analyzed: nabhaḥ dadāti śvasatām padam yat niyamāt adaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.043/2 lokaṃ sva-dehaṃ tanute mahān saptabhir āvṛtam
analyzed: lokam sva deham tanute mahān saptabhiḥ āvṛtam

original: BhP_03.29.044/1 guṇābhimānino devāḥ sargādiṣv asya yad-bhayāt
analyzed: guṇa abhimāninaḥ devāḥ sarga ādiṣu asya yad bhayāt

original: BhP_03.29.044/2 vartante 'nuyugaṃ yeṣāṃ vaśa etac carācaram
analyzed: vartante nu yugam yeṣām vaśe etat carācaram

original: BhP_03.29.045/1 so 'nanto 'nta-karaḥ kālo 'nādir ādi-kṛd avyayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ na ntaḥ nta karaḥ kālaḥ na ādiḥ ādi kṛt avyayaḥ

original: BhP_03.29.045/2 janaṃ janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunāntakam
analyzed: janam janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunā antakam

original: BhP_03.30.001/0 kapila uvāca
analyzed: kapilaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.30.001/1 tasyaitasya jano nūnaṃ nāyaṃ vedoru-vikramam
analyzed: tasya etasya janaḥ nūnam na ayam veda uru vikramam

original: BhP_03.30.001/2 kālyamāno 'pi balino vāyor iva ghanāvaliḥ
analyzed: kālyamānaḥ pi balinaḥ vāyoḥ iva ghana āvaliḥ

original: BhP_03.30.002/1 yaṃ yam artham upādatte duḥkhena sukha-hetave
analyzed: yam yam artham upādatte duḥkhena sukha hetave

original: BhP_03.30.002/2 taṃ taṃ dhunoti bhagavān pumān chocati yat-kṛte
analyzed: tam tam dhunoti bhagavān pumān śocati yatkṛte

original: BhP_03.30.003/1 yad adhruvasya dehasya sānubandhasya durmatiḥ
analyzed: yat adhruvasya dehasya sa anubandhasya durmatiḥ

original: BhP_03.30.003/2 dhruvāṇi manyate mohād gṛha-kṣetra-vasūni ca
analyzed: dhruvāṇi manyate mohāt gṛha kṣetra vasūni ca

original: BhP_03.30.004/1 jantur vai bhava etasmin yāṃ yāṃ yonim anuvrajet
analyzed: jantuḥ vai bhave etasmin yām yām yonim anuvrajet

original: BhP_03.30.004/2 tasyāṃ tasyāṃ sa labhate nirvṛtiṃ na virajyate
analyzed: tasyām tasyām sa labhate nirvṛtim na virajyate

original: BhP_03.30.005/1 naraka-stho 'pi dehaṃ vai na pumāṃs tyaktum icchati
analyzed: naraka sthaḥ deham vai na pumān tyaktum icchati

original: BhP_03.30.005/2 nārakyāṃ nirvṛtau satyāṃ deva-māyā-vimohitaḥ
analyzed: nārakyām nirvṛtau satyām deva māyā vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.006/1 ātma-jāyā-sutāgāra- paśu-draviṇa-bandhuṣu
analyzed: ātma jāyā suta āgāra paśu draviṇa bandhuṣu

original: BhP_03.30.006/2 nirūḍha-mūla-hṛdaya ātmānaṃ bahu manyate
analyzed: nirūḍha mūla hṛdayaḥ ātmānam bahu manyate

original: BhP_03.30.007/1 sandahyamāna-sarvāṅga eṣām udvahanādhinā
analyzed: sandahyamāna sarva aṅgaḥ eṣām udvahana ādhinā

original: BhP_03.30.007/2 karoty avirataṃ mūḍho duritāni durāśayaḥ
analyzed: karoti aviratam mūḍhaḥ duritāni durāśayaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.008/1 ākṣiptātmendriyaḥ strīṇām asatīnāṃ ca māyayā
analyzed: ākṣipta ātma indriyaḥ strīṇām asatīnām ca māyayā

original: BhP_03.30.008/2 raho racitayālāpaiḥ śiśūnāṃ kala-bhāṣiṇām
analyzed: rahaḥ racitayā ālāpaiḥ śiśūnām kala bhāṣiṇām

original: BhP_03.30.009/1 gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu duḥkha-tantreṣv atandritaḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu kūṭa dharmeṣu duḥkha tantreṣu atandritaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.009/2 kurvan duḥkha-pratīkāraṃ sukhavan manyate gṛhī
analyzed: kurvan duḥkha pratīkāram sukhavat manyate gṛhī

original: BhP_03.30.010/1 arthair āpāditair gurvyā hiṃsayetas-tataś ca tān
analyzed: arthaiḥ āpāditaiḥ gurvyāḥ hiṃsayā itastatas ca tān

original: BhP_03.30.010/2 puṣṇāti yeṣāṃ poṣeṇa śeṣa-bhug yāty adhaḥ svayam
analyzed: puṣṇāti yeṣām poṣeṇa śeṣa bhuj yāti adhas svayam

original: BhP_03.30.011/1 vārtāyāṃ lupyamānāyām ārabdhāyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vārtāyām lupyamānāyām ārabdhāyām punar punar

original: BhP_03.30.011/2 lobhābhibhūto niḥsattvaḥ parārthe kurute spṛhām
analyzed: lobha abhibhūtaḥ niḥsattvaḥ para arthe kurute spṛhām

original: BhP_03.30.012/1 kuṭumba-bharaṇākalpo manda-bhāgyo vṛthodyamaḥ
analyzed: kuṭumba bharaṇa ākalpaḥ mandabhāgyaḥ vṛthak udyamaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.012/2 śriyā vihīnaḥ kṛpaṇo dhyāyan chvasiti mūḍha-dhīḥ
analyzed: śriyā vihīnaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ dhyāyan śvasiti mūḍha dhīḥ

original: BhP_03.30.013/1 evaṃ sva-bharaṇākalpaṃ tat-kalatrādayas tathā
analyzed: evam sva bharaṇa ākalpam tad kalatra ādayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_03.30.013/2 nādriyante yathā pūrvaṃ kīnāśā iva go-jaram
analyzed: na ādriyante yathā pūrvam kīnāśāḥ iva gojaram

original: BhP_03.30.014/1 tatrāpy ajāta-nirvedo bhriyamāṇaḥ svayam bhṛtaiḥ
analyzed: tatra api ajāta nirvedaḥ bhriyamāṇaḥ svayam bhṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_03.30.014/2 jarayopātta-vairūpyo maraṇābhimukho gṛhe
analyzed: jarayā upātta vairūpyaḥ maraṇa abhimukhaḥ gṛhe

original: BhP_03.30.015/1 āste 'vamatyopanyastaṃ gṛha-pāla ivāharan
analyzed: āste vamatyā upanyastam gṛhapālaḥ iva āharan

original: BhP_03.30.015/2 āmayāvy apradīptāgnir alpāhāro 'lpa-ceṣṭitaḥ
analyzed: āmayāvī apradīptāgniḥ alpa āhāraḥ lpa ceṣṭitaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.016/1 vāyunotkramatottāraḥ kapha-saṃruddha-nāḍikaḥ
analyzed: kapha saṃruddha nāḍikaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.016/2 kāsa-śvāsa-kṛtāyāsaḥ kaṇṭhe ghura-ghurāyate
analyzed: kāsa śvāsa kṛta āyāsaḥ kaṇṭhe ghuraghurāyate

original: BhP_03.30.017/1 śayānaḥ pariśocadbhiḥ parivītaḥ sva-bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: śayānaḥ pariśocadbhiḥ parivītaḥ sva bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_03.30.017/2 vācyamāno 'pi na brūte kāla-pāśa-vaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: vācyamānaḥ pi na brūte kāla pāśa vaśam gataḥ

original: BhP_03.30.018/1 evaṃ kuṭumba-bharaṇe vyāpṛtātmājitendriyaḥ
analyzed: evam kuṭumba bharaṇe vyāpṛta ātmā ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.018/2 mriyate rudatāṃ svānām uru-vedanayāsta-dhīḥ
analyzed: mriyate rudatām svānām uru vedanayā asta dhīḥ

original: BhP_03.30.019/1 yama-dūtau tadā prāptau bhīmau sarabhasekṣaṇau
analyzed: yama dūtau tadā prāptau bhīmau sarabhasa īkṣaṇau

original: BhP_03.30.019/2 sa dṛṣṭvā trasta-hṛdayaḥ śakṛn-mūtraṃ vimuñcati
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā trasta hṛdayaḥ śakṛt mūtram vimuñcati

original: BhP_03.30.020/1 yātanā-deha āvṛtya pāśair baddhvā gale balāt
analyzed: yātanā dehaḥ āvṛtya pāśaiḥ baddhvā gale balāt

original: BhP_03.30.020/2 nayato dīrgham adhvānaṃ daṇḍyaṃ rāja-bhaṭā yathā
analyzed: nayataḥ dīrgham adhvānam daṇḍyam rāja bhaṭāḥ yathā

original: BhP_03.30.021/1 tayor nirbhinna-hṛdayas tarjanair jāta-vepathuḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ tarjanaiḥ jāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_03.30.021/2 pathi śvabhir bhakṣyamāṇa ārto 'ghaṃ svam anusmaran
analyzed: pathi śvabhiḥ bhakṣyamāṇaḥ ārtaḥ gham svam anusmaran

original: BhP_03.30.022/1 kṣut-tṛṭ-parīto 'rka-davānalānilaiḥ santapyamānaḥ pathi tapta-vāluke
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ parītaḥ rka davānala anilaiḥ santapyamānaḥ pathi tapta vāluke

original: BhP_03.30.022/2 kṛcchreṇa pṛṣṭhe kaśayā ca tāḍitaś calaty aśakto 'pi nirāśramodake
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa pṛṣṭhe kaśayā ca tāḍitaḥ calati nirāśrama udake

original: BhP_03.30.023/1 tatra tatra patan chrānto mūrcchitaḥ punar utthitaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra patan śrāntaḥ mūrcchitaḥ punar utthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.023/2 pathā pāpīyasā nītas tarasā yama-sādanam
analyzed: pathā pāpīyasā nītaḥ tarasā yama sādanam

original: BhP_03.30.024/1 yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi navatiṃ nava cādhvanaḥ
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrāṇi navatim nava ca adhvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.024/2 tribhir muhūrtair dvābhyāṃ vā nītaḥ prāpnoti yātanāḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ muhūrtaiḥ dvābhyām vā nītaḥ prāpnoti yātanāḥ

original: BhP_03.30.025/1 ādīpanaṃ sva-gātrāṇāṃ veṣṭayitvolmukādibhiḥ
analyzed: ādīpanam sva gātrāṇām veṣṭayitvā ulmuka ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.30.025/2 ātma-māṃsādanaṃ kvāpi sva-kṛttaṃ parato 'pi vā
analyzed: ātma māṃsa adanam kvāpi sva kṛttam vā

original: BhP_03.30.026/1 jīvataś cāntrābhyuddhāraḥ śva-gṛdhrair yama-sādane
analyzed: jīvataḥ ca antra abhyuddhāraḥ śva gṛdhraiḥ yama sādane

original: BhP_03.30.026/2 sarpa-vṛścika-daṃśādyair daśadbhiś cātma-vaiśasam
analyzed: sarpa vṛścika daṃśa ādyaiḥ daśadbhiḥ ca ātma vaiśasam

original: BhP_03.30.027/1 kṛntanaṃ cāvayavaśo gajādibhyo bhidāpanam
analyzed: kṛntanam ca avayavaśas gaja ādibhyaḥ bhidāpanam

original: BhP_03.30.027/2 pātanaṃ giri-śṛṅgebhyo rodhanaṃ cāmbu-gartayoḥ
analyzed: pātanam giri śṛṅgebhyaḥ rodhanam ca ambu gartayoḥ

original: BhP_03.30.028/1 yās tāmisrāndha-tāmisrā rauravādyāś ca yātanāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ tāmisra andhatāmisrāḥ raurava ādyāḥ ca yātanāḥ

original: BhP_03.30.028/2 bhuṅkte naro vā nārī vā mithaḥ saṅgena nirmitāḥ
analyzed: bhuṅkte naraḥ vā nārī vā mithas saṅgena nirmitāḥ

original: BhP_03.30.029/1 atraiva narakaḥ svarga iti mātaḥ pracakṣate
analyzed: atra eva narakaḥ svargaḥ iti mā atas pracakṣate

original: BhP_03.30.029/2 yā yātanā vai nārakyas tā ihāpy upalakṣitāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ yātanāḥ vai nārakyaḥ tāḥ iha api upalakṣitāḥ

original: BhP_03.30.030/1 evaṃ kuṭumbaṃ bibhrāṇa udaram bhara eva vā
analyzed: evam kuṭumbam bibhrāṇaḥ udaram bharaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_03.30.030/2 visṛjyehobhayaṃ pretya bhuṅkte tat-phalam īdṛśam
analyzed: visṛjya iha ubhayam pretya bhuṅkte tad phalam īdṛśam

original: BhP_03.30.031/1 ekaḥ prapadyate dhvāntaṃ hitvedaṃ sva-kalevaram
analyzed: ekaḥ prapadyate dhvāntam hitvā idam sva kalevaram

original: BhP_03.30.031/2 kuśaletara-pātheyo bhūta-droheṇa yad bhṛtam
analyzed: kuśala itara pātheyaḥ bhūta droheṇa yat bhṛtam

original: BhP_03.30.032/1 daivenāsāditaṃ tasya śamalaṃ niraye pumān
analyzed: daivena āsāditam tasya śamalam niraye pumān

original: BhP_03.30.032/2 bhuṅkte kuṭumba-poṣasya hṛta-vitta ivāturaḥ
analyzed: bhuṅkte kuṭumba poṣasya hṛta vittaḥ iva āturaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.033/1 kevalena hy adharmeṇa kuṭumba-bharaṇotsukaḥ
analyzed: kevalena hi adharmeṇa kuṭumba bharaṇa utsukaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.033/2 yāti jīvo 'ndha-tāmisraṃ caramaṃ tamasaḥ padam
analyzed: yāti jīvaḥ ndhatāmisram caramam tamasaḥ padam

original: BhP_03.30.034/1 adhastān nara-lokasya yāvatīr yātanādayaḥ
analyzed: adhastāt nara lokasya yāvatīḥ yātanā ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.30.034/2 kramaśaḥ samanukramya punar atrāvrajec chuciḥ
analyzed: kramaśas samanukramya punar atra āvrajet śuciḥ

original: BhP_03.30.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_03.31.001/1 karmaṇā daiva-netreṇa jantur dehopapattaye
analyzed: karmaṇā daiva netreṇa jantuḥ deha upapattaye

original: BhP_03.31.001/2 striyāḥ praviṣṭa udaraṃ puṃso retaḥ-kaṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: striyāḥ praviṣṭaḥ udaram puṃsaḥ retaḥ kaṇā āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.002/1 kalalaṃ tv eka-rātreṇa pañca-rātreṇa budbudam
analyzed: kalalam tu eka rātreṇa pañca rātreṇa budbudam

original: BhP_03.31.002/2 daśāhena tu karkandhūḥ peśy aṇḍaṃ vā tataḥ param
analyzed: daśa ahena tu karkandhūḥ peśī aṇḍam vā tatas param

original: BhP_03.31.003/1 māsena tu śiro dvābhyāṃ bāhv-aṅghry-ādy-aṅga-vigrahaḥ
analyzed: tu

original: BhP_03.31.003/2 nakha-lomāsthi-carmāṇi liṅga-cchidrodbhavas tribhiḥ
analyzed: nakha loma asthi carmāṇi liṅga chidra udbhavaḥ tribhiḥ

original: BhP_03.31.004/1 caturbhir dhātavaḥ sapta pañcabhiḥ kṣut-tṛḍ-udbhavaḥ
analyzed: caturbhiḥ dhātavaḥ sapta pañcabhiḥ kṣudh tṛṣ udbhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.004/2 ṣaḍbhir jarāyuṇā vītaḥ kukṣau bhrāmyati dakṣiṇe
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ jarāyuṇā vītaḥ kukṣau bhrāmyati dakṣiṇe

original: BhP_03.31.005/1 mātur jagdhānna-pānādyair edhad-dhātur asammate
analyzed: mātuḥ jagdha anna pāna ādyaiḥ edhat dhātuḥ a sammate

original: BhP_03.31.005/2 śete viṇ-mūtrayor garte sa jantur jantu-sambhave
analyzed: śete viṣ mūtrayoḥ garte sa jantuḥ jantu sambhave

original: BhP_03.31.006/1 kṛmibhiḥ kṣata-sarvāṅgaḥ saukumāryāt pratikṣaṇam
analyzed: kṛmibhiḥ kṣata sarva aṅgaḥ saukumāryāt pratikṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.31.006/2 mūrcchām āpnoty uru-kleśas tatratyaiḥ kṣudhitair muhuḥ
analyzed: mūrcchām āpnoti uru kleśaḥ tatratyaiḥ kṣudhitaiḥ muhur

original: BhP_03.31.007/1 kaṭu-tīkṣṇoṣṇa-lavaṇa- rūkṣāmlādibhir ulbaṇaiḥ
BhP_03.31.007/2 mātṛ-bhuktair upaspṛṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgotthita-vedanaḥ
analyzed: mātṛ bhuktaiḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ sarva aṅga utthita vedanaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.008/1 ulbena saṃvṛtas tasminn antraiś ca bahir āvṛtaḥ
analyzed: ulbena saṃvṛtaḥ tasmin antraiḥ ca bahis āvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.008/2 āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugna-pṛṣṭha-śirodharaḥ
analyzed: āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugna pṛṣṭha śirodharaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.009/1 akalpaḥ svāṅga-ceṣṭāyāṃ śakunta iva pañjare
analyzed: akalpaḥ sva aṅga ceṣṭāyām śakuntaḥ iva pañjare

original: BhP_03.31.009/2 tatra labdha-smṛtir daivāt karma janma-śatodbhavam
analyzed: tatra labdha smṛtiḥ daivāt karma janma śata udbhavam

original: BhP_03.31.009/3 smaran dīrgham anucchvāsaṃ śarma kiṃ nāma vindate
analyzed: smaran dīrgham anucchvāsam śarma kim nāma vindate

original: BhP_03.31.010/1 ārabhya saptamān māsāl labdha-bodho 'pi vepitaḥ
analyzed: ārabhya saptamāt māsāt labdha bodhaḥ vepitaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.010/2 naikatrāste sūti-vātair viṣṭhā-bhūr iva sodaraḥ
analyzed: na ekatra āste sūtivātaiḥ viṣṭhā bhūḥ iva sodaraḥ

original: BhP_03.31.011/1 nāthamāna ṛṣir bhītaḥ sapta-vadhriḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: nāthamānaḥ ṛṣiḥ bhītaḥ saptavadhriḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_03.31.011/2 stuvīta taṃ viklavayā vācā yenodare 'rpitaḥ
analyzed: stuvīta tam viklavayā vācā yena udare rpitaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.012/0 jantur uvāca
analyzed: jantuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.31.012/1 tasyopasannam avituṃ jagad icchayātta-
analyzed: tasya upasannam avitum jagat icchayā ātta

original: BhP_03.31.012/2 nānā-tanor bhuvi calac-caraṇāravindam
analyzed: nānā tanoḥ bhuvi calat caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_03.31.012/3 so 'haṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ hy akuto-bhayaṃ me
analyzed: saḥ ham vrajāmi śaraṇam hi akutobhayam me

original: BhP_03.31.012/4 yenedṛśī gatir adarśy asato 'nurūpā
analyzed: yena īdṛśī gatiḥ adarśi asataḥ nurūpā

original: BhP_03.31.013/1 yas tv atra baddha iva karmabhir āvṛtātmā
analyzed: yaḥ tu atra baddhaḥ iva karmabhiḥ āvṛta ātmā

original: BhP_03.31.013/2 bhūtendriyāśayamayīm avalambya māyām
analyzed: bhūta indriya āśaya mayīm avalambya māyām

original: BhP_03.31.013/3 āste viśuddham avikāram akhaṇḍa-bodham
analyzed: āste viśuddham a vikāram akhaṇḍa bodham

original: BhP_03.31.013/4 ātapyamāna-hṛdaye 'vasitaṃ namāmi
analyzed: ātapyamāna hṛdaye vasitam namāmi

original: BhP_03.31.014/1 yaḥ pañca-bhūta-racite rahitaḥ śarīre
analyzed: yaḥ pañcabhūta racite rahitaḥ śarīre

original: BhP_03.31.014/2 cchanno 'yathendriya-guṇārtha-cid-ātmako 'ham
analyzed: channaḥ yathā indriya guṇa artha cit ātmakaḥ ham

original: BhP_03.31.014/3 tenāvikuṇṭha-mahimānam ṛṣiṃ tam enaṃ
analyzed: tena avikuṇṭha mahimānam ṛṣim tam enam

original: BhP_03.31.014/4 vande paraṃ prakṛti-pūruṣayoḥ pumāṃsam
analyzed: vande param prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ pumāṃsam

original: BhP_03.31.015/1 yan-māyayoru-guṇa-karma-nibandhane 'smin
analyzed: yat māyayā uru guṇa karma nibandhane smin

original: BhP_03.31.015/2 sāṃsārike pathi caraṃs tad-abhiśrameṇa
analyzed: sāṃsārike pathi caran tad abhiśrameṇa

original: BhP_03.31.015/3 naṣṭa-smṛtiḥ punar ayaṃ pravṛṇīta lokaṃ
analyzed: naṣṭa smṛtiḥ punar ayam pravṛṇīta lokam

original: BhP_03.31.015/4 yuktyā kayā mahad-anugraham antareṇa
analyzed: yuktyā kayā mahat anugraham antareṇa

original: BhP_03.31.016/1 jñānaṃ yad etad adadhāt katamaḥ sa devas
analyzed: jñānam yat etat adadhāt katamaḥ sa devaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.016/2 trai-kālikaṃ sthira-careṣv anuvartitāṃśaḥ
analyzed: traikālikam sthira careṣu anuvartita aṃśaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.016/3 taṃ jīva-karma-padavīm anuvartamānās
analyzed: tam jīva karma padavīm anuvartamānāḥ

original: BhP_03.31.016/4 tāpa-trayopaśamanāya vayaṃ bhajema
analyzed: tāpa traya upaśamanāya vayam bhajema

original: BhP_03.31.017/1 dehy anya-deha-vivare jaṭharāgnināsṛg-
BhP_03.31.017/2 viṇ-mūtra-kūpa-patito bhṛśa-tapta-dehaḥ
BhP_03.31.017/3 icchann ito vivasituṃ gaṇayan sva-māsān
analyzed: icchan itas vivasitum gaṇayan sva māsān

original: BhP_03.31.017/4 nirvāsyate kṛpaṇa-dhīr bhagavan kadā nu
analyzed: nirvāsyate kṛpaṇa dhīḥ bhagavan kadā nu

original: BhP_03.31.018/1 yenedṛśīṃ gatim asau daśa-māsya īśa
analyzed: yena īdṛśīm gatim asau daśamāsye īśa

original: BhP_03.31.018/2 saṅgrāhitaḥ puru-dayena bhavādṛśena
analyzed: saṅgrāhitaḥ purudayena bhavādṛśena

original: BhP_03.31.018/3 svenaiva tuṣyatu kṛtena sa dīna-nāthaḥ
analyzed: svena eva tuṣyatu kṛtena sa dīna nāthaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.018/4 ko nāma tat-prati vināñjalim asya kuryāt
analyzed: kaḥ nāma tat prati vinā añjalim asya kuryāt

original: BhP_03.31.019/1 paśyaty ayaṃ dhiṣaṇayā nanu sapta-vadhriḥ
analyzed: paśyati ayam dhiṣaṇayā nanu saptavadhriḥ

original: BhP_03.31.019/2 śārīrake dama-śarīry aparaḥ sva-dehe
analyzed: śārīrake dama śarīrī aparaḥ sva dehe

original: BhP_03.31.019/3 yat-sṛṣṭayāsaṃ tam ahaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ
analyzed: yat sṛṣṭayā āsam tam aham puruṣam purāṇam

original: BhP_03.31.019/4 paśye bahir hṛdi ca caityam iva pratītam
analyzed: paśye bahis hṛdi ca caityam iva pratītam

original: BhP_03.31.020/1 so 'haṃ vasann api vibho bahu-duḥkha-vāsaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ham vasan api vibho bahu duḥkha vāsam

original: BhP_03.31.020/2 garbhān na nirjigamiṣe bahir andha-kūpe
analyzed: garbhāt na nirjigamiṣe bahis andhakūpe

original: BhP_03.31.020/3 yatropayātam upasarpati deva-māyā
analyzed: yatra upayātam upasarpati deva māyā

original: BhP_03.31.020/4 mithyā matir yad-anu saṃsṛti-cakram etat
analyzed: mithyā matiḥ yat anu saṃsṛti cakram etat

original: BhP_03.31.021/1 tasmād ahaṃ vigata-viklava uddhariṣya
analyzed: tasmāt aham vigata viklavaḥ uddhariṣya

original: BhP_03.31.021/2 ātmānam āśu tamasaḥ suhṛdātmanaiva
analyzed: ātmānam āśu tamasaḥ suhṛd ātmanā eva

original: BhP_03.31.021/3 bhūyo yathā vyasanam etad aneka-randhraṃ
analyzed: bhūyas yathā vyasanam etat aneka randhram

original: BhP_03.31.021/4 mā me bhaviṣyad upasādita-viṣṇu-pādaḥ
analyzed: mā me bhaviṣyat upasādita viṣṇu pādaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.022/0 kapila uvāca
analyzed: kapilaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.31.022/1 evaṃ kṛta-matir garbhe daśa-māsyaḥ stuvann ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: evam kṛta matiḥ garbhe daśamāsyaḥ stuvan ṛṣiḥ

original: BhP_03.31.022/2 sadyaḥ kṣipaty avācīnaṃ prasūtyai sūti-mārutaḥ
analyzed: sadyas kṣipati avācīnam prasūtyai sūtimārutaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.023/1 tenāvasṛṣṭaḥ sahasā kṛtvāvāk śira āturaḥ
analyzed: tena avasṛṣṭaḥ sahasā kṛtvā avāk śiraḥ āturaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.023/2 viniṣkrāmati kṛcchreṇa nirucchvāso hata-smṛtiḥ
analyzed: viniṣkrāmati kṛcchreṇa nirucchvāsaḥ hata smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_03.31.024/1 patito bhuvy asṛṅ-miśraḥ viṣṭhā-bhūr iva ceṣṭate
analyzed: patitaḥ bhuvi asṛj miśraḥ viṣṭhā bhūḥ iva ceṣṭate

original: BhP_03.31.024/2 rorūyati gate jñāne viparītāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: rorūyati gate jñāne viparītām gatim gataḥ

original: BhP_03.31.025/1 para-cchandaṃ na viduṣā puṣyamāṇo janena saḥ
analyzed: para chandam na viduṣā puṣyamāṇaḥ janena saḥ

original: BhP_03.31.025/2 anabhipretam āpannaḥ pratyākhyātum anīśvaraḥ
analyzed: anabhipretam āpannaḥ pratyākhyātum anīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_03.31.026/1 śāyito 'śuci-paryaṅke jantuḥ svedaja-dūṣite
analyzed: śuci paryaṅke jantuḥ sveda ja dūṣite

original: BhP_03.31.026/2 neśaḥ kaṇḍūyane 'ṅgānām āsanotthāna-ceṣṭane
analyzed: na īśaḥ kaṇḍūyane ṅgānām āsana utthāna ceṣṭane

original: BhP_03.31.027/1 tudanty āma-tvacaṃ daṃśā maśakā matkuṇādayaḥ
analyzed: tudanti āma tvacam daṃśāḥ maśakāḥ matkuṇa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.027/2 rudantaṃ vigata-jñānaṃ kṛmayaḥ kṛmikaṃ yathā
analyzed: rudantam vigata jñānam kṛmayaḥ kṛmikam yathā

original: BhP_03.31.028/1 ity evaṃ śaiśavaṃ bhuktvā duḥkhaṃ paugaṇḍam eva ca
analyzed: iti evam śaiśavam bhuktvā duḥkham paugaṇḍam eva ca

original: BhP_03.31.028/2 alabdhābhīpsito 'jñānād iddha-manyuḥ śucārpitaḥ
analyzed: a labdha abhīpsitaḥ jñānāt iddha manyuḥ śucā arpitaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.029/1 saha dehena mānena vardhamānena manyunā
analyzed: saha dehena mānena vardhamānena manyunā

original: BhP_03.31.029/2 karoti vigrahaṃ kāmī kāmiṣv antāya cātmanaḥ
analyzed: karoti vigraham kāmī kāmiṣu antāya ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.030/1 bhūtaiḥ pañcabhir ārabdhe dehe dehy abudho 'sakṛt
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ārabdhe dehe dehi abudhaḥ sakṛt

original: BhP_03.31.030/2 ahaṃ mamety asad-grāhaḥ karoti kumatir matim
analyzed: aham mama iti asat grāhaḥ karoti kumatiḥ matim

original: BhP_03.31.031/1 tad-arthaṃ kurute karma yad-baddho yāti saṃsṛtim
analyzed: tad artham kurute karma yat baddhaḥ yāti saṃsṛtim

original: BhP_03.31.031/2 yo 'nuyāti dadat kleśam avidyā-karma-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nuyāti dadat kleśam avidyā karma bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.032/1 yady asadbhiḥ pathi punaḥ śiśnodara-kṛtodyamaiḥ
analyzed: yadi asadbhiḥ pathi punar śiśna udara kṛta udyamaiḥ

original: BhP_03.31.032/2 āsthito ramate jantus tamo viśati pūrvavat
analyzed: āsthitaḥ ramate jantuḥ tamaḥ viśati pūrvavat

original: BhP_03.31.033/1 satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā maunaṃ buddhiḥ śrīr hrīr yaśaḥ kṣamā
analyzed: satyam śaucam dayā maunam buddhiḥ śrīḥ hrīḥ yaśaḥ kṣamā

original: BhP_03.31.033/2 śamo damo bhagaś ceti yat-saṅgād yāti saṅkṣayam
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ bhagaḥ ca iti yad saṅgāt yāti saṅkṣayam

original: BhP_03.31.034/1 teṣv aśānteṣu mūḍheṣu khaṇḍitātmasv asādhuṣu
analyzed: teṣu aśānteṣu mūḍheṣu khaṇḍita ātmasu asādhuṣu

original: BhP_03.31.034/2 saṅgaṃ na kuryāc chocyeṣu yoṣit-krīḍā-mṛgeṣu ca
analyzed: saṅgam na kuryāt śocyeṣu yoṣit krīḍāmṛgeṣu ca

original: BhP_03.31.035/1 na tathāsya bhaven moho bandhaś cānya-prasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: na tathā asya bhavet mohaḥ bandhaḥ ca anya prasaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_03.31.035/2 yoṣit-saṅgād yathā puṃso yathā tat-saṅgi-saṅgataḥ
analyzed: yoṣit saṅgāt yathā puṃsaḥ yathā tad saṅgi saṅgataḥ

original: BhP_03.31.036/1 prajāpatiḥ svāṃ duhitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tad-rūpa-dharṣitaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ svām duhitaram dṛṣṭvā tad rūpa dharṣitaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.036/2 rohid-bhūtāṃ so 'nvadhāvad ṛkṣa-rūpī hata-trapaḥ
analyzed: rohit bhūtām saḥ nu adhāvat ṛkṣa rūpī hata trapaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.037/1 tat-sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭeṣu ko nv akhaṇḍita-dhīḥ pumān
analyzed: tad sṛṣṭa sṛṣṭa sṛṣṭeṣu kaḥ nu akhaṇḍita dhīḥ pumān

original: BhP_03.31.037/2 ṛṣiṃ nārāyaṇam ṛte yoṣin-mayyeha māyayā
analyzed: ṛṣim nārāyaṇam ṛte yoṣit mayyā iha māyayā

original: BhP_03.31.038/1 balaṃ me paśya māyāyāḥ strī-mayyā jayino diśām
analyzed: balam me paśya māyāyāḥ strī mayyāḥ jayinaḥ diśām

original: BhP_03.31.038/2 yā karoti padākrāntān bhrūvi-jṛmbheṇa kevalam
analyzed: yā karoti pada ākrāntān bhrū vijṛmbheṇa kevalam

original: BhP_03.31.039/1 saṅgaṃ na kuryāt pramadāsu jātu yogasya pāraṃ param ārurukṣuḥ
analyzed: saṅgam na kuryāt pramadāsu jātu yogasya pāram param ārurukṣuḥ

original: BhP_03.31.039/2 mat-sevayā pratilabdhātma-lābho vadanti yā niraya-dvāram asya
analyzed: mad sevayā pratilabdha ātmalābhaḥ vadanti yā niraya dvāram asya

original: BhP_03.31.040/1 yopayāti śanair māyā yoṣid deva-vinirmitā
analyzed: yā upayāti śanais māyā yoṣit deva vinirmitā

original: BhP_03.31.040/2 tām īkṣetātmano mṛtyuṃ tṛṇaiḥ kūpam ivāvṛtam
analyzed: tām īkṣeta ātmanaḥ mṛtyum tṛṇaiḥ kūpam iva āvṛtam

original: BhP_03.31.041/1 yāṃ manyate patiṃ mohān man-māyām ṛṣabhāyatīm
analyzed: yām manyate patim mohāt mad māyām ṛṣabhāyatīm

original: BhP_03.31.041/2 strītvaṃ strī-saṅgataḥ prāpto vittāpatya-gṛha-pradam
analyzed: strī tvam strī saṅgataḥ prāptaḥ vitta apatya gṛha pradam

original: BhP_03.31.042/1 tām ātmano vijānīyāt paty-apatya-gṛhātmakam
analyzed: tām ātmanaḥ vijānīyāt pati apatya gṛha ātmakam

original: BhP_03.31.042/2 daivopasāditaṃ mṛtyuṃ mṛgayor gāyanaṃ yathā
analyzed: daiva upasāditam mṛtyum mṛgayoḥ gāyanam yathā

original: BhP_03.31.043/1 dehena jīva-bhūtena lokāl lokam anuvrajan
analyzed: dehena jīva bhūtena lokāt lokam anuvrajan

original: BhP_03.31.043/2 bhuñjāna eva karmāṇi karoty avirataṃ pumān
analyzed: bhuñjānaḥ eva karmāṇi karoti aviratam pumān

original: BhP_03.31.044/1 jīvo hy asyānugo deho bhūtendriya-mano-mayaḥ
analyzed: jīvaḥ hi asya anugaḥ dehaḥ bhūta indriya manaḥ mayaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.044/2 tan-nirodho 'sya maraṇam āvirbhāvas tu sambhavaḥ
analyzed: maraṇam āvirbhāvaḥ tu sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.045/1 dravyopalabdhi-sthānasya dravyekṣāyogyatā yadā
analyzed: dravya upalabdhi sthānasya dravya īkṣā yogya tā yadā

original: BhP_03.31.045/2 tat pañcatvam ahaṃ-mānād utpattir dravya-darśanam
analyzed: tat pañcatvam ahaṃmānāt utpattiḥ dravya darśanam

original: BhP_03.31.046/1 yathākṣṇor dravyāvayava- darśanāyogyatā yadā
analyzed: yathā akṣṇoḥ dravya avayava darśana ayogya tā yadā

original: BhP_03.31.046/2 tadaiva cakṣuṣo draṣṭur draṣṭṛtvāyogyatānayoḥ
analyzed: tadā eva cakṣuṣaḥ draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tva ayogya tā anayoḥ

original: BhP_03.31.047/1 tasmān na kāryaḥ santrāso na kārpaṇyaṃ na sambhramaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt na kāryaḥ santrāsaḥ na kārpaṇyam na sambhramaḥ

original: BhP_03.31.047/2 buddhvā jīva-gatiṃ dhīro mukta-saṅgaś cared iha
analyzed: buddhvā jīva gatim dhīraḥ mukta saṅgaḥ caret iha

original: BhP_03.31.048/1 samyag-darśanayā buddhyā yoga-vairāgya-yuktayā
analyzed: samyak darśanayā buddhyā yoga vairāgya yuktayā

original: BhP_03.31.048/2 māyā-viracite loke caren nyasya kalevaram
analyzed: māyā viracite loke caret nyasya kalevaram

original: BhP_03.32.001/0 kapila uvāca
analyzed: kapilaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.32.001/1 atha yo gṛha-medhīyān dharmān evāvasan gṛhe
analyzed: atha yaḥ gṛhamedhīyān dharmān eva avasan gṛhe

original: BhP_03.32.001/2 kāmam arthaṃ ca dharmān svān dogdhi bhūyaḥ piparti tān
analyzed: kāmam artham ca dharmān svān dogdhi bhūyas piparti tān

original: BhP_03.32.002/1 sa cāpi bhagavad-dharmāt kāma-mūḍhaḥ parāṅ-mukhaḥ
analyzed: sa ca api bhagavat dharmāt kāma mūḍhaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.002/2 yajate kratubhir devān pit-ṃś ca śraddhayānvitaḥ
analyzed: yajate kratubhiḥ devān pitṝn ca śraddhayā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.003/1 tac-chraddhayākrānta-matiḥ pitṛ-deva-vrataḥ pumān
analyzed: tad śraddhayā ākrāntamatiḥ pitṛ deva vrataḥ pumān

original: BhP_03.32.003/2 gatvā cāndramasaṃ lokaṃ soma-pāḥ punar eṣyati
analyzed: gatvā cāndramasam lokam soma pāḥ punar eṣyati

original: BhP_03.32.004/1 yadā cāhīndra-śayyāyāṃ śete 'nantāsano hariḥ
analyzed: yadā ca ahi indra śayyāyām śete nanta āsanaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_03.32.004/2 tadā lokā layaṃ yānti ta ete gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: tadā lokāḥ layam yānti te ete gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_03.32.005/1 ye sva-dharmān na duhyanti dhīrāḥ kāmārtha-hetave
analyzed: ye svadharmān na duhyanti dhīrāḥ kāma artha hetave

original: BhP_03.32.005/2 niḥsaṅgā nyasta-karmāṇaḥ praśāntāḥ śuddha-cetasaḥ
analyzed: niḥsaṅgāḥ nyasta karmāṇaḥ praśāntāḥ śuddha cetasaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.006/1 nivṛtti-dharma-niratā nirmamā nirahaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: nivṛtti dharma niratāḥ nirmamāḥ nirahaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.006/2 sva-dharmāptena sattvena pariśuddhena cetasā
analyzed: svadharma āptena sattvena pariśuddhena cetasā

original: BhP_03.32.007/1 sūrya-dvāreṇa te yānti puruṣaṃ viśvato-mukham
analyzed: sūrya dvāreṇa te yānti puruṣam viśvatomukham

original: BhP_03.32.007/2 parāvareśaṃ prakṛtim asyotpatty-anta-bhāvanam
analyzed: parāvara īśam prakṛtim asya utpatti anta bhāvanam

original: BhP_03.32.008/1 dvi-parārdhāvasāne yaḥ pralayo brahmaṇas tu te
analyzed: dvi parārdha avasāne yaḥ pralayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu te

original: BhP_03.32.008/2 tāvad adhyāsate lokaṃ parasya para-cintakāḥ
analyzed: tāvat adhyāsate lokam parasya para cintakāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.009/1 kṣmāmbho-'nalānila-viyan-mana-indriyārtha-
BhP_03.32.009/2 bhūtādibhiḥ parivṛtaṃ pratisañjihīrṣuḥ
analyzed: bhūta ādibhiḥ parivṛtam pratisañjihīrṣuḥ

original: BhP_03.32.009/3 avyākṛtaṃ viśati yarhi guṇa-trayātmākālaṃ
analyzed: avyākṛtam viśati yarhi guṇa traya ātma akālam

original: BhP_03.32.009/4 parākhyam anubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ
analyzed: para ākhyam anubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ

original: BhP_03.32.010/1 evaṃ paretya bhagavantam anupraviṣṭāye
analyzed: evam paretya bhagavantam anupraviṣṭāḥ
