original: BhP_03.32.010/2 yogino jita-marun-manaso virāgāḥ
analyzed: yoginaḥ jita marut manasaḥ virāgāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.010/3 tenaiva sākam amṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ
analyzed: tena eva sākam amṛtam puruṣam purāṇam

original: BhP_03.32.010/4 brahma pradhānam upayānty agatābhimānāḥ
analyzed: brahma pradhānam upayānti agata abhimānāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.011/1 atha taṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ hṛt-padmeṣu kṛtālayam
analyzed: atha tam sarva bhūtānām hṛd padmeṣu kṛta ālayam

original: BhP_03.32.011/2 śrutānubhāvaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja bhāvena bhāmini
analyzed: śruta anubhāvam śaraṇam vraja bhāvena bhāmini

original: BhP_03.32.012/1 ādyaḥ sthira-carāṇāṃ yo veda-garbhaḥ saharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: ādyaḥ sthira carāṇām yaḥ veda garbhaḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.32.012/2 yogeśvaraiḥ kumārādyaiḥ siddhair yoga-pravartakaiḥ
BhP_03.32.013/1 bheda-dṛṣṭyābhimānena niḥsaṅgenāpi karmaṇā
analyzed: bheda dṛṣṭyā abhimānena niḥsaṅgena api karmaṇā

original: BhP_03.32.013/2 kartṛtvāt saguṇaṃ brahma puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabham
analyzed: kartṛ tvāt sa guṇam brahma puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: BhP_03.32.014/1 sa saṃsṛtya punaḥ kāle kāleneśvara-mūrtinā
analyzed: sa saṃsṛtya punar kāle kālena īśvara mūrtinā

original: BhP_03.32.014/2 jāte guṇa-vyatikare yathā-pūrvaṃ prajāyate
analyzed: jāte guṇa vyatikare yathāpūrvam prajāyate

original: BhP_03.32.015/1 aiśvaryaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ ca te 'pi dharma-vinirmitam
analyzed: aiśvaryam pārameṣṭhyam ca te dharma vinirmitam

original: BhP_03.32.015/2 niṣevya punar āyānti guṇa-vyatikare sati
analyzed: niṣevya punar āyānti guṇa vyatikare sati

original: BhP_03.32.016/1 ye tv ihāsakta-manasaḥ karmasu śraddhayānvitāḥ
analyzed: ye tu iha āsakta manasaḥ karmasu śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.016/2 kurvanty apratiṣiddhāni nityāny api ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: kurvanti a pratiṣiddhāni nityāni api ca kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_03.32.017/1 rajasā kuṇṭha-manasaḥ kāmātmāno 'jitendriyāḥ
analyzed: rajasā kuṇṭhamanasaḥ kāma ātmānaḥ jita indriyāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.017/2 pit-n yajanty anudinaṃ gṛheṣv abhiratāśayāḥ
analyzed: yajanti anudinam gṛheṣu abhirata āśayāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.018/1 trai-vargikās te puruṣā vimukhā hari-medhasaḥ
analyzed: traivargikāḥ te puruṣāḥ vimukhāḥ harimedhasaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.018/2 kathāyāṃ kathanīyoru- vikramasya madhudviṣaḥ
analyzed: kathāyām kathanīya uru vikramasya madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.019/1 nūnaṃ daivena vihatā ye cācyuta-kathā-sudhām
analyzed: nūnam daivena vihatāḥ ye ca acyuta kathā sudhām

original: BhP_03.32.019/2 hitvā śṛṇvanty asad-gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viḍ-bhujaḥ
analyzed: hitvā śṛṇvanti asat gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viḍbhujaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.020/1 dakṣiṇena pathāryamṇaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ vrajanti te
analyzed: dakṣiṇena pathā aryamṇaḥ pitṛ lokam vrajanti te

original: BhP_03.32.020/2 prajām anu prajāyante śmaśānānta-kriyā-kṛtaḥ
analyzed: prajām anu prajāyante śmaśāna anta kriyā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.021/1 tatas te kṣīṇa-sukṛtāḥ punar lokam imaṃ sati
analyzed: tatas te kṣīṇa sukṛtāḥ punar lokam imam sati

original: BhP_03.32.021/1 patanti vivaśā devaiḥ sadyo vibhraṃśitodayāḥ
analyzed: patanti vivaśāḥ devaiḥ sadyas vibhraṃśita udayāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.022/1 tasmāt tvaṃ sarva-bhāvena bhajasva parameṣṭhinam
analyzed: tasmāt tvam sarva bhāvena bhajasva parameṣṭhinam

original: BhP_03.32.022/2 tad-guṇāśrayayā bhaktyā bhajanīya-padāmbujam
analyzed: tad guṇa āśrayayā bhaktyā bhajanīya pada ambujam

original: BhP_03.32.023/1 vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti-yogaḥ prayojitaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti yogaḥ prayojitaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.023/2 janayaty āśu vairāgyaṃ jñānaṃ yad brahma-darśanam
analyzed: janayati āśu vairāgyam jñānam yat brahma darśanam

original: BhP_03.32.024/1 yadāsya cittam artheṣu sameṣv indriya-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: yadā asya cittam artheṣu sameṣu indriya vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.32.024/2 na vigṛhṇāti vaiṣamyaṃ priyam apriyam ity uta
analyzed: na vigṛhṇāti vaiṣamyam priyam apriyam iti uta

original: BhP_03.32.025/1 sa tadaivātmanātmānaṃ niḥsaṅgaṃ sama-darśanam
analyzed: sa tadā eva ātmanā ātmānam niḥsaṅgam samadarśanam

original: BhP_03.32.025/2 heyopādeya-rahitam ārūḍhaṃ padam īkṣate
analyzed: heya upādeya rahitam ārūḍham padam īkṣate

original: BhP_03.32.026/1 jñāna-mātraṃ paraṃ brahma paramātmeśvaraḥ pumān
BhP_03.32.026/2 dṛśy-ādibhiḥ pṛthag bhāvair bhagavān eka īyate
analyzed: dṛśya ādibhiḥ pṛthak bhāvaiḥ bhagavān ekaḥ īyate

original: BhP_03.32.027/1 etāvān eva yogena samagreṇeha yoginaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva yogena samagreṇa iha yoginaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.027/2 yujyate 'bhimato hy artho yad asaṅgas tu kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: yujyate bhimataḥ hi arthaḥ yat asaṅgaḥ tu kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_03.32.028/1 jñānam ekaṃ parācīnair indriyair brahma nirguṇam
analyzed: jñānam ekam parācīnaiḥ indriyaiḥ brahma nirguṇam

original: BhP_03.32.028/2 avabhāty artha-rūpeṇa bhrāntyā śabdādi-dharmiṇā
analyzed: avabhāti artha rūpeṇa bhrāntyā śabda ādi dharmiṇā

original: BhP_03.32.029/1 yathā mahān ahaṃ-rūpas tri-vṛt pañca-vidhaḥ svarāṭ
analyzed: yathā mahān ahaṃrūpaḥ trivṛt pañcavidhaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_03.32.029/2 ekādaśa-vidhas tasya vapur aṇḍaṃ jagad yataḥ
analyzed: ekādaśavidhaḥ tasya vapuḥ aṇḍam jagat yatas

original: BhP_03.32.030/1 etad vai śraddhayā bhaktyā yogābhyāsena nityaśaḥ
analyzed: etat vai śraddhayā bhaktyā yoga abhyāsena nityaśas

original: BhP_03.32.030/2 samāhitātmā niḥsaṅgo viraktyā paripaśyati
analyzed: samāhita ātmā niḥsaṅgaḥ viraktyā paripaśyati

original: BhP_03.32.031/1 ity etat kathitaṃ gurvi jñānaṃ tad brahma-darśanam
analyzed: iti etat kathitam gurvi jñānam tat brahma darśanam

original: BhP_03.32.031/2 yenānubuddhyate tattvaṃ prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
analyzed: yena anubuddhyate tattvam prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca

original: BhP_03.32.032/1 jñāna-yogaś ca man-niṣṭho nairguṇyo bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: jñāna yogaḥ ca manniṣṭhaḥ nairguṇyaḥ bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.032/2 dvayor apy eka evārtho bhagavac-chabda-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: dvayoḥ api ekaḥ eva arthaḥ bhagavat śabda lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.033/1 yathendriyaiḥ pṛthag-dvārair artho bahu-guṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yathā indriyaiḥ pṛthak dvāraiḥ arthaḥ bahu guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.033/2 eko nāneyate tadvad bhagavān śāstra-vartmabhiḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ nānā iyate tadvat bhagavān śāstra vartmabhiḥ

original: BhP_03.32.034/1 kriyayā kratubhir dānais tapaḥ-svādhyāya-marśanaiḥ
analyzed: kriyayā kratubhiḥ dānaiḥ tapaḥ svādhyāya marśanaiḥ

original: BhP_03.32.034/2 ātmendriya-jayenāpi sannyāsena ca karmaṇām
analyzed: ātma indriya jayena api sannyāsena ca karmaṇām

original: BhP_03.32.035/1 yogena vividhāṅgena bhakti-yogena caiva hi
analyzed: yogena vividha aṅgena bhakti yogena ca eva hi

original: BhP_03.32.035/2 dharmeṇobhaya-cihnena yaḥ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān
analyzed: dharmeṇa ubhaya cihnena yaḥ pravṛtti nivṛttimān

original: BhP_03.32.036/1 ātma-tattvāvabodhena vairāgyeṇa dṛḍhena ca
analyzed: ātma tattva avabodhena vairāgyeṇa dṛḍhena ca

original: BhP_03.32.036/2 īyate bhagavān ebhiḥ saguṇo nirguṇaḥ sva-dṛk
analyzed: īyate bhagavān ebhiḥ saguṇaḥ nirguṇaḥ svadṛś

original: BhP_03.32.037/1 prāvocaṃ bhakti-yogasya svarūpaṃ te catur-vidham
analyzed: prāvocam bhakti yogasya svarūpam te caturvidham

original: BhP_03.32.037/2 kālasya cāvyakta-gater yo 'ntardhāvati jantuṣu
analyzed: kālasya ca avyakta gateḥ yaḥ ntar dhāvati jantuṣu

original: BhP_03.32.038/1 jīvasya saṃsṛtīr bahvīr avidyā-karma-nirmitāḥ
analyzed: jīvasya saṃsṛtīḥ bahvīḥ avidyā karma nirmitāḥ

original: BhP_03.32.038/2 yāsv aṅga praviśann ātmā na veda gatim ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yāsu aṅga praviśan ātmā na veda gatim ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.039/1 naitat khalāyopadiśen nāvinītāya karhicit
analyzed: na etat khalāya upadiśet na avinītāya karhicit

original: BhP_03.32.039/2 na stabdhāya na bhinnāya naiva dharma-dhvajāya ca
analyzed: na stabdhāya na bhinnāya na eva dharma dhvajāya ca

original: BhP_03.32.040/1 na lolupāyopadiśen na gṛhārūḍha-cetase
analyzed: na lolupāya upadiśet na gṛha ārūḍha cetase

original: BhP_03.32.040/2 nābhaktāya ca me jātu na mad-bhakta-dviṣām api
analyzed: na abhaktāya ca me jātu na mad bhakta dviṣām api

original: BhP_03.32.041/1 śraddadhānāya bhaktāya vinītāyānasūyave
analyzed: śraddadhānāya bhaktāya vinītāya anasūyave

original: BhP_03.32.041/2 bhūteṣu kṛta-maitrāya śuśrūṣābhiratāya ca
analyzed: bhūteṣu kṛta maitrāya śuśrūṣā abhiratāya ca

original: BhP_03.32.042/1 bahir-jāta-virāgāya śānta-cittāya dīyatām
analyzed: bahis jāta virāgāya śānta cittāya dīyatām

original: BhP_03.32.042/2 nirmatsarāya śucaye yasyāhaṃ preyasāṃ priyaḥ
analyzed: nirmatsarāya śucaye yasya aham preyasām priyaḥ

original: BhP_03.32.043/1 ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād amba śraddhayā puruṣaḥ sakṛt
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt amba śraddhayā puruṣaḥ sakṛt

original: BhP_03.32.043/2 yo vābhidhatte mac-cittaḥ sa hy eti padavīṃ ca me
analyzed: yaḥ vā abhidhatte mad cittaḥ sa hi eti padavīm ca me

original: BhP_03.33.001/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.33.001/1 evaṃ niśamya kapilasya vaco janitrīsā kardamasya dayitā kila devahūtiḥ
analyzed: evam niśamya kapilasya vacaḥ janitrī sā kardamasya dayitā kila devahūtiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.001/2 visrasta-moha-paṭalā tam abhipraṇamyatuṣṭāva tattva-viṣayāṅkita-siddhi-bhūmim
analyzed: visrasta moha paṭalā tam abhipraṇamya atuṣṭāva tattva viṣaya aṅkita siddhi bhūmim

original: BhP_03.33.002/0 devahūtir uvāca
analyzed: devahūtiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.33.002/1 athāpy ajo 'ntaḥ-salile śayānaṃ bhūtendriyārthātma-mayaṃ vapus te
analyzed: atha api ajaḥ ntar salile śayānam bhūta indriyārtha ātma mayam vapuḥ te

original: BhP_03.33.002/2 guṇa-pravāhaṃ sad-aśeṣa-bījaṃ dadhyau svayaṃ yaj-jaṭharābja-jātaḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravāham sat aśeṣa bījam dadhyau svayam yat jaṭhara abja jātaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.003/1 sa eva viśvasya bhavān vidhatte guṇa-pravāheṇa vibhakta-vīryaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva viśvasya bhavān vidhatte guṇa pravāheṇa vibhakta vīryaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.003/2 sargādy anīho 'vitathābhisandhir ātmeśvaro 'tarkya-sahasra-śaktiḥ
analyzed: sarga ādi anīhaḥ vitatha abhisandhiḥ tarkya sahasra śaktiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.004/1 sa tvaṃ bhṛto me jaṭhareṇa nātha kathaṃ nu yasyodara etad āsīt
analyzed: sa tvam bhṛtaḥ me jaṭhareṇa nātha katham nu yasya udare etat āsīt

original: BhP_03.33.004/2 viśvaṃ yugānte vaṭa-patra ekaḥ śete sma māyā-śiśur aṅghri-pānaḥ
analyzed: viśvam yuga ante vaṭa patre ekaḥ śete sma māyā śiśuḥ aṅghri pānaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.005/1 tvaṃ deha-tantraḥ praśamāya pāpmanāṃ nideśa-bhājāṃ ca vibho vibhūtaye
analyzed: tvam dehatantraḥ praśamāya pāpmanām nideśa bhājām ca vibho vibhūtaye

original: BhP_03.33.005/2 yathāvatārās tava sūkarādayas tathāyam apy ātma-pathopalabdhaye
analyzed: yathā avatārāḥ tava sūkara ādayaḥ tathā ayam api ātma patha upalabdhaye

original: BhP_03.33.006/1 yan-nāmadheya-śravaṇānukīrtanād yat-prahvaṇād yat-smaraṇād api kvacit
analyzed: yad nāmadheya śravaṇa anukīrtanāt yad prahvaṇāt yad smaraṇāt api kvacid

original: BhP_03.33.006/2 śvādo 'pi sadyaḥ savanāya kalpate kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt
analyzed: śvādaḥ pi sadyas savanāya kalpate kutas punar te bhagavat nu darśanāt

original: BhP_03.33.007/1 aho bata śva-paco 'to garīyān yaj-jihvāgre vartate nāma tubhyam
analyzed: aho bata garīyān yat jihvā agre vartate nāma tubhyam

original: BhP_03.33.007/2 tepus tapas te juhuvuḥ sasnur āryā brahmānūcur nāma gṛṇanti ye te
analyzed: tepuḥ tapaḥ te juhuvuḥ sasnuḥ āryāḥ brahma anūcuḥ nāma gṛṇanti ye te

original: BhP_03.33.008/1 taṃ tvām ahaṃ brahma paraṃ pumāṃsaṃ pratyak-srotasy ātmani saṃvibhāvyam
analyzed: tam tvām aham brahma param pumāṃsam pratyak srotasi ātmani saṃvibhāvyam

original: BhP_03.33.008/2 sva-tejasā dhvasta-guṇa-pravāhaṃ vande viṣṇuṃ kapilaṃ veda-garbham
analyzed: sva tejasā dhvasta guṇa pravāham vande viṣṇum kapilam vedagarbham

original: BhP_03.33.009/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.33.009/1 īḍito bhagavān evaṃ kapilākhyaḥ paraḥ pumān
analyzed: īḍitaḥ bhagavān evam kapila ākhyaḥ paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_03.33.009/2 vācāviklavayety āha mātaraṃ mātṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: vācā aviklavayā iti āha mātaram mātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.010/0 kapila uvāca
analyzed: kapilaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.33.010/1 mārgeṇānena mātas te susevyenoditena me
analyzed: mārgeṇa anena mātar te susevyena uditena me

original: BhP_03.33.010/2 āsthitena parāṃ kāṣṭhām acirād avarotsyasi
analyzed: āsthitena parām kāṣṭhām acirāt avarotsyasi

original: BhP_03.33.011/1 śraddhatsvaitan mataṃ mahyaṃ juṣṭaṃ yad brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: śraddhatsva etat matam mahyam juṣṭam yat brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.011/2 yena mām abhayaṃ yāyā mṛtyum ṛcchanty atad-vidaḥ
analyzed: yena mām abhayam yāyāḥ mṛtyum ṛcchanti a tad vidaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.012/0 maitreya uvāca
analyzed: maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_03.33.012/1 iti pradarśya bhagavān satīṃ tām ātmano gatim
analyzed: iti pradarśya bhagavān satīm tām ātmanaḥ gatim

original: BhP_03.33.012/2 sva-mātrā brahma-vādinyā kapilo 'numato yayau
analyzed: sva mātrā brahma vādinyā kapilaḥ numataḥ yayau

original: BhP_03.33.013/1 sā cāpi tanayoktena yogādeśena yoga-yuk
analyzed: sā ca api tanaya uktena yoga ādeśena yoga yuj

original: BhP_03.33.013/2 tasminn āśrama āpīḍe sarasvatyāḥ samāhitā
analyzed: tasmin āśrame āpīḍe sarasvatyāḥ samāhitā

original: BhP_03.33.014/1 abhīkṣṇāvagāha-kapiśān jaṭilān kuṭilālakān
analyzed: abhīkṣṇa avagāha kapiśān jaṭilān kuṭila alakān

original: BhP_03.33.014/2 ātmānaṃ cogra-tapasā bibhratī cīriṇaṃ kṛśam
analyzed: ātmānam ca ugra tapasā bibhratī cīriṇam kṛśam

original: BhP_03.33.015/1 prajāpateḥ kardamasya tapo-yoga-vijṛmbhitam
analyzed: prajāpateḥ kardamasya tapaḥ yoga vijṛmbhitam

original: BhP_03.33.015/2 sva-gārhasthyam anaupamyaṃ prārthyaṃ vaimānikair api
analyzed: sva gārhasthyam anaupamyam prārthyam vaimānikaiḥ api

original: BhP_03.33.016/1 payaḥ-phena-nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma-paricchadāḥ
analyzed: payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_03.33.016/2 āsanāni ca haimāni susparśāstaraṇāni ca
analyzed: āsanāni ca haimāni susparśa āstaraṇāni ca

original: BhP_03.33.017/1 svaccha-sphaṭika-kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca
analyzed: svaccha sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā mārakateṣu ca

original: BhP_03.33.017/2 ratna-pradīpā ābhānti lalanā ratna-saṃyutāḥ
analyzed: ratna pradīpāḥ ābhānti lalanāḥ ratna saṃyutāḥ

original: BhP_03.33.018/1 gṛhodyānaṃ kusumitai ramyaṃ bahv-amara-drumaiḥ
analyzed: gṛha udyānam kusumitaiḥ ramyam bahu amara drumaiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.018/2 kūjad-vihaṅga-mithunaṃ gāyan-matta-madhuvratam
analyzed: kūjat vihaṅga mithunam gāyat matta madhu vratam

original: BhP_03.33.019/1 yatra praviṣṭam ātmānaṃ vibudhānucarā jaguḥ
analyzed: yatra praviṣṭam ātmānam vibudha anucarāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_03.33.019/2 vāpyām utpala-gandhinyāṃ kardamenopalālitam
analyzed: vāpyām utpala gandhinyām kardamena upalālitam

original: BhP_03.33.020/1 hitvā tad īpsitatamam apy ākhaṇḍala-yoṣitām
analyzed: hitvā tat īpsitatamam api ākhaṇḍala yoṣitām

original: BhP_03.33.020/2 kiñcic cakāra vadanaṃ putra-viśleṣaṇāturā
analyzed: kiñcid cakāra vadanam putra viśleṣaṇa āturā

original: BhP_03.33.021/1 vanaṃ pravrajite patyāv apatya-virahāturā
analyzed: vanam pravrajite patyau apatya viraha āturā

original: BhP_03.33.021/2 jñāta-tattvāpy abhūn naṣṭe vatse gaur iva vatsalā
analyzed: jñāta tattvā api abhūt naṣṭe vatse gauḥ iva vatsalā

original: BhP_03.33.022/1 tam eva dhyāyatī devam apatyaṃ kapilaṃ harim
analyzed: tam eva dhyāyatī devam apatyam kapilam harim

original: BhP_03.33.022/2 babhūvācirato vatsa niḥspṛhā tādṛśe gṛhe
analyzed: babhūva aciratas vatsa niḥspṛhā tādṛśe gṛhe

original: BhP_03.33.023/1 dhyāyatī bhagavad-rūpaṃ yad āha dhyāna-gocaram
analyzed: dhyāyatī bhagavat rūpam yat āha dhyāna gocaram

original: BhP_03.33.023/2 sutaḥ prasanna-vadanaṃ samasta-vyasta-cintayā
analyzed: sutaḥ prasanna vadanam samasta vyasta cintayā

original: BhP_03.33.024/1 bhakti-pravāha-yogena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā
analyzed: bhakti pravāha yogena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā

original: BhP_03.33.024/2 yuktānuṣṭhāna-jātena jñānena brahma-hetunā
BhP_03.33.025/1 viśuddhena tadātmānam ātmanā viśvato-mukham
analyzed: viśuddhena tadā ātmānam ātmanā viśvatomukham

original: BhP_03.33.025/2 svānubhūtyā tirobhūta- māyā-guṇa-viśeṣaṇam
analyzed: sva anubhūtyā māyā guṇa viśeṣaṇam

original: BhP_03.33.026/1 brahmaṇy avasthita-matir bhagavaty ātma-saṃśraye
analyzed: brahmaṇi avasthita matiḥ bhagavati ātma saṃśraye

original: BhP_03.33.026/2 nivṛtta-jīvāpattitvāt kṣīṇa-kleśāpta-nirvṛtiḥ
analyzed: nivṛtta jīva āpatti tvāt kṣīṇa kleśa āpta nirvṛtiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.027/1 nityārūḍha-samādhitvāt parāvṛtta-guṇa-bhramā
analyzed: nitya ārūḍha samādhi tvāt parāvṛtta guṇa bhramā

original: BhP_03.33.027/2 na sasmāra tadātmānaṃ svapne dṛṣṭam ivotthitaḥ
analyzed: na sasmāra tadā ātmānam svapne dṛṣṭam iva utthitaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.028/1 tad-dehaḥ parataḥ poṣo 'py akṛśaś cādhy-asambhavāt
analyzed: tad dehaḥ paratas akṛśaḥ ca ādhi asambhavāt

original: BhP_03.33.028/2 babhau malair avacchannaḥ sadhūma iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: babhau malaiḥ avacchannaḥ sa dhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.029/1 svāṅgaṃ tapo-yogamayaṃ mukta-keśaṃ gatāmbaram
analyzed: sva aṅgam tapaḥ yoga mayam muktakeśam gata ambaram

original: BhP_03.33.029/2 daiva-guptaṃ na bubudhe vāsudeva-praviṣṭa-dhīḥ
analyzed: daiva guptam na bubudhe vāsudeva praviṣṭa dhīḥ

original: BhP_03.33.030/1 evaṃ sā kapiloktena mārgeṇācirataḥ param
analyzed: evam sā kapila uktena mārgeṇa aciratas param

original: BhP_03.33.030/2 ātmānaṃ brahma-nirvāṇaṃ bhagavantam avāpa ha
analyzed: ātmānam brahma nirvāṇam bhagavantam avāpa ha

original: BhP_03.33.031/1 tad vīrāsīt puṇyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ trailokya-viśrutam
analyzed: tat vīra āsīt puṇyatamam kṣetram trailokya viśrutam

original: BhP_03.33.031/2 nāmnā siddha-padaṃ yatra sā saṃsiddhim upeyuṣī
analyzed: nāmnā siddhapadam yatra sā saṃsiddhim upeyuṣī

original: BhP_03.33.032/1 tasyās tad yoga-vidhuta- mārtyaṃ martyam abhūt sarit
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat yoga vidhuta mārtyam martyam abhūt sarit

original: BhP_03.33.032/2 srotasāṃ pravarā saumya siddhidā siddha-sevitā
analyzed: srotasām pravarā saumya siddhi dā siddha sevitā

original: BhP_03.33.033/1 kapilo 'pi mahā-yogī bhagavān pitur āśramāt
analyzed: kapilaḥ pi mahā yogī bhagavān pituḥ āśramāt

original: BhP_03.33.033/2 mātaraṃ samanujñāpya prāg-udīcīṃ diśaṃ yayau
analyzed: mātaram samanujñāpya prāc udīcīm diśam yayau

original: BhP_03.33.034/1 siddha-cāraṇa-gandharvair munibhiś cāpsaro-gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_03.33.034/2 stūyamānaḥ samudreṇa dattārhaṇa-niketanaḥ
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ samudreṇa datta arhaṇa niketanaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.035/1 āste yogaṃ samāsthāya sāṅkhyācāryair abhiṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: āste yogam samāsthāya sāṅkhya ācāryaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.035/2 trayāṇām api lokānām upaśāntyai samāhitaḥ
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām upaśāntyai samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.036/1 etan nigaditaṃ tāta yat pṛṣṭo 'haṃ tavānagha
analyzed: etat nigaditam tāta yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham tava anagha

original: BhP_03.33.036/2 kapilasya ca saṃvādo devahūtyāś ca pāvanaḥ
analyzed: kapilasya ca saṃvādaḥ devahūtyāḥ ca pāvanaḥ

original: BhP_03.33.037/1 ya idam anuśṛṇoti yo 'bhidhatte kapila-muner matam ātma-yoga-guhyam
analyzed: yaḥ idam anuśṛṇoti yaḥ bhidhatte kapila muneḥ matam ātma yoga guhyam

original: BhP_03.33.037/2 bhagavati kṛta-dhīḥ suparṇa-ketāv upalabhate bhagavat-padāravindam
analyzed: bhagavati kṛta dhīḥ suparṇa ketau upalabhate bhagavat pada aravindam
